tagline: Gozova is an on-demand delivery/transportation services platform focused on providing users with vetted, crowdsourced drivers for the transportation of good, large or small.
description: Gozova is an on-demand delivery/transportation services platform focused on providing users with vetted, crowdsourced drivers for the transportation of goods, large or small. Gozova currently has two distinct services:On-Demand Moving Services (focused on consumer uses cases i.e. moving, furniture delivery, etc.) and Courier Services (B2B-focused, job-site inventory movement and delivery services). Gozova takes a % split of every transaction.
problem_statement: Individuals and businesses needing to transport goods, small or large, often lack the necessary resources (trucks, physically-capable deliverers, tracking system, etc.) and/or the ability to efficiently & effectively scale fleets at competitive price points.

tagline: Our World, Regenerated
description: LOCOAL is a climate technology company comprised of military veterans, engineers, and business professionals with a unified commitment to regenerate our planet. Through new innovations, partnerships, and passion for impact, LOCOAL’s team of climate fighters is here to build a resilient, sustainable future. LOCOAL's Rainmaker (TM) is a modular semi-autonomous pyrolysis system that can be rapidly deployed anywhere, anytime. A platform system, Rainmaker is integrated with the most advanced capabilities in bioenergy conversion, data-collection, and robotics automation.
problem_statement: 500M tons of organic waste is landfilled annually - an expensive and ecologically harmful method to manage end-of-life materials that could be converted into sustainable co-products. In the U.S. alone, we spend over $50B in harmful waste management practices. LOCOAL has a solution to unlock the value of this waste.

tagline: 1700+ venues in 19 cities where you can meet, create and work
description: Squares works with 1700+ commercial real estate owners to monetize their spaces more efficiently with:1) Squares App - marketplace for renting venues for different occasions2) Squares Pass - a single subscription that gives instant access to different workspaces
problem_statement: Squares App:For Users:Main Problem: Difficulty in Finding Suitable SpacesUsers often struggle to find convenient and appropriate spaces for meetings, events, or work, leading to wasted time and effort.For Hosts:Main Problem: Underutilized SpacesHosts may have valuable commercial spaces that often remain vacant, resulting in missed revenue opportunities.Squares Pass:For Users:Main Problem: Cost and Convenience for Frequent Space UsageRegular users of meeting rooms or workspaces may find it expensive and time-consuming to book spaces individually for each use.For Hosts:Main Problem: Attracting Regular UsersHosts may find it challenging to establish a consistent stream of bookings for their spaces, especially from frequent users.

description: Legal Karma can automate complex contracts with conditional clauses, calculations -- even pronouns, grammar, and syntax
problem_statement: Building a document generation tool for Microsoft Word from scratch is nuanced, requires maintenance, and is expensive. There's always a situation you didn't expect.

tagline: Easy to Use, Impossible to Replicate
description: We have invented the most sophisticated and effective anti-counterfeit technology in existence. Safestamps are security marks that companies affix to their product's packaging. When pressed, branded images and colors are revealed. This is made possible using advanced deep-tech innovations. Safestamps are unhackable, practical, and engage end-users. We employ a mixture of broad patents and trade secrets to ensure our innovations remain unique. After 7+ years of experimentation, our product is out of the lab and ready for production. We are doing one final round of funding before fulfilling customer requests.
problem_statement: Counterfeit products cost companies $4 trillion last year. $200 billion was lost in the pharmaceutical industry alone. Fake prescription drugs cause about 1 million deaths every year. Every other anti-counterfeit solution has itself been counterfeited. Safestamp is the first truly irreplicable anti-counterfeit product. By using Safestamps on their products, companies will be able to prove their legitimacy and recapture sales lost to counterfeiters. We have agreements with high-profile companies in the pharmaceutical and electronics industries, and verbal interest from companies in the alcohol, vape, and fashion industries.

tagline: Golf Scope uses VR to make golf more accessible and fun. Their goal is to grow the game, both in terms of participants and rounds of golf played (virtual and on course).
description: ProPutt creates AR/VR golf games through the Oculus headset. Users can play on a course, practice their swings at the range, and enter into a virtual TopGolf experience. ProPutt’s mission is to bring more people into the game of golf.Price: $20 per game per user
problem_statement: There is no current way to play golf via AR/VR. People want to play and practice golf in the virtual world. TopGolf did not have a virtual presence in the AR/VR world.

tagline: AI/ML for Data Discovery, Classification and Protection
description: We have built the worlds most sophisticated ML platform for the discovery and classification of data. The Getvisibility solutions dig deep to uncover every place sensitive data is stored. Getvisibility helps organisation to quickly realise a substantial ROI due to the sophisticated out of the box models. These have been fine tuned for Health, Government, Pharmaceutical, Financial and Retail sectors.
problem_statement: Most security programs are broken because they don't focus on data. There is significant effort put into securing the borders, where attackers should be held at bay, or arms length of the crucial business data BUT If the end goal of most security programs is to protect data, then we need to shift our focus to where it lives. In Getvisibility we have a relentless focus on protecting valuable data. We apply the latest AI/ML to help our clients discover, classify and protect their data.Check out the Forrester TEI Report to see the ROI that we deliver https://lnkd.in/dAsjaW2A

tagline: for you, by you...
description: - The U.S. has a 3.8M single family home shortage and approximately 54% fewer homebuilders than 15 years ago.- National Association of Realtors reports that homebuilders would have to build 2M homes per year to catch up, yet there are currently only approximately 1.3M homes built annually.- The consequences are unaffordability, wealth disparity, and homelessness. The industry cannot solve the shortages itself.
problem_statement: - The U.S. has a 3.8M single family home shortage and approximately 54% fewer homebuilders than 15 years ago.- National Association of Realtors reports that homebuilders would have to build 2M homes per year to catch up, yet there are currently only approximately 1.3M homes built annually.- The consequences are unaffordability, wealth disparity, and homelessness. The industry cannot solve the shortages itself.

tagline: Papercut-proof Paper, produced sustainably
description: We utilize our proprietary technology to produce high grade paper that is tear-proof, reduces printer jams, and papercut-proof; while being 10 times cheaper than other tear-proof paper.
problem_statement: Paper is something we use often, especially at a younger age. And we often tear paper by mistake and get papercuts in kindargarten and elementary school. With our printer paper, notebook sheets, and book paper, children can have access to safe, durable paper and books.Additionally, our premium tear-proof paper protects the information printed on it, enabling businesses and law firms to enhance their operations and services.

tagline: Making Internships Easy
description: Raindrop is a platform that makes it easier for students to find internships - we automatically organize and track users' applications from submission to offer, tell them when they've been ghosted by companies, and connect them with opportunities they're likely to get.We save companies time and money by connecting them with the students that they’re most likely to hire.We help universities increase the overall internship success of their student body by providing analytics about their application process.
problem_statement: The current internship application process hurts students, companies, and universities.The process for most college students consists of mass applying to any company and position remotely relevant to what they want to do. This creates disorganization and confusion for the student, which is made worse by often receiving no communication from the companies they apply to. This process keeps the applicants from focusing their efforts on the positions where they're most likely to succeed.On the other side, companies waste a lot of money and time navigating candidates who aren’t a good fit. Recruiters are swamped with piles of applications and often let the best talent slip by.Universities suffer from low student internship rates and lack the data to understand how to improve them.

tagline: The Future of Space Communications
description: Solstar's mission is to make living and working in space more efficient by providing the core network equipment required to do so. We provide WiFi in space. With WiFi in space, we can connect people, payloads, spacecraft, space stations, lunar rovers, landers, and habitats just like we use WiFi networks in our offices and homes on earth.Solstar has a long spaceflight and satellite communications heritage that positions the company for being the leader for WiFi in space. Going back as far as 2005, Solstar has been advancing technologies to make aerospace communications for available and efficient. From connecting Walmart’s corporate Learjets and NATO/United Kingdom Ministry of Defense helicopters to the first texts to space in 2013 aboard an UP Aerospace sounding rocket and providing the first commercial WiFi in space in 2018 aboard Blue Origin’s New Shepard rocket, Solstar has been leading the way for aerospace communications.
problem_statement: Wifi Access points built specifically to operate in the extreme conditions of space currently does not exist.  NASA and commercial space companies building space stations and bases on the moon have a requirement for the WiFi that Solstar is developing.Just like on Earth, we need network equipment in space. Unfortunately, today WiFi in space isn’t easy and is practically non-existent. This is a missing piece in space-based communications that Solstar is fulfilling.

tagline: AI solutions for one of the largest industries on earth
description: PLT uses artificial intelligence and machine vision to provide livestock producers actionable insights that drive higher profits, better quality, and improved animal health.  Our technology addresses the most important areas that can be improved in large commercial livestock operations:*Feeding – Where more accurate and objective measurements can be used to safely maximize intake, save labor, increase quality and minimize errors.*Performance – Where weight data can be used to optimize harvest timing and evaluate optimal feeding strategies.*Health – Where early detection of illness can reduce antibiotic usage and minimize death loss.
problem_statement: The livestock sector is one of the largest industries on earth but is underserved by technology.  Many decisions are based on observations rather than data, and skilled labor is increasingly hard to find and retain.  To achieve the higher levels of automation required to combat these issues,  the industry needs accurate and timely data.

tagline: Forging Meaningful Connections
description: Founding Titans is a community-focused relationship management platform designed to help Pre-seed to Series A founders connect with the right resources and networks for their startups, enhancing productivity by improving communication and reducing inefficiencies.
problem_statement: 150 million startups globally face severe growth challenges due to siloed resources and inefficient networking processes; limiting their access to critical operational assets.

tagline: Resilient Data Everywhere
description: Kinnami provides AmiShare, a Zero Trust secure resilient data mesh for data sharing at the edge. AmiShare simplifies data availability, protection, and security for complex distributed systems and provides peer-to-peer data sharing critical to dynamic digital edge systems, including devices such as laptops, smart phones, drones, robotics and many other autonomous systems. AmiShare data mesh operates even where networks may be unstable or devices are air-gapped and ensures data gets where it is needed on time using the best available resources.Kinnami was named a “Cool Vendor” in Edge Computing by Gartner in Fall of 2023 and is a winner of the NATO Innovation Award for resilience in Fall 2022. Kinnami is committed to enabling a connected future through innovative data management solutions.
problem_statement: Gartner predicts a dramatic shift in data processing, with 50% of enterprise data generated and processed at the edge by 2025, up from just 10% in 2018. As devices like laptops, mobiles, drones, and robotics proliferate, organizations increasingly rely on edge computing. Unlike traditional data center-centric models, the edge presents unique challenges in data availability, security, and protection.To scale effectively, enterprises must decentralize edge systems while maintaining centralized control. This requires zero-touch management, orchestration, and robust distributed data management. Additionally, edge systems demand unwavering reliability and data accessibility, even when networks are disrupted. Kinnami AmiShare addresses these critical challenges.

Kinnami will provide the secure distributed hybrid data fabric and work with researchers to allow secure data collection at the edge using internet of things, including sensors, UAVs and more and secure data processing and management from the edge to the cloud; visualizations and analytics of data using machine learning; socio-technical impacts (e.g., fairness of data, algorithms, and analysis), and decision support systems.

tagline: Stembot designs and provides educational robots and tools that help students harness their critical and creative thinking potential. All students should have exposure and high quality opportunities to creative and critical thinking empowerment. Students must be encouraged from an early age about the great opportunities in STEM professions, where our country needs them most.

tagline: The first federally regulated digital asset platform
description: A Federally RegulatedDigital Asset Platform. that is:-Consistently aligned with US regulators and stakeholders.-A B2B platform focused solely on US compliance and regulation for banks, family offices and institutions.

Enter and maintain a US market share, and capture the transfer of wealthb. tagline: Create effective and inclusive job ads to attract top talent
description: Our algorithms help you construct recruitment material that is filled with language empirically shown to be inviting for marginalized groups. With the help of our product, you will create recruitment content that will significantly increase applicant conversion rate and the diversity of your applicant pool.
problem_statement: Most organizational leaders don’t recognize that the language they’re using is driving applicants away.We know how hard it is to get top talent in the door. That’s why we created a job description tool to help you infuse your job ads with inviting and engaging language that increases applicant interest.

tagline: The most intelligent physical asset management & performance system in the world.
description: Sentient Science is a technology leader specializing in material science and physics-based prognostic modeling. Our core expertise lies in predicting the performance, reliability, and lifecycle of mechanical systems through advanced computational methods. By leveraging physics-based data and material science, we provide actionable insights that optimize maintenance schedules, enhance system reliability, and reduce operational costs. Our proven track record with defense and industrial clients demonstrates our ability to deliver innovative solutions to complex technical challenges.Sentient’s DigitalClone® is a patented digital twin, AI SaaS solution, developed in partnership with NASA and the DoD that uses proprietary physics-based modeling to predict the life of mechanical systems, optimize advanced manufacturing, and recommend timely and life-saving maintenance. With detailed insight into microstructure properties, the physics of friction, lubrication, and wear, the software predicts fatigue, future performance, life cycle, and failure. Customers use DigitalClone® to unlock insights that lower the costs of designing, operating, and sustaining high value assets for rotorcraft, ground vehicles, industry equipment, and energy regeneration platforms. Think of advanced asset management for mission critical mechanical systems. As the market continues to mature particularly in advanced manufacturing, we are seeing rapidly increasing traction in the additive manufacturing/3D printing space where we have patented technology as well that builds on our core DigitalClone platform.The company’s customer base includes Shell, Lockheed Martin, Raytheon, Rolls-Royce, NASA, Booz Allen, and Liberty Power, the US Army, the US Air Force, the US Navy, and the Department of Energy.
problem_statement: Existing asset management and maintenance prediction methods rely on a combination of sensors, diagnostics, advanced analytics, and machine learning algorithms that typically leverage very outdated schematics and limited historical performance data. This generally results in failure and critical maintenance warnings occurring 0-4 months before failure. These approaches also generally only report when they expect the failure to happen with very little additional detail with much confidence. With our approach we are able to increase that time horizon to up to 18 months in advance as well as provide extremely accurate diagnostics that answer how and why the failure will occur with recommendations for improvement. This saves our clients both time and money and in certain cases, like with the US Army, it is lifesaving.

tagline: Redefining the Human Journey
description: Executive Summary: MozeeMozee is dedicated to revolutionizing first and last-mile transportation through the use of advanced autonomous shuttles. Our focus is on providing flexible, predefined routes that adapt to the needs of commuters, enhancing their mobility and convenience.Key Highlights:First and Last Mile Focus: Mozee addresses the critical gaps in the transportation network by offering seamless solutions for the first and last miles of a commute. This ensures that commuters can easily connect to major transit hubs and their final destinations.Flexible Predefined Routes: Initially, our services will operate on flexible, predefined routes. This approach allows us to efficiently meet demand while maintaining a high level of service reliability and consistency.Non-LiDAR Based Technology: Unlike many of our competitors, Mozee employs advanced autonomous driving technologies that do not rely on LiDAR. This enables us to offer a more cost-effective and scalable solution without compromising safety and performance.B2B Partnerships: We work directly with municipalities and private customers, positioning ourselves as a B2B business. By collaborating closely with these entities, we tailor our services to meet the specific needs of different communities and organizations, ensuring a better fit and higher adoption rates.Goal of Increasing Commuter Flexibility: Our overarching goal is to increase commuter flexibility through the adoption of autonomous technology. By integrating autonomy into mass transit, we aim to make transportation more accessible, efficient, and adaptable to individual needs.Shuttle Design: Our shuttles resemble traditional trolleys but operate without the need for tracks. This design combines the charm and functionality of trolleys with the modern benefits of autonomous technology, offering a unique and attractive transit solution.Innovative Transit Approach: Mozee takes inspiration from New York City's dynamic approach to mass transit, infusing it with the latest advancements in autonomous technology. This blend creates a robust and forward-thinking transit solution that meets the demands of contemporary urban life.Mozee is poised to transform urban mobility by enhancing commuter flexibility and integrating advanced autonomous shuttles into the public transit ecosystem. Our innovative approach and commitment to excellence position us as a leader in the next generation of transportation solutions.
problem_statement: Despite significant advancements in technology and increasing consumer interest in sustainable transportation solutions in the autonomous electric vehicle (AEV) market, several key issues persist presenting barriers to market penetration and profitability for companies operating in this sector:Application: Most existing AEV companies are focusing on the consumer market by retrofitting sensors onto existing consumer vehicles and enhancing ADAS capabilities. However, these vehicles are not purpose-built for autonomous operation, thus falling short of true self-driving capabilities. Although some companies have plans for purpose-built vehicles in the future, they would have to redo all the real-world testing as consumer vehicles have vastly different driving patterns, vehicle dynamics, passenger and safety requirements, and sensor/tech specifications, compared to purpose-built shuttles. Moreover, the presence of non-autonomous vehicles on the roads adds complexity and variables that the current state of autonomous software cannot safely handle, unless there are dedicated routes supported by local authorities.Changing Trends: Unforeseen disruptions such as the Covid-19 pandemic, remote work trends, and economic shifts, have significantly altered the transportation landscape in the past five years. As fewer people own personal vehicles, particularly in urban areas, public transit systems are struggling to adapt and provide accessible and reliable solutions. Additionally, public transit has developed a negative perception among the growing middle-class consumer as an unsafe and unreliable option. This has led to an average of 5 occupants per standard city bus in sprawling cities like DFW.Cost and Affordability: The high initial cost of electric and autonomous vehicles remains a significant barrier for many consumers. While the total cost of ownership over the vehicle's lifespan may be lower than traditional internal combustion engine vehicles, the upfront cost often presents a deterrent, particularly in price-sensitive market segments. Addressing cost barriers and enhancing affordability is essential for expanding the customer base and achieving economies of scale in production.Technological Reliability and Safety: While advancements in autonomous driving technology have been substantial, concerns regarding the reliability and safety of these systems persist. Incidents involving autonomous vehicles, such as accidents or system malfunctions, undermine public trust and confidence in the technology. Ensuring the robustness and safety of autonomous systems is crucial for widespread adoption and market acceptance.Addressing these challenges requires a multifaceted approach involving collaboration among industry stakeholders, policymakers, and technology innovators. By overcoming these obstacles, the autonomous electric vehicle industry can realize its potential to revolutionize transportation, reduce emissions, and create a more sustainable future.

tagline: The Supply Chain of the Circular Economy

LoopDeco has built a national network of charities and drivers with pickup trucks, cargo vans, and box trucks to make removing and reusing unwanted furniture easier than ever before.
problem_statement: $30 billion in reusable furniture is discarded annually by US businesses and individuals.

tagline: An end-to-end solution for nurse turnover
description: Weeve.ai is a People Transformation Platform that helps hospital systems reduce nurse turnover. We identify who is about to quit, why they plan to leave, and rapidly implement solutions to transform burnt out, at-risk individuals into happy and high-performing nurses. Weeve.ai has helped large healthcare networks like Prime Healthcare, Beth Israel, and St. Elizabeth Healthcare maintain up to 50% lower turnover than norms.
problem_statement: In the last five years, the average hospital faced 100% staff turnover rate, at an average cost of $35,000,000 per institution. However, this is no longer just a financial problem. With a projected shortage of up to 450,000 nurses by 2025, it has become existential.

tagline: Sell anything, anywhere.
description: Porcelain is the smallest and most affordable vending machine in the world. Its size, affordability, and energy efficiency allows owners to sell in places inaccessible to traditional vending machines including Ubers, AirBnBs and the remote outdoors.
problem_statement: Porcelain was founded to serve those who have encountered setbacks with traditional retail and e-commerce due to variables largely out of their control. In the case of traditional retail, fixed location due to size and electrical reliance is inherently a limitation. In e-commerce, adjustments to algorithmic ranking and the high-cost of search can be just as detrimental. Porcelain vending machines provide entrepreneurs with an alternative sales channel removed from growth inhibiting aspects of modern day retail and e-commerce.

tagline: The Immune System for AI – Hallucination-Free, Reliable, and Self-learning AI
description: At Elloe AI, we believe that AI has the power to change lives —but only if it can be trusted. In a world where AI influences every decision we make, from financial transactions to medical diagnoses, accuracy is everything. But here’s the problem: AI is still prone to mistakes—whether it’s generating false information, misinterpreting data, or acting on inherent biases.So, we asked ourselves a bold question: What if AI could protect itself? What if we could build an immune system for AI, one that could continuously monitor, detect, and correct errors in real time—before they impact critical decisions?That’s exactly what we’ve done. At Elloe AI, we’ve built technology that ensures AI systems are not just powerful, but also reliable, accurate, and safe. Our platform actively eliminates misinformation, bias, and hallucinations, so businesses in industries like finance, healthcare, and legal can trust their AI to make the right decisions.We’re on a mission to redefine trust in AI. Because when AI is flawless, businesses unlock new levels of innovation, and the world moves forward with confidence. Say Elloe to a future where AI isn’t just smart—it’s dependable.
problem_statement: In today's world, AI is everywhere, powering critical industries like finance, healthcare, and law. However, despite its transformative potential, AI is flawed. Studies show that even the most advanced models make mistakes, hallucinate, or produce biased outcomes up to 3% of the time. In high-stakes industries, these errors can have devastating consequences—from biased loan approvals to incorrect medical diagnoses, resulting in financial losses, damaged trust, and life-threatening risks.The problem is simple: Businesses can’t fully trust AI because of its unpredictability. And with AI adoption accelerating globally, the risks of relying on faulty or biased AI systems are compounding.Elloe AI is addressing this urgent problem by building an immune system for AI, ensuring that these systems are accurate, reliable, and free of errors in real-time. Our breakthrough solutions monitor, detect, and correct AI hallucinations, misinformation, and biases, empowering businesses to trust their AI models without the fear of costly mistakes. In short, we’re making AI as dependable as it is powerful, so companies can innovate without risk.Our vision is to enable flawless AI decision-making, especially in sectors where accuracy is not a luxury but a necessity.

description: View our investor deck at https://docsend.com/view/mhydeyb37pxeifh2Founded by serial entrepreneurs in 2020, Donatestock is democratizing charitable stock gifting by making it accessible, safe and easy for millions of investors and nonprofits. problem_statement: Stock gifting represents $50 billion in untapped funding with unparalleled advantages over cash: donors avoid capital gains tax while deducting full market value while allowing nonprofits to keep the proceeds that would otherwise go to the IRS.  Yet stock gifting is used by <1% of 100 million investors due to decades-old problems:1. Very few investors are aware of the benefits of donating stock.2. The stock gifting process is onerous, opaque and manually intensive for donors.3. Less than 5% of nonprofits have brokerage accounts that are necessary to receive stock.4. Those that have a brokerage cannot scale stock gifting due to the manual, fractured process and lack of data needed to reconcile and acknowledge gifts.

tagline: The Foundational AI for Defense
description: "Modern Intelligence builds the AI platform to watch all of the DOD's sensors and tell American warfighters where the bad guys are. Our first AI Cutlass is a software product that can deploy on any UXS, ship, plane, or COP to process sensor data in real-time from any sensor. Cutlass turns that sensor data into real-time, shareable, non-proprietary target tracks to act as a distributed 'red force tracker' for autonomy platforms, commanders, and weapons.  Cutlass runs on the edge, has an open API, and can learn novel targets with no data and remember unique targets across time. It can detect, track, remember and share targets across DOD platforms, breaking down data silos. It has been tested with ONR, JIATF-S, NSW, NGA, and USAF tracking targets for simulated INDOPACOM and SOUTHCOM missions.Modern has raised $12M+ in VC capital from Bedrock, Caffeinated, Contrary, Air Street, Champion Hill, and others and are a team of 14 based in Austin TX. We are sponsored by SOCOM for a TS FCL."
problem_statement: Over the next 10 years, the DOD will 10x the number of drones it deploys to see the battlefield faster and more effectively. However, it cannot 10x the volume of people dedicated to manually watching video, radar, and sonar feeds and telling each other what they see. This is how defense intelligence, surveillance, reconnaissance, and targeting is done today. It causes error - as humans make mistakes. It is slow - because it's limited by the number of people and how quickly they can work. And it creates data silos between DOD systems and units that make sharing enemy location difficult. All of these problems can cost lives in war and exponentially drive up the cost of solving them conventionally, manually, or with siloed computer systems.This problem: Turning real-time sensor data from a variety of platforms into target tracks of where the bad guys are in a shareable way, is the first and most important AI problem in defense.

While the early foundations of our products and solutions focused on universities and government agencies, our solutions today allow us to bring these leading-edge solutions to the commercial marketplace which create new standards and solutions that have broader impact.
problem_statement: Current technologies deployed in the telecommunication market have limited bandwidth and distance in RF deployments and cost to install in dense urban environments in the case of fiber.  X-lumin TeraLink product suite provides additional options for the telecom and fiber deployment companies to address this issue. description: Planning Hub is revolutionizing the event management industry by empowering professionals to manage and monetize their networks through curated preferred partner marketplaces. Our platform centralizes communication among event planners, venues, and vendors, offering tailored workflows that streamline collaboration and decision-making. By enabling professionals to create and share their own marketplaces of trusted partners, we unlock new revenue streams and strengthen industry connections. With real-time updates and seamless integration, Planning Hub brings unprecedented clarity, control, and profitability to every stage of event planning. Led by industry expert Michael and seasoned CTO Raj, we're poised to redefine how events are organized and executed, offering a compelling opportunity for early-stage investors to join us in transforming the industry.
problem_statement: Organizing events is a high-pressure task due to the intricate coordination required among planners, venues, and vendors, often relying on fragmented communication like phone calls, texts, and emails that create data silos and lead to overlooked details and last-minute crises. Current preferred vendor lists are outdated and static. At the same time, traditional marketplaces are overwhelming and inconsistent in quality, charging vendors upfront fees without guaranteeing business—misaligning incentives and offering little reliability for planners. Monetizing vendor relationships through reselling is risky and diverts focus from core competencies. There's a clear need for a solution that streamlines coordination, ensures quality and reliability, aligns incentives between planners and vendors, and enables event professionals to manage and monetize their professional connections without the risks associated with traditional reselling.

tagline: We are building an AI powered eye disease diagnostic system
description: At Ai-Ris, where we are disrupting the diagnostics space with a ML/AI headset for eye exams in the primary care setting. We are going after the leading cause of preventable blindness - diabetic vision loss (34M pts/year) and our technology has applications to detect Alzheimer's, Cardiac arrests etc., early. It is estimated that this form of vision loss can affect 34million Americans each year with its economic burden amounting to 21 billion dollars. Our technology will radically bring this price down by increasing access to eye exams by 10-fold.Thus far, we've been NSF SBIR funded, have clinical partnerships with Harvard and UT San Antonio, are published in Nature and Cell, have signed letter of intents, and we are currently raising our first round.
problem_statement: Vision Loss due to diabetes is a huge problem affecting up to 34 million people each year in U.S. and over 200million globally. Early detection is key to prevention, but due to lack of easy access to retinal exams, most people go undiagnosed and suffer from vision loss.After going through the NSF National ICORPS program and conducting over 300 customer interviews, we decided our target market as primary care clinics located in the U.S. Specifically, clinics that participate in “Medicare Advantage” or other quality-based care programs that receive insurance reimbursement corresponding to their ability to meet specific quality-based measures, which includes the percentage of diabetic patients receiving their yearly retinal exam. However, physicians have no way to ensure that their patients see a specialist for their eye exam. With the rise of such quality-based care programs, we are noticing a strong trend for PCPs to offer robust services.

That is, over 21 million Americans in rural areas, and over 3 billion people worldwide, can not access broadband Internet, denying them critical education, commercial, and healthcare services. tagline: Geospatial at Scale, Simplified.
description: SpatialScale is a pioneering geospatial cloud computing company that simplifies access to advanced geo AI/ML technologies for businesses across diverse industries. Headquartered in Austin, TX, SpatialScale offers scalable and efficient cloud-based solutions that enable organizations to manage, analyze, and visualize complex geospatial data with ease. Our platform is designed to provide powerful geospatial analysis, real-time processing, and automated workflows, transforming how businesses approach tasks like land surveying, urban planning, environmental monitoring, and defense operations.Founded in 2021 by Jonathan Pascoe, a seasoned geospatial technology expert and former GeoInt Soldier, SpatialScale bridges the gap between cutting-edge geospatial analytics and practical, user-friendly applications. We specialize in point cloud classification, feature extraction, and secure, enterprise-grade data solutions. SpatialScale's mission is to democratize geospatial technology, empowering organizations to harness the full potential of their data while reducing costs and improving decision-making through innovative cloud infrastructure and AI-driven insights.
problem_statement: SpatialScale is addressing the complexity and inaccessibility of advanced geospatial data analysis. In industries like aerial land surveying, urban planning, environmental monitoring, and defense, the ability to process, analyze, and visualize large volumes of geospatial data is critical. However, traditional methods are resource-intensive, require specialized expertise, and are often cost-prohibitive for many organizations.Key problems we solve include:High Complexity and Technical Barriers: Many organizations struggle to leverage advanced geospatial technologies, such as AI/ML-based feature extraction and real-time data processing, due to the expertise required.Scalability and Cost: Handling large geospatial datasets requires significant hardware investments and infrastructure, making it difficult for businesses to scale operations efficiently.Slow Data Processing and Analysis: Industries like aerial land surveying and defense need real-time insights from geospatial data. Traditional solutions often result in delays, reducing the effectiveness of decision-making.Integration and Usability: Many existing geospatial tools are difficult to integrate with enterprise systems, and their complex interfaces can deter non-technical users.SpatialScale's cloud-based platform solves these challenges by providing an easy-to-use, scalable, and affordable geospatial cloud computing solution that automates and optimizes geospatial workflows, making advanced analytics accessible to a broader range of industries.

tagline: Food management done right. Waste less, save more.
description: We're a food management app that revolutionizes the way you store and track your groceries, ensuring freshness and reducing waste. Upon scanning your grocery receipt, Foveo not only suggests the optimal storage methods for each item but also provides a tailored expiration timeline. As each product nears its expiry date, you'll receive timely updates, empowering you to make informed decisions about your food's safety. Additionally, Foveo gives you a detailed nutrient makeup of your order, highlighting any potential deficiencies and how to address them. And after using your food, Foveo gives you exclusive coupons from nearby grocery stores for exact what you just used up, help you minimize your grocery cost. Join us in our mission to make food management smarter, safer, and more sustainable.
problem_statement: Have you ever had groceries that you’ve had to throw out? Maybe a squishy tomato, some meat that smells weird, or maybe something that says use within 5 days of opening and you can’t remember when you opened it?Turns out, it’s practically everyone. Us too. When fridges are stocked to the brim with all sorts of ingredients, be it your own or roommates, it’s hard to keep track of what’s going bad. In fact, the average household wastes 31.9% of the food it acquires. This is about $1,866 worth of food each year for a household, amounting to over $240 billion annually in America alone.Moreover, when an expiry date is up, that doesn't necessarily mean something has gone bad. Yet, it's estimated that 91% of consumers discard food based on the "sell by" date, mistaking it for a safety indicator. Figuring out if food is safe to eat or how to even store it correctly can be a time-consuming series of google searches nobody wants to bother with. And it's important to mention there are 10 different sources who all say different things. That's just too much work.Unused and expired groceries are one of the largest contributors to food waste today. In a day and age where inflation is rampant and groceries are expensive as ever, it's crucial that people use the groceries they buy to their full potential, wasting less and saving more.

tagline: The solar tracker that makes solar PV farms profitable
description: Samtracs designed a single-axis tracker that reduces the cost of building solar photovoltaic farms by 12% and increases its yearly revenue by at least 10% using generative artificial intelligence intra-hour forecasting. Both solutions add 30% more value to the utility solar farm, that is $46 million per 100 MW.
problem_statement: Samtracs simultaneously solves two problems faced by utility-scale solar photovoltaic (PV) plant developers : 1) the soaring cost of constructing utility-scale solar farms, due to a piece-meal construction process, and 2) the curtailment (reduction) of solar power output by grid operators due to solar intermittency, which causes lost revenues for plant owners.

tagline: The marketplace for shipping supplies.
description: We are a marketplace that matches buyers and sellers of shipping supplies (pallets, boxes, totes, drums, etc). We help buyers lower their shipping costs, our sellers generate revenue reselling their packaging, all while lowering emissions in the circular economy.
problem_statement: Companies who use industrial packaging and shipping supplies (pallets, totes, barrels, boxes) are massively overcharged for these shipping materials and, in turn,  underpaid for reselling theirs. Customers must manually call around to individual brokers as opposed to buying online, creating a lack of price honesty.

tagline: Telemedicine for the LatinX community.
description: Telemedicine for the LatinX community.1) VeMiDoc has developed a fully integrated and functional bilingual platform that connects patients to their own local and trusted doctors.2) They have a strong network of medical providers and partnerships with a range of healthcare entities (ie, Managed Care Organizations) that are best placed to reach Latino patients.3) VeMiDoc’s strength is not only in the proprietary platform and network, but in their targeted messaging strategy and outreach in Spanish.
problem_statement: Latinos are the fastest growing US population. They have the highest life expectancy rates, yet among the lowest rates of access to healthcare in the nation. This disparity is caused by lack of affordable options, coupled with socio-economic, language and cultural barriers when seeking out healthcare—a disproportionate effect that has been exacerbate. No telemedicine company has made a serious effort to capture it.

tagline: HD2Menus is a Visual Communication Platform the cuts cost and improves efficiency and boots profits by offering cost effective, turnkey solution for digital menus, directories and signage. for small & medium size businesses.
description: Menu Displays with integrated software and mounting solution that allow the customer to create/design/update/schedule menus themself or find a designer/content creator using our online marketplace. Brands can rent AdSpace on Displays by subsidizing Hardware purchase and softwaresubscription credits.
problem_statement: 90% of restaurants don't have digital menus. Digital signage market worth $20B. Hassle & cost of printed/fabricated menus, directories & signage leads to profit lost due to incorrect pricing or info.

tagline: Home is health, Community is life
description: Our mission is simple: We believe home is health and community is life. We believe that an affordable home combined with a friendly community and easier access to health and lifestyle services will lead to healthier living.Perch Houses partners with institutional homeowners to manage homes for a monthly fee. We then lease these homes to 2-3 residents (starting with women, expanding to men in late 2024). Each resident enjoys a private bedroom, bathroom and personal space, with shared common areas.We then act as a concierge for our renters by building needs-based profiles and providing access to local lifestyle and aging services in exchange for lead generation fees from vendors
problem_statement: By age 55, Solo Agers are looking ahead and preserving capital while still still paying for private health insurance. They need a way to reduce costs while planning for a healthy future as they head into their late 60’s and beyond with Medicare. There are three primary challenges1.	Exclusivity: Only about 8% of Americans aged 65+ reside in a senior living facility.2.	Cost: According to the Harvard Joint Center for Housing Studies, 49% of renter households are already cost-burdened, meaning they spend 30% or more of net income on housing. For Active Adult community renters, the monthly rent typically ranges from $1,800 to well over $3,000. Optional services can add $500 to $1,500 per month. In addition, many communities require a substantial buy-in fee.3.	Health: Social isolation and loneliness hinder good health, putting older adults at risk for high blood pressure, heart disease, obesity, a weakened immune system, anxiety, depression, cognitive decline, Alzheimer’s disease, and even death.We see this as an unsustainable situation requiring a bold new approach combining attainable residential real estate utilization with lifestyle and senior living services for Solo Agers seeking a healthy future.

tagline: We design and produce all-in-one 3D printing solutions that encompass the function of an entire suite of printers in a single machine.
description: Creative 3D Technologies addresses that divided marketplace by creating 3D printers that are truly all-in-one. Creative 3D's printers encompass the separated functions of an entire suite of 7+ 3D printers, in a single machine. Except unlike a multitool that can typically perform many functions but none better than a dedicated tool, Creative 3D's printers outperform the competition with each of the individual functions the company combines. Not only does Creative 3D's printers encompass these separated printing functions, but also enables the combination of them. Users can merge the separated functions of printers to create previously impossible to produce parts, or bolster single 3D printing functions. Paired with the fact that Creative 3D's first product is more than 80% less expensive than the closest competitor, the company's products are an ideal solution for any customer, even if they don't have a need for multiple functionalities.3D printers are tools that are made to overcome current design constraints, so why should they obey the same constraints when being designed or produced? Creative 3D wasn't satisfied with the answer of "Because everyone else is," and set forth to design a 3D printer from the ground up ignoring industry standards, design constraints, and production constraints. As a result, Creative 3D created a modular platform that can be relevant for years to come, and is adaptable to change and improve as 3D printing does. This set the basis of how Creative 3D will break the mold in the design and production of products, doing everything in-house with custom production and testing tools. The market loves the product and is salivating awaiting the company's move to production. With the immense growth of the marketplace and buying cycle of original adopters of 3D printing requiring new more capable printers, it's an ideal time for Creative 3D to be launching!
problem_statement: Creative 3D Technologies addresses a divided 3D printing marketplace. Currently, when a customer goes to buy a 3D printer, they must know exactly what type of parts they'd like to create and buy a specialty 3D printer. For example, to print large parts, they need to purchase a large printer that only prints large parts. That large printer isn't capable of fine precision, parts, metals, industrial-grade materials, simultaneous batches of parts, or fiber-reinforced parts as those are all separate functions of other specialty printers. That divide in function spans throughout the market, with few competitors selling for each niche function for each price tier of customer. As a result, Creative 3D Technologies sees that technology and innovation are stunted, the price for functionality is high, there are artificial market dividers, and the market is operating inefficiently against customers.

tagline: Connecting the next generation to honest work
description: Gateway Gigs is a video-based hiring platform for the entry level workforce and companies that hire them. By attacking the dual sided labor market we are making it easier for business to hire people better -faster, creating a new marketplace for Gen Z.
problem_statement: Filling the gap for the dual sided labor market that's experiencing an all time high in ghosting and the lack of quality talent to fill open positions. Business owners believe nobody wants to work anymore, and early career job seekers who earnestly want gainful employment struggle to be viewed by employers, the old-school traditional job board isn't getting it done. We bridge this gap by putting committed job seekers directly in front of hiring managers on our platform via videos and quality controlled job postings and resumes.

tagline: Sports Betting social media platform
description: Bookit Sports aims to bring together the fragmented sports betting industry under one platform. With Bookit, sports bettors can connect through a social feed, track their bets, purchase verified expert picks, and gain statistical insights into the games they are wagering on. This approach is unique to Bookit because there is no other platform in the sports betting space that is taking a social-first approach to bringing the community together. With the industry rapidly expanding, Bookit aims to be the center of the social experience of betting.
problem_statement: Despite the rapid growth of sports betting, the industry remains socially fragmented and decentralized.

tagline: Fantasy sports, for reality TV.
description: Bracketology is the premier centralized fantasy gaming platform for reality TV. Led by its first property, Bach Bracket (founded in 2016, think Fantasy Football for The Bachelor franchise television shows), Bracketology has expanded into additional reality TV shows (Survivor and Big Brother). Over the past 5 reality TV show seasons for which we offer fantasy games, we’ve seen212,000 league sign-ups, with $0 spent on marketing/user acquisition. New leadership was brought onto the team in 2021 as Bach Bracket became Bracketology, with a goal of expanding from a passion project to a global business.
problem_statement: Reality TV fans are craving more engagement with their favorite shows through fantasy gaming, but current solutions in the market are decentralized, unreliable, and lack community focus. Reality TV shows are being created at a faster rate than ever (~300 new shows/year), yet not enough is being done to more meaningful engage its audience.

tagline: Everything micor-creator's need to monetize video content with ads and subscriptions
description: Exstreamity is a SaaS technology company uniquely positioned in the void between aggregators like Youtube, Onlyfans, and TikTok and custom solutions like Vimeo. We allow anyone with video content to monetize with ads but with more customization than aggregators and with less cost and shorter lead times than custom solutions. And unlike the aggregators, our users get their own customizable mobile apps and a website on their domain that can be launched in hours using our proprietary workflow and with no out-of-pocket costs.
problem_statement: Small and medium sized content creators like fitness trainers, spiritual leaders, motivational speakers, small production studios, and others have no video streaming platforms that are easy to launch, affordable, and customizable. Video streaming platforms in the market fall into two categories and those categories are at opposite ends of the spectrum as it relates to cost and features. Aggregator solutions like Youtube are easy to launch but have no customization. Custom solutions like Vimeo are fully customizable but are very expensive, have long lead times to market, and require creators to bring their own payment processing and ads. Also, aggregator solutions like Youtube strip content creators of their individuality by placing them in the Youtube ecosystem with millions of other content creators - all vying for the same video views. Our solution is uniquely positioned in the void between these two extremes and provides everything creators need including billing, payment processing, and ad networks.

tagline: make the web better for all with just a single line of code.
description: With just *ONE* line of code, we make any website to load in one second or less on mobile.

tagline: Future of Work - virtual work as a service
description: Work anywhere with vSpatial. Productivity and Collaboration Toolsets for the Virtual Workspace.  Leading, patented solution for consumers, smb, and enterprise who want more out of remote working.  Over 120,000 users on the Quest 2 alone.
problem_statement: Work anywhere with unlimited monitors.Remote doesn't have to mean distant.Sometimes you need to focus on the people, sometimes it’s the content – but usually, it’s both. With vSpatial, you don’t have to pick one or the other.

tagline: mission is to decarbonize the transportation of goods
description: Automating on-demand logistics
problem_statement: A stealth startup disrupting industries that need to move goods

tagline: Now UrinControl of Your Health
description: At Starling, we are developing the world's first continuous at-home urine remote monitoring platform which seamlessly integrates into any patients’ daily bathroom routine enabling passive screening for a large array of critical biomarkers. Using our automated toilet indwelling device and our connected AI driving our digital health infrastructure, our platform enables the early detection of our patient’s chronic health issues and the activation of downstream care workflows like never before. In the process, it can help prevent costly hospitalizations for health issues, including recurrent UTIs, diabetes, heart failure, kidney disease, at risk pregnancies, and many more. Our first product, UrinDx, is FDA registered and Medicare reimbursed for monitoring the risk of urinary tract infections and we have successfully launched with our first clinical partners. Our first enterprise customer that has a total potential contract value over $144M in ARR and we have the next 4 customers in our pipeline with plans to begin their pilots in 2024. Before expanding out to our broader $74B market in the US alone. Since Y-combinator (W22), we raised a 3.7M seed round led by some great institutional funds like Rebel Fund, Magic Fund and a strategic potential future acquirer.
problem_statement: For an adult living with a chronic health condition, accessing care, sometimes as simple as providing a urine sample, commonly involves confusion, logistical challenges, and potentially shame. These challenges may prevent a patient from getting the care they need, and can ultimately land them in the Emergency Room with delirium or sepsis.

tagline: The Competitive Edge in Lending
description: CollateralEdge™ is an innovative, collateral coverage solution designed to give community and regional banks a competitive edge in commercial lending. Our FinTech platform enables banks to overcome short-term underwriting concerns and policy exceptions – the result: more closed deals and less wasted resources.
problem_statement: We partner with community banks to help them solve short term underwriting issues on commercial loans.

tagline: Biosignals AI
description: We're building AI technology for sports teams (across major competitive sports), businesses, and individuals to greatly reduce injury and increase performance.
problem_statement: Health context data, correlations, and decision making across multiple data streams. This impacts markets from general consumer to healthcare to pro sports.

tagline: Hire Fortune 500 employees for your projects
description: Tilvo is a platform that connects businesses with skilled professionals from Fortune 500 companies, offering access to elite talent for project innovation and efficiency. It provides a unique opportunity to access top-tier expertise, typically reserved for top-tier corporations, thereby maximizing the value and impact of each project.
problem_statement: Have you, as a business, ever dreamed of having a cybersecurity expert from Apple working with you, or an AI expert from Google, but can't afford or don't need that expertise full-time? Now it's possible with Tilvo. Tilvo connects businesses with top-tier professionals from Fortune 500 companies for flexible, part-time, or project-based work. This arrangement offers cost-effective access to specialized expertise, enhances project outcomes, and enables scalability. It bridges skill gaps without the long-term commitments of full-time hires, reducing HR burdens and helping businesses quickly adapt to market demands and global opportunities

tagline: THE Consumer to Dealer Used Car Market Place
description: Frulu is revolutionizing the way you sell your car using AI and a human touch.For Car Sellers:  We provide a seamless transaction experience from listing your car all the way to cash in your pocket. Using proprietary AI technology, we match you with the best vetted buyers for your car, getting you the best possible deal.For Used Car Dealers: We provide access to thousands of newly listed cars that would otherwise not have been on your radar. Our AI will help match you with cars that you might like to purchase and connect you to those sellers.
problem_statement: Over 440,000 people Google “sell my car” or "sell my (insert car model)" on a daily basis in the U.S. There isn't one company that provides a destination for consumers to reach dealers like Frulu does.Frulu has the unique ability to reach the consumers sentiment thru search engines better than ALL of the incumbents.We help consumers sell their car faster and more easily, generating the most money for their car, while also supporting ALL car dealerships, big and small.Frulu will be a destination URL by capturing the hearts and minds of consumers & dealers.Selling your car?  FRULU IT!

tagline: Intelligent Decision Support  for Extreme Edge Use Cases
description: Hybrid and module-based system that provides resilient decision support, workflow automation, and collaboration for distributed workforces that operate in constrained, challenging, and austere environments.  The modular and open API configurable services provide an AI-based intelligent distributed system architecture for assurance and resiliency of local in the field operations and decision support, even when uplinks, networks, clouds, and SaaS resources are not available.  System supports thousands of sensor types and scales to thousands of nodes without high cost infrastructures or deployments.  System natively supports IoT, AI/ML at the edge, distributed AI across nodes, cybersecurity, and interoperates with 5G/4G, Wi-Fi, IoT networking, Fiber, SATCOM, and tactical RF radios.Ultimately IoT/AI provisions a suite of "at the edge services" of decision support applications, data streams, and AI/ML intelligence to help distributed workforce get the job done.  Full interoperability into any network uplink, cloud, data center, or enterprise system.  Full closed-loop management functions for IoT/Sensor management, AI/ML distributed to the edge, distributed learning system orchestration, and human/machine teaming.  The system includes both an edge system and a cloud/SaaS system for end-to-end workflows, and both components easily integrate into 3rd party enterprise and C5ISR systems.
problem_statement: IoT/AI tackles edge use cases that encounter constraints in size, weight, power, security, connectivity, and processing power.  Workers in these environments are often maintainers, engineers, security personnel, trainers, and other commercial and defense fielded workers that are challenged by inadequate or constrained digitization of their edge sensors, communications, machines, and tools.  We provide decision support, distributed AI, and IoT within the harshest environments on the planet.  System is dual-use tackling Extreme IoT in the commercial markets and Internet of Battlefield Things (IoBT) in the defense markets.

tagline: Creating passive profit streams for real estate Owners and Developers by deploying decentralized wireless network technology on their assets.
description: LongFi Solutions is the premier Decentralized Wireless (DeWi) infrastructure builder and operator deploying domestically and internationally since 2019. LongFi Solutions helps solve the problem of last mile 5g by quickly and efficiently deploying decentralized wireless infrastructure on top of projects like the Helium Network, Xnet, and Really Wireless.LongFi Solutions is uniquely positioned to capture present and future value in Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks (DePIN):  evaluate emerging decentralized technologies for new revenue potential, integrate these value projects into existing business models, leverage proprietary relationships to rapidly scale and monetize multiple new technology projects.  Once physical infrastructure is built, new technologies can be added incrementally based on this process.
problem_statement: Traditional telco infrastructure building is expensive and slow.  Small-cell densification is imperative to achieve full 5G build-out ("last mile 5g") which will help meet the exponential growth in data demand.  Decentralized wireless infrastructure (DeWi) reduces traditional barriers by leveraging shared spectrum, plug-n-play equipment, and frictionless transactions to achieve cheaper network data for end users and faster network growth.  Beyond wireless networks, this approach is being used in other verticals such as energy infrastructure and sensor networks.

milestones.title: DeWi Relies on Thousands of Individual Contributions to Create Holistic Ubiquitous Networks
milestones.description: https://totaltele.com/dewi-relies-on-thousands-of-individual-contributions-to-create-holistic-ubiquitous-networks/

tagline: Environmentally-controlled modules for sustainable farming on Earth and life-support in space.
description: Interstellar Lab develops modules for sustainable living on Earth and in Space. Using space exploration design and technologies, we have developed environment-controlled pods for crop cultivation on Earth and life support in Space.
problem_statement: Climate change poses a threat to farming. Severe weather, fluctuations in precipitation rates, and wildfires are only a few of the challenges our food production systems currently face. And part of the issue stems from agriculture itself.Conventional cultivation methods damage Earth’s ecosystems: they generate about 30% of greenhouse gas emissions and over-rely on chemicals and pesticides, slowly degrading our planet’s soil. Change is needed.

description: With the Kanthaka App you can schedule a highly vetted trainer to anyplace you want (also available live one on one virtually streamed straight through the App.
problem_statement: The personal Training market is broken. We serve a horribly underserved demographic, searching for an actual trainer to train them at the convenience and privacy of their home. Our clients are not looking for another pre recorded video company but the personal touch and accountability only an actual trainer can provide.

tagline: RESHAPING THE SKIES WITH THE MOST EFFICIENT AIRCRAFT EVER DEVELOPED
description: Natilus is building a family of ultra efficient Blended-Wing-Body (BWB) aircraft to break-up the duopoly between Boeing and Airbus. We are starting with a regional freight aircraft destined for UPS, FedEx, DHL, etc. and moving into the narrowbody passenger sector shortly thereafter. Our BWB aircraft unlock improved aviation economics by reducing fuel consumption by 30% while increasing payload capability by 40%.
problem_statement: Over the next two decades, market demand for passenger and freight aircraft will significantly outpace current aircraft manufacturing capabilities representing a need for a third entrant with step change technology to deliver 15,000 planes (or a $3 Trillion opportunity). As global carriers aggressively pursue net zero targets, Natilus’ BWB design offers exceptional aerodynamic efficiency and significantly more interior volume while burning 30% less fuel than the traditional tube-and-wing aircraft used in commercial aviation today.

tagline: Techless helps people take back control and break the power of addiction, so that they can unleash the beauty of real relationships. Their first product, Wisephone™ is a mobile OS with no apps, no addictions and no distractions. Techless is healthy technology; pure and simple.
description: Techless’ first product is Wisephone, an essentialist mobile operating software with no apps, no addictions and no distractions. The phone has 6 core features: clock, calculator, maps, settings, phone, and messages - the phone is also able to filter any explicit messages. They are the only mobile OS for sale on the market.How it works - You can buy any Android phone, scan a QR code to reset the phone and download Techless to turn your phone into a minimalist device.
problem_statement: There are no good solutions to meet the oncoming tidal wave of people looking to break free from digital addiction & maintain a healthy relationship with their technology.

tagline: Protecting the welfare of horses through data science
description: Protequus® is a privately held biomedical engineering firm based in Austin, TX (USA) working to protect the welfare of animals through advances in AI, biosensors, and IoT connectivity.Founded in 2013 after the sudden loss of one of his horses to colic, Jeffrey R. Schab, an accomplished equestrian, biomedical engineer, and successful entrepreneur assembled a multidisciplinary team to create an early-warning solution to combat colic, the leading natural cause of death in horses. Today, that solution is an AI-driven, IoT-enabled, predictive-health wearable known as the NIGHTWATCH® smart halter™ that Forbes reports is “one of the most sophisticated IoT devices they’ve ever seen.”Over the past decade Protequus® has focused on the $300B equine industry but now working to expand their IP/patented technology horizontally across animal species from companion to production animals, while vertically integrating and enriching their proprietary data via a B2B DSaaS prescriptive analytics platform to connect insurance and life science companies, veterinarians, and governing bodies.
problem_statement: Problem:Colic is #1 natural case of death in horses that largely presents overnight while these animals are unsupervised. If detected early, colic is easily remedied through analgesics and movement of the animal to induce gut motility. However, if detection is delayed or left unresolved, colic can result in costly surgery, disability, and death.Solution:Noninvasive remote monitoring of a horse's physiologic parameters (ie, biometrics, behavior) via the NIGHTWATCH® smart halter™ to identify markers of pain/distress so caretakers can be alerted and intervene sooner and veterinarians can make more informed clinical decisions based on real-time objective personalized data.

tagline: Start with Stats
description: Cerebro is building basketball's crystal ball, allowing professionals, players, and fans to see into the future using proprietary statistical data and AI.
problem_statement: Basketball talent is not properly evaluated, and this is costing millions of people billions of dollars. Basketball professionals are unable to evaluate the field of millions of basketball players, leading to 70% of American players drafted into the NBA not being considered top 100 high school players. Basketball players are blindly spending over $8b annually, but have no idea how they stack up or where they need to improve in the eyes of decision makers. And sports fans gamble billions on basketball each year, relying on media reports and gut feel to place bets.

tagline: Beyond LLMs
description: AGI is building a new class of AI that is a step change beyond LLMs and a tipping point in intelligence.With several computational breakthroughs, the Arx general intelligence system outperforms all LLMs using magnitudes less compute while solving the issues plaguing LLMs - hallucinations, inaccuracies, biases, and Explainability

milestones.title: MMLU Pro Leaderboard
milestones.description: Arx-0.3, our first engineering prototype, currently holds the top spot on the leading AI benchmark MMLU-Pro, ahead of OpenAI, Meta, Anthropic, and Google

tagline: Creating Entrepreneurs in every home
description: Feasti, established in 2023 by Rahul Yadav in Dallas, Texas, is an online platform that operates on a subscription-based model. It serves as a connecting bridge, linking local chefs with those in search of homemade meal delivery services. The core mission of Feasti is to eliminate the divide between homemade meals and takeout, with a strong dedication to making these homemade culinary delights both affordable and easily accessible to all.One of the standout features of Feasti is its role as a catalyst for home cooks looking to establish their own food brands. They offer comprehensive support encompassing packaging, branding, marketing, and distribution, empowering home chefs to expand their reach and sell their culinary creations on a larger scale. Furthermore, Feasti equips these budding entrepreneurs with advanced tools and technology for various aspects of their business, including menu creation, efficient order management, and seamless delivery logistics.The onset of the COVID-19 pandemic led to a substantial surge in demand for Feasti's services. Many individuals, seeking flexible income opportunities from the comfort of their homes, turned to the platform. Remarkably, some of these "HomeChefs," who had experienced job losses during the pandemic, are now earning monthly incomes of up to $3,000 through Feasti.Feasti doesn't stop at facilitating culinary creativity; it also provides local cooks with essential business tools and technological resources. These encompass assistance with pricing strategies, professional photography services, and guidance on effective self-marketing and promotional activities. In essence, Feasti remains unwaveringly committed to ensuring that every individual can savor wholesome, homemade meals without straining their budget.
problem_statement: Feasti addresses various key challenges in the food market for HomeChefs:Offering them a platform to showcase their culinary skills and connect with a wider customer base. It helps home chefs expand their businesses by connecting them with customers seeking homemade meals and takes on the responsibilities of marketing, promotion, order management, and customer support, relieving chefs of these burdens. Additionally, Feasti aids in building brand recognition for home chefs, ensuring quality through its assurance processes, and ultimately empowers them to establish themselves as reputable culinary experts in the industry.Feasti addresses key Consumer needs in the food industry by:Simplifying daily meal planning with convenient access to freshly prepared meals. It offers variety and consistency through a diverse menu, saving time with doorstep meal deliveries. Prioritizing health and nutrition, Feasti allows customization to accommodate dietary preferences and offers flexible ordering options. Overall, it provides a convenient and hassle-free solution for individuals and families looking to simplify their daily dining needs and eliminate the need for cooking or ordering from multiple restaurants.

tagline: Stones AI is a Service-Based Business with SaaS Margins and Multi-Year Contracts
description: Stones AI specializes in providing top-tier security and compliance services tailored specifically for AI system developers and deployers. Our offerings are meticulously aligned with the latest standards and regulations in AI ethics and compliance, ensuring our clients achieve the highest level of trust and reliability in their AI solutions.Leveraging an efficient offshore operations model, Stones AI delivers fixed-cost, repeatable services under multi-year contracts, ensuring predictability and value for our clients. Unlike larger players in the security and compliance automation industry, Stones AI's exclusive focus on AI allows us to deliver unparalleled expertise and dedication to this rapidly evolving field. Stones AI is leading the charge towards secure, ethical, and compliant AI innovation.
problem_statement: The AI compliance market is poised for substantial growth due to the rapid adoption of AI technologies and increasing regulatory oversight. AI compliance is expected to grow from $7.6 billion in 2021 to $19.5 billion by 2026.Regulations: New AI-specific laws, like the EU's AI Act, require compliance investments.Ethical Concerns: Rising awareness of AI ethics and fairness drives robust compliance measures.Risk Management: Complex AI systems need comprehensive compliance frameworks.Industry Adoption: Growing AI use in sectors like finance, healthcare, and manufacturing increases demand for tailored compliance solutions.Data Privacy: AI's overlap with data protection regulations creates a niche for specialized compliance solutions.This suggests a rapidly expanding market opportunity for AI compliance solutions within the broader AI governance markets.

tagline: SalesBoost, LLC

Drillapp helps oil companies (E/P) to reduce unplanned events in drilling, completion and production of wells so they can benefit from a cost reduction. Through market research, Drillapp has determined that major oil and gas companies teams present an extra cost of 25 - 40% of the total drilling budget due to events outside the plan.
description: We built PITIA© a cloud-base software and mobile app, that gathers, secures and process wellsite data to get analytics in real time to alert the supervision team both at the field and headquarters of upcoming problems, risk and key strategies.
problem_statement: The current wellsite analytics process is outdated and fragmented upstream for oil and gas companies. Due to the unattended consequences of inefficient tracking software, oil and gas companies inadvertently spend 25-40% more in their total drilling budget annually.

tagline: Saving organs, saving lives
description: VPS, a Texas-based early-stage Medtech company, is revolutionizing organ transplantation with a focus on simplicity, ease of use, and accessibility in price through our flagship product, the VP.S ENCORE®, a hypothermic machine perfusion device for prolonged cardiac graft preservation. This innovative device represents a groundbreaking advancement in heart preservation technology, surpassing conventional methods such as the ice-cooler. It has gained FDA breakthrough device designation back in 2021 and undergone successful preclinical testing on over 100 hearts, including ovine, porcine, and human hearts donated for research.
problem_statement: VP.S ENCORE addresses a critical healthcare need in the U.S., where out of 15,000 deceased donors in 2022, only 30% of hearts were utilized, leaving 70% untapped. This stark contrast underscores the disconnect between the number of people awaiting life-saving organs and the available supply. Our technology directly tackles this problem by offering an innovative solution—prolonged preservation times and superior organ preservation. By extending the viability window to 8 hours or beyond, VP.S ENCORE aims to significantly increase organ utilization rates, bridging the gap between supply and demand and transforming the landscape of cardiac transplantation.
