tagline: Reinvents how people discover and purchase toys & gifts online
description: Webejoy.com reinvents how people discover and purchase toys & gifts online. We are a social commerce platform for toys and gifts that connects creators, brands and customers.
problem_statement: We address Toys&Games e-commerce market, introducing social commerce experience that delivers superior engagement and conversion rate metrics by personalising product feed and focusing on user generated content.

description: Advanced Bifurcation Systems, Inc ("ABS") is a California-based company which has developed a proprietary stent delivery system to effectively treat coronary bifurcation lesions. The addressable market is $5.0+ billion with 1.6 million procedures performed annually.Founded by cardiologist Dr. Mehran Khorsandi and medical devices engineer Henry Bourang, ABS is positioned to solve one of the most technically challenging problems – the treatment of coronary bifurcation lesions - that has eluded the medical device world since the first human implant of a coronary stent in 1986.  Bifurcation lesions are prevalent in about 35% of Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting (“CABG”) procedures and about 20% of Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (“PCI”) procedures. Patients confronting coronary bifurcation lesions are currently left with only two options: (1) complex stenting procedures with suboptimal and unpredictable results; or (2) higher risk, and more expensive, open-heart CABG surgery.The ABS System is not a stent. It is a proprietary stent delivery system. From prototype to final product, the ABS System has been evaluated through bench testing, animal implants (at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center Los Angeles) and 10 human implants across 3 international medical centers – all with successful results. The ABS System is specifically designed to efficiently treat coronary bifurcation lesions with predictable results.The key attributes of ABS are:•	highly simplified approach to bifurcation stenting (which is a growing clnical challenge: ~20% of coronary PCIs and ~35% of CABGs present with bifurcation lesions)•	ABS’s 6F bifurcation platform is designed for automatic orientation and alignment: ~10-15 minutes for procedure completion with full lesion coverage and side-branch access•	US$22 million invested to date, with US$10.4 million Series A Preferred financing (Nov 2020)•	65 issued and 17 pending patents with freedom to operate opinion•	first-in-human trials (10 patients) completed with 100% success (with 1 year follow-up) and excellent clinical results•	fully developed product with regulatory pathway clearly defined•	large, and growing, addressable market (US$5+ billion)•	institutional investors and Board members•	KOL support from leading cardiologists globally•	multiple exist pathways with timing alternatives.Video Links:	https://youtu.be/FpF7asGAdeY   https://youtu.be/dFwX_PR2SLk

tagline: Connecting People to the World’s Best Educational Resources in All Languages
description: We make it easy for parents and educators to find the world’s best educational resources, in all languages.We built an ecosystem with a marketplace and directory that we are growing into a media company for global education.Language Learning Market is a female-founded, Impact-focused, early-stage edTech startup.Our B2B2C platforms are built, live and generating revenue.We curate, organize, and promote educational companies on 3 platforms, connecting parents and educators to the best learning resources globally.1. Online Marketplace for buying and selling educational resources in all languages (think, Etsy)2. Educational Industry Directory with curated business & school listings & reviews (think, Trip Advisor)3. Global Media Influencer Network is dedicated to expert advice and brand advertising (think TED-Ed)
problem_statement: Problem: Global Education Fails to Connect Buyers and Sellers1. Sourcing quality educational resources in all languages is a daunting task for parents and educators.2. Educational businesses struggle with direct access to their target customers - school districts, parents, and teachers.3. No one-stop, centralized location exists for quality learning resources in all languages.

tagline: Direct-to-consumer soap subscription service.
description: Petal offers a direct to consumer, sustainable personal care subscription service. Pods of hand soap (first product) are shipped directly to customers who mix with water in their own bottle or Petals, removing dependence on single-use plastics.
problem_statement: Plastic waste in personal care is a major contributor to the 28,000 tons of single-use plastics that are dumped into our oceans EVERY DAY. Hand soap is one of the most frequently used personal care products and this has been heightened because of COVID-19. There is a huge shift in sustainability focused demand for CPG products based on the core values of their largest generation - Millennials. Petal will fulfill this demand in personal care.

tagline: Restoring nutrient security from soil to our cells.
description: Modgarden: Reviving the Food System from the Brink of CollapseModgarden transforms urban spaces into thriving hubs of fresh, living organic greens, inspired by century-old agricultural wisdom. Our vertical TinyFarms grow nutrient-dense, soil-based produce in restaurants, schools, senior living homes, and more—putting transparency and nourishment within steps of where people live and work.By decentralizing food production and focusing on heirloom growing methods, we prioritize nutrient security over industrial abundance. Our mission: shift control of food from big-ag corporations back to urban communities, fostering health, sustainability, and transparency.Failure to act risks a future dominated by corporate control, where food is abundant but hollow, and organic farming disappears. Modgarden brings fresh, local, organic food back to cities, restoring a sustainable connection between people and their food.
problem_statement: Modern farming practices have led to a steep loss of nutrients in food (vis-a-vis the soil) which has been detrimental and costly to population health.Less than 1% of the 911M acres of US farms are certified organic. This decline in food quality has created a global **nutrient security issue, where essential nutrients in our diet are significantly reduced.As a result of lack of pure food access, we’re experiencing a global record rise in chronic disease, and falling life expectancies over the last five decades, where the US ranks 53rd.

milestones.title: Hotel Pilot
milestones.description:
We have started a pilot with a major hotel chain in Austin and have placed a prototype in the hotel dining room which is being promoted by the staff as ‘organic greens grown on premises.’
We are working with the head chef to target a volume of greens and fold it into certain foods such as topping microgreens on pizza, adding it to sandwhiches, etc.
Our estimation is that we’ll be really getting going with multiple cycles of microgreen growing and developing a revenue model that is repeatable and scalable.

tagline: Bob.AI is an end-to-end software company for assisted living and affordable housing programs.
description: Bob.AI is building a marketplace that connects housing providers withrenters and agencies tasked with fighting homelessness. Bob.AI is a “Go to” place for finding an assisted rental unit, staying in compliance, and attaining family self-sufficiency.
problem_statement: There is no “go-to” place for renting to assisted living programs in the market.

tagline: Business simplified
Web3 App, Support Local Businesses & Save Money At The Same Time.    Grab USDC & Start Shopping Today.
description: CornerMarket is a new Web3 App built on Polygon where you can support local businesses & save money at the same time. It uses blockchain technology and DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) to reduce costs for merchants and save money for consumers. The decentralized nature of the app eliminates the need for intermediaries and reduces transaction fees, enabling merchants to keep more of their profits. The goal of CornerMarket is to not only be a new and better marketplace for small businesses, but to assist them in operating more successful businesses that strengthen the communities where they are based.
problem_statement: CornerMarket provides a solution to each of these, bringing in new customers who are excited to pay with cryptocurrency, or in the case of a Web2 user, happy to support their local small business and community because of the integration of unique storytelling abilities on the CornerMarket platform which allow business owners to communicate with their customers directly and update them in a TikTok fashion. Advanced loyalty abilities are put into the hands of the business, who gain the ability to personalize and update programs as they grow. Transaction fees are lowered through the power of Web3, to as little as 1%, which includes access to all the additional benefits of the CornerMarket platform. The ethos of CornerMarket is support for small businesses, and that’s why we work hard to provide them with additional tools to complete in the David and Goliath fight with their challengers. But this is only the beginning.

tagline: Kugar is building a modular, Lego-like robotic manufacturing platform to provide flexible automated manufacturing at scale.
description: Kugar is building Instablox, a modular robotic manufacturing platform (consisting of proprietary hardware & software) that consists of 30 parts that can be rearranged in a variety of ways to produce various types of components for a wide variety of industries. The platform is built with standardization, ease of integration, and scalability in mind. Initially, the product will be offered under a “manufacturing-as-service model” under company-owned facilities, eventually evolving into a direct sales & SaaS model.
problem_statement: For several decades, the strategy of many global manufacturers to preserve margins included outsourcing/offshoring factories and related activities to economies with lower labor costs. As global wages and living standards continue to rise, robotic automation is seen as the next solution; however, many options are inaccessible due to high upfront costs, technically complicated offerings, and time required for effective implementation. Additionally, COVID-19 had unveiled the faults in complex, globally distributed supply chains.

milestones.title: Government Grant Received
milestones.description: Kugar Inc. received $49,616.00 from Air Force

tagline: Powering The World's Best Rental Businesses
description: Founded in 2017, RentMy is the platform built specifically for the unique needs of the equipment rental industry.  From real-time inventory management to eCommerce booking and payments, RentMy provides the tools for businesses to manage the 7 financial transactions that are common when offering equipment for rent.
problem_statement: Equipment rentals are hard. RentMy makes is easier for equipment owners and their Customers.

tagline: NangioTx has a proprietary gel that promotes the regeneration of blood vessels to regenerate tissue. Beachhead market is root canals.
description: NangioTx’s flagship product is an injectable drug, V-10, that helps create new blood vessels to treat root canals. NangioTx' injectable hydrogel creates a tissue regenerative matrix. Additionally, V10 has shown animal efficacy in treating peripheral artery disease ($14B market) and a funded Phase I SBIR for efficacy in diabetic wound healing. Business model is to sell doses for $100 each at 90% profit margin (1 dose/root canal)
problem_statement: Every year over 15M in the US and 75M Worldwide have root canals filled with rubber rods (gutta percha) resulting in dead teeth. Prone to infection, bone resorption and brittleness; these tombstones often require ~6-8 revisions/ tooth. The Holy Grail of Regenerative Endodontic Therapy (RET) is to develop a material that promotes in vivo regeneration of pulp-like tissue with regenerated blood vessels (vPLT).

tagline: The future of talent acquisition and innovation
description: Assist 2 Develop is a marketplace that helps companies discover innovative ideas and hardware engineering talent.Struggling to hire the right candidate? Propose a problem or select a challenge from our library of stock challenges and find vetted candidates who can walk in with the skills needed to push limits.Privacy concerns? We can help you run a private invite-only open challenge, or an internal competition using our platform.
problem_statement: The rising skills gap and an aging workforce are creating bottlenecks at various stages of the product development process. In fact, 84% of executives report a shortage of qualified technical candidates. To make matters worse, $581 billion was spent on corporate innovation, but only 6% of executives are satisfied with innovation performance.

tagline: Provene uses real-time monitoring and proactive intervention to improve outcomes for jail recidivism, substance abuse recovery, and hospital readmission. Improvements in outcomes save programs (and taxpayers) billions.
description: Provene’s patient-facing app has customizable capabilities to connect resources, track activity, and observe behavior. This allows providers to develop and optimize best practices throughout the continuum of care. Improving outcomes improves participant care, but also saves programs considerable sums. Provene was developed as an enterprise solution and can be private labeled for a client
problem_statement: Jail is more expensive than Harvard. Private treatment fails 80% of the time. Prison recidivism is an alarming 90%. In 2018, over 80% of hospitals received a financial penalty from Medicare for failing to meet readmission requirements. All these programs put the responsibility for success on sick and ill-equipped participants - often without additional resources and we expect them to be successful. Homeless patients are discharged from state of the art facilities literally onto the sidewalk. We can do better.

tagline: Wizest democratizes access to investment professionals through one-click retail portfolios.
description: When a user drafts an expert on Wizest, the platform replicates the expert’s virtual portfolio on the user’s behalf, allowing for diversified investment strategies, as well as a learning and engaging experience through its gamified environment. Wizest is an API that integrates into brokerage platform and is currently recognized as SEC and FINRA compliant. Additionally, Wizest is pursuing turn key partnerships and co-branded white labeling opportunities with regional banks.
problem_statement: Wizest allows retail investors to replicate portfolio’s of CFA and FINRA licensed investment professionals. Wizest democratizes access to financial advice, making investing as easy as selecting a trusted expert in TaskRabbit or building a team in Fantasy Football.

tagline: An app for exclusive restaurant deals
description: DoorDash allowed all restaurants to be able to afford delivery services. Similarly, Dabble allows all restaurants to have a technical presence to feature their promotions.
problem_statement: Dabble addresses restaurants necessity for technology to help drive consistent foot traffic. For consumers, Dabble provides a curated experience with exclusive promotions.

tagline: Byldr.  On Device.  Code Free.  XR Application Authoring Platform.
description: Think Powerpoint or Wix for XR applications.Byldr is an on device, code free XR application authoring tool which allows experienced developers to improve their productivity 5 fold by eliminating the desktop to XR device iteration cycle by allowing them to dream, design and deploy all on device in XR.  In addition, by removing the code barrier it allows new and existing creatives to transition into XR application developers in a matter of days rather the months required to develop commercial proficiency in coding and Unity functionality.  The result, more people building more apps.
problem_statement: Broad enterprise XR adoption has been slowed by a lack of capacity in the XR development community.  A lack of capacity illustrated by a 1400% increase in the demand for XR professionals in the last 18 months.  This has limited the ability of development agencies and professionals to scale their businesses to meet billions of dollars in exploding demand.

tagline: A digital solution for rotational savings groups. Small Savings… Big Impacts
description: A digitized rotational savings group mobile app that helps users build savings, commit to a savings plan, and make significant purchases. They make money on transaction and subscription fees, partner ads, and direct sales/commissions from partners on the platform
problem_statement: Communities around the globe participate in rotational savings groups for various reasons but face issues with:Payment tracking (usually done by one member of the group) is burdensome and opaque to membersOn-time payments made by group members are not reported to credit bureaus to help build credit worthinessThere’s no insurance for missing paymentsRotation savings groups account for more than $200B worldwide.

tagline: UpBrainery Technologies
description: UpBrainery software platform plans to catch students at these earlier stages and expose them to content and materials that will allow them to discover their interests and aptitude.  Research shows that these students will then be better prepared for the jobs of tomorrow with early exposure and guided pathways.
problem_statement: 65% of students enter college without a clear plan.  College debt is at an all time high and 70% of graduates wish they had pursued a different degree.  1: 500 college counselor to students ratio also makes it hard to receive guidance.  The reason for this problem lies within the crucial upper elementary and  middle school time when it takes an extreme effort for parents to expose their kids to unique experiences and a huge lack of resources and guidance.

milestones.title: Government Grant Received
milestones.description: UpBrainery Technologies received $2,860,000.00 from DoDEA

tagline: AI Autopilot for Facility Energy Savings
description: FLUIX is an autonomous AI software platform that saves critical buildings, such as data centers, up to 40% in energy costs by intelligently connecting and holistically controlling facility systems (HVAC, IT, water, lighting). In 2023, FLUIX generated $75K in revenue across four paid pilots and is projecting $850K in ARR 12 months post-fundraise. FLUIX is raising a $3M round, with $1.5M already committed.
problem_statement: With rising energy rates, increased demand, and carbon regulations, data centers are eager to save energy. Small-to-medium data centers is the fastest growing segment ($30B). However, major automation companies like Honeywell and Johnson Controls don't address how fragmented systems in these centers are. Our company, FLUIX, does. We are like Google for facility management. Our AI software optimizes and manages complex facilities, saving up to 40% in energy costs, helping SMB data centers increase margins and meet AI demand. Currently, many SMB data centers calculate efficiency metrics on spreadsheets or even by hand, which can take hours, and by the time they're finished, the values would have likely changed. With lack of these insights, facilities are often static and stuck in the past. Facility systems are fragmented and do not holistically work together, leading to millions lost in potential savings.

milestones.title: ECO-AI Slashes Server Room AC Energy Use By 65%
milestones.description: FLUIX Inc., a climate startup, has proudly announced its latest feat in artificial intelligence: AIMI, an Autonomous AI, has significantly reduced HVAC energy consumption by 65% in a server room environment. This pioneering initiative optimizes energy use and maintains optimal server performance, leading to an impressive 40% cut in overall site energy usage. “Through the innovation of our own Eco-AI, we are enabling traditional AI to be more efficient by optimizing the data centers that host them.” - Abhishek Sastri, Founder & CEO, FLUIX Inc.

tagline: Medical Device for Opioid Withdrawal and Addiction
description: Spark Biomedical is a medical device company focused on solutions to address addiction, withdrawal, and overall mental health.  Spark's flagship product, the Sparrow therapy system, is a non-invasive wearable neurostimulator that alleviates nearly all withdrawal symptoms in as little as 30-60 minutes.  The device sends electrical signals to the brain, driving endogenous endorphin production and calming the fight-or-flight instincts that create a near primal urge to use again.  The Sparrow for adults is backed tier 1 clinical evidence and FDA cleared.  The Sparrow Fledgling, for neonates, has undergone is first proof-of-concept trial with great success - and is now entering an NIH funded pivotal trial to obtain FDA approval.
problem_statement: The opioid epidemic continues to grow out of control throughout the COVID Pandemic - experts predict there will be over 100,000 opioid overdose deaths in 2022, up over 100% in the last 3 years.  The major barrier to beating an opioid addiction is getting through the debilitating physical withdrawals.  Furthermore, over 40,000 babies are born every year into opioid dependence and face a brutal first 3-4 weeks of life in the NICU as they are weened off opioids, with an average cost of over $70,000 per child.

tagline: We help veterinarians diagnose embryo health to improve pregnancy outcomes of embryo transfer 20%. Better embryo health diagnostics can reduce the transfer of inviable embryos into recipients and save american cattle producers 1.8 billion annually.
description: EmGenisys’ SaaS technology offers an objective and consistent analysis of embryo morphokinetic activity to standardize the evaluation of bovine embryos. This system simply involves the assessment of 30 second videos of embryos recorded by the veterinarian and can use these videos to predict embryo health and viability. With more data, veterinarians can choose NOT to transfer embryos with low developmental potential and improve pregnancy outcomes of embryo transfer 20%.
problem_statement: By 2050, the global population is expected to reach 9.5 billion people causing  a 76% increase in demand for animal derived foods, such as milk, meat and eggs. Reproductive advancements have been utilized in breeding programs to maximize production of superior animals. The impact of ARTs has been tremendous, as the USDA reports the United States is producing more beef from fewer head of cattle (USDA). Cattle producers and veterinarians attribute these advancements for making animal production more economically advantageous, but admit they are frustrated because pregnancy rates resulting from ARTs have remained 30-56% successful for over a decade causing over $1.8 billion in losses to cattle producers in the U.S.

tagline: The B2B marketplace and new supply chain for sustainable agriculture
description: Fieldcraft is building the alternative to commodity. Their platform connects fragmented networks and democratizes market access. They are on a mission to simplify marketing across the supply chain for sustainable agriculture to enable makers, processors and growers alike to promote biodiversity, restore soil and open new markets.
problem_statement: Commodity agriculture relies heavily on consolidated networks. Businesses going beyond commodity are faced with expensive, manual and time-consuming marketing.

tagline: Deliver your packages safer, faster, and more reliably than ever — from pick up to drop off.
description: The Dropoff DifferenceCouriersOur professional, highly-trained couriers go through a seven-day vetting process before they can wear the Dropoff uniform – including written tests, in-person interviews, ride-a-longs, and multiple background checks. They are continually rated by our customers and reviewed by us to ensure they’re always meeting our high standards.Customer ServiceWhen it comes to logistics, one size does not fit all. Our experienced team will design a custom logistics program based on your specific needs. Our customer service team is available 24/7, so we're always there when you need us. If we’re not already in your city, let us know and we can set up shop in less than 30 days.Reliability & ExperienceOur couriers have made over a million deliveries in cities all over the U.S. We are committed to providing consistent, dependable service and professionalism with every delivery. Use our tracking technology to see exactly where your courier is, and when they’ll arrive. With Dropoff, you can have peace of mind that your deliveries are in good hands.Accountability & TimelinessDropoff is the only logistics partner you’ll need for all of your locations. We have local experts available at any time, and our “no excuses” approach means we take full accountability for every pickup and delivery. We measure our performance on our timeliness down to the minute and use courier ratings and reviews for continual improvement.ScalabilityBefore we design your customized logistics program, we get to know your business and align our program with your company’s goals. We have 10+ unique courier actions that can be configured for your deliveries and can develop new ones to meet your specific needs. Our system allows you to make changes to your logistics program as your business evolves.TechnologyOur software seamlessly integrates into your existing operations, our user-friendly interface makes placing and tracking orders simple and intuitive. Already have your own couriers on staff, but don’t want to manage them? Put them into our custom-built app and we’ll manage them for you.FleetDropoff vehicles are always clean, well-maintained, smoke-free, and marked with the Dropoff logo. We regularly audit the health of and track every vehicle in our fleet. No matter what you need picked up and delivered, Dropoff has the right-sized vehicle and expert couriers to transport your goods with care.
problem_statement: Dropoff is the only courier service with the people, technology, and fleet to provide you with:- Well-maintained marked vehicles driven by uniformed, professional couriers- Customer support available 24/7/365- Real-time tracking and image confirmations- Advanced logistics software with custom solutions to fit any business- Guaranteed on-time delivery, no excuses- Door-to-door white glove service

tagline: Maintenance and Repair as a service
description: On-demand access to maintenance and repair services for the heavy equipment and transportation industry.We offer Maintenance and Repair as a Service to individuals and companies nationwide.We create value through our streamlined process, cross-industry payment platform, and AI to cater to the field personnel involved in the transactions to manage expectations and transparency throughout the process.
problem_statement: Large to medium Transportation companies outsource a significant part of their maintenance and repair.The remaining industry is fragmented and has little to no capacity for in-house maintenance and repairs.1. Finding reliable service throughout the country.2. Lack of trust between service shops, transportation companies, and their employees, especially outside major cities.3. Fragmentation leads to Information asymmetry, which leads to high costs.

milestones.title: Revenue positive
milestones.description: We became revenue-positive in January 2023. Since then, we have been working on our operations and product to fix issues and consistently growing our revenue,

tagline: A Unique Experience, in a Familiar Package
description: Chebemchn is revolutionizing the vending industry with smart, tech-forward vending machines designed to provide unparalleled convenience and product variety. Our machines offer a cashless, contactless experience with real-time inventory monitoring, dynamic advertising opportunities, and tailored product selections. Strategically placed in high-traffic areas like college campuses, multifamily properties, hostels, and convention centers, Chebemchn brings the future of automated retail to life.
problem_statement: Students and travelers often face challenges accessing essential items at their place of residence, particularly in student housing and hostels. Delivery options come with long wait times and extra costs, while walking or driving to nearby stores results in a loss of time and convenience. This creates a gap in providing immediate access to essential items, which impacts both the user experience and the operational potential of property owners.Simultaneously, property owners of student residences and hostels have an untapped opportunity to increase revenue by offering on-site access to essentials, improving tenant satisfaction and cash flow.

milestones.title: Austin Machine Final Build
milestones.description: Final build for machine going to Austin student apartment!

milestones.title: First Location Launched
milestones.description: We launched our first location in Denver, Colorado!

tagline: NanoStraws
description: We enable Drs to safely inject medicines into cells to make new treatments for cancer and other severe diseases.
problem_statement: Engineering cells to fight disease is the future of medicine, but current methods to deliver gene editors into cells to train them to beat cancer or correct disease, inadvertently kill or perturb the cells. As a result, Drs face major hurdles innovating therapies for patient access (high costs, long time-to-patient, and limited therapeutic window).

tagline: One company, with multiple solutions to Win the New Era of fan engagement.
description: We provide a CMS (content management system), on a subscription basis (PaaS model), that can launch multiple fan engagement solutions and tools that generates insights into fan behaviors, interests, and patterns so our customers can understand what is most important and relevant to each every one of their fans.Our current suite of products consists of:- an Interactive video player that allows viewers to pick and choose their own preferred angles and engage with experiential technology like gamification, AR, stats, etc. all within a single window.- a user generated content platform- a rewards platform- data and analytics and more
problem_statement: Today, the way we consume content has change. We watch things on the fly, when we want, whenever we want and on whatever devises we want. But we still can't watch things HOW we want. As a result, legacy broadcast companies are dying and 90% of young adults have no intention on subscribing to cable. We are in this 'attention economy' and fans want more, they want it fast and they want it THIER way.Sports/entertainment properties are struggling to keep fans engaged especially beyond game day. 1) sports properties know very little about their fans and 2) they don't have that personal relationship with them because of lack of data on them. In this new era of sports distribution where we are seeing big tech, for the first time in history, get into the sports content game individual teams are going more Direct-to-Consumer and need to learn more about their global fan base and offer personalized experiences.In conclusion, today’s fans want to be active participants and not just the consumers of the content during live/on demand events. As fans we want to contribute our take on things, thoughts, pictures, videos and opinions just like we do on every other social media platform out there. Social media has trained us that our likes, comments, and content matter. And that's why big tech/social platforms make billions, and most sports properties don't. At Providential Media, we are building the solutions to change all of this.

milestones.title: IBM and Providential Media Sign Partnership Agreement
milestones.description:
Providential Media has signed an agreement, and its associated disclosure documents, with IBM to co-create, co-build, co-sell and GTM with IBM and IBM partners.
As an IBM Partner, we will be able to:
- Leverage cutting-edge WatsonX AI technology to help our clients transform their businesses
- Take advantage of demand generation programs to drive growth and revenue
- Use leading tools and skill-building opportunities to enhance our offerings
- Expand IBM’s exposure into additional sports tech opportunites

milestones.title: PMG Selected as 1 of 10 Companies for Plug and Play Sports Tech Batch 2 Accelerator
milestones.description:
It’s official!
Providential Media has been selected as one of 10 startups to participate in the prestigious Plug and Play Sportstech Batch 2 cohort based in hashtag#FriscoTx starting in September.
As one of hundreds of companies from around the world that were reviewed for this unique program, we’re also proud to be just one of three companies from the hashtag#NorthTexas region that will be participating in this cohort.
We appreciate the great support from the Frisco Plug and Play team as well as McKinney Economic Development Corporation and the Frisco Economic Development Corporation for their diligent work to bring Plug and Play Tech Center to our area. At PMG, we’ve already experienced the tremendous impact from this powerful private and public partnership and look forward to many more great opportunities to come.

milestones.title: Providential Media Winner of the 2024 Sports Tech Award
milestones.description:
As countries around the world welcome home their Olympians, Providential Media is excited to welcome home CEO Denny Darmo and CTO Son Tran from a highly successful trip to Asia that included winning the ASPN Sports Tech Accelerator Demo Day pitch competition in Taiwan.
The event was part of the graduation day for the 12 international sports tech startup companies selected to participate in the 2024 ASPN Sports Tech cohort and featured 30 judges from 11 countries.
The cohort companies went through a rigorous application and interview process to be selected into this prestigious program. Hundreds of applicants from around the world vied for the opportunity to participate in the ASPN program. Throughout the 2024 cohort, PMG team members participated in various sessions and webinars learning from some of the most influential minds in startup and sports tech in the APAC region.
The organization is supported by the Sports Administration, Ministry of Education Taiwan, and executed by IAPS NYCU Accelerator (Center of Industry Accelerator & Patent Strategy). It collaborates with the 11 member economies of the APEC Sport Policy Network (ASPN) to jointly provide the best route for startups to enter the Asia-Pacific and Taiwanese markets in order to accelerate sports tech innovation.
We’re grateful for the invaluable support and learnings from ASPN, especially our mentor Hidenori “Dino” Suzuki and Darren Chua.
“From my experiences of CRM & ticketing in Tokyo 2020 Olympic & Paralympic Games, mobile e-ticketing and fan club management of various contents including sports & major artists, I believe the Providential Media platform and products will create significant opportunities for contents holders to utilize their valuable assets in various ways toward the future.
I’m convinced that the new platform and UGC management function would provide more friendly and safer environments with positive values for both users and contents owners such as professional teams & clubs.”
Hidenori “Dino” S. (Suzuki)
Former Managing Executive, Head of Ticketing & CRM of Tokyo 2020 Olympic & Paralympic Games
Advisor, APEC Sports Policy Network
Senior Director, Corporate Management, Dentsu
“I’ve had the privilege of working closely with the Providential Team, and their relentless drive for innovation has consistently impressed me. Winning the ASPN Award is a well-deserved recognition of their commitment to transforming the sports media landscape. Their solution is perfectly aligned with the burgeoning opportunities in the Asia-Pacific market, which is ripe for such cutting-edge solutions. This milestone is just the beginning, and I’m excited to see how they will continue to shape the future of sports technology in this dynamic region.”
Darren Chua
Advisor, APEC Sports Policy Network
Managing Director, The Ideal Venture Studio
Director, Unity Brands

tagline: Frictionless web-based video calls
description: Yep is a low friction, universally-accessible video calling utility that functions across all major operating systems and device platforms. Users can be instantly connected to each other for a video call with no other requirements–nothing to download, no accounts to set up, and no pre-, mid- or post-administration of the call is required.
problem_statement: There is no standard for video calling that enables frictionless video communication between all internet-connected devices without requiring software downloads, pre-configuration, and/or account creation.

tagline: Crypto investing made simple
description: Bundil's automated financial services platform hits a large key market of retail investors who are just learning about digital asset classes. Our approach provides beautiful UX, and automated investing into diversified portfolios to capture and retain more users.
problem_statement: The average person does not know how to begin investing in crypto

tagline: Web3 music platform for music creation
description: Musical helps Artists make more music, and more money, by connecting them to crowdfunding, collaboration, and creative tools in one place. The platform brings together storage, workspaces and workflow, play-to-earn game mechanics and 3rd party APIs to create a web3 platform for sound creation
problem_statement: 1% of artists generate 90% of streams on platforms like Spotify and Apple Music, 75% of which is catalog music from existing artists. Humans put a tremendous emotional value on music and the people who create it, but current industry structures make it near impossible to break through and even if you do, establish a sustainable living.

tagline: Fitnescity helps people uncover valuable data about their body by providing easy  access to wellness lab testing, along with personal data analytics.
description: We see traditional healthcare as reactive and the Quantified Self movement as incomplete. We believe there is a solution: making preventative lab testing accessible to the general consumer. We do the work, connecting people to our network of trusted lab partners around the country and supporting them through the process. We then take the results and generate insights on our digital platform, which makes tracking progress over time simple, inspiring accountability. Understanding your factors of well-being empowers proactivity and allows you to truly put your wearables to work.
problem_statement: It is complicated to find a health test that fit your needs and understand it.

tagline: Digital Biomarkers for Rare Diseases
description: Blackwerx is a digital diagnostic startup focused on disrupting the diagnostic journey for patients with rare and complex diseases by developing imaging biomarkers for indications within neurology and oncology. Our platform distills unique insights from existing imaging modalities to allow for the early diagnosis and enhanced monitoring of severe diseases. The software was used in over 4,000 patients and in multiple phase 3/4 clinical trials. We are preparing to seek regulatory approval for our first indication, which assists clinicians in differentiating multiple sclerosis from neuromyelitis optical spectrum disorder. Our tool demonstrated a superior sensitivity as compared to the gold-standard blood-based assay.
problem_statement: For many diseases within neurology and oncology, clinicians, payers, and drug developers lack quantifiable tools to accurately diagnose, monitor, and treat disease.  Patients with rare diseases will wait, on average, five years before they receive an accurate diagnosis, with 30% of patients waiting over a decade. For multiple sclerosis, as many as 18% of patients may actually be misdiagnosed. These incorrectly diagnosed patients maintain the incorrect diagnosis for over 3 years resulting in $41k of unnecessary costs. Drug development companies also suffer from the lack of highly sensitive and specific tools. For the rare disease neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder (NMOSD), there are three FDA-approved therapeutics. These drugs generate as much as $640k per patient, per year. However, the gold standard for the diagnosis of NMOSD is an antibody that recognizes as little as 50% of the population, leaving the remainder of patients without access to therapy and representing a large inaccessible market.

tagline: The SciOps Company
description: DataJoint helps life sciences organizations reach reliable findings faster. Our platform replaces ad hoc, fragmented data handling with automated computation, interactive tools, and AI-powered workflows that bring structure, reproducibility, and efficiency to science operations.
problem_statement: Today, research labs collect and process data using manual processes that are slow, tedious, and rife with opportunities for human error.Getting a project off the ground can take months of configuration and coding. Recording requires systems, infrastructure, and significant effort to keep data organized. Manually passing data between processing tools leads to unnoticed errors.In their current state, labs cannot meet new US and EU regulatory requirements for data management and traceability, creating substantial risks to institutions' grant funding and to commercial enterprises' ability to get their drugs or devices approved.

tagline: Employee-Driven Upskilling Platfrom
description: OneRange is an end-to-end solution that allows companies to effectively upskill their employees by automating and streamlining access to learning resources. OneRange is an upskilling platform that actually works - the proven solution increases employee productivity, optimizes budget, and reduces the cost of training and turnover.We use technology to ensure individual goals align with company strategy and provide the data to company people teams to actively manage the program.
problem_statement: Corporate training is falling to upskill the workforce.70% of employees report they don't have the skills for their current role while the half-life of skills has decreased from 5 years to 4 years since 2017.  Yet, only 12% of employees have applied skills learned from traditional learning and development programs to their job.  At a time when professional development programs should differentiate a company, it’s holding the workforce back.Companies benefit in three ways:Cost savings: OneRange is more cost-effective than traditional forms of training and development because companies pay for upskilling resources only when utilized by employees.Increased productivity: Employees who have access to OneRange are more productive and perform better in their jobs, especially engineers who need to continuously learn to keep up with their job requirements.Better retention: Companies that invest in the development of their employees are more likely to retain them, reducing the cost of turnover.

tagline: Love solutions
description: Vashikaran services are traditional spiritual practices rooted in ancient Indian astrology and mysticism, aimed at influencing or attracting someone towards you in a positive way. These services involve the use of specific rituals, mantras, and yantras to create harmony in relationships, resolve conflicts, and address personal issues like love, marriage, or professional growth. Vashikaran is believed to help individuals gain control over challenging situations and bring positive influence to their lives, often used to rekindle affection, strengthen bonds, or bring desired outcomes in various aspects of life. It is essential to approach such services with a clear and ethical intent.
problem_statement: Our company is dedicated to solving a wide range of challenges that impact personal and professional lives. We specialize in:Relationship Issues: Whether it's love, marriage, or family dynamics, we provide solutions to heal and strengthen bonds, fostering understanding and closeness.Career Challenges: From overcoming workplace hurdles to boosting your career prospects, we help you navigate through professional obstacles and achieve success.Attracting Positivity: Using spiritual guidance and traditional practices, we help attract positivity, prosperity, and peace, empowering you to lead a more fulfilled life.Conflict Resolution: Our services are designed to bring resolution to disputes—whether personal or professional—creating harmony and reducing stress.We address these problems with empathy, confidentiality, and time-tested approaches, helping individuals regain control and find lasting solutions for a happier, more prosperous life.

tagline: eDealer Direct help financial institutions sell their repossessed vehicles at the lowest cost per transaction in the industry while providing more returns.
description: An auction marketplace for pre-owned vehicles. Sellers (auto dealers, credit unions, fleet/rental) use eDealer Direct to sell to the buyers (wholesalers, auto dealers, volume buyers).Business model - charge buyers and sellers $100 flat fee per deal, profit margin per vehicle of 1-10% above an agreed sale price
problem_statement: • 2.2M vehicles repossessed in 2019, up 22% from 2017• 7M+ Americans are delinquent in 90+ days• For every 2.4 cars sold, 1 car is repossessed• Credit unions finance ~28% of all auto purchases• 2020 Covid-19 impact → repossessed vehicles are expected to 2x through 2021

tagline: Visibly Better Protection
description: DrySee makes the only waterproof bandage with liquid indication technology that changes color, alerting you when it is time to change your bandage. DrySee reduces unnecessary bandage changes, resulting in fewer bandages used and less wound exposure to potential pathogens, which could reduce the number of surgical site infections.
problem_statement: Post procedure most patients are told not to get their dressings wet, and to avoid showering and bathing. DrySee provides a waterproof dressing that changes color if there is liquid present - allowing patients to shower confidently and know when to change their dressing. DrySee addresses the $2.5B advanced wound market.

tagline: We simulate how audiences will respond to stories.
A leading provider of blockchain-backed credentialing solutions for educational institutions
description: Digital Record is a leading provider of blockchain-backed credentialing solutions for educational institutions and accreditation agencies. Our services are currently available in 7 countries spanning 5 continents.Our digital platform allows education providers to issue secure & verifiable digital credentials that are backed by the blockchain.What Is a Verifiable Credential?We use the power of blockchain to create verifiable credentials that are digital and cryptographically secure. This includes diplomas, transcripts, and other education records.Storing a record on the blockchain is like storing it on thousands of secure individual databases, where each databases keeps each other in check. Blockchain's inherent property ensures the authenticity of the record.The holders of digital diplomas recorded on the blockchain can share their digital credentials with any entity using a simple link or QR code. With the use of blockchain technology, trust is guaranteed.Target customers: Education providers (i.e Universities, Vocational Training)Problem: Paper & PDF credentials are hard to verify, easy to fraud, and easily lost or destroyedSolution: A web platform where education providers can issue and manage tramper-proof credentialsCurrently, many universities globally are issuing tamper-proof certificates via our platform. (i.e University of San Francisco, University of Nairobi, etc)
problem_statement: We combat the problem of fraudulent paper and PDF credentials that hinder verification, impacting employment and hiring. Traditional credentials are vulnerable to manipulation and forgery, undermining individuals' confidence in showcasing their qualifications and employers' ability to authenticate candidates' credentials. According to Eaton & Carmichael's 2022 research, this fraud is estimated to be at least $21 billion USD.We are still using paper & PDF for verification purpose in the era of photoshop. Paper & PDF credentials are easy to fake, hard to verify, and easily lost or destroyed.When PDF file first came out in 1993, it was the source of truth as not many people had the access or the knowledge to use photoshop. But today anyone can photoshop straight from their phone without special training.The issue of fake credentials not only undermines the credibility of the individuals who hold them, but also undermines the overall trust and value of education. This has significant economic and social consequences, as employers and society as a whole rely on credentials to determine the knowledge and skills of individuals. The current system of paper and PDF credentials is therefore no longer adequate and a more secure and trustworthy solution is needed.

milestones.description: We had several schools saying yes to pilot our product so we started off piloting the solution.

milestones.description: We finished developing our V1 product, a web platform that allows education providers to issue and manage tamper-proof certificates.

milestones.title: Focus on education credentialing
milestones.description: This is when we decided to start focusing on education credentialing as our client was asking us to build a more user friendly interface to register certificates onto the blockchain.

milestones.title: Project formation
milestones.description: We first formed the project, it started off as a NFT API company. We made APIs to help developers to easily turn anything on their software platform to NFT. We were able to commercialize the technology very soon.

tagline: We help real estate investors find motivated sellers.
description: Real Estate IQ is a lead generation and software company focused on helping real estate investors find deals within 90 days. The product offers prop-tech, skip tracing, and CRM software so buyers can find off market properties before anyone else!- Cost advantage: offering data and analytics at 10X value.- Network effect: creating business development opportunities.- Efficient scale: reducing costs when entering new markets.- Webinar platform: building brand and subscriber communities.
problem_statement: The real estate market is booming which means there is a low supply of inventory available in the market. Buyers are seeking new avenues to find available properties. However, there aren't enough reliable resources with quality deals to find.

tagline: Send a video, Spark a Conversation
description: Sendspark helps businesses deliver personalized video experiences at scale. Instead of Customer-facing teams spending hours on Zoom calls, they can use Sendspark to easily record short, personalized videos to onboard, support, or pitch customers. They can also request videos from customers to capture feedback, testimonials, or support issues — all asynchronously. Sendspark allows businesses to white-label video messages and request pages to provide a beautiful, branded experience at a level up to competitive video platforms. Sendspark is used by more than 10,000+ people at companies like LinkedIn, Salesforce, Qualtrics, and Fiverr.
problem_statement: Business communication for business has gotten… exhausting. The two most common channels are email and Zoom, but emails have become a chore (as we strive for inbox 0), and "Zoom fatigue" was one of the biggest buzzwords of 2021 for a reason. Customer-facing people in sales, marketing, and customer success need a 3rd channel to communicate with customers in a way that's actually engaging. Video is the #1 most engaging medium but is traditionally difficult to produce, expensive, and slow.

tagline: Building Connections | Powering Performance
description: FieldVision is a dynamic field operations workflow application tailored for small and medium-sized businesses (SMBs) in the broadband and telecom industries. The innovative platform enhances operational efficiency by integrating essential business functions, such as onboarding profiles management, work order processing, data collection, invoicing, and transaction facilitation. By streamlining these critical operations seamlessly, FieldVision enables businesses to focus more on their core services and growth, making it a daily tool in the broadband and telecom field.
problem_statement: In the broadband and telecom industries, there are over 54000 independent contractors, many of which are new LLCs with limited business knowledge. These businesses often struggle to comprehend their payment structures and processes. Moreover, they are burdened by an average of 5 disparate applications for managing operations, production, invoicing, payments, project management, communication, and scheduling. These disparate systems create inefficiencies, data silos, and increase the risk of errors. Additionally, these SMBs bear a high risk due to prolonged payment cycles that can extend up to 90 days. FieldVision addresses these critical challenges by providing a comprehensive, user-friendly solution that streamlines vital operational processes and includes a flexible transactional pricing model. This model aligns with the variable workloads and financial structures of SMBs, empowering them to manage their operations more effectively while minimizing financial risks.

tagline: Neurable Inc.
description: After over a decade of development, advances across neuroscience and AI have berthed the Neurable AI platform. This platform technology enables systems that we wear on a daily basis to be powered by scalable, low-cost, high performance, neural sensors enabling applications across performance, health, human-computer interaction, and more. Their first enabled product, in collaboration with Master & Dynamic, is the MW75 Neuro, a premium brain-computer interface (BCI) enabled headphone product with a mobile app interface for cognitive health and performance tracking. Enabling head-worn products from headphones to earbuds, AR to hearing protection, Neurable works with and supports various key partnerships across consumer, academia, and defense industries.
problem_statement: Historically, insights from neural data, whether it's to diagnose a condition like a traumatic brain injury (TBI) or to improve an athlete's performance, have been restricted to laboratory settings, with expensive tools used exclusively by highly trained personnel.Our brain-sensing platform, Neurable AI, enables head-worn products to seamlessly integrate neural sensing suites at the point of original equipment manufacturing (OEM) level. Neurable AI uniquely provides high-performance neural insights from low-cost components, leveraging advances in signal processing, machine learning, and neuroscience to be used outside of the laboratory, without a neuroscience PhD, and into devices we use on a daily basis forever changing our relationship with the brain.

tagline: A New Age of Oxygen Equilibrium
description: We have developed a next-generation blood testing instrument for measuring Oxygen-hemoglobin Dissociation Curve and MetHemoglobin - 10 times more precise, 3 times faster than current market devices, and requires only a drop of blood. We aim to radically streamline pharma R&D, Clinical, Chronic, and Emergency Medical Care, helping improve outcomes for patients suffering from blood disorders worldwide.In addition to our focus on healthcare, we also target Military, Athletic & High-Altitude Training, Animal Testing & Research, Field Testing, and other markets.
problem_statement: The Oxygen-Hemoglobin Equilibrium Curve (OEC) is a fundamental measurement for understanding how a patient’s blood carries and releases oxygen. This test is critically important for establishing therapeutic processes for many disorders, like sickle cell anemia and pulmonary diseases.Currently-available OEC blood testing devices have many shortcomings as a result of the lack of major development or advancement in the last two decades. They cannot support current market needs due to large blood sample requirements, complex supply chains, lengthy testing time, messy blood spills, frequent calibration and maintenance, and difficult operation.

tagline: Quality Healthcare in your Hands
description: Doktorconnect aims to make preventative healthcare more accessible, affordable, and available on the African continent.We provide access to:- Annual preventative wellness checks- 24/7 access to doctors from the comfort of a phone- Rapid Diagnostics test kits for fast & cheap at-home testing of endemic issues like Malaria- Digitally enabled do-it-yourself medical devices that sync with the Doktorconnect app and store vital medical records on the cloud.- On-demand access to prescription medications issued by our team of qualified doctors and a range of laboratory investigations with the option of at-home testing.All of these are available via annual subscriptions. We are today the only healthtech company on the continent offering this unique mix of services.
problem_statement: Africa is home to 1.2 Billion people, with Nigeria alone housing 20% of those and she is going through a health crisis.WHO projects that in Nigeria, over the next ten years, over 5 million people will die from a chronic disease from about 500,000 in 2015.Nigeria is estimated to lose USD 8 billion over the next ten years from premature deaths due to heart disease, stroke, and diabetes. In addition, Nigeria is experiencing an acute shortage of healthcare facilities and a low doctor-to-patient ratio.Delay in discovering medical issues is costing Africa lives and money. This is driving increased demand for preventative and on-demand quality healthcare services.

tagline: An Intelligence driven ERP for Food Manufacturing
description: Power Central builds software for manufacturers that makes it easier, faster and more efficient to manage sales, production, procurement, shipping, inventory and pricing.The unique phased deployment approach and AI toolkit allows Power Central to efficiently clean your existing data, integrate into Microsoft’s Business Central ERP solution and quickly give you custom mission critical Business Intelligence reports build on the latest Power BI platform.
problem_statement: Most companies in the industry use Quickbooks and Excel, however, these don’t scale. They are beacheading the food industry but there are opportunities in medical device, heavy equipment and apparel manufacturing.

tagline: Predicting upstream delays and disruptions months in advance
description: Ceres enables companies to optimize their logistics network by finding patterns and trends within internal and external data sources to predict upstream disruptions, often months in advance, through its patent pending system, Ceres Nostradamus.We help companies to mitigate upstream risk:1) Predict when a disruption or delay upstream in the supply chain occurs months in advance with 80%+ accuracy2) Understand which purchase orders and upstream suppliers are at the most risk for a delay or disruptionIf there is a delay, provide the reason and the severity of that delay3) Reduce order delays by 80%+4) Proactively find the right supplier to fulfill Purchase Orders5) Lower inventory safety stock6) Increase supply chain reliability to match consumer demand with timely revenues
problem_statement: Companies are still struggling with supply chain issues since the pandemic of Covid-19. These issues will continue to extend into the foreseeable future. Below are headlines on the current state of the supply chain:1) John Deere said it was having difficulty securing parts for its heavy machinery, sending shares down 14%.2) Ford said late Monday it will end this quarter with between 40,000 and 45,000 large pickups and SUVs that it can't finish because it doesn't have all the parts. Shares are down 12.4% on the news.3) Toyota cuts production plan again on ongoing chip shortage. Toyota cuts its production plan by 100,000 in October as chip shortages continue.34) General Electric Co is still grappling with supply-chain bottlenecks which have made it tougher to deliver products to customers on time, Chief Financial Officer Carolina Dybeck Happe said on Thursday.McKinsey Global Institute’s recent research has found that as much as 45 percent of one year’s EBITDA can be lost each decade because of disruptions. Even a short disruption of 30 days or fewer can put 3 to 5 percent of the EBITDA margin at stake.

tagline: LIFTING BARRIERS
description: At Actus, we help Commercial and Defense logistics improve efficiency and effectiveness by providing the capability to operate independently of fixed logistics infrastructure with our autonomous aerial cargo systems.
problem_statement: Freedom of movement for DOD and Commercial logistics is critical to our economic and national security.  The movement of shipping containers relies entirely on fixed infrastructure—seaports, airports, roads, and railways.  When this infrastructure is congested, due to excess capacity, or contested, due to denied or destroyed infrastructure it significantly restricts both commercial and Department of Defense (DOD) mobility.  This drives the need to operate outside of the fixed logistics infrastructure.

The technology has vast potential applications ranging from development to finance. Our vision is to revolutionize business with the next generation of digital employees.Pitch deck: https://bit.ly/creatus_pitch_deck

They aim to simplify the process of eating healthy by offering meals tailored to individual dietary needs and preferences. They likely target busy individuals who want personalized, nutritious meal options without the hassle of meal planning or preparation. This approach addresses the growing demand for convenience, health-conscious choices, and customization in food services.

tagline: Dispute Recovery Platform for Commercial Claims and Litigations
description: We are building and operating a unique Dispute Recovery Platform (DRP) as a low-cost, hands-off and risk-free solution that uses AI & Automation to evaluate and resolve contractual breaches, commercial disputes and litigations while expediting cash recovery for businesses.
problem_statement: Small and Medium businesses are losing $800B every year because of unresolved or inefficiently resolved commercial disputes and litigations. Resolving contractual breaches, commercial disputes, and litigation is, for business today, a substantial expense, distraction from core operations and risk.We help SME's and startups to recover their money when dealing with commercial disputes and contract breaches from their customer or suppliers.

tagline: Electric Car Chargers

This feature will allow to set up your own charger at home and to sell power to other EV users that do not have an EV charger themselves.
problem_statement: Electrical vehicle market is growing at a rapid pace, its forecasted 18.7 million EVs on the road by 2030 with total of 9.6 million charge ports needed in US alone. As such the lack of charging stations bring huge opportunity for us at ChargifyEV.Furthermore, chargers on the market have short warranties, expensive, and provide no feature expandability without replacing to a newer charger.

tagline: Making pages turn
description: Bookwheel is a web platform designed to help students become lifelong readers using a simple three step process: incentivize, monitor, and grow. We give kids a reason to read through digital and real-world incentives, enable teachers to monitor their progress through AI-generated comprehension quizzes and reading logs, then help them find their next good read. With Bookwheel, we aim to make reading more than just a chore.
problem_statement: Reading has fallen out of popularity over the years, especially among children. According to the NAEP, student reading and comprehension has plummeted over the last decade. With so many distractions, it can be hard to motivate kids to read and for teachers to manage reading in their classrooms. That's where Bookwheel comes in.

Through prompts and guided questions curated by leading child and family psychologists, we help parents (and grandparents) create an honest portrait of who they are and share their true self with their children by so that their children understand them better and grow up with a foundation of family and self.
problem_statement: We have social media platforms and apps to help cultivate every relationship we make in our lives, except for the most important.- 70% of parents struggle to communicate meaningfully with their children- 85% of parents worry their children are grow more emotionally distant over time- 86% of parents of parents distrust found on social mediaThe influence of parents and family institute are under threat.“Massive exposure to all kinds of information, and particularly information that is unhealthy or beyond the scope of a child’s developmental age, has placed parents in the untenable position of battling outside influences that tear at the parent-child relationship rather than assisting to safeguard family values, parental guidelines, and promote normal psychological growth.”

Andrew and I are so proud to share that Well Water Finders has been invited to be a portfolio member of Austin Technology Incubator (ATI) - the deep tech incubator at The University of Texas at Austin. ATI is the longest active technology incubator in the United States and has helped numerous entrepreneurs effectively commercialize their breakthrough innovations and compete in the global marketplace.
The Well Water Finders patented technology locates depth and volume of groundwater down to 5,000 ft. in minutes. Ideal for real estate development, food production, ranching and municipal supply - we are working towards manufacturing portable units that can be used to determine groundwater levels for two important applications: extraction through water well drilling; and ideal placement for aquifer recharge zones to collect harvested rainfall, returning water back to the earth.

tagline: The World's Smallest Hearing Aid
description: NanoEar is a biotech startup aimed at developing the world's smallest hearing aid. Our founders bring clinical, engineering, and financial expertise to the development of this revolutionary hearing aid. Our company's advisors bring world class experience. They include a NASA battery expert, MIT trained ASIC designer, and a 3rd generation master watchmaker to build our prototypes who also happens to have been the lead guitarist for Anthrax. We are working with University of Antwerp for FEA modeling and cadaveric testing of the middle ear, Tulane University for animal tissue engineering, and University of Rochester for advanced battery developments.
problem_statement: There are 466 million people who suffer from hearing loss worldwide. In the US and in many other western countries there is only a 20-30% adoption of today’s hearing technologies. Untreated hearing loss, can lead to a reduction in productivity, loss of jobs, emotional distress and even cognitive disorders like anxiety, depression, and dementia. The most common reasons for lack of hearing aid adoption are: stigma, cost, hassle with batteries, poor fit, and the perception that hearing aids offer limited benefit. The current global hearing aid market is $7B annually. Given the low adoption rates, positive demographics, and the desire for improved hearing aid quality, NanoEar is poised to take advantage of a severely under-penetrated market.

tagline: Food Loss Prevention at Heart, Machine Learning in Mind
description: We are a SaaS, ML-based portal for restaurant owners to prevent food loss, which is food that is thrown away before it ever ‘leaves the kitchen’, primarily due to expiration of perishable ingredients. We integrate with the restaurant’s existing PoS system to gather streamlined data on dishes sold. We take this data, combined with historic PoS data, and input it into a machine learning algorithm that provides a forecast that is more accurate than humans. Using our service, restaurant owners can save time and money in food sourcing by using our forecasts as an anchor for how many pounds of perishable ingredients to buy. We also are adding data visualization and nearby event/foot traffic analytics as features.Key Numbers:Currently, an average restaurant loses $70K per location on food lossCurrent average human margin of error is 18.2%For every 5% we improve the margin of error, the restaurant saves $14K
problem_statement: It’s important to understand the distinction between food “loss” and food “waste”. Food loss refers to food that is thrown away before it leaves the kitchen. It is usually a result of expiration of perishable goods. Food loss is controlled by owners/chefs. Food waste is the amount of food thrown away by a customer. Sprout Food Solutions is aimed to help reduce food loss, food that is thrown away by owners and chefs. According to the Natural Resources Defense Council, around $70B of food loss occurs every year. On a per restaurant level, that is around $70K/per restaurant in pure cost savings they’re foregoing. With experience in the food service industry amongst all 3-team members, in addition to the 35+ client interviews we’ve conducted, it became clear that this problem is fueled by restaurant owners making food sourcing decisions ‘by-ear’ and generally involves little data analysis.

tagline: ObiiGO is revolutionizing the auto repair industry using technology designed to save customers time and money.
description: From End to End, ObiiGO Is the Only App That Sends Auto Repair Quotes to Your Phone, Finds You The Best Price, Schedules, And Offers Interest Free-No Credit Check Payment Options

tagline: In space, "can't teach an old dog a new trick" has a whole new meaning.
description: Stormey X is providing the solution.By using a special patented dog training technique, backed by the American Kennel Club and ASPCA, we are able to send canines to space to complete low-grade space missions. These missions would typically cost space programs billions of dollars with the current flight plans and construction set for humans.However, by utilizing canines and the Perfect Space Shuttle (TM), we can save the country a projected 350% in reduced costs.Stormey X is revolutionizing the way we think about space exploration - through the help of man's best friend.
problem_statement: As the race towards space expansion travels at the speed of light onward, we find that our one main barrier to continued success is the actually size of astronaut. Funding for research and development will come, and technology continues to progress.However, what limits us is actually humans' size versus the perfect aerodynamic shape of the ideal space shuttle. NASA has come up with the Perfect Space Shuttle (TM) and it allows for a 2 square foot space for our astronauts. NASA, Roscosmos (Russia) and the European Space Agency as well as 97% of private aerospace scientific community back this design.Obviously, humans cannot make 2 square feet work.

milestones.title: NASA has publicly supported our prototype.
milestones.description: In June, NASA released a public statement publicly supported our prototype for training dogs to go to space. We are in constant communication and collaboration with the team at NASA, and we look forward to continued work with them!

milestones.title: We officially launched!
milestones.description: Stormey Explorations is proud to officially launch and begin our journey through space by booking our first partnership with the John Stennis Space Center in Hancock County, MS.

tagline: All-in-one SaaS for Gyms & Personal Trainers
description: WeStrive is building the world's first platform for all Health & Fitness professionals to manage/scale their business while collaborating with other professionals in similar fields. We’re growing as a tool for personal trainers & gyms and will begin expanding horizontally to physical therapists, yoga studios, and group fitness studios in 2024.Our app helps save time, increases sales, and improves the overall business experience. Our suite of tools includes fitness programming, daily schedules, nutrition plans, habit-tracking, progress graphs, and is trusted by 1000's of gyms, trainers, and clients worldwide.
problem_statement: There are 5M health & fitness businesses worldwide utilizing a dozen apps to manage their day-to-day operations. A crossfit gym will use Excel to build programs, a physical binder to track client progress, and text messages to handle appointments - a nutritionist will send their nutrition plans over PDF, have clients individually text their macros, and then send them their final results in an excel document. It's the exact same song & dance for every health/fitness business.The 2nd problem is the fact that a personal trainer, nutritionist, and physical therapist all work with the same client but they have no idea. With WeStrive, they'll not only know, but they'll actively collaborate to improve the client's life and grow their businesses together.

tagline: Safe Airfield Automation Solutions with Autonomy, AI, and Real-Time Analytics
description: Essential Aero automates airfield operations using autonomous vehicles, computer vision, and AI.  Airfield operations are dominated by human centric processes that are inefficient and consume precious human resources.  Machines are more efficient and more effective at executing many of the tedious but critical tasks that are required for safe operations.  Our robotic automation systems can move materials, clean ramps off debris, inspect pavement, and patrol the perimeter continuously 24/7/365 and deliver better results along with data and imaging that can be used for performance measurement and process optimization.  We are experienced in both airport and air carrier operations and are trusted to deliver a solution that will meet your safety expectations and those of your regulators, FAA or otherwise.  In this post-pandemic environment where your operations are growing but your workforce isn't, maybe more human resources isn't the answer.  Automation is the only scalable solution and we are here to help.
problem_statement: Operation of critical infrastructure, including airfields, is human centric.  Operators of this infrastructure are finding it harder to hire, train, and retain than ever before.  Post-COVID, the pool of qualified candidates has decreased dramatically and some of these positions require drug testing, further whittling down the field.  Operators are not able to keep pace with current expectations and regulatory requirements let alone grow capacity for the future.  The fact is, human centric processes are not scalable.Airports and airlines are breaking passenger travel and capacity records, exceeding pre-COVID levels.  Neither of these industries have been able to scale their operations to keep up.  All constituents agree that automation is the only viable solution.

tagline: Fortem Technologies
description: Fortem detects UAS threats using small distributed AESA radar with leading edge artificial intelligence to digitize the airspace in the any environment. Fortem defeats these threats with the F700 DroneHunter, the world’s most advanced interceptor. This same underlying capability will accelerate the adoption of urban air mobility through digitizing the airspace for safe unmanned flight.
problem_statement: Fortem provides the world’s leading solutions sensors, interceptors, and enabling software platform to autonomously defend urban areas from unmanned threats.

tagline: Virtual-First Preventative Care through delightful services and intelligent software
description: Our Technology Platform combined with skillful Care Coordination allows us to provide Chronic Care Management, Remote Patient Monitoring, and Transitional Care Management at scale, including both the patient and their care network (family/caregivers/physicians) via multiple communication methods. We offer literally a private labeled, turnkey service delivered to patients on behalf of our clinical partners (practices, hospitals, senior communities).  The result is clear and impactful: Health and wellness improvements, more involvement from the care network (through a Personal Health Record and Comprehensive Care Plan), and better access to life-saving clinical care for those who have been disproportionately affected by COVID-19 (lower-income individuals and seniors of color).
problem_statement: Each year almost $4 Trillion (literally 90% of the nation’s annual healthcare expenditures) is spent on chronic and acute disease management.  Yet with over 44 million Americans eligible for a Medicare-reimbursed Chronic Care Management program, fewer than 1.5% take advantage of this federal initiative.  Often the patient’s healthcare practitioner isn’t staffed to be able to deliver this needed service.  And COVID-19 has exacerbated the problem, as fewer than 40% of Seniors in the U.S. had a clinical encounter (in person or by telehealth) during the pandemic, and mental health issues (anxiety, social isolation, loneliness) are on the increase in the senior population.  That’s where 1TH-CM finds our opportunity.
