Our technology connects the senior with their care network (family/caregivers/physicians) via multiple communication methods and provides meaningful information on the patient’s past encounters and real-time health information.  trueCare also visualizes the senior’s care plan instructions and engages them via notifications and visual/verbal communication to improve compliance.

tagline: Making sense of sensor data
description: Enables engineering teams designing and building new products in Automotive, Aerospace, Energy and other manufacturing segments analyze and build “Big Physics” based predictive models improve manufacturing quality and reduce new product time to market.
problem_statement: Engineers in manufacturing product development are being asked to create breakthrough technologies like EVs, autonomous vehicles and molten salt nuclear reactors in half the time and with quality improvements that minimizes risk of expensive product recalls.  To accomplish this engineering teams must virtualize their design, prototyping and validation processes by tapping into predictive machine learning modeling techniques to increase scale and accelerate their processes.

milestones.title: ARR
milestones.description: $1.7 software ARR target hit

milestones.title: Cloud version of Viviota Time-to-Insight software released
milestones.description: Viviota’s TTI software has traditionally been an edge-based product in alignment with customer requirements.  Released a cloud version of the software to meet our market’s growing demand for hybrid edge-to-cloud deployments for their global engineering organizations.

tagline: We connect curated brand ambassadors to CPG, beer/wine/liquor companies looking for high quality brand activation
description: We combine brand learning, emotional sales education, and a non-model approach to experiential marketing. In this day and age, most consumers want to be educated and told a story, and we have the best business model and technology to achieve that end.Our Proof:  50+ paying clients, 5000+ Dagons on the DEN platform,  and 150% rev growth from 2021 to 2022
problem_statement: The $27.5B Brand Activation industry is plagued with uneducated ambassadors, low ROI & ancient (or nonexistent) event data reporting.Dragon Spirits Marketing (DSM) was founded on the belief that the brand activation space (also known as the promotional model or experiential marketing space) is in great need of disruption.  Our in-house designed technology affectionately called the DEN (Dragon Engagement Network™) is our key to this disruption.  The DEN is built to allow clients direct access to Dragons (brand ambassadors), allowing greater efficiency to add events, manage Dragons, and most importantly, receive informative after-event reporting data that will grow their brands through distribution and retail partners.

tagline: The world’s biggest tip jar.
description: PickleJar’s cashless tipping app centralizes and rewards fan engagement, dramatically increasing the earning potential of artists so they can maximize their brand. With insights to what fans love and what they want next, community stakeholders such as venues, advertisers, Record Labels, and ESG organizations can connect with fans on a hyper-local level.
problem_statement: Today, millions of artists and content creators are feverishly chasing pockets of fans and new audiences across multiple social platforms, streaming services, and on-stage performances. Artist exposure is spread too thin across too many platforms which charge high take rates (up to 50%) for tips and provide limited control to the artists for engagement with their audience and content monetization.

tagline: WORLD’S FIRST FLEXIBLE STERILIZATION DEVICE
description: Lumaegis' key innovation is RadBlanket, a flexible decontamination device that provides a final step in the infection control and prevention (ICP) protocol in all healthcare settings. Our vision is to revolutionize healthcare ICP and become the new standard for not only healthcare disinfection, but in hospitality, travel, food, drug preparation, and nano-particle drug delivery systems. Just developed, RadBox, is in testing to replace autoclaves within 6 mins.
problem_statement: LumAegis, Inc. is developing and commercializing technologies in the e-textile/smart fabric space. Our patented system integrates solid-state components into a flexible textile structure, creating a free-flowing system that can illuminate, communicate, decontaminate, sense and react. I

tagline: Outsourced Cybersecurity for SMBs, Startups, and Supply Chains. Cyvatar is the easiest and most cost-effective way to get and stay cyber-secure.
description: Cyvatar is leading the future of cybersecurity with effortless, fully managed security subscriptions. As the first cybersecurity-as-a-service (CSaaS) provider, Cyvatar empowers our members to achieve successful security outcomes by providing the people, process, and technology required for cybersecurity success. Solution assessment, installation, configuration, remediation, and maintenance are all included in a fixed subscription. The future of cybersecurity is effortless with Cyvatar.
problem_statement: Implementing cybersecurity for your SMB can feel overwhelming and expensive. You may even be putting it off. But it doesn’t have to be that way. Cyvatar drives worry-free cybersecurity programs for SMBs who need security from the ground up, are scaling quickly, or need to simplify their strategy. Members get free access to the Cyvatar Platform to analyze performance and see how their security investments are measuring up against ROI. And our Member Experience Team ensures white-glove treatment and satisfaction extends beyond the sale.

milestones.title: Cyvatar Ranked As The #1 Company In Security And Privacy Services On G2
milestones.description:
Cyvatar has been ranked as the #1 company in the Security and Privacy Services category on G2. This recognition comes as a result of the company’s commitment to providing innovative and effective solutions to its clients, as well as its dedication to customer service and satisfaction.
G2 is a software and services review platform that helps businesses make informed decisions by providing accurate and unbiased reviews from real users. The rankings on G2 are determined based on user satisfaction, market presence, and overall customer feedback.
Cyvatar’s ranking as the #1 company in Security and Privacy Services on G2 is a testament to the company’s commitment to delivering the best possible solutions to its clients. The company has a team of experienced professionals who are dedicated to providing top-notch cybersecurity and privacy services to organizations of all sizes.
“We are honored to be recognized as the #1 company in Security and Privacy Services on G2,” said Corey White, CEO of Cyvatar. “This recognition is a reflection of our team’s dedication to providing the best possible solutions and services to our members. We are committed to continuing to innovate and provide the highest level of customer service and satisfaction.”
Cyvatar’s comprehensive cybersecurity and privacy services include vulnerability assessments, penetration testing, threat intelligence, incident response, and compliance management. The company also offers managed security services, including managed detection and response, and endpoint protection.
“We are proud of the work we do at Cyvatar and are grateful to our members for their trust and support,” said White. “We will continue to push the boundaries of what is possible in the world of cybersecurity and privacy, and we look forward to serving our members with excellence for years to come.”

milestones.title: Cyvatar Launches eCommerce Page to Revolutionize Cybersecurity-as-a-Service
milestones.description:
As a pioneer in cybersecurity-as-a-service, Cyvatar becomes the first company to integrate full-commerce capabilities into its platform. Today’s launch of the eCommerce page is just one example of Cyvatar’s commitment to innovation and game-changing solutions for the future of cybersecurity.
With the new eCommerce page, customers can say goodbye to sales calls, lengthy negotiations, and complex contracts. Instead, they can enjoy flexible billing options, transparent pricing, and effortless cybersecurity with just a few simple clicks.
“Our decision to launch eCommerce was driven by our dedication to providing a seamless experience for all Cyvatar members,” said Corey White, Cyvatar CEO. “We’re always looking for ways to make it easier for our customers to secure their organizations against cyber threats. By launching our new eCommerce page, we’re giving customers the ability to purchase our services quickly and easily, without the need for complex contracts. We are making cybersecurity simple.”
Cyvatar offers the industry’s first subscription-based, cybersecurity-as-a-service (CSaaS) that protects the company’s members, their resources, and confidential information. Cyvatar’s products ensures customers get tangible and pivotal value from their security tools, from conception and strategy to implementation and maintenance.
Cyvatar’s method provides expert cybersecurity pros, provably successful processes and best-of-breed security tools for superior compliance and cyber-attack protection. Cyvatar guarantees proper identification of assets, installation, configuration, assessment, remediation, and maintenance. Customer organizations actually achieve better protection and resilience from their investments. Instead of throwing more tools at the problem, drowning in security alerts, and hoping that somehow these “streams will cross” to combat the actual problem, Cyvatar subscribers achieve provably reliable cybersecurity and demonstrable compliance with the most stringent requirements.
Cyvatar replaces ownership with membership. Through the new eCommerce page, new members can join in seconds. This membership model levels the playing field by democratizing cybersecurity and making the best protection accessible and affordable for every size organization, even if they have no cybersecurity expertise in house.

tagline: AI-driven patient engagement for pharmacy
description: Doseform is building AI for prescriptions. Our platform helps pharmacies automate effective patient communication through conversational two-way texting that feels like chatting with friends, provides intelligent answers to routine pharmacy questions, and can escalate to the pharmacy team.We are on a mission to enable patient-first practice by helping pharmacies operate on autopilot.
problem_statement: Today, the $550B US pharmacy market faces huge labor shortages, resulting in revenue loss, compliance issues, medication dispensing errors, and employee burnout.This is happening amid shifting healthcare consumer preferences as a result of more Americans choosing high deductible health plans (HDHPs), and demand better digital experience.

tagline: The World's First AI Product Manager
description: At Product Pal, we're revolutionizing the landscape of tech and SaaS product management through our innovative virtual product assistant, Pal - the pioneering AI product manager at a global scale.Pal operates as an intelligent entity, streamlining a multitude of tasks crucial for your company's sustained profitability and success. It masters everything from conducting insightful competitive and market analyses to discerning customer sentiments and optimizing employee productivity. However, Pal's capabilities extend far beyond mere data analysis and reporting.Armed with a comprehensive understanding of the market, Pal channels this intelligence into action - crafting requirement documents, orchestrating engaging presentations, prioritizing roadmap elements, and a plethora of other tasks, all performed with unrivaled precision.This seamless automation liberates your team to invest more time in fostering deep customer relationships and cultivating innovative strategies for your business, sparking growth and driving long-term success. Experience the future of product management with Product Pal, and elevate your company to new heights of excellence.
problem_statement: Building product is hard. Even if you are building software products, it is still really hard. It starts with a great idea, but the execution is what matters and where most products fail. They fail because they aren't keeping up with market trends or listening to customers or have poor communication and what is built doesn't match customer needs. Product Pal is designed to address all of those concerns. Product Pal is every product manager's personal virtual assistant. Pal stays up-to-date on the competitive market, alerting you when there is news. It analyzes customer feedback and write product requirements so that your product matches customer needs and help helps vet new ideas so that your roadmap stay ahead of the curve.

tagline: Feel good gift-giving platform
description: Altrüus is a multinational  platform that consolidates international, national and local brands in one marketplace (social network app), and allows users to send gifts to each other with fun and emotional messages attached to them, and then allows friends to interact with those messages socially.
problem_statement: Millennials and Zoomers are abandoning the $180bn ($390bn global) gift card industry for p2p gifting.B2C: Millennials and Zoomers prefer social experiences with the ability of personalization, but only have access to transaction-focused gifting platforms. Our app is a social network that creates experiences around gifting that are social, fun and emotional.B2B: RETAILERSWe produce additional revenue in 2 ways and makeanalytics accessible.A. User-paid gifts. We provide a sales channel where users actually engage frequently.B. Free gifts (business sponsored). We drive qualified prospects into retail stores (not discount hunters). We succeed where Groupon fails, in that we connect the business with profitable customers.GIFT CARD INDUSTRY INCUMBENT NEGLECTMillennials and Zoomers prefer to buy from local businesses, but there is no consolidated marketplace that offers gift cards and SKUs from local places, in addition to national brands

tagline: Robustify Your Supply Chain
description: Multi AI provides an end-to-end visibility and decision-support platform that allows supply chain managers in manufacturing and retail to receive a holistic view of their supply chain operations and identify and mitigate real-time disturbances before they result in supply chain disruptions.
problem_statement: More than 81% of companies spend more than $3 million on disruption annually, and more than 91% of supply chain managers cannot assess disruption impacts within hours. These are huge inefficiencies and costs caused by a lack of supply chain visibility and decision-support tools, creating a drastic need for our solution.

tagline: Protecting the World's Data
description: STASH is a patented zero-trust quantum-resistant, proactive, autonomous, automatic solution to data theft, ransomware, loss, manipulation, and harm. It is unique and effective, delivering a level of data privacy, security, and resilience that is beyond anything available until now.  It protects data at the data byte level, wherever it is wherever it goes inside or outside of the organization, and restores both Data and The System that runs it in every organization, in real-time.  Without paying ransom.STASH mitigates attacks by thwarting the attempted damage and getting businesses up and running again in several hours instead of several weeks or months. Data and The System it runs on are completely restored. Business Downtime at $500-600,000 per hour eliminated. No ransomware payment to make.STASH was built with today's organizations in mind. Its modular format works with all legacy systems and tools as well as new ones; it will fill the defensive security gap, and if an organization chooses, replace lower value, lower performance tools.Run from an Admin Dashboard, there are no changes to workflows or user dependencies. There isn't another breakthrough out there that accomplishes all this, cost-effectively, simultaneously addressing the growing shortage of technology talent and winning at the ransomware chess game.You owe it to your company to take a look - this is the dawn of the least effort, most effective solution for data breach.Sound too good to be true? We hear that pretty often. Until we show that our steak actually matches the sizzle. You'll know without a doubt - and just like that, you'll breathe a sigh of relief.
problem_statement: Cybersecurity is broken. The last twenty years of building stackable tools in an effort to create a fortress to defend the perimeter has failed woefully. The DATA is the perimeter.There are thousands of defensive security tools - large organizations are using on average 156 of them in an attempt to thwart data compromise. With 50 Billion connected endpoints in the world and growing, this simply isn't possible. Trying to protect data from the outside in continues to be an effort in futility.Cyber thought leaders universally agree after years of faith in defense alone, that data is not protected unless a datacentric solution that contains, mitigates, and eradicates the attack is part of the security posture. That's what STASH brings to the table.

tagline: A Unique Content & Ad Solution.
description: Pickey delivers premium photo & video content while offering full service digital targeting, placement, and ad management. We leverage mobile phone data to build and activate your target audience, only creating & deploying ads that are highly relevant to the people who see them. Say goodbye to wasted ad spend.
problem_statement: Brands struggle to create compelling photo & video content and don’t know how to place themselves in front of a relevant audience using Facebook & Google Ads.

tagline: Love where you live, and trust who works there
description: Fairmarket is the first full-range online home management tool for homeowners.Fairmarket for homeowners: Homeowners, Realtors, Property Managers, Real Estate InvestorsFarimarket for contractors: From House Cleaners And Handymen, To Roofers And General Contractors. Any Residential Servicer Or Contractor Can Become A Fairmarket Contractor.Fairmarket for product brands and distributors: Provide Consumers Digital Visualization Of Your Products On Their Own Homes.
problem_statement: The online home services industry lacks the ability for users to include vital job data, such as accurate specs & measurements, which are necessary for any kind of on-demand user flow. This technology vacancy leaves gaping holes in the B2C online workflow for the online home services industry.

tagline: Addressing the Epidemic of Antibiotic Overuse
description: Entvantage Diagnostics, based in Austin Texas, has developed Sinu-Test®, the first rapid, in-office test for bacterial sinusitis detection. The Sinu-Test Bacterial Sinusitis Test Kit includes a proprietary collection device, bacterial assay kit and optical reader device that provides accurate, rapid, in-office diagnostic test results for determination of bacterial sinusitis.  The first-of-its-kind, FDA Class II DeNovo Diagnostic test kit, with issued patents in the U.S., EU, Australia and Japan, provides primary care and ENT physicians with a simple and accurate point-of-care test for sinusitis that takes 20 minutes to achieve results and allows healthcare providers to determine the 10% of patients that have bacterial sinusitis and can benefit from antibiotics from the 90% that have viral sinusitis where antibiotics are ineffective. The Sinu-Test diagnostics test kit will help providers reduce the number of unnecessary antibiotic prescriptions, increase revenue to the clinic using established CPT reimbursement codes that pay $55 per test and reduce the overall treatment costs for these illnesses from $400 to $125 with the use of the Sinu-Test.  Clinical testing is underway in the U.S.
problem_statement: There are many common upper respiratory illnesses (URI’s) that are currently being overtreated with antibiotics.  Based only on patient history and symptomology, it is difficult for a physician to accurately diagnose if the URI is caused by a bacterial infection or a virus since the symptoms are very similar. There are no rapid, in-office diagnostic tests available to assist them in making their diagnoses and without a definitive diagnostic test, physicians prescribe antibiotics to most patients, even though they are infrequently needed.  Unnecessary antibiotics can make their condition worse and lead to serious and costly complications an over 23,000 deaths each year in the U.S.ENTvantage Dx provides a diagnostic test kit to allow physicians to accurately diagnose upper respiratory illnesses and help reduce unnecessary antibiotic use.  No rapid, in-office tests are available to test for pathogens in upper respiratory illnesses.

tagline: Ohio Drone is the end-to-end partner for UAS integration, drone manufacturing, and operations service provider.
description: Ohio Drone is bringing the VORN UAS Net to market through a nationwide program that is drone agnostic, focusing on detection, communication, and coordination of drone mobility.
problem_statement: Ohio Drone is a non-destructive C-UAV RF detecting communication network that enables shared airspace operations (manned and unmanned) by supporting detection capabilities below 500 feet and handoff between regional UTM systems and aerospace transportation authorities.

tagline: AI-Powered Resume Distribution Service for Job Seekers
description: WeSendCV.com is a cutting-edge platform designed to revolutionize the job search process by leveraging advanced AI technology. We help job seekers increase their chances of landing interviews and job offers by automatically distributing their resumes to relevant job agencies, recruiters, and hiring managers. Our service is simple: users upload their resumes, and our AI system analyzes their skills and experience to match them with suitable job opportunities. By sending resumes to a wide network of potential employers, WeSendCV.com saves time and enhances the visibility of job seekers in the competitive job market.
problem_statement: WeSendCV.com addresses the challenge of job seekers struggling to get noticed in a highly competitive local job market. Traditional job search methods often involve manually searching through countless job listings and submitting resumes one by one, which can be time-consuming and inefficient. Many candidates find it difficult to match their qualifications with the right opportunities, leading to frustration and missed chances for employment.Our platform solves this problem by leveraging AI for the resume distribution process. WeSendCV.com ensures that resumes are sent directly to the most relevant country-specific job agencies, recruiters, and hiring managers, significantly increasing the chances of securing interviews and job offers. By streamlining the job search process, we help candidates get noticed faster in the local market and connect with opportunities that truly match their skills and career goals.

tagline: Like “Zillow” for Mars
description: Million on Mars is an MMO open sandbox city-builder, where you decide on your homestead's location, explore Mars, and build out your settlement on the highest-fidelity terrain available in a gamewith data from NASA/JPL.
problem_statement: We’re combating common prevailing attitudes about becoming multi-planetary

tagline: Out of this world software for high-risk operations. Using AI to predict and manage complex risks.
description: Space Redi is building software to support operational decision making and risk management for human spaceflight and other high-risk operations.Our platform allows companies to capture and characterize the data representing complex relationships between crews and their environments, the outcomes of their missions, and the factors that link each element. It then communicates the risks, likelihoods, and consequences to decision-makers, allowing users to play “what-if” games with their missions either before having to launch or when away from Earth-based support.We are working on dual-use applications in industrial workforce safety for terrestrial industries with humans operating in extreme environments like mining, commercial diving, energy, and DoD (warfighter readiness).
problem_statement: Spaceflight is risky. In the new space economy, companies are taking on the risk of selecting, training and monitoring their crew systems as NASA once did.Predicting and modeling those risks in spaceflight is a difficult and arduous task. With only around 700 people ever going to space, there is simply not enough data for traditional statistical methods to work. There are millions of variables to manage with complex relationships that allow even small risks to cascade in catastrophe.Current risk analyses are inadequate, performed manually, in spreadsheets, and occasionally by hand. Even at the highest levels of spaceflight operations, real-time risk trades are often done with heuristic knowledge and without quantitative support. This slows down the time to critical decisions and leaves room for human error.We've found similar issues in risk systems for warfighter readiness, mining operations, and other extreme environment occupations.

tagline: Moth+Flame VR
description: Moth+Flame is a developer of virtual training technology intended to define the next generation of visual communication. The company's training platform powered by AI and natural language processing offers innovative adaptive learning programs for technical and cognitive skills, enabling clients to get immersive learning experiences for enterprise-scale across a range of verticals. Moth+Flame's solution melds state-of-the-art cinematography with cutting-edge VR environment creation to improve the fluency of human-computer interactions and create visceral synthetic experiences that humanize the VR experience. Virtual reality creates the most immersive training experience to improve the workforce in any industry.
problem_statement: Typical workplace learning and development involving slide presentations has fallen flat, despite the best efforts of the most enthusiastic instructors to engage learners. This has been the norm for a number of training programs within the public and private sectors. Stagnant training models and limited resources are resulting in low engagement, low employee retention, and slow skill-building of workforces. The next generation of technology can help organizations improve the engagement of their workforce in training.

tagline: Full-Stack Space Supercomputers
description: Odyssey is building full-stack space supercomputers starting with building the communication software and AI on Earth, scaling it, and using the insights and profit to build a supercomputer in LEO that will power Earth's orbital services, and leverage that to build the compute infrastructure to support orbital intelligence and communications services around the Moon, Mars, the solar system, deep space, and beyond.

tagline: TourniTek is the first pre-hospital treatment for emergencies leading to amputation and the first to combine the preservative properties of cooling with the circulatory control of a traditional tourniquet.
description: TourniTek is the first pre-hospital treatment for emergencies leading to amputation and the first to combine the preservative properties of cooling with the circulatory control of a traditional tourniquet. TourniTek is designed to substantially extend the pre-treatment timeline by cooling the core temperature of the limb. This increases the window of time in which to seek treatment, preventing amputation and saving limbs.
problem_statement: Tourniquets are proven to save lives by preventing lethal blood loss. However, by restricting blood flow for the prolonged time required to transport an injured patient from the field to a surgical facility for treatment, tourniquet use often results in disability or amputation.

tagline: AI + 3D for Virtual Training and Simulation
description: We enable anyone to quickly create photoreal AI-enabled virtual training modules in minutes and deploy them on any device.Using cutting-edge AI and computer vision techniques backed by leading 3D and AI experts from Stanford University, we enable users to rapidly scan real-world environments and assets using any sensor and turn them into interactive 3D scenes in under 30 minutes. These 3D scenes are then combined with relevant data and documentation using our proprietary 3D retrieval augmented generation (RAG) process.
problem_statement: The armed forces have 900,000 personnel who undergo structured (multi-week) training each year in one of 10,000 different military occupational specialties. All 2M personnel undergo annual informal on-the-job training to maintain readiness and learn new capabilities. Virtual training is 75% more effective than traditional methods, but it has only been a possibility for pilots and other niche groups through large expensive simulators provided by the incumbent primes.We are democratizing access to virtual training for 95% of the military, which currently does not have access, by drastically reducing the cost and effort needed to create virtual training modules.

tagline: AI spatial platform
description: GridRaster is an AI Spatial platform transforming Industrial Enterprise Manufacturing, Operations, and Training using AI and XR.  We recognized early on the transformative power of XR and AI to boost efficiency and productivity throughout the product life cycle - starting from design, assembly, manufacturing, to training, and maintenance operations. Using the GridRaster platform, our customers are not only able  to automate the creation and streaming of digital twins (10x faster at 1/10th the cost), but also precisely merge these digital models with the real world using common commercial XR devices. Put simply, we're making AR experiences more efficient, accessible, and secure.
problem_statement: GridRaster is helping industrial enterprises boost efficiency and productivity throughput the product lifecycle.

tagline: The leading peer-based mental well-being solution for employers.
InformationShield is like quickbooks for cyber security compliance.
description: Information Shield has a SaaS product and that enables any company to quickly and painlessly generate information security programs, provides templates for policies and employee training programs, and document and report adherence to these policies for regulatory and verification purposes. Their library encompasses SOC II, HIPAA, PCI, GLBA, ISO 27002, and many other compliance regulations. They also can generate a Cyber Risk Score which helps organizations benchmark their programs against key cyber practices.
problem_statement: More and more businesses are required to generate plans and demonstrate follow through with information security compliance regulations, yet it’s a complicated and complex process that to date has required hours of work from dedicated compliance professionals and the high associated costs, leading many businesses to defer or ignore this critical business practice often to their detriment.

tagline: Autonomous Maintenance Operations for Solar Energy & Airfields
description: Renu Robotics develops and manufactures autonomous mobile robots that maintain solar fields and energy infrastructure.   The Generation 3 Renubot was designed to mow grass under solar panels on utility scale solar farms.   The capabilities are expanding to airfield maintenance and military facilities.  A data center called Mission Control monitors all robots in the fields, sets schedules to perform maintenance and collects data to provide reports to customers.
problem_statement: The solar industry is growing fast and the cost of maintaining these large facilities can be as much as 60% of the operational costs.  Employees are hard to find and jobs are hazardous considering heat and high voltage levels.   Renu has automated the process and reduced the cost to maintain these facilities providing up to 50% saving for customers while reporting on infrastructure repair needs.

tagline: TOPIT is a social gamification platform that allows users to create challenges to compete against friends, rivals or influencers while the audience decide the winner. Wage Coins, Win Highlights, Earn Bragging Rights
description: TOPIT is a social gamification platform that allows users to create and engage in an endless variety of competitions and challenges. Our users create skilled, niche, and talented content to compete between friends, rivals or celebrities.
problem_statement: TOPIT allows content creators to monetize their skilled, talented and niche content while giving creators more control over challenge rooms, competitors, and audience. TOPIT is bridging the gap between social media and gamified content by allowing creators and brands to create challenges against the competition of choice while the audience votes for the winner based on skill, talent or niche.

tagline: Efficient power chip for the energy transition and electrification
description: New Power Chip Tech Saves EV Companies Money and Battery Last LongerTurbo Power Semiconductors helps electric vehicle manufacturers get more performance out of their batteries at about one-third the cost of current solutions – Tesla could save about $1,300 per car! Our Silicon-based solution has the performance of Silicon Carbide at much lower cost.
problem_statement: Silicon and SiC chips available on the market still generate substantially losses, hence wasting a lot of electric energy. Our new technology in Si and SiC can cut down the losses by 50 to 90%. This is especially true for higher and higher voltage devices.

tagline: Powering the world, wirelessly™
description: Spark Connected is a global leader in supplying B2B wireless power systems for autonomous industrial robots (AMR), automated guided vehicles (AGV), light electric vehicles (LEV) and professional service robots (PSB) built for customer service and interaction with people.We are a trusted partner for companies seeking to maximize their fleet efficiency and productivity of logistical operations by offering ready-to-integrate wireless charging systems. Our disruptive charging technology eliminates the need for manual charging and our systems are integral to our customers automated production flows to operate seamlessly, reducing downtime and program costs.Spark Connected wireless charging modules are not just about convenience; they also contribute to a decarbonized, greener and more sustainable future. By facilitating the adoption of electric vehicles and reducing the reliance on fossil fuels, the company plays a role in mitigating environmental challenges such as air pollution and climate change.
problem_statement: Today, wireless power solution providers are focused on smartphone and other portable consumer product charging.  These solutions are application specific, and only suitable for wirelessly charging small consumer electronics devices.Charging with a plug-in cable does not work for autonomous systems and unmanned vehicles used in factory automation, logistics, e-mobility, and aerospace & defense.  Spark's disruptive technology provides a touch-less and hermetically sealed charging solution that enables true autonomous systems and does away with the maintenance and repairs associated with cable/connector based charging solutions.Spark Connected is focused on providing b2b industrial wireless charging solutions for industrial robotics and light electric vehicles. The company has the broadest portfolio of innovative ready-to-use wireless power solutions ranging from 1 Watt to over 3 kilowatts.  Spark Connected is leading the way in wireless charging solutions for next-generation, higher-power applications such as e-bikes, robots, drones, power tools, AMR/AGV, light electric vehicles, and factory automation.

tagline: Voice. Identity. Guaranteed
description: ValidSoft is a global leader in speech science technologies, specifically Voice Authentication, generative AI deepfake audio detection and Trusted Identity Assurance
problem_statement: Deepfake audio, also known as synthetic audio, is a type of artificial intelligence-generated audio that can mimic thevoice of a real person to a high degree of accuracy. Over the last 18 months, Deepfake technology has become increasingly real and will continue to evolve. The rapid advances in AI applications such as ChatGPT have created opportunitiesfor fraudsters/hackers, making Deepfakes one of the foremost emerging methods for perpetrating fraud and identity theft. The human ear can no longer tell the difference between a Deepfake and a genuine human voice, so, every call to a Help Desk or Contact Center needs to be checked - is it a genuine human voice, or is it computer generated (Deepfake, RoboCall, etc.). The TAM is massive. Billions of calls per day are made to Help Desks and Contact Centers, and there were over 55 billion RoboCalls in the US alone in 2023. The world need a solution today. ValidSoft's AI patented solution, Voice Verity, solves the problem

tagline: Fully automated and globally integrated AI/ML platform (PaaS/SaaS) for forecasting revenues and costs for smarter decision making and planning.
description: We are using Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to forecast revenues and expenses on a monthly basis over a 12-month horizon.  We do this every month, so the company has a rolling forecast not just an annual budget.  We reduce the time, energy, and frustration in the "budget process" while providing an accurate forecast so management and employees can make smarter decisions and plan better.
problem_statement: Companies "budget" once a year and (1) they have high error rates, (2) lots of people are involved, (3) lots of friction between management wanting to increase revenues and decrease costs, while employees "sandbag" revenues and want more resources - both sides compensation are tied to results, and (4) budget is scraped at the end of the first quarter!

tagline: nVenue delivers lightning fast real-time predictive analytics for live sports - primarily for microbets and fan engagement.
description: nVenue provides real time predictions, analytics, and insights about player and team data to enable the sports betting industry to create a better gambling experience and open the door to new opportunities.
problem_statement: Professional sports gambling is a large and growing industry with little visibility into the data behind making informed bets.

tagline: Edutain your Brain
description: Introducing KLOUT KAST, a pioneering social media platform designed to bridge the gap between influential figures and diverse brands. Our platform serves as a dynamic marketplace, connecting a wide array of talents—from models, athletes, actors, musicians, TV personalities, magicians, internet influencers, comedians, chefs, and more—with brands and companies of all sizes.What sets KLOUT KAST apart is its integration of a reliable booking system and a trusted payment platform. This innovative approach streamlines the process of connecting, negotiating, and transacting between talents and brands. Our mission is to simplify and enhance the talent booking process, fostering beneficial collaborations that drive growth, brand awareness, and success for all parties involved.
problem_statement: Klout Kast addresses the fragmentation and inefficiencies in the current talent booking and edutainment market by offering a centralized, and soon AI-driven,  platform that connects talents directly with audiences seeking personalized educational and entertainment experiences. Our solution will soon leverage cutting-edge technology, including AI for personalized recommendations and blockchain for secure transactions, to streamline the discovery, booking, and engagement processes. This not only enhances the user experience by providing tailored content and interactive opportunities but also empowers talents with tools to expand their reach and monetize their skills effectively. By solving these core issues, Klout Kast is positioned to capture significant market share in the rapidly growing digital talent engagement space, offering a compelling investment opportunity with the potential for substantial growth and returns.

tagline: Unlock the biomedical dataverse to power human health
description: Autonomize Health is a healthcare AI company. Our Human-Centric Healthcare AI platform learns from multi-structured clinical and biomedical data, pairs with human context, to aid decision making and data discovery.
problem_statement: Data driven decisions are hard in healthcare, whether is for Clinical Decision Support, Population Health Management or discovery and launching new drugs and diagnostic, the ever exploding dataverse of bio medical information is a fascinating resources, still largely untapped. This is because Healthcare data is 80%+ unstructured and is not easily computable/analyzable ad it is silo'd across multiple systems and formats that is hard to synthesize. Our medical knowledge is doubling every 73 days today, and presents a missed opportunity to not leverage all of the available information to make critical decisions and unlock the human health potential.

milestones.description: Included into J&J JLabs Accelerator

tagline: We help companies keep great people
description: We have a beta product that has been used for the past 4 years by Accenture. Last year, 170 Accenture employees reached out via our platform looking to leave Accenture but we were able to help retain 131 employees.We have a total of 6,000 employees using the beta from Accenture, Roche, GlaxoSmithKline and Molex.

tagline: What's Inside?
CHAaSM Cloud is the first zero-trust software factory that automates secure software deployment.
description: CHAaSM Cloud is the first zero-trust software factory that automates secure software deployment. In a matter of minutes, you can ingest your software bill of materials, scan for vulnerabilities, and automate the build process to rapidly accelerate secure delivery. CHAaSM Cloud leverages Kubernetes (used by 87% of fortune 500) for customers who wish to develop software that can be adopted and accredited for use in federal government and highly regulated commercial environments.
problem_statement: There is an estimated $6 Trillion in damages from cybercrime in 2021. There are 100 Billion new lines of code produced every year, and 78% of organization have one or more critical vulnerabilities in their code base from consuming open source components. To compound this problem there is a projected 3.5 million shortfall in security talent.

tagline: Tomorrowing Today.
description: We build AI-driven software for Space, Defense, and Critical Infrastructure to drive predictive insights and enable optimized decisions for business and defense leaders. We have world-class Data Science, User Experience, Design, and Engineering, and Security teams all under one roof, which fosters optimized collaboration ensuring we deliver the best outcomes for our customers with the fastest time to value. Our goal ultimately is to optimize the path from data to decision
problem_statement: Making accurate, real-time decisions is critical to every business and every nation. The volume and types of data continue to grow out of control and is not easily accessed or shared across teams and lines of business. Traditional analytics tools have are simply inadequate in today’s business and defense environments. They don’t scale easily to meet growing demands and they can’t provide the real-time insights needed to keep up with innovative competitors and adversaries in today's fast-paced and dynamic world.

tagline: Global Intelligence & Research
description: A global intelligence & research platform, enabling the public to make better and faster decisions.
problem_statement: There is no way to contextualize what is happening on a global scale. The rapid pace and sheer volume of publicly available information is overwhelming the information pipeline and is an increasing threat for security and accuracy. We are building a single-point intelligence platform that collects Location & Event Data, Consumer Social Sentiment, and Public Polling data into one   platform for platforms to have global intelligence in one place.

tagline: Illuma Labs helps contact centers elevate the user experience, enhance security, and improve operational efficiency with zero friction voice authentication.
description: Illuma Shield is a real-time audio authentication platform for secure voice communications. The platform replaces archaic and intrusive authentication methods like PINs, passwords, and personal questions. Illuma Shield runs passively in the background and continuously analyzes the unique characteristics of the speaker's voice and calling device, resulting in significantly higher authentication accuracy achieved in a fraction of the time required by traditional authentication methods.
problem_statement: Existing identity verification technology and processes can lack true security/infallibility, leave much to be desired from a user experience perspective, and present a very real cost to operations (such as call centers) in the form of time and money. This problem exists across the financial, healthcare, telecom, and government sectors, representing a potential market of $10Bn.

tagline: Empowering SMBs to Scale Their Spend
description: ScaleSpend is redefining the corporate card industry by offering credit to traditional SMBs based on company performance, including bank balance history and financial reports, rather than personal credit scores. ScaleSpend uses AI-driven logic for underwriting, making business credit more accessible and tailored to SMBs' needs.
problem_statement: In the prevailing financial landscape, traditional SMBs face significant hurdles in securing business credit, as conventional banks heavily rely on personal credit scores and require personal backing for approval, without adequately considering the business's actual performance or success. This approach, coupled with a lengthy approval process and restrictive spending controls on employee cards, severely limits SMBs' financial agility and ability to manage expenses effectively. Moreover, existing alternatives focus on venture-backed companies, sidelining a vast majority of SMBs that operate without such backing.

tagline: Augmented reality for space education.
description: AstroReality leverages a partnership with NASA to ingest data and produce enriched content using AR/VR technology. The end product is like Masterclass, for learning about Space. The team sells direct to consumer and also through B2B channels for schools.
problem_statement: AstroReality is an award-winning brand that innovates by merging physical products with augmented reality. Creating immersive, tactile methods to explore science, space, and life, AstroReality brings space experiences to life in the palm of your hand.

description: We’re working on Edith which is the primary destination where people can stay on top of everything happening within their org. The key business insight is that teams are now de novo remote, and companies are adopting more software tools than ever. This results in teams missing out on critical work/discussions on disjointing tools/teams. By creating an algorithmic feed that curates conversations, updates, and projects happening across a workspace, we aim to seamlessly increase cross-org communication, and ultimately drive productivity.
problem_statement: - It's hard to stay on top of all the updates/ideas within an organization- Notifications/tracking changes gets overwhelming and takes away from focused deep work- Communicating broader organization and team wide goals currently is difficult without meetings/all hands

tagline: Business events automation SaaS tool
description: Oveit is an enterprise SaaS that helps event planners/creators atomate their process for ticketing, registration, access control, badging, billing, payments and data analytics.Oveit uses several highly innovative features in managing the process, some of them quite unique.
problem_statement: Our TAM (Total Addressable Market) is the MICE industry (Meetings, Incentives, Conferences and Exhibitions).Post-pandemic, this market grew exponentially - by more than $230 billion each year, by 30% year-on-year in the last 3 years, a $876 billion market in 2023, estimated to reach $1.4 trillion by 2030.Currently, the MICE market is under-digitized & under-staffed.Is under-digitized due to outdated, expensive software based on older tech with older stack (Cvent, Tito, Whova, Bizzabo).Is an under-staffed industry, a remanence of the pandemic era.In essence, the industry requires fully automated tools.

tagline: Protected by Paldara
description: Paldara is addressing this issue by developing an inexpensive antimicrobial gel coating using bacteriophage to prevent these infections from happening in the first place. Our innovative technology is non-toxic and all components are Generally Recognized as Safe (GRAS) by the FDA. Our bacteriophage cocktail can also combat antibiotic and multi drug resistant bacteria, thus addressing the growing antibiotic resistance crisis in hospital systems.
problem_statement: Catheter Associated Urinary Tract Infections (CAUTIs) are the most common hospital acquired infection in our healthcare systems. These infections are reoccurring, have high rates of antibiotic resistance, and tend to disproportionally effect those with pre-existing conditions. A yearly 1.7 billion dollar economic burden associated with these infections occurs annually along with at least 10,000 deaths reported in hospitals.

tagline: Renovlutionizing Authentication to Set the World Free From its Burden
description: Allthenticate is an all-in-one access control and authentication solution.This allowed people to use a secure credential on their smartphone for everything.USABILITY: The most usable security product will win the marketSECURITY: Security mechanisms that mitigate all popular attacksMODULARITY: Fully-distributed Scalable and modular architecture (patented)- Hardware and software are both build once, run everywhere- Ability to move quickly to adapt to changing landscape or expand into different marketsFLEXIBILITY: Maximum flexibility for users to configure their security postureCROSS - DOMAIN: The only unified, cross-domain identity management platform
problem_statement: Managing Employee credentials and access is annoying...- 72% of companies take more than 1 week to onboard employees.- 50% of companies take more than 3 days to offboard employees.- On Average, About 11 Hours/Person a year are spent resetting passwords annually ($5.2 million/organization).- 80% of hacking-related breaches are tied to credential theft.

tagline: Helping others train to save more lives using augmented reality.
description: MedCognition's product, PerSim, is an augmented reality simulation system that uses holograms placed in any environment to help the front line of medicine to train to save more lives. We use off the shelf hardware and and proprietary software to create thousands of simulation combinations.
problem_statement: Medical professionals seek to answer one key question, what does sick look like? PerSim patients display thousands of signs and symptoms to help answer this question and allow instructors and students to train immersively, forming strong cognitive learning pathways.

tagline: The hiring platform for legal
description: Flo Recruit is the hiring platform for the legal industry. We partner with law firms to help the hire the best legal talent and law schools to land their students jobs.What makes Flo Recruit special is our partnerships with law schools. When a law school partners with Flo Recruit, the school uses Flo Recruit to host all of its recruiting events and interview programs for students to meet employers. All employers who attend that campus' recruiting activities utilize Flo Recruit to meet students, and Flo Recruit premium employer clients get special access - all of the candidate data from the event is transferred directly to their accounts, a process that used to late nights of manual labor from recruiters scanning candidate documents into legacy applicant tracking systems one by one.Today, we partner with 60% of the top 100 law schools and over 70 law firms in an industry that spends billions on hiring every year.
problem_statement: The recruitment of lawyers has become hyper-competitive. Demand has exploded for digital solutions to address the sharp increase in lawyer attrition, demand for legal services, and as a result, the acceleration in on-campus interviewing and lateral recruitment.Law Firm Chief Talent Officers, Directors, Managers of Recruiting and Law School Career Services are all confirming value as Flo Recruit customers because we are bringing innovation where older solutions are slowing them down. With Flo Recruit, our clients bring recruiting into the digital world by building candidate pipelines, tracking candidates at recruiting events, hosting hundreds (sometimes thousands) of virtual interviews, collecting candidate evaluations digitally, and more recently, tracking candidates through the recruiting process from first touchpoint to hire.

tagline: Lena helps health systems support patients beyond clinic walls through virtual health companions augmented by text-based AI.
description: Lena is a virtual health companion. Engaging seniors through a text-based AI. This is a hybrid AI/Human solution, in certain scenarios, Lena will engage the human coach to step in and handle the conversation.
problem_statement: Post-treatment, Seniors are on their own. Seniors without support increase the chances of readmission and they don’t know how to effectively navigate systems for food, prescriptions, and housing. The total addressable market for seniors is $21B.

tagline: Empowering Men, Building Families
description: We help men treat their infertility comfortably at home instead of in an awkward clinic. Our at-home test kit and app can improve infertility almost half the time and save more than 22 months by doing it at home.
problem_statement: Each year, 9 million couples in America grapple with infertility. Male factors makeup half of those infertility cases - but men aren’t receiving the care they need. Men often skip fertility clinics due to discomfort. For those who do get tested in clinic, there are few male fertility programs available to help.

tagline: Microgravity, Delivered
description: In Orbit Aerospace is a space third-party logistics (3PL) service provider supporting the Department of Defense for use cases such as precision delivery of cargo from Space to Earth, satellite servicing and refueling, and on-orbit warehouse automation.We can get cargo from space to anywhere on Earth in under an hour. It is better protected in space than close to resupply lines and our docking technology paired with our warehouse automation technology means we can tailor make specific payload packages on demand.We're a team of seven based in Los Angeles working on multiple government programs with signed on commercial customers and deep space industry experience. Please don't hesitate to reach out!Click for full pitch deck!
problem_statement: Our warfighters can't get the supplies they need in time. And I cannot overstate the importance of that problem. With advanced warfare technologies including drones, our current logistics methods are increasingly at risk of interception and the problem is only going to get worse.

milestones.title: Granted a $1.8MM Contract from the Air Force for Hypersonic Fault Detection using AI/ML-based Algorithms
milestones.description:
In Orbit has been awarded a Phase II STTR from the Air Force to develop AI/ML-based algorithms to detect and correct faults on hypersonic vehicles. This work is sponsored by the Air Force Research Lab and the 49th Flight Test Squadron out of Edwards Air Force Base.
A culmination of this work will be an operation mission on a hypersonic flight test vehicle in the late 2025 time frame.

milestones.title: Identified a Champion for a $1.25MM Grant for Precision Delivery of Cargo
milestones.description:
Backstory: The DoD will give a result of ‘selectable/unfunded’ for SBIR proposals that they like but don’t have funding for. This means that you’re past the competitive selection process, but need to find a champion to fund the proposal yourself. It is notoriously difficult to get funding and most companies just resubmit the next solicitation period.
However, In Orbit has found a champion within USSOCOM to pick up our proposal and fund it. For this work, we will develop a precision cargo delivery capability via weather balloon while progressing our space to Earth delivery capability through prototyping and testing. The weather balloon capability is a natural stepping stone and can also lead to an early revenue generator for In Orbit.

milestones.title: Awarded a $1.8MM Grant from the US Space Force!
milestones.description: In Orbit has been awarded a $1.8MM Grant to further develop their docking technology. This is in partnership with the University of Boulder at Colorado and sponsored by the Air Force Research Lab and Space Systems Command’s Assured Access to Space.

milestones.title: Build prototype of the Resource Exchange Module
milestones.description:
When we asked customers if they wanted to save money and get more revenue, they obviously said yes. We then asked if leaving their labs in space and just shipping their products would allow them to achieve that, they also said yes. We then asked if they had any idea how to do that, they said no, and we happily sought to solve that problem for them.
Our solution was the Resource Exchange Module (REX). This is a module robotic system that sorts and exchanges materials between itself and other space assets, such as stations, manufacturing equipment, or another REX. We prototyped and built the first version that operates in an autonomous mode to transfer a resource between itself and another REX. See the video here:
https://inorbit.docsend.com/view/2jkmce9n7jba2d7y

milestones.title: Secure Customers for First Launch
milestones.description:
For our first re-entry mission in 2024, In Orbit had a milestone to fill the payload bay. This re-entry mission featured a 20cm x 20cm x 10cm payload bay with a total mass capability of 10kg. We received more demand for this mission than we had room for!
The reservation agreement is signed and final contract is in progress.

milestones.title: Receive a binding, milestone-based agreement for a paid future flight
milestones.description:
To lock in our future pipeline and also provide a low-risk method for our customers to secure future flights, we developed a memoranda of understanding with terms committing to a future flight. These terms are binding and contingent on us performing a successful re-entry mission in advance of the terms becoming binding.
We received our first signed agreement of this form from a well established Space Pharmaceutical company. This agreement generates $20k per kilogram for no less than 24 kilograms of payload for a $480k value.

milestones.title: Receive and complete a Government Contract
milestones.description:
As a dual use company, it is important for us to submit and receive government proposals. After probably a dozen submissions, and numerous ‘selectable/unfunded’ results, we were selected and funded.
In partnership with University of Colorado at Boulder (CU Boulder), we received a $75k phase I STTR to perform a feasibility study on electro-adhesive docking. Under this study, CU Boulder would develop the physics and force model and In Orbit would perform on-orbit simulations of the docking procedure.

milestones.title: Completed Prototype of Full Scale Retriever
milestones.description: To get a sense of the scale of our vehicle and confirm we could manufacture the capsule structure to mass specifications on a low-budget, we set out to produce a carbon-fiber prototype structure of our Haven Retriever re-entry vehicle. This vehicle is 1.2m in diameter, 1.3m tall, weighs just 15kg (but feels indestructible!), and is quite imposing.

milestones.title: Reach $100MM in Letters of Intent
milestones.description:
To gain initial traction in our specific service and validate the market, we set out to build relationships with customers and get letters of intent and support. With the letters of intent, we were able to capture what our customer base was willing to pay and how often they were looking to fly over the coming years.
In Orbit understands these letters are non-binding and don’t represent sales contract. These, along with letters of support and memoranda of understanding, served to capture the value our customers see in our service.

tagline: The Company with a Direct Path to AGI
description: Revolutionize the Future with Artificial General Intelligence (AGI)We coined the term “AGI” (Artificial General Intelligence) over 20 years ago and we’ve spent every waking moment since then developing AGI through Cognition.Today, as technologies like ChatGPT highlight AI's incredible potential, we stand on the brink of a monumental breakthrough.With a $25M investment, we are poised to achieve human-level intelligence within two years, surpassing the limitations of current Large Language Models (LLMs).The AGI RevolutionAGI is set to transform the world as profoundly as fire, electricity, and the internet.While today's LLMs offer remarkable capabilities, they fall short in critical areas:•	Hallucinations: LLMs can generate plausible but incorrect information.•	Incremental Learning: They lack the ability to learn incrementally from new data.•	Real-World Grounding: LLMs struggle to connect abstract concepts to real-world applications.•	Metacognition: They do not understand their own thinking processes.•	Transparency: The decision-making process of LLMs is often opaque.•	Resource Intensive: LLMs require massive amounts of data and compute power.Introducing Cognitive AI: The Third WaveCognitive AI defined by DARPA as the third wave of AI mimics human cognition addressing the limitations of LLMs while utilizing minimal data and compute resources. There is no true intelligence without cognition, and Cognitive AI is the breakthrough the world needs.Leadership in Cognitive AIPeter Voss, the world’s leading expert in Cognitive AI and CEO of Aigo.ai, is at the forefront of this revolution with a 20-year head start in developing this Cognitive Brain. We're on the cusp of extending this Cognitive Brain to Human-Level AI.Our white paper details this groundbreaking approach and our strategy to achieving this vision.Join us in Making HistoryAigo is fiercely committed to bringing AGI to the world to enhance human flourishing.We seek a financial partner who shares our vision of delivering radical abundance for all through AGI, creating a lasting impact on humanity, and leaving an enduring legacy.Why Invest in Us?•	Proven Track Record: Two decades of pioneering work in AGI.•	World-Leading Expertise: Led by Peter Voss, a visionary in Cognitive AI.•	Innovative Approach: Developed Cognitive AI that overcomes LLM limitations.•	Transformative Potential: AGI will revolutionize industries and everyday life.•	Ground floor opportunity: Market size is multi-trillion $•	Commercially Proven: An earlier version of the technology replaced 1000s of call center agentsBecome a Partner in the AGI RevolutionInvest in the future. Invest in Aigo. Together, we will achieve human-level intelligence and usher in a new era of human progress and prosperity.For more details, please contact[email protected]also review our comprehensive white paper and join us on this exciting journey to redefine intelligence and change the world.
problem_statement: Unleash the power of Aigo with human-like and human level intelligence towards solving diseases, climate change, poverty, inequality, dramatically reduce the cost of goods and services, expert enterprise workers and expert personal assistants.

tagline: Move-in Made Easy
description: Our service, Keyready, automates the Move-in processes at multifamily properties.  It is designed to reduce workloads and conflicts for Property Managers and their new Residents, and it helps Resident setup utilities and services at their apartment.

tagline: Automated personal shopping powered by AI
description: Ploom has created the world's first truly automated personal shopper, providing profile-based, expert, event-specific written fashion advice and garment search.  Ploom has emulated the in-store personal shopping experience online."Customers engaged with a stylist, online or in a store, spend seven times more and report greater levels of satisfaction ..." according to Erik Nordstrom, CEO, Nordstrom, Inc.Please note: Many think they've seen a solution like Ploom because they've been pitched many, many times on similar ideas.  These solutions have been partially successful or have often failed because they are incomplete and/or provide broad or simply terrible advice.  Unlike anything else on the market, Ploom provides a complete, high quality solution, making the description above absolutely true, word for word.
problem_statement: E-commerce apparel stores lack ...- a truly personalized shopping experience- an ability to help when their customer doesn't know what they want- a capability to interact, especially with 'just browsing' visitors."80% of consumers are more likely to do business with with a company that offers personalized experiences," says Epsilon Marketing.  This is exactly what Ploom provides.

milestones.title: Beta product completed, live inventory

tagline: Cloud Computing that Software Developers Love!
description: Taubyte is warping the divide between software development and cloud computing:- Turning iterations that would usually take hours, if not days, into minutes.- Saving most of the cost that is usually spent on DevOps, SRE, and Platform Engineering, which generally represents 30% of the software development expenses.
problem_statement: Today's Cloud computing products are built for operators rather than the real users: software developers. Resulting in slow iterations, risky deployments and an additional ~30% in cost.This is a huge problem, so we're addressing it in phases:- This year, we'll be addressing the use cases where a complex stack, most of time involving kubernetes, is overkill or simply not an options.- By end of:* 2025, we'll be the most popular open source distributed PaaS* 2026, we'll be a platform to seriously consider for (Gen)AI workloads* 2030, kubernetes stacks will be called legacy!

tagline: SunShader is the Laptop Sun, Heat & Privacy Shade enabling you to Work From Anywhere!
description: SunShader clips onto the edge of your laptop screen, enabling you to see your screen clearly in direct sunlight, while preventing your device from overheating. It doubles as a privacy screen, stopping nosy neighbors from spying on your work. With SunShader, work efficiently from coffee shops, co-working spaces or with your friends on Campus, from the beach, the pool, your backyard or balcony, from airports, airplanes and AirBnBs, or even inside by that bright office window.SunShader is Patented in the U.S. (Patent No. 10963010) and China, and is Patent Pending worldwide.
problem_statement: If you've ever tried to use your laptop outside, or on the move, you'll know that it is impossible to see your screen in direct sunlight, and laptops will overheat and shut down surprisingly quickly outside. When your laptop overheats, it damages the long term battery life of your device. Furthermore, keeping your work and your team's work private while working in public spaces is harder than ever.

tagline: Bringing Innovation to Dermatology
description: Nuvothera is a rapidly growing consumer products company that develops and sells unique, highly effective OTC drugs that are boosted with natural anti-inflammatory ingredients and produce prescription-like results for dermatology conditions. Having a track record of doubling annual sales from its online channels, Nuvothera has expanded into the huge retail drugstore channel through CVS, Walgreens and soon Walmart and they are experiencing rapid growth. Patients are concerned about the inconsistent efficacy and dangerous side effects of prescription drugs. Current OTC products lack innovation and consumer appeal because they're outdated, greasy, and smelly and they are required to be applied many times a day. tagline: Safeguarding Innovation.
description: IPTalons provides managed research security services to help organizations protect their innovation, intellectual property, and competitive advantage from insider and outsider threats, including foreign influence and nation-state-sponsored threat actors. We combine our insider threat management expertise with proprietary technology platform insights of our Innovation Protection Platform (IPP) to identify, assess, and investigate advanced persistent threats to researchers, research data, trade secrets, and intellectual property resulting from foreign influence IP-theft networks and competitive intelligence targeting efforts. We design, implement, and manage research security and insider risk programs for all industry sectors, including academic, corporate, military, and government research organizations and funders.
problem_statement: Innovative organizations, especially those working on critical technologies, face unprecedented risks from foreign influence, nation-state-sponsored, and traditional competitive intelligence threats. The rising concern of foreign influence conflicts of interest and IP theft has caused the United States Government and supply chain partners to implement strict research security compliance regulations and guidelines as a condition of research grant and contract funding. Most organizations do not have the internal expertise, technology, or insights to proactively manage the risks and effectively implement research security plans to meet compliance and legal requirements or industry best practices. These risk management gaps result in elevated personnel risks, contract violations, and regulatory breaches that can negatively impact the organization's revenues, competitiveness, reputation, and overall ability to protect its assets and interests.

tagline: Enabling hospitals and clinics prevent medical errors, harm, and related cost
description: Pascal Metrics automates identification of medical errors and harm using real-time electronic healthcare record (EHR) data so that clinical teams can avoid unsafe and low quality care as well as related cost and missed revenue opportunities.Pascal Metrics is an outcomes data company transforming global patient safety, risk, and quality. Pascal's up to 24/7 Virtual Patient Safety (VPS) solution uses real-time electronic healthcare record (EHR) data to "measure and manage all harm all the time for all patients."  VPS identifies preventable patient harm in support of intervention and improvement across health systems.  These clinically validated adverse event outcomes using EHR data (AE Outcomes) are optimal for training ML and AI models -- the largest data set of which Pascal holds worldwide, which is valuable across not only for the provider sector but also for medical malpractice, employers, and life sciences.
problem_statement: Hospitals and clinics identify the errors and harm patients suffer in only 5% of cases, because they largely rely on manual "see something, say something" self-reporting. This misses 90% of the serious harm resulting in lawsuits, doubles the risk of death, increases the length of stay, and increases the chance of readmission – costing insurers, payors, and the health systems themselves more, as well as affecting African Americans and Latinos disproportionately.

milestones.title: Leading Academic Medical Center Validates Value Proposition for Risk Management
milestones.description: A leading academic medical center (AMC) anchored health system validated that Pascal’s Virtual Patient Safety (VPS) solution demonstrated the ability to identify 10 times the potentially compensable events (PCE) [meaning the events represente potential lawsuits] as compared to the traditional event reporting “see something, say something” method.  This will accelerate both the client’s effort to have their medical professional liability insurer provide compensation in exchange for using Pascal’s VPS solution as well as the likelihood that this insurer will join Pascal’s data consortium and pay for high margin Pascal data analytics in a regulatorily compliant way.

milestones.title: U.S. government  promulgated the EHR-based safety measurement method pioneered by Pascal
milestones.description: It is publicly known that the U.S. Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) contracted with Pascal and its academic partner to develop the first EHR-based hospital harm measures.  These new electronic harm measures replace the traditional claims-based approach (PSI-90), and will determine how 50% of hospital reimbursement will be paid for safety.  Pascal is the leader in the industry in having operationalized these types of measures at scale and, importantly, demonstrated how health systems can improve them.

milestones.title: 1st Enterprise Deal Expands by 25% and Likely to Double in FY23
milestones.description: Pascal’s first enterprise deal, one of the four largest health systems in the United States, expanded its spend by 25%.  Economics more than doubling the current spend were pre-negotiated for FY23, taking the ARR to the high 7 figures.

milestones.title: 1st Medical Professional Liability Insurer Funds Pilot to Test Pascal Method for Underwriting Risk
milestones.description: This is one of the largest medical professional liability insurers in the industry with sufficient market share to change the industry standard.

milestones.title: Contracted Second Client of Four Largest U.S. Health Systems
milestones.description: This 2nd of the four largest U.S. health systems means Pascal is contracted with 50% of the largest U.S. health systems with an available footprint for expansion of ~300 hospitals.  More importantly, from the standpoint of  data under management, once Pascal implements and begins to to accumulate AE Outcomes data from the operation of our solution, the size of our AE Outcomes data set and rate of growth will be extremely hard to surpass by other entrants – representing the highest barrier to entry and most durable competitive advantage in our market.

milestones.title: 1st Health System Enterprise Deal Validates ROI of >6x
milestones.description: Pascal’s first enterprise deal, which is with one of the four largest health systems in the United States, validated internally on a data science team led by a CXO physician, that Pascal’s Virtual Patient Safety (VPS) solution enables them to avoid at least $5,418 of direct variable cost for each patient avoiding harm.

milestones.title: Pascal Releases Virtual Patient Safety (VPS) Solution
milestones.description: Pascal added Expert Clinical Review (ECR) to its Risk Trigger Monitor (RTM) and Expert Safety Advisory (ESA) subscription services, resulting in the comprehensive, integrated Virtual Patient Safety (VPS) solution.  While Pascal had pioneered and been improving its RTM software for many years, adding ECR resulted in being able to offer hospitals and clinics a turnkey solution for monitoring and avoiding preventable errors and harm up to 24/7.  Pascal releases this amidst the pandemic, which accelerated product-market fit due to the heightened demand for electronic demand for remote patient safety monitoring and the elevation of patient safety as a priority overall.

tagline: Protect Your Advantage - Security for AI
description: HiddenLayer provides security solutions for artificial intelligence algorithms, models, and the data that power them. With a first-of-its-kind, non-invasive software approach to observing and securing AI, HiddenLayer is helping to protect the world’s most valuable technologies.
problem_statement: Despite the staggering growth of AI across every industry, organizations are often times unknowingly opening themselves to vulnerabilities and adversarial attacks due to insufficient investments and education on current AI threats.Gartner has reported that “2 in 5 organizations have had an AI security or privacy breach, and 1 and 4 were malicious attacks.”With the AI market projected to reach $16 trillion by 2030, our mission is to empower governments, academic institutions, and corporations to embrace AI by securing their models through the application of traditional cybersecurity techniques.

The investment marks the largest Series A funding raised by a cybersecurity company focused on protecting AI this year, and was led by M12, Microsoft’s Venture Fund, and Moore Strategic Ventures, with participation from Booz Allen Ventures, IBM Ventures, Capital One Ventures, and Ten Eleven Ventures.
