tagline: Agile, Predictive Monitoring Platform for Industries
description: Skysens is Edge Based, Collaborative, Analytics Enabled, Application Ready, Operational Data Platform for Industry 4.0 efforts.It comes with ready-to-use, no-code analytics, which can be used also for frontline teams.Platforms industrial adapters and southbound northbound data integration capabilities, eliminates siloed data problem and non-existing or inefficient industrial data flow problem.It has ready-to-deploy applications already embedded in a platform that enables users to easily achieve up to 15% energy cost reduction, 50% reduction in production interruption due to maintenance issues, and 10% quality improvement, especially in process industries in a very short time.One of its unique features is integrated, low power wide area wireless capability which comes with Skysens managed plug-and-play edge device portfolio. With it, it is very easy for operational teams to capture data anywhere they want inside or around the facility without high-cost cabling and network deployment costs.
problem_statement: Globally, 72% of all Industry 4.0 projects witnessed a failure*Current AI platforms:Require high level of trainingNot available for operational levelRequired expertise do not stay in the companies due to 	‘Great Reshuffle’OT-IT convergence :Does not exist and/orVery insecureVery inefficientFor most enterprises.Data is siloed and not ready for AI3-4 different vendor is required even for small-scale AI adoption due to OT-IT in discrepancy

tagline: Natural Resource Company of the Future
description: We use CO2 to make Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) for United Airlines.Cemvita stands at the forefront of revolutionizing waste carbon utilization, crafting sustainable feedstocks through a cutting-edge closed-loop conversion process. Harnessing nature-inspired technology, Cemvita produces microbial oil, a vital component in the creation of eco-friendly fuels and chemicals, including the game-changing sustainable aviation fuel. Cemvita's groundbreaking approach seamlessly blends cost-effectiveness with a green touch.Cemvita was founded in 2017 and is proudly based in the energy capital of the world—Houston, TX.
problem_statement: The Energy Transition and Global Supply Chain needs more sustainable feedstocks, and we have an incredible amount of carbon sources undervalued and wasted. More specifically, today, only less than 1% of the flights are fueled by Sustainable Aviation Fuel and the bottleneck is the availability of feedstocks (soybean oil, used cooking oil, and animal fat).

milestones.title: United Offtake
milestones.description:
United Signs Agreement to Buy Up To One Billion Gallons of Sustainable Aviation Fuel from Cemvita. Cemvita designs synthetic microbes that have the potential to convert CO2 into sustainable aviation fuel (SAF)-
https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20230913981691/en/United-Signs-Agreement-to-Buy-Up-To-One-Billion-Gallons-of-Sustainable-Aviation-Fuel-from-Cemvita/

tagline: AI brain interface for humans with prosthetics
description: Phantom is enabling lifelike control of prosthetics and exoskeletons to re-establish lost function for individuals with limb difference. The same flexible design can be applied to uninjured individuals for human augmentation through lifelike control of modern technology. The team is looking to run a software playbook through a monthly subscription to upsell additional capabilities.
problem_statement: Prosthetic outcomes are very poor because individuals with limb difference have no meaningful way to control even their most advanced prostheses.

tagline: Genuine. Authentic. Original. For connecting, not comparing.
description: Vlogmi is a social media platform built entirely around genuine and authentic behind-the-scenes content. So how do we do that? On Vlogmi, all pictures and videos are taken directly from inside of our in-app camera. So what does that mean? It means there's NO Photoshop, NO reposts and NO fake news.
problem_statement: Social media used to be a place for connecting with friends, family, and others with similar interests.Vlogmi brings out the best of social media; what it was built to do, connect rather than compare.While platforms like Instagram focus on disingenuous content and obsessing over “pictureperfect” posts, Vlogmi makes social media a healthier place by promoting and regulating genuine and authentic content.Severe increase of mental health issues among teens and young adults caused by social media.Youth self-harm rate has increased by nearly 400% from 2002-2018.*Current social media platforms are filled with fake news, reposts and unoriginal content.Established, popular social media platforms reward inauthentic content, and are now being used more for comparing than connecting.

tagline: Enabling the Armed Forces HR to effectively Manage Talent
description: StartDate’s artificial intelligence technology matches the most optimized candidates to human resources job descriptions.Our process manages the armed forces’ recruiting process  by skills matching, leadership and strengths matching (Talent/Leadership) and  skills testing through our SaaS recruitment platform.The AI matching algorithm is the bedrock, StartDate then builds the additional steps involved in the organization's hiring process.
problem_statement: Talent Management is highly complex within the military. Attempting to balance strategic alignment, talent requirements, talent inventory along with career path design, can be exhausting. Human Resource teams within the defense industry need assessment solutions for measurement, accountability & forecasting. Processing the Human Talent and overseeing this talent management system is what StartDate does.

tagline: Breakthrough Composite 3D Printing
description: Raven's mission is to modernize composite manufacturing with breakthrough 3D printing for the aerospace and defense industry. Raven's patented Microwave Assisted Deposition (MAD) innovation unlocks scalable 3D printing of thermoset and preceramic composites for the first time. Thermoset and ceramic composites are the apex materials for aerospace that traditionally are made by hand, require extensive tooling, use backlogged ovens, and are limited in design. The outdated manufacturing processes lead to complicated factories, bottlenecked supply chains including parts with several months lead times, and expensive suboptimal systems. Raven is building aerospace-grade composite 3D printing smart factories that will drastically reduce lead times to hours or days, lower the cost of flight-critical components, and usher in a new era of composite manufacturing for the US and its allies.

tagline: Powering progress, powering lives
description: The Energy Umbrella is a solar energy system that uses a foldable, ergonomic solar pod to deliver reliable and portable power when grid energy isn't available.
problem_statement: Imagine not having power. This is the reality for 1 in 10 people in the world (767 million people) who don't have access to grid power. The Energy Umbrella has many uses cases such as for disaster relief and emergency response, applications for the military, and in developing countries that deal with frequent power outages.The Energy Umbrella is a solar energy system designed to capture sunlight during the day with portable solar panels and stores the energy in a battery pack for use during power outages. Practically, the Energy Umbrella can produce 400W of power and has 5 USB ports, meaning it can charge 5 phones, 3 laptops, 6 LED bulbs for 15 hours, or 2 table fans for 3 hours.

tagline: We are the Venmo for professional and college players (to receive tips from fans in exchange for exclusive rewards) with a focus toward solving the income gap between women and men sports.
description: PROTIPPZ is a sports-tech company allowing fans to tip their favorite players/teams, earn rewards, win prizes, and build a community of sports lovers.
problem_statement: We solve two problems, (1) the significant income/pay gap between men women sports; and (2) the inability for fans to directly connect with their fans:Throughout history, men have been paid more than women, which remains true today especially in the sports world. The PROTIPPZ app evens the “paying” field and allows fans to tip their favorite players and teams in exchange for exclusive rewards and prizes. PROTIPPZ will be available for both men and women sports and allows for women and lower paid players to earn additional income for all their hard work and to “directly” connect with their fans and supporters.Prior to the introduction of PROTIPPZ, there were limited ways for fans to support their favorite players and teams directly. Fans could show support indirectly to their favorite player through the purchasing of tickets, merchandising, sponsorship goods, etc., but only a small portion of that money would go directly to the player. The majority of that money goes to third parties (manufacturers, team owners, sponsors, licensors, etc.).

tagline: Building a Printable Future
description: At Accelerate3D we help companies building larger size machines get on-demand production of large size plastic parts, and we do this using local high speed 3D printing.It’s not just that we print big.  It’s not just that we print fast.   And it’s not just that we are building our own machines and have solid IP.   It’s that we are doing all of those things with a purely on-demand based model that makes us unique and is the reason we will own this space.Right now is the perfect time for this to exist.   Our patented 3D printer design is making large size printing faster and more cost effective than ever before.  Industries are adopting 3D for both prototype work as well as production of final use parts at record rates.  New materials are making 3D printed parts stronger and more capable while key patents expiring just in the last year are opening up new machines design options which previously weren't available
problem_statement: I’m sure you’ve heard the saying that hardware is hard.  Well a big part of this is the difficulty of getting non off the shelf components manufactured.   This is especially true for large size plastic components, and by large I mean ones that can be measured in feet as opposed to inches.

tagline: Turning a $30K regenerative therapy into $300
description: Asclepii is creating the next generation of regenerative therapies through Artemis™, a revolutionary therapeutic platform that turns a US$30.000 autologous cell therapy into US$300.
problem_statement: Cell therapy is the future of human health, with the potential to address underlying causes of disease, reduce the severity of illness, and reduce healthcare utilization. However, current cell therapies have high upfront costs and operating expenses, requiring complex and hard-to-scale infrastructure to execute, severely limiting their accessibility and potential and costing from $30–45K USD per treatment on average. The centerpiece of regenerative therapies (including but not limited to hematopoietic, myocardial, neural, and skeletal repair therapies) is the scaffold, which acts as the growth-inducing environment for cells. However, current scaffolds such as decellularized fish skin (Kerecis, acq. US$1.3 B Jul 2023) or bovine intestines (Healthpoint, acq. US$780MM 2012) are highly complex, application-specific, and costly. There is a pressing need for novel, more cost-effective, and versatile scaffolds capable of creating more accessible and effective cell therapies.

tagline: Diamond-Encased Faraday Cages for Ultimate EMP Defense and Thermal Efficiency
description: Waterloo Solutions is the material sciences company responsible for inventing a revolutionary diamond metamaterial called Qrystal™.Qrystal™ is a diamond wafer with conductive internal graphite structures. This has applications in the defense, semiconductor, and product authentication sectors, but our preliminary focus is on the defense industry.The Qrystal™ EMP Shield places Faraday cages inside diamond wafers to protect critical infrastructure from electromagnetic pulses (EMP). Effective in environments that are too small, too hot, or too harsh for conventional Faraday cages, our innovative approach allows Faraday cages to go where they have never been able to before.Key benefits of Qrystal™ EMP Shield:- Thermal Control: Diamond-based Qrystal™ prevents component overheating, ensuring operational reliability under various conditions.- Safe Conductivity: The unique design of our diamond-based Faraday cages minimizes the risk of short circuits, enhancing the safety of electronic systems.- Size Optimization: Qrystal™ enables highly compact encasement to address space limitations and promote ongoing advancement of miniaturization in technology.- Weight Efficiency: Particularly important for aerospace operations and assets, this lighter shielding solution can help mitigate launch costs and enhance payload efficiency.- G-Force Durability: Our materials and Faraday cage designs are built to withstand the rigors of launch and other harsh environments, ensuring durability and reliability.
problem_statement: It is well-established, that our critical national infrastructure faces significant vulnerability to an electromagnetic pulse (EMP) attack.Numerous foreign adversaries are advancing their capabilities in this area, and the consequences of such an attack could be far-reaching, enduring, and potentially devastating. Estimates suggest that up to 90% of the population could become casualties within a year following an EMP event, underscoring the urgent need for robust protective measures.Waterloo Solutions is addressing the critical challenge of protecting essential infrastructure, and is focused on innovative solutions capable of shielding vital systems that have been challenging or impossible to protect with conventional EMP shielding solutions.

milestones.title: Waterloo Solutions Admitted into the Capital Factory and Austin Technology Incubator (ATI) Ecosystems
milestones.description: Waterloo Solutions is now a portfolio company of Capital Factory and the Austin Technology Incubator.

milestones.title: EllansaLabs Inc. Rebranded and Relaunched as Waterloo Solutions
milestones.description: EllansaLabs Inc. d/b/a Waterloo Solutions completed its pivot from a JMaaS service company manufacturing jewelry on demand to a product authentication company leveraging its Qrystal technology as asset tags.  The company relocated from Addison, Texas, to Austin, Texas, in October 2023.

milestones.title: Board of Directors Authorizes Business Model Pivot
milestones.description:
Between August 2020 and April 2023, EllansaLabs Inc. generated $1.3 million in jewelry manufacturing sales, well below management expectations.
The EllansaLabs management team proposed a significant business model pivot away from jewelry manufacturing and towards using its Qrystal NFT blockchain diamonds as product authentication asset tags.
The BoD approves the pivot and sets October 1st as the deadline for winding down jewelry manufacturing operations and relaunching the company as a product authentication company.

milestones.title: Invention of Qrystal Asset Tags
milestones.description:
JMaaS customers requested the ability to have unique jewelry pieces linked to the blockchain.
EllansaLabs Inc. invented a technology to meet those customers’ demands.  It utilizes a unique laser technology to create graphite QR codes within small lab-grown diamonds, with the QR codes “pointing” to NFT “digital twins” on any blockchain system.
This technology is called Qrystal, with the “QR” in the name coming from the QR codes created within the diamonds.

milestones.title: EllansaLabs Inc. Formation
milestones.description: EllansaLabs Inc. was formed as a Delaware C corp.  Its mission was to create a Jewelry Manufacturing as a Service (JMaaS) service offering for the jewelry industry.

tagline: Imperium Technologies, Inc.
description: Imperium Technologies delivers transformative solutions for industrial steam systems through our patented InteliTrap® and SteamView® technologies. By integrating advanced hardware with data-driven insights, we provide operators with real-time monitoring and predictive analytics that optimize steam trap performance, reduce operational costs, and enhance system reliability. What sets us apart is our unique approach to combining cutting-edge technology with actionable intelligence, enabling our clients to proactively address inefficiencies and safeguard their operations with unparalleled precision.
problem_statement: Imperium Technologies addresses a critical gap in the steam industry, where inefficient and failing steam traps cost companies millions annually in energy loss, equipment damage, and unplanned downtime. Traditional steam traps are prone to failure, require manual inspection, and lack real-time data capabilities, resulting in significant operational inefficiencies.Industries reliant on steam—such as power generation, manufacturing, and healthcare—are under increasing pressure to reduce their carbon footprints and improve energy efficiency in response to climate change. Failing steam traps are a major contributor to unnecessary energy consumption, which exacerbates environmental impact through excessive emissions. Companies are seeking smarter solutions that not only reduce energy waste but also enable sustainable operations. Current market solutions fail to leverage real-time data insights for predictive maintenance and operational optimization, creating an opportunity for a transformative technology that integrates both hardware and advanced data analytics.

tagline: Where Cyber Work Thrives.
description: Cybrize is a tool for enterprises to help manage their cybersecurity initiatives.They are building a platform that manages cyber security products, strategy, road mapping, and implementation. Additionally, the solution further aligns various internal, or external teams, to promote collaboration among projects. For example - companies will commonly conduct cyber security assessments to find weak points in their infrastructure that need to be worked on, or launch new security programs. The platform helps manage the technical expertise and resources to address the security issue and successfully plan/execute on the project. This ultimately helps management stay organized and make faster and more educated decisions. Cybrize plans to sell direct to enterprises ($9.5B market size) and charge annual SaaS fees ($75K-250K/year) and additionally sell to universities ($25-50K/year).
problem_statement: The problem is that many organizations are disorganized internally when it comes to managing cybersecurity workstreams. It’s a super complex process and involves many stakeholders to align.

tagline: Erin Living
Bring joy to language learning
description: Spark Collection's mission is to inspire families to learn language and culture in a fun and meaningful way. We seek to increase representation in children's literature and access to learning languages.We launched on Kickstarter in July 2021 with our first bilingual storybook in Mandarin-English and Hindi-English. Our project was fully backed in 2 days, selected as a Kickstarter Project We Love, and reached 220% of its goal with over $13K in pre-orders.We launched Korean-English in July 2022 and our second storybook in October 2022.
problem_statement: Research shows that the most effective window for language learning is 0-6 years of age. While some technology apps exist, there are little to no market leaders of physical products for language learning. The most accessible are books, yet only 1% of children's books published annually in the U.S. are bilingual, with most in Spanish-English. Multilingualism is growing in the U.S. and globally, but there is a gap and underrepresentation of quality language resources.

tagline: Digital asset marketplace for sports communities.
description: Our company is publicly known by our product name, Activelink. Activelink is a digital asset marketplace for sports communities. We help sports properties digitally transform the way they recognize and reward athletes. You know how all your high school sports awards and certificates are sitting at your Mother's house in her old trophy case? Activelink has essentially digitized the trophy case, so that awards are now portable, ownable, and shareable. Similar to credly, but for sports communities.
problem_statement: Sports properties have a centuries old method they use to recognize and reward their athlete communities, primarily through physical trophies, medals, and certificates. Their current solution is costly, and does not align with the needs of GenZ and the next generation of athletes that require a more digitally native way to bookmark their sports journeys. The Activelink solution gives much needed visibility to sports properties and their potential corporate sponsors by enabling them to issue digital badges that connect with each person in their community.

tagline: Automating Commerce Returns.
description: Flindel is building smart hardware and software to make commerce returns easy for consumers and profitable for retailers. There smart drop off boxes (RTM’s), which allow for consumers to drop off products that they want to return from the lobbies of their apartments, condos, and hotels free of charge. The team has built software that makes free returns and same day re-fulfillment possible for online merchants. Flindel will replace the return bar at every store and will have a larger returns footprint than Walmart by 2025.
problem_statement: About 5 to 10 percent of in-store purchases are returned and 15 to 40 percent for purchases made online. Returns are a grievance that everyone faces and is a headache for both merchants and consumers.It is inconvenient and costly to return anything, regardless of whether it is a brick and mortar return or an online return.

tagline: Next Generation Rapid Diagnostics
description: Biosensing will provide the foundation for next generation rapid diagnostic systems.  We use biology as a circuit to create a portable, next generation diagnostic platform that uses highly sensitive and selective biosensors to cost effectively detect infectious disease related proteins at very low concentrations in saliva in 5 minutes.  Our devices are cloud connected for data sharing, aggregation, and continuous disease surveillance reporting to decision makers.  Our biggest advantage is that each test provides a quantitative report of copies of live virus present in saliva.   This allows for high fidelity contact tracing and instant on-site assessment of risk to the public at points of entry, therefore slowing the spread of the next pandemic.
problem_statement: The value of diagnostic tests and tools in healthcare is indisputable, whether it be for human performance, monitoring of patient recovery, pandemic pathogen detection, or medical prescription adherence.  While traditional diagnostic testing methods have progressed immensely in recent decades, there are still non-ideal aspects of common testing methods that prevent them from being more widely accessible.  For example, they are commonly analog (i.e., not always a simple yes/no result), use specialized equipment and require trained personnel. These lab diagnostics are also expensive and typically done in centralized labs, which requires time for transport and/or multi-day analysis as well complex sample preparation steps. In other words, for as far as we’ve come in recent decades, we still do not have diagnostic capabilities for most applications of need that can support in-field testing that is rapid, rugged, fast, affordable, reliable, and requires minimal user training.

tagline: Everyware, a payments platform that has simplified the collection of money allowing customers to simply pay using their mobile number as well as supporting traditional credit card processing.
description: Everyware is a leading contactless payments and customer engagement solutions company. Everyware offers simple billing solutions for organizations in a wide variety of industries helping companies collect payments and connect with customers, especially through text messaging, the ultimate contactless technology. The company helps clients to boost revenue, reduce chargebacks and refunds, as well as improve customer service. There is no other highly secure, mobile communication platform and payment gateway on the market that combines these tools to meet the demand. It is the most straightforward, simple and scalable Pay by Text platform that has the capability to work alongside existing systems with easy integration.

tagline: world’s first fully encrypted and privacy-focused phone service
description: REALLY is the world’s first fully encrypted and privacy-focused phone service. Powered by REALLY DeWi, a cutting edge community-powered network, combined with  largest 5G network in the country, we empower individuals with unprecedented security, privacy, speed, and coverage.
problem_statement: In today's world, digital privacy and security are under threat. At REALLY, we're ready to revolutionize mobile networks by protecting your data and keeping you connected. Traditional networks have dead zones and risky setups that leave you vulnerable.According to a recent TIME article citing a J.D. Power study, U.S. cellphone users faced an increase in service issues, averaging 11 problems per 100 attempts to use data, text, or make calls between April and June 2023, up from about nine problems in 2020 and 2021. Major carriers—Verizon, T-Mobile, and AT&T—all experienced declining scores in early 2023 compared to early 2021.With every REALLY plan purchased, you're not just getting a service – you're joining a movement. Through our G.O.A.T program, we are working to do our part to end the digital divide. For every phone plan purchased, we donate a plan to a deserving community member.

milestones.title: T-Mobile Partnership
milestones.description:
This Serial Entrepreneur Struck a Key Deal to Scale Up. Here Are His Tips for Achieving Fast GrowthWith a new deal with T-Mobile, Adam Lyons has paved a path for his wireless company, Really, to reach a national audience.
https://www.inc.com/sarah-lynch-/this-serial-entrepreneur-struck-a-key-deal-to-scale-up-here-are-his-tips-for-achieving-fast-growth.html

milestones.title: Seed Round Fundraise - Largest in Telecom Industry
milestones.description:
Tech entrepreneur Adam Lyons has a track record of developing platforms that help people save money on their insurance bills. In 2012, he founded The Zebra, an online platform that helps consumers compare and shop for insurance. The company has raised $246.5 million in funding to date and became a tech unicorn in 2021.
https://www.builtinaustin.com/2022/02/28/really-raises-18m-adam-lyons

tagline: Experts without ego
description: “OnlyFans of business content".A creator platform and social network for entrepreneurs.Cut through the noise of YouTube, LinkedIn and TikTok to find the real information needed to launch and grow startup.10,000 expert creators sharing their knowledge with no trolls, no toxicity and a focus on the mental health of Founders.Revenue: Commission sharing with creators; merchandise; subscriptions and advertising.Conceived at MIT by our Founder Charlie Lass (4 launches, 3 exits and a nervous breakdown). Humble was born out of his experience.Platform is built and has 1,500 creators for our Season 1 launch.
problem_statement: 900,000 startups launch each MONTH.Up 50% since 2021There are too many sources of information (google, YouTube, LinkedIn, TikTok) that no one knows the facts.Startup information is skewed to english language, but that represents only 28% of creator content.Most startups fail because of inexperience and burnout.Humble.inc is ONE place for vetted startup information and expert creators.Creators own their content and are paid properly. Humble curates, edits and promotes.We protect the mental health of entrepreneurs and creators.

milestones.title: Private Beta Launch
milestones.description:
Fully functional platform went live for invited Users with 1,500 content creators represented.
Updates to branding across the platform.
Automated Creator onboarding process.

milestones.description:
Crowdfunding, non-voting Common Stock funding round.
Accepted into the largest crowdfunding platform in the world and have begun the promotion of our raise to our network of 10,000+ contacts.
We are maxing the raise at $1.2 through StartEngine and raising the remaining $800k directly.

Accepted into the All Access Fund and will be leveraging the resources and network to the fullest.
Our Founder Charlie has also been a mentor for Capital Factory for the past 4.5 years.

www.humble.inc is now live for our first Users and new website.
We continue to onboard Creators and will soon be offering Lifetime “Founder” membership to early adopters.

tagline: TrustFund is the first ever debit card that acts like a credit card when emergencies arise. More than 50% of Americans do not have enough in savings to cover a $500 unplanned expense. For the third of American adults with subprime credit they have to resort to options like payday, title loans and pawn shops which boast Avg APRs north of 400% when needing to access cash fast. TrustFund is platform that provides clients the tools & features they need to achieve their goals in addition to the support they need to keep them on track when they hit a bump in the road.
description: TrustFund is a fintech startup on a mission to disrupt payday/title lending. We have developed the first debit card that acts like a credit card when emergencies arise. By clients using the card for transactions and mobile app for planning/budgeting/savings they develop a TrustFund score, a clean slate credit score that measures financial health in a more real-time fashion. As their score increases they unlock benefits like emergency loans, auto refinancing and our in-house credit products like bridge credit, rent-split and quick floats.
problem_statement: The current payday loan atmosphere for the disadvantaged and lower socioeconomic demographic today puts an additional constraint when a personal emergency arises, leaving unreasonable interest rates and personal unnecessary duress.

tagline: Your Life, Your Data, Your AI
description: I'm Jon Mick, a product management veteran with 15 years of experience in software development for Fortune 500 companies. Today, I'm here to introduce you to AIs & Shine, a revolutionary AI-powered life management platform born from my own journey of self-discovery and optimization.Imagine having a personal AI assistant that truly understands you - your personality, your goals, your challenges, and your daily life. That's what AIs & Shine offers.We're living in an age where AI is becoming increasingly integrated into our lives, but most AI interactions are generic, failing to account for our individual complexities. AIs & Shine changes that.Our platform creates a comprehensive digital model of each user, synthesizing data from personality assessments, daily habits, personal goals, and even communication styles. This model then powers AI interactions across various life domains - from productivity and decision-making to personal growth and relationships.For example, AIs & Shine can provide personalized insights to improve your relationships based on your attachment style and communication preferences. It can help prioritize your tasks not just by deadline, but by aligning them with your core values and long-term goals. It can even offer customized interpretations of the content you consume, making learning more relevant and actionable for you.What sets AIs & Shine apart is its holistic approach. While other AI tools focus on narrow applications, we're creating a unified platform that enhances AI interactions across all areas of life. It's not just about productivity or personal growth - it's about creating a digital representation of you that can interface with current and future AI technologies in a way that's truly personalized.I've experienced firsthand the transformative power of this approach. Using an early version of AIs & Shine, I've gained profound insights into my own behavior patterns, improved communication in my relationships, and even uncovered new opportunities for personal growth and financial gain. It's helped me navigate major life transitions and rediscover my entrepreneurial spirit.We're currently developing our MVP, focusing on modules for self-understanding and relationships. We're seeking partners who share our vision of a future where AI truly understands and serves individual human needs.
problem_statement: In today's rapidly evolving AI landscape, individuals are inundated with generic AI tools that fail to truly understand and cater to their unique needs, personalities, and life contexts. Current AI applications often operate in silos, addressing isolated aspects of a person's life without considering the holistic nature of human experience. This fragmented approach leads to suboptimal AI assistance, missed opportunities for personal growth, and a disconnect between AI's potential and its practical application in daily life. As AI becomes increasingly integrated into our world, there is a critical need for a unified, personalized AI system that can comprehensively understand each individual, adapt to their specific circumstances, and provide tailored insights and support across all areas of life. The absence of such a system leaves people struggling to fully leverage AI's capabilities for their personal and professional development, ultimately hindering their ability to navigate the complexities of modern life and achieve their full potential.

tagline: The world's first AI-driven selling platform for today's self-serve Buyers.
description: Millennials make up 75% of today's workforce. 73% of them are already making key purchase decisions for businesses. Yet 77% of them want ZERO interaction with sales reps. This is completely disrupting a market sector that is projected to grow to $2.1T by 2032.Splashmetrics is the world’s first AI-driven SaaS solution solely focused on the rapidly accelerating shift toward self-serve B2B buying. For enterprise businesses, self-serve selling with Splashmetrics can result in a ~7X increase in marketing and sales ROI.Our revolutionary AI-driven platform helps automate the planning, execution, and measurement of smart-content-driven, hyper-personalized, self-serve sales journeys. For example, our Manage component collaboratively aligns all GTM stakeholders across the enterprise around a 5-touch content-driven sales cycle from initial engagement to closed deal. Then with 1-click from that collaborative strategic plan, our underlying SplashLogicAI automates much of the execution, integration, and measurement of this strategy-driven, hyper-personalized sales content via our SplashMaker+ smart content component. This includes full integration with leading platforms such as HubSpot, Marketo, SalesForce, etc. where the sale team receives a completely new class of real-time qualification data directly from these Buyers. And finally, our Analyze component leverages this end-to-end RevOps intelligence to provide 360°, CRO-level analytics specifically focused on the efficacy these strategic self-serve selling efforts. Finally, based on this measurement, our SplashLogicAI provides users best-practice feedback and recommendations for improving their self-serve selling efforts.Splashmetrics is led by Steve Brothers, whose experience consists of almost two decades in enterprise B2B Marketing Strategy and Creative work via his previous award-winning agency, Watershed 5. Splashmetrics is primarily bootstrapped to this point, has paying customers, and is an alum of both the Capital Factory and MassChallenge programs.
problem_statement: 77% of today’s millennial B2B buyers - who are now making the majority of the purchase decisions for all businesses - want ZERO interaction with a sales rep until they’ve made their purchase decision. Instead, in the "last-mile" of their buying journey, these buyers prefer a sequence of hyper-personalized smart sales content through which they can get the same answers to their very specific questions that sales-reps have previously provided. This is the new “B2B sales conversation”. Delivering on this demand not only bridges the long-standing marketing and sales divide within a company, but vastly improves sales and ROI (up to 7X). Yet most businesses still struggle to align their executive, marketing, sales, and content teams to deliver this last-mile, self-serve buying experience.Splashmetrics is the solution to this problem - benefitting both Buyer and business.

milestones.title: Sign strategic sales partnership with BBN International

problem_statement: Athletes get injured often, causing teams to lose hundreds of millions of dollars in revenue due to player unavailabilities and salaries.

description: NanTrak develops platforms for remotely delivering small networked sensor and electronic payloads via small arms and unmanned platforms.-- We support warfighters and their command and control by turning every hit target into a source of real-time information for situational awareness and mission assessment.-- We support rapid technology deployment by providing payload-agnostic, open architecture platforms for delivering a wide variety of kinetic and non-kinetic effects to targets.-- We support recreational hunters with data from their shot animals to support successful recovery.
problem_statement: For defense customers, NanTrak addresses the current capability gap in small form factor sensor and electronics payloads that are remotely deployable by individual warfighters to deliver networked kinetic and non-kinetic effects to mission environments. NanTrak turns common squad weapons and unmanned systems into platforms for delivering electronic warfare effects; tagging, tracking and targeting payloads; chemical and radiological sensing; and other intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance payloads. NanTrak technology also provides  lethal rounds with lethality confirmation, target location, and other capabilities.For the recreational hunting market, NanTrak’s game recovery solutions solve the two biggest problems for hunters: knowing when their shot animals have expired, and where they are located. The NanTrak technology deploys in the wound channel and transmits vitality and location data back to a hunter's handheld device.

tagline: Eventbrite for College Campuses
description: For each college, we consolidate all the public events made for students that are hosted by community members. Namely, parties, socials, free food events, and anything else a student might want to go to. Students want to go to events that their classmates and peers are going to, not randoms.
problem_statement: With the magnitude of events taking place throughout each week on a Campus like at UT, it is incredingly difficult to concisely track what is going on and what to do as all the info is usually scattered amongst multiple resources and social media pages. Cove College Events solves just this by consolidating absolutely everything happening on Campus, filtered by category and date making it easy for students to make the most out of their university experience.Furthermore Cove now offers an efficient way

tagline: Vzy is very easy
description: Vzy is a no-code platform that empowers non-technical people to make beautiful, fast, secure websites directly from any browser — integrated with templates, forms, simple analytics, CRM and the ability to create multiple sites on one account.
problem_statement: Creating a professional website that retains customers is hard. The current tools in the market are desktop dependent in a mobile-first world. These tools are also complicated for non-technical users and require skills to manage. Today’s businesses are expected to move at the speed of the economy.Vzy provides the easiest visual interface for anyone to create a website at the time when inspiration strikes. With our proprietary design system, you can customize every page and publish in seconds rather than dealing with code or syntax. Our platform takes care of secure hosting via AWS, beautiful design with templates and flexible layouts, forms and CRM, privacy-friendly analytics and flawlessly works on any browser.

milestones.title: Launched to 13,000 waitlist users
milestones.description:
We shared exclusive access to the Vzy beta with 13K waitlist users.
Features available are multiple sites per account, pre-made templates, customization, forms, analytics, search and social sharing.
Our goal is to gain further insights on how to improve the product before launching it to a global audience.
We have received so many positive reviews about the simplicity of our platform and great feedback.

tagline: VINCI helps enterprises create, customize, and share immersive Virtual Reality training simulations that both lower training cost and time while maximizing worker performance.
description: They do this through their system called Codex; the most robust end-to-end VR training platform on the market that is able to deliver a fully customizable content creation platform, ultra realistic simulator, and detailed data analytics system. Codex not only dramatically improves performance while cutting costs (our users’ pass rates and training times have increased 30% and 495 hours at only 10% of the cost of current tools), but it will also ultimately help save lives.
problem_statement: Training teams working on High Value Assets and/or dangerous tasks face major problemswhen it comes to training:● Training is Expensive & Dangerous - Real Equipment is expensive & often can’t be used for safety concerns● Students lack Repetitions due to Training Limitations - 90% of knowledge is lost within 30 days without any practice

tagline: Where business and government connect.
description: An intuitive CRM purpose-built to match capabilities with transition partners, enabling more products and services to scale faster within the DoD. Using our proprietary matching algorithm, we connect capabilities to requirements, providing enhanced visibility into industry supply and government demand for both programs and companies. Matches are based on relevant operational needs, requirements, and budget—visualized in card view and ranked by compatibility score. Think of it as Match.com, but for government.We are starting with defense companies as the initial user group, with plans to scale across all industries and executive departments for modern government engagement.Founders: Led by a former defense lobbyist and Capitol Hill Defense Appropriations Chief of Staff, who secured $900M in congressional adds for companies like SpaceX and Palantir, Demand Signal combines deep industry expertise with advanced AI to democratize access and level the playing field.
problem_statement: - Complicated procurement process, no clear way to identify the right transition partner for products/services to scale within DoD- Broken communication channels​ between Congress, DoD, and Industry- Disjointed Entities (S&T/PoR/End User)- Limited visibility into industry supply and government demand for both industry and government- Expensive Middleman (Lobbyists)- Influence bias, shaped by entrenched contractors

tagline: KeifeRx is on a mission to improve the outcomes for dementia patients and their families.
description: KeifeRx is dedicated to providing new treatment options for neurodegenerative and immune diseases and bringing relief to the millions of people worldwide who are impacted by these debilitating, life-diminishing conditions.We have exclusively licensed a family of drugs from Georgetown for the treatment Alzheimer’s Diseases, Parkinson’s Disease, Lewy Body Dementia and ALS.Our drugs repair the brain’s cellular recycling system to remove toxic proteins and reduce inflammation using proprietary compounds that enter the brain at high concentrations.
problem_statement: There are limited compelling pharmaceutical options to treat devastating neurological conditions including Alzheimer's Disease and Parkinson's Disease.  Current approved medications primarily treat symptoms and have limited impact on cognition.KeifeRx is building upon its extensive clinical experience at Georgetown University in neurodegenerative diseases to advance a second generation of orally delivered small molecules that improve blood-brain-barrier penetration by 30x-50x enhancing the clearance of toxic proteins while avoiding inflammation and brain bleeding that is a common side effect of existing treatments.

tagline: Doctor-designed, personalized hemp/CBD products for people coming to the category for sleep, stress, and pain.
description: Bace provides a new approach to Hemp CBD with full spectrum Hemp extracted without chemical solvents. Capsules contain hemp extract and organic coconut oil in a vegan capsuleBace has developed a process to help guide consumers through finding their optimal dosage via the Discovery Pack, as well as providing educational content to help educate the consumers on the usage and contraindications for CBD. They also sell 10, 25, and 50mg capsules for one-time purchase or monthly subscription.
problem_statement: Consumers seek Hemp for health uses, but lack access to high-quality solutions. Over 70% of CBD products are mislabeled, there is limited traceability on sources, and many producers use chemical-based extraction that leads to the inclusion of unnecessary ingredients. There’s also insufficient consumer guidance on how to properly use CBD or effective dosage.

tagline: Walkabout Workplace is a global SaaS digital workplace or school platform, that connects employees to companies and students to schools and makes you feel like you are ‘really there’.
description: Walkabout Workplace (“WW” or the “Company”) is a virtual workplace platform (not unlike Sococo) that allows remote/distributed users to design virtual offices, schools, and social spaces; collaborate on projects and assignments using in-app video conferencing and chat; and engage with other users, both in a professional and social context.
problem_statement: As enterprises become increasingly more distributed, the demand for productivity tools has since a commensurate rise. More recently, the on-going Covid-19 epidemic has forced many traditionally structured firms to adapt to a new, virtual-first world. Existing solutions typically involve the use of several services, with varying levels of integration/ease of use. Under the “new normal” it’s expected that 35% of global work (inclusive of education) will be conducted virtually.

tagline: ArenaXR creates an VR immersive experience that trains decision time, 360 degree awareness, and stress inoculation for frontline medical teams. We use state-of-the-art Hollywood capture to build hyperrealistic environments for training and stress.
description: VR for training in stressful situations - how to regulate your physiology under pressure. Uses biosensors to measure bio reaction to stress and how they respond to the situation in the VR. Useful for surgeons, soldiers, and first responders.We built this technology with the number one cardiac care provider in the world: The Cleveland Clinic Heart + Vascular Institute. We also partnered with WHOOP, a global leader in human performance analytics, to get real-time data for users. Our BETA launched with 15 soon-to-be heart surgeons, all of whom are eager for a platform that allows real-time-feedback on performance under pressure and cognitive load.
problem_statement: Healthcare -- in civilian and military medicine -- trains technical skill. Yet success of a team in a high-pressure, life and death environment is predicated on non-technical skills.

tagline: Safety and Performance Monitoring for Teams
description: Notus Labs provides safety and performance monitoring for teams. Our wearable sensor and analytics platform warn users in real time of potential risks like high heart rate, heatstroke, and overexertion so they can be prevented.Notus Labs also helps improve athletic performance by providing coaches and trainers with actionable insight to ensure their athletes are progressing and at their best when they need to perform.
problem_statement: Most importantly, Notus Labs reduces the risk of preventable injuries and deaths. We provide objective, insightful feedback on the health, performance, and safety of our users.

tagline: an app to share thoughts with close friends.

tagline: Request, Send & Receive Money Instantly using PayWint Wallet, like CashApp.
description: Paywint is a fintech platform to Request, Send & Receive Money Instantly using a Digital Wallet like CashApp. It offers peer-to-peer transactions, multi-currency wallets, and business tools tailored to individuals, families, and small businesses. By integrating multiple digital wallets like CashApp, Venmo, Zelle, PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, etc., Paywint offers cross-wallet payments. With features like real-time payment processing, AI-driven financial planning, and integrations with major accounting and payroll platforms, Paywint simplifies financial workflows. Our mission is to provide an all-in-one solution for fast, secure, and efficient transactions, empowering users globally.
problem_statement: Cross-platform payments between digital wallets like CashApp, Venmo, and PayPal remain cumbersome, leaving users with a disjointed experience. Small businesses face additional challenges, such as high transaction fees, limited integration options, and lack of tools to streamline invoicing, payroll, and expense tracking. Managing personal and business finances is often fragmented and inefficient, with users juggling multiple apps for payments, budgeting, and financial planning. Paywint addresses these issues by providing an all-in-one platform that simplifies payments, integrates multiple financial tools, and enables seamless cross-wallet transactions, making financial management easier and more accessible.

milestones.title: MVP Release
milestones.description: Successfully launched the Paywint MVP on September 15, 2024, with core features like peer-to-peer payments and wallet integrations.

milestones.title: Team Formation
milestones.description: Assembled a dedicated team and officially started development on August 15, 2024, laying the foundation for Paywint’s growth and success.

milestones.title: Idea Conception
milestones.description: The concept for Paywint was born on August 8, 2024, after a merchant shared pain points around vendor payments, sparking the vision to create a comprehensive payment solution.

tagline: Tuuk helps financial service firms and insurance carriers increase self-service transactions in digital channels so they can reduce operating costs. For every 1% increase in activity, they can reduce these costs by $8.8 million each month.
description: Tuuk is an embedded digital experience platform that enables customers to proactively self-service within 3rd party apps and sites. i.e. US Bank customer notifies them of travel - from inside the Hotels.com app
problem_statement: Financial services and insurance companies have a problem. These companies are investing billions of dollars to build out capabilities that will shift servicing and acquisition processes into digital channels. However each month - less than 40% of their customers use their apps, websites and the tools within them. Which results in customers using costly servicingmethods (branches, call centers, etc.) for a majority of their interactions. Costing banks (on average) $9.00 / servicing event. We are adamant that the next wave or growth results from embedding these experiences and we're passionate about doing it.

tagline: All Vision Technologies helps customers automatically sort their data and track changing trends, so they can make better decisions faster.
description: All Vision helps customers automatically sort their data and track changing trends, so they can make better decisions faster. The AI platform helps businesses develop data-driven policies to capture opportunities and minimize risk in a time-efficient matter.  With the software, decision-makers can set optimized, responsive operating policies in hours, rather than after months of manual data labeling and analysis.
problem_statement: Businesses lose money by creating policies in silos and taking too long to release them in a fast-changing world. A company needs its frontline staff to manually gather and prepare data, (which takes 1 to 2 months) and then data scientists analyze data and recommend policies (which takes 4 to 12 months) and then business leaders need to predict outcomes and approve policies.

tagline: a SaaS-enabled marketplace that is leveling the $56B e-commerce acquisition industry for SMBs to find success by bringing community, collaboration, and network into it.
description: We allow SMBs to sell to a massive community of customers, and unlike Facebook and Amazon, we give them access to all the aggregated data and help them leverage it into successful marketing-allowing us to vertically integrate with the small business.
problem_statement: The online selling experience is highly fragmented.If you are an SMB u have to use dozens of different sites, dozens of different tools, and instead of running your business, u have to figure all this out. No one is building the tools they need.

tagline: STACE is a No-Fee commerce platform that empowers restaurateurs, retailers and service providers with the tools that they need to sell in store and online.
description: STACE is a new type of Point of Sale system. With STACE we’re providing restaurateurs, retailers and service providers with the tools that they need to sell in store and online with No Fees. What makes STACE different from our competitors is that we don’t charge our vendors high merchant fees. Instead we charge the customer a small 5% convenience fee per transaction. We provide our customers with the tools they need to continuously grow their businesses aggressively.
problem_statement: Our core problem is that the traditional point of sale model is killing Small Businesses. The model penalizes business owners for being a successful business. If I sell $50k worth of products for the month I am obligated as a business owner to pay the platform $10k of that revenue just for facilitating payments. It’s a lose-lose transaction for the merchant. Many businesses can’t start or sustain the operating cost for the current landscape of platform options.

tagline: Clyr is about enabling clarity in your water and the pool maintenance process by helping you understand pool health, receiving exact instructions on dosing, getting chemicals delivered and accessing 24x7 pool help, all from your phone.
description: Clyr has developed a smart skimmer plate that monitors the water and reports back to their connected app, letting users (or service providers) know in real time what the pool’s condition is. Subscribers also gain access to discounted chemical ordering and referrals to service providers.
problem_statement: Pool maintenance is tough - for both pool owners and service providers. While 30% of pool owners opt to pay for a pool service, there are still a huge number of people going at it DIY. It’s a chore to check your pool’s chemical balance, and often requires owners drive to the pool store for sample analysis and chemical/supply purchases.

tagline: We provide off-road electric vehicles for warfighters that are quiet, have low thermal signatures, and excel in austere environments. Built on a standard platform, our vehicles offer versatile configurations to meet diverse mission needs.
description: The goal of Pawnee Offroad is to design, develop, and deploy military UTEVs that meet the specific requirements and operational needs of various armed forces units. The UTEVs developed will be versatile and reliable vehicles that support various military operations by enhancing mobility, flexibility, and effectiveness in combat and non-combat scenarios. Future developments prioritize hybrid/electric powertrains and autonomous operations.
problem_statement: Current surface vehicles for SOF fail to fulfill operator requirements. Current vehicles lack durability for austere environments. Internal Combustion Engines generate excessive noise and high thermal signatures, have high operations and maintenance costs, and suspensions that are not capable for mission needs.

milestones.title: Winter USAF Phase I STTR Award
milestones.description: Pawnee Off-Road won its first USAF Phase I STTR with an award value of approximately $110,000. This award provided an opportunity for Pawnee to work with members of the Air Force and develop a relationship with a customer to sponsor Phase II. The Phase II contract will be used to build a functional prototype of the vehicle base platform.

tagline: Drive Revenue Performance through Coaching
description: SaaS to drive sales performance through coaching, accountability, and forecasting so managers are getting the most out of their teams and execs are getting the most out of managers. Our goal is to create the sales manager of the future. The co-founders have worked in sales and sales management for a combined 40 years and the company spun out of consulting work they were doing based on one of the 8 books they've written.
problem_statement: Sales teams struggle to hit their revenue goals and are often led by managers who have no formal training in management or coaching, and who don't have a good system of continuously developing their employees. Furthermore, executives lack the insights needed to coach front-line managers on how to get more out of their teams.

milestones.title: We crossed $75k ARR
milestones.description: At $76k now and adding more customers!

tagline: Life. Lived. Live
description: festivalPass is a subscription membership platform in the $200B live events industry, that will change the way audiences access and engage in live events. There are 75 million Millennial and Gen Z "live experience" fans that have been to more than 6 live events in the past year.Our platform is live, we have over 80,000 live events available for our members to secure tickets to and we have created an innovative Lifetime Pass allowing members to pay once and receive $1,200 of credits on the platform annually. We have already sold hundreds of our Lifetime Pass and will be limiting the available Lifetime Passes to 10,000. We expect to sell all 10,000 within 12-18 months for an average of $4,000 per Lifetime Pass generating $40MM of capital into the business and 10,000 super fans.
problem_statement: Accessing tickets to live events has been a transactional, non-social, inefficient experience for decades.Fans are forced to pay high ticketing fees on top of the purchases, while ticketing companies and event owners are forced to pay high ad dollars to market their events -- creating a lose-lose situation for all.

milestones.title: Lifetime Pass Available as a Digital Asset
milestones.description: We have created the first ever Lifetime Pass to all live events where members pay once and receive $1,200 of tickets to live events every year for life of the company.  They receive a digital asset that arrives into their account on festivalPass.  We have sold hundreds already and will sell 10,000 within 12-18 months bringing in $40MM of capital into the company.

tagline: Plug into the Sun... Anywhere
description: Vroom Solar develops Smart Solar-Direct technology.  Our groundbreaking solar inverter manages solar intermittent power and removes the cost and hurdles of the grid and battery connections. Our patent pending technology is lower cost and plug-and-play compared to traditional solar.
problem_statement: Solar is inaccessible because of the needed battery and grid connections.

tagline: We are a mental health provider empowering you & our community to achieve mental well-being through effective, evidence-based, & accessible treatments
description: We are developing capital light centers, starting in Texas, offering telepsychiatry,ketamine, Spravato™ (esketamine), TMS, and psychedelics (once approved)
problem_statement: Mental health disorders are the costliest medical conditions in the U.S. - $201bn a year. Traditional antidepressants such as Prozac have failed for generations.

tagline: The only marketplace for investors to buy and wholesale deals between each other.
description: Currently, Trelly makes revenue from 1) a 5K transaction fee paid on every "sponsored sale." and 2) We indirectly make the arbitrage from our seed-brand, Myers. Majority of our revenue is currently coming from that seed brand. We anticipate allowing other brands to sell which will drive our instances of 5k fees much higher. - In the future, we plan to reduce the cost for the supplier and increase the cost for the buyer given the drastic value difference between the two sides.
problem_statement: Trelly operates a websites that enables the selling/bidding of purchase agreements on prospective investment properties. Trelly enables wholesalers to actively manage their listings, coordinate closings, and make more money!

tagline: CustomerXi (CX.i) is a marketing technology company that helps drive customer acquisition for restaurant chains so they can find, and better and engage guests
description: CX.i is a Customer Data Platform that takes data from inside of stores to tie it to a bunch of outside data. The  platform then leverages AI  to make important decisions for operators to dramatically enhance the most important aspects of their business: finding more customers and optimize their marketing spend.
problem_statement: The team  have worked with the largest grocery chains globally, and have steered them to digital and physical transformations, resulting in data assets. Restaurants are structured very similar to retailers because of smaller profit margins, and have not had the financial capabilities to reinvest in the data revolution that has taken place. This provides an immense opportunity to replicate a proven model tailored to their industry and others.

tagline: The efficient, fast and smart way to hire
description: What is Sousflex?A peer-to-peer food service industry marketplace where businesses gain access to the largest diverse pool of skilled workers who are available to start working shifts within the same hour, day, or week.
problem_statement: The absence of an innovative hiring platform poses a significant challenge for the food service industry. This challenge not only leads to extensive financial losses but also jeopardizes a business's reputation and inhibits the ability to secure efficient and top-notch staffing solutions.

tagline: We make durable, sustainable, & versatile clothing that encourages you to wear it longer and spend more time outdoors.
description: LIVSN uses natural and technical materials to create sustainable, high-quality outdoor clothing with classic styling and a modern fit. Our passion is for the outdoors and our interest is in high quality clothing.We love finding good fabric and admiring the hand, the weight, and the texture. The story of the material and what it can do inspires us to create clothing as dynamic as the fabric.The name LIVSN comes from the Swedish word "livsnjutare,"​ which roughly translates to "one who loves life deeply; an enjoyer of life."​ We know we won't regret more time outside - or with friends - or with family.Abraham Maslow's famous Hierarchy of Needs lists clothing among the physiological needs to meet before moving on towards the ultimate goal of self-actualization. If clothing is something that we must have, then we believe it should perform well, look good, be ethically made, environmentally friendly - and it should last.We design our clothing to be dynamic, made with naturally technical materials, and have a subdued style.We're not out to make the "best"​ shirt or the "most advanced"​ jacket in the world. We want to make good clothing, we want to make it with tried and true methods, and we want to make it with high quality materials and modern fits.We'll be officially launching in late 2018, but will have plenty to share before then. Please follow along on our journey.Join our list: http://eepurl.com/dhC8nr

tagline: An Exclusive Community supporting sophisticated Independent Professionals
description: Nuooly is in the Future of Work space.  We are an Exclusive Community for sophisticated Independent Professionals servicing business clients (attorneys, accountants, etc.), enabling them to choose “independence without tradeoffs” versus working at a larger firm.Our Community model allows our members to leverage relevant peers for networking and support, increasing their business success and satisfaction.
problem_statement: Our Independent Professionals lack relevant peers and support which equates to Wasted Time.Big firm professionals bill well over 75% of their time, but as independents they bill less than 50% of their time due to the inefficiencies of running their small business.This reduced efficiency costs each of our target professionals $100,000+ annually in Wasted Time.

tagline: Lightweight solutions for crash energy absorption that saves lives
description: Tesseract Structural Innovations, Inc. is developing new solutions for vehicle safety. Its flagship product, the Uniform Deceleration Unit or UDU, is a unique structure that has the ability to absorb an enormous amount of energy during a vehicle crash.The patent-pending UDU is designed to fit into the wheel well of virtually any light vehicle including cars, trucks, minivans, SUVs, or crossovers.During a small overlap front crash, UDU absorbs significant amounts of the kinetic energy and reduces the crash forces experienced by the vehicle driver and passengers.By absorbing energy, UDU prevents vehicle components from intruding into the driver’s space during the crash. UDU is a clear improvement in vehicle safety, saving lives and preventing serious injuries from offset crashes.

tagline: Revolutionizing RV living with our smart thermostat and control, Significant traction with more than 500 users at $329 price point. LTV of $479 through monthly recurring revenue and CPA of $156/device.
description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OMT0njHHN5cImagine every RV on the road, not just as a vehicle but as a futuristic hub of comfort and convenience. This is the vision WalTech turns into reality. Waltech 2.0 is the world's first universally compatible smart thermostat for RVs, setting a new course for the 12 million-strong, yet technologically dormant RV market.WalTech 1.0 has already redefined RV living for over 500 users, boasting a remarkable lifetime value (LTV) and customer satisfaction at an enticing price point. And now, with WalTech 2.0, we're gearing up to go beyond—over 200 pre-orders speak to the anticipation of our tech-enhanced solution designed by an RVer, for RVers.We're not just selling a device; we are creating a lifestyle with smarter and more connected RVs. We're ready to scale, ready to innovate, and ready to welcome you to the smart RV revolution.
problem_statement: While you might think it's easy to just pop a Nest or Ecobee thermostat into an RV, it's not that simple. Here's why:For RV Owners:1. Voltage Issue: RVs use 12v DC from batteries, unlike homes that use 24v AC from the grid.2. Wiring Complexity: Homes have standard HVAC wiring; RVs do not. In fact, RVs can have over 10 different wiring setups.3. Unstable Wi-Fi: About 70% of RVs don't have reliable Wi-Fi, a must-have for most smart devices.4. No Custom Fits: Most smart systems aren't designed for the RV lifestyle, offering little in terms of customization or integration.For RV Makers:1. Too Many Controls: Each appliance supplier has their own control unit, and does not talk to each other, so an RV could have separate controls for AC, heat, water heating, etc.2. Rigidity: The current control center in RVs is wired and rigid. Users can't easily add or remove features.3. Pet Monitoring: 60% of RV owners travel with their pets but none of the HVAC products offers room temp monitoring/alert features since they do not have smart thermostats.This combination of challenges creates a substantial gap in the market. WalTech's smart thermostats are engineered to overcome these obstacles, offering a tailored solution for the unique demands of RV living.TAM: $2.5 Billion (only travel trailers and fifth wheel that is 85% of the RV market)SAM: $2.15 Billion (85% of TAM that are compatible easily uses Dometic/Coleman/Furrion/GE thermostats)SOM: $647 Million (30% of SOM are frequent travelers who travel more than 55 days a year)

tagline: 3-Statement Financial Modeling Automation Powered by USPTO-Patented Machine Learning Algorithms
description: RMI Insights is an innovative USPTO-Patented comprehensive financial modeling automation platform for accounting firms, small businesses, financial institutions and governments that empowers users to, in a matter of minutes, build their own three statement financial models through visually driven operational-level drivers and subsequently easily perform scenario planning, budgeting, financial planning & analysis, KPI & Stakeholder analysis, financial health monitoring, benchmarking, valuation analysis and custom, bespoke reporting so that Management, Board Members and other Stakeholders can drive their businesses forward with up-to-date knowledge and expediency. Our all-in-one platform requires minimal implementation and a more intuitive, modern interface allowing leaders to build financial models in minutes, not weeks and generate financial reports in minutes, not hours.
problem_statement: Financial modeling is a tedious, manually-intensive process done in Microsoft Excel that is mired with data entry and formula errors. Our technology automates the building of 3-statement financial models thereby eliminating data entry and formula errors while simultaneously speeding-up the process from a typical 60 hours in Excel to just a few minutes thanks to our patented machine learning algorithms and cloud-native technologies.

tagline: Predict equipment failures, not face them.
description: Our solution to the problem statement above:1. An equipment agnostic plug-n-play interface to monitor health of the mission critical equipment.2. Failure predictions with proprietary algorithms.3. And, a market place for maintenance managers to connect with capable service providers.
problem_statement: When a facility maintenance manager today encounters sudden equipment failure, it leads to operations downtime, he/she struggles to find the right service provider to fix the equipment failures and spends an unexpected large amount of money to get back to normal.

tagline: Turning Documents in Data
description: AutoExtract.ai goes beyond optical character recognition (OCR) to extract structured information from any document. Our Artificial Agents are trained by example and powered by cutting-edge AI solutions, converting all of your PDFs and scanned documents into structured data, and allowing you to focus on the things that make your business succeed
problem_statement: Companies are spending too much time and money dealing with papers, faxes, and manually extracting data from physical documents.
