tagline: Stop Harm - Save Lives
description: Pegwin Patient Safety Innovation helps healthcare institutions solve post-operative patient complications by leveraging Machine Learning and AI technology to alert clinicians on early identification of patient abnormalities.On top of the EMR we create a risk profile for each patient that shows their co-morbidities ranked by severity and pushes the best practice and standard of care to the attending clinician in real-time, augmenting their knowledge to take timely preventive action.
problem_statement: The third leading category of death globally, following cancer and heart disease, is mortality within 30-days of surgery. In addition, nearly 1 in 4 hospitalized patients admitted to hospitals in the U.S. will experience harm. Despite decades of effort, U.S. hospitals still have a long way to go to improve patient safety. A recent study shows that 7% of total admissions experience preventable arm and 1% experienced serious preventable adverse events that resulted in serious harm or death.

tagline: Get 100 Free Job Applications | Job Search AI | Job Application AI
description: ApplyPass is an automated job search tool that applies to hundreds of jobs specific to your skills, experience, and preferences. This application AI also optimizes you job profile including your resume and your cover letter to attract hiring manages and get you more interviews. Auto apply to hundreds of engineering jobs by uploading your resume to get 100 free job applications.ApplyPass offers a freemium service. It will submit the first 100 applications for free. Users will then have the option to pay $20/month for 100 applications sent per week or $100/month for 400 applications sent per week.
problem_statement: Looking for a job shouldn't be a full-time job. Skip the repetitive application process and get straight to interviewing and negotiating your dream salary.

tagline: Cloud-enabled, projection-based digital storefronts for offline retail.
description: We help brands/retailers drive incremental walk-ins through highly unique, custom-tailored digital storefront activations.

tagline: Redefining Identity in an Evolving Digital World
description: KNWN helps businesses reduce losses from fraud while increasing omnichannel revenue by providing them with a new level of identity validation that enables them to know and protect their customers' identity from enrollment through every touchpoint in the customer journey via our continuously evolving relational identity network that leverages biometrics, artificial intelligence, and IoT communication.Our privacy-preserving ecosystem of identity vectors continuously learns and perfects itself on each person, the places/environments they go, and the things/devices they have ensuring passive multidimensional authentication with unmatched speed and accuracy at scale across any platform and camera-enabled device.KNWN has a built-in network effect that makes the system more powerful with every new user, interaction, and device that's added to the platform, which makes us the only solution in the market that gets smarter, faster, more accurate, and more secure with each use by each individual.
problem_statement: As our physical and digital worlds continue to converge at a rapid pace, further accelerated by Covid, it's made it more difficult than ever for businesses to make accurate trust decisions in real-time about who their customers are, while maintaining a seamless experience for the life of the relationship, across platforms and channels, online and in-person.Existing solutions have proven to be static, fragmented, full-of-friction, and vulnerable.  This has led to businesses and consumers losing billions of dollars annually from lost sales, fraud, hacks, and breaches.

tagline: Charter Flights, Airline Prices
description: Our 2-sided marketplace unlocks affordable, private charter flights by aggregating demand between commercial users and the US Federal Government. Reservations can be made on our platform, just like the airlines for the number of seats each traveler desires. The flight is confirmed once enough seats are filled or the reservations holders agree to split the remaining balance. Government users have visibility to flights with reservations against them, allowing the government to access low cost, point-to-point logistics for significantly less than chartering full planeloads.
problem_statement: Every day more than 12 million Americans take long distance road trips to places where the airlines simply don't go. Overlapping many of these roots are over 200 military installations and thousands of defense supply chain vendors. They currently rely on the hub and spoke of air carriers and partial delivery service.

description: Valor’s patented system is used by the MLS, EPL, NHL, NFL, and Universities to streamline player development through easy to use motion capture.Valor Vision helps to keep student-athletes on the field by identifying imbalances leading to severe non-contact injuries by just clicking record on your phone.  We work with the team to design a program that student-athletes will stick to since we help track their adherence to the program. We are already working with some of the top-ranked Big 12 athletic programs and many professional sports teams.
problem_statement: In sports, $335 Million is lost each year on unfulfilled player contracts due to injury. 55% of ACL injuries occur from NI/IC incidents regardless of the sport.This issue has not been solved because no one has developed a technology that captures and quantifies movement that is efficient enough that ends up getting used and accurate enough that it is worth using.

tagline: INFY is the producer of Intelligent NanoFiber, an absorbent nano-material capable of capturing and neutralizing toxins and infectious diseases.
description: Intelligent Fiber is an NRL-tested, patented technology. It is an absorbent nanomaterial that can capture multiple variations of toxins, breaking them down into non-toxic compounds. When impregnated into a base material, the material can be tuned to turn colors based on chemical detection and will self-decontaminate with exposure to UV radiation or direct sunlight. Integrating our solution into additional materials will not only keep harmful substances from reaching the first responders and health care providers; they can neutralize threats through capturing and converting them into less lethal substances.
problem_statement: We have adapted this technology to address the current COVID-19 crisis by providing a solution to easily convert standard masks into higher performing masks, capable of collecting finer materials, including the COVID-19 virus itself. The nanofiber in question adheres to most surfaces, even glass, by applying it through a cost-effective spray system. Through such a system, we can adhere our material to any low-grade filter and vastly improve its performance and capacity to keep the individuals from coming into direct contact with the pathogen.

tagline: National e-commerce platform for building materials offering 2-hour delivery to contractors and homeowners. Think of us as an "Amazon for building materials" that delivers same-day.
description: The BuildClub offers same-day, on-site delivery of building materials – 7 days a week. Leveraging AI and Machine Learning technology, The BuildClub provides a disruptive alternative to home improvement stores and wholesale warehouses. The Company has grown 258% in 2022 generating an annual revenue of $3M, launched nationwide in 2023 with a 100% outsourced delivery fleet. The BuildClub allows contractors and homeowners to skip the trip, and finish faster.
problem_statement: BuildClub relieves the pain of visiting big box and specialty building material retail and wholesalers. Hundreds of non-billable hours are spent each year by contractors procuring materials. From plumbing and electrical, to HVAC and lumber, BuildClub can have it on the job site in about 2 hours. BuildClub is the outsourced, sourcing department for small and mid-sized contractors saving them the need for staff to fill the function, and offering faster service. Restaurants delivered long before DoorDash and Uber Eats, but their convenience and consolidated marketplace created a $10b delivery market segment.

tagline: At Colossal Biosciences, we endeavor to jumpstart nature’s ancestral heartbeat
description: Colossal will revolutionize history and be the first company to use CRISPR technology successfully in the de-extinction of previously lost species. On the journey we will build radical new software tools and technologies to advance the science of genomics overall.At Colossal Biosciences, we endeavor to jumpstart nature’s ancestral heartbeat. To see the woolly mammoth thunder upon the tundra once again. To advance the economics of biology and nutrition. To make humanity more human. And to reawaken the lost wilds of Earth. So we, and our planet can breathe easier.These things, which were not achievable before, are now. In our laboratories. Through our breakthroughs in CRISPR and genetic engineering. We are leading the new charge of bioscience. We accept the responsibility. And we can see the light at the end of it all.
problem_statement: Of all the root causes of modern extinction, the most hyperactive factors are human civilization and industry which are accelerating extinction at a pace unimaginable across the entire 4.5 billion year history of Planet Earth.

tagline: Eggschain, Inc.
description: We are a Biotech/Healthcare Technology company that proudly operates at the intersection of early disease detection capabilities development, hacker-resistant pertinent healthcare record management leveraging the blockchain, longevity and humanity.
problem_statement: 1)In 2023, one-third of Americans experienced healthcare data breaches, leading to canceled procedures such as radiation for cancer treatments, suspicious medical bills, and credit frauds. Such breaches continued into 2024, affecting over 140 hospitals all across the USA for multiple consecutive weeks. During these consecutive weeks, the hospitals are largely shut down, with patients' procedures canceled. Eggschain’s patented healthcare records management platform leverages blockchain technology to protect critical data, in a decentralized manner, especially in times of need, can save lives and help prevent potential harm to patients when a medical facility is forced to delay treatments.2)According to the Cleveland Clinic, 60 percent of men don't regularly visit a doctor, going only when they are seriously ill. Currently, results of infections such as bacteria or fungus have to be obtained from a laboratory, and it requires patients travel to a hospital or medical facility. Eggschain aims to help with medical autonomy/self-triage and providing a product that is accessible and can inform next steps/actions (e.g. seeking medical help) and get early intervention for potentially serious medical issues.

tagline: AI Driven Digital Front Office for Healthcare Providers
description: Voxology aims at transforming patient engagement and care coordination in healthcare by acting as a digital front office for providers. Recognizing that today’s patient experience is often overshadowed by administrative and financial tasks, Voxology allows healthcare providers to focus on patient care.The platform reduces administrative costs, increases net patient revenue, and improves patient satisfaction. Voxology offers AI agents that automate various front office functions like scheduling, financial clearance and care coordination. A distinctive feature is its human-like, voice-based scheduling, which uses generative AI to create a seamless patient experience. Voxology uniquely integrates the provider-patient and provider-payer ecosystems, offering an end-to-end process that automates scheduling, financial clearance, insurance verification, and care coordination.
problem_statement: Healthcare providers face significant challenges in managing front office administrative and financial tasks, which are both labor-intensive and costly. Staffing shortages have further compounded this issue, making it difficult for providers to meet front office demands like scheduling and financial clearance efficiently. These tasks are not only expensive but also prone to inaccuracies, which can lead to downstream issues like disrupted cash flow and increased claim denials. Voxology seeks to alleviate these burdens, helping providers streamline these essential functions and focus on delivering quality patient care.

tagline: Simmie is leading the industry with our (Ai) powered Analytics & Role-Playing Sales Simulations
description: Our engaging platform accelerates salespeople's skills while saving sales managers countless hours of time of performance analysis  . Sales managers can easily provide customized practice to each team member without the time and cost of traditional methods. Save time, money, and stress with a modern approach to sales training.
problem_statement: Scaling Your Sales Team is hard. It’s hard to get salespeople to upskill quickly, and even if you can, hiring the right people is challenging. And once you’ve hired them, trying to give them personalized coaching and training is a huge time suck fraught with biases, all leading to bad hires and raised costs of hiring.

milestones.title: Launch V2 Pilot
milestones.description:
I am thrilled to share an exciting milestone in our journey at Productbot AI. Today, we officially launch Version 2 of our platform, marking a significant step forward in our mission to revolutionize how product teams operate. This latest version is not just an upgrade; it’s a transformation—empowering our users with even more robust tools to make data-driven decisions efficiently.
What’s New in V2?
Enhanced Data Analysis Engine: Our AI has been upgraded to process data faster and with greater accuracy, providing insights that are not only actionable but also align perfectly with strategic business goals.
Streamlined User Interface: We’ve listened to feedback and simplified our interface, making it more intuitive for product managers to navigate and extract the information they need quickly.
Advanced Integration Capabilities: V2 offers seamless integration with a wider range of data sources, ensuring that our users have comprehensive visibility over all the relevant data.
Impact of V2 on Our Mission
With these enhancements, Productbot AI V2 will redefine the standard for product discovery and analysis. Our tool’s increased efficiency and precision in handling data mean that product teams can focus more on innovation and less on the intricacies of data management. This release propels us closer to our vision of a streamlined, data-driven product management landscape.
Looking Ahead
The launch of V2 is just the beginning. We are committed to continuous improvement and innovation, aiming to always provide the best solutions to our users. Your support has been instrumental in reaching this milestone, and we look forward to achieving even more, together.
Thank you for your continued trust and investment in Productbot AI. We are excited about this new chapter and the opportunities it brings.

Given the current trajectory and improved product direction, many of our V1 customers saw the latest development as a major improvement on the existing product and one that elicited a great productivity use case during user research. We re-engaged with 60 high-value targets out of 1200 companies who signed up last year and are now in varying stages of working them through our sales pipeline and into paying customers for V2. Given the current capability, our V2 now justifies a higher price point and is differentiated from other AI chat competitors.

We also began to build out our product design within the platform.

tagline: To save life and limb
description: Founded in 2017, TourniTek is a team of top medical and engineering experts working to dramatically improve patient outcomes with the world’s premier limb preservation technology.
problem_statement: TourniTek is the first pre-hospital treatment for limb threatening injuries. Using therapeutic cooling, TourniTek preserves injured limbs in the field until patients can be transported to definitive surgical care. By treating these injuries prior to surgical care, TourniTek can prevent amputation and permanent disability. TourniTek is a critical preparedness tool that can be used in mass casualty events or a variety of acute care situations such as hypothermia, hyperthermia, and burns.

tagline: UpTime is a on-demand, shared resource, roadside service platform that manages, tracks, and reports, every event, from start to finish (think “uber for roadside service”).
description: • UPTIME's technology, without human intervention, links a commercial vehicle in need of roadside assistance with a nearby service provider reducing down time by 75%.• UPTime’s average response time is 30 minutes (compared to industry standard of 1.5 hours)• How it works: CLICK (request service), ACCEPT (RSP selected), ENGAGE (RSP arrives), TRACK (RSP & Vehicle), COMPLETE (Vehicle handled), REPORT (all involved notified), then INVOICE (direct billing)• Product - Have currently done all of this through text messaging → expect to test and launch the app with existing clients over next 30-60 days
problem_statement: 1. Fleet Management Companies (FMCs) own/manage large numbers of fleet vehicles. The problem is that they do not own or control Roadside Service Providers.2. Fleet customer wait too long for service providers to arrive costing the industry millions in cost related to downtime (on average a vehicle is waiting 1.5 hours).3. Tow drivers (service providers) sit idle 65% of the time waiting on calls.

tagline: Autonomous 'satellite restaurants' that solve the core issues with 3rd-party delivery for both restaurants and consumers
description: Now Cuisine is a restaurant tech startup building a highly-scalable network of autonomous “satellite restaurant" kiosks that serve hot, customizable, affordable meals on demand in virtually any location. Our vision is to democratize access to high-quality food while solving key industry pain points. Our full, did-it-before team of food automation and 3D printing industry experts includes a CEO who brought the 1st 3D printer to market and founded two exited startups, and a CTO who pioneered robotic foodservice kiosks and exited to Coke.Our Hardware-as-a-Service business model leverages the foodservice operations of our customers and the branding and recipes of popular restaurants to yield SaaS-like unit economics with recurring revenues and ~80% gross margins. Our proprietary zero-food-contact technology ensures food safety, bypasses the need for machine cleaning, and enables highly efficient operations.Our kiosks can go nearly anywhere since deployment barriers such as special utilities and facilities have been eliminated: They give people in convenience stores, hotels, office and multifamily buildings, colleges, and other locations immediate access to restaurant-quality meals. Locations benefit from a competitive amenity, employee productivity boost, and new revenue source. Restaurants get a new way to scale quickly without labor, real estate, CapEx, or risk, greatly expanding their reach while promoting their brands.
problem_statement: In too many locations, good food is hard to find. People typically must drive to a restaurant, or resort to third-party delivery (e.g., DoorDash), paying up to double and waiting up to an hour for meals which often degrade in transit. Meanwhile, restaurants become isolated from their customers, see their margins reduced, and must juggle delivery drivers along with dine-in customers.

tagline: We allow people with mobility disorders walk safely, independently, and confidently.
description: De Oro Devices makes mobility assistive devices to allow people with mobility disorders to walk safely, allowing people to retain independence and confidence. We use research-backed sensory cues to help people with mobility disorders walk and prevent falls with improved step symmetry, step length, and overall safety and mobility. In our beachhead market, Parkinson's, we help overcome freezing of gait, one of the most common and most debilitating symptoms of Parkinson's disease. Our initial device, NexStride, combines a green laser line visual cue and a metronome auditory cue into a small portable device that can attach to any cane, walker, or walking pole. These cues have been shown to reduce falls by 40% for people with Parkinson’s. This patent-pending technology can be used in Parkinson’s, Stroke Rehab, Multiple Sclerosis, and Cerebral Palsy, resulting in a $13B global market opportunity for our first product alone. NexStride is already available in the U.S., Europe, Australia, and New Zealand.
problem_statement: $50B is spent on non-fatal falls in the US alone. Our cues have been shown to reduce falls by 40% for people with freezing of gait. We not only give people their independence and confidence back to walk on their own, but we also significantly reduce the cost to our health system.Freezing of gait is the inability to take the next step due to a damaged neural pathway that carries out brain-to-body communication. Those living with neurological ambulatory disorders describe feeling as if their feet are glued to the floor or planted in boxes of concrete. Freezing can manifest as trembling, shuffling of feet, or a complete inability to move and drastically increases the likelihood of a fall or injury.

tagline: Capture structured data from technical documents with AI
description: AgileDD is a human-in-the-loop AI platform that captures trusted and structured data from technical documents such as PDFs, MS Office files, images, and flat files. It captures textual, tabular, graphical and semantic information from large volumes of heterogeneous documents without defined templates. We have three enterprise customers in production and we are working through a solid lead and deal pipeline. Our founding teams bring 80+ years of experience in machine learning, information technology, and sales.
problem_statement: It is time-consuming and risky to make data-driven decisions:- It requires access to technical and relational data- Data is hidden in domain-specific unstructured documents- Subjects matter experts find it difficult to access data and information from vast document stores

tagline: Immersive gamified therapy for physical and cognitive rehabilitation
description: Neuro Rehab VR has developed an immersive gamified physical therapy solution that is engaging, fun and motivating for patients with data analytics:•	Multiple therapy modules for upper, lower, strength and balance issues with low to high complexity so patients within any functional level can benefit from the system.•	Data Analytics to quantify patient progress over a period for therapists as well as for insurance payments.•	Portable and wireless system with 6 DOF tracking so the solution can be utilized on patient’s bedside, home, or therapy gym setting.•	Cost effective and efficient way to do therapyOur goal is to make virtual reality a staple therapy modality in physical and occupational therapy to increase therapy efficiency, decrease recovery times, and provide better patient outcomes with quantitative feedback and data reports.
problem_statement: More than 800,000 people in the United States alone suffer from a stroke or traumatic brain injury each year, and thousands diagnosed with neurodegenerative diseases such as Parkinson's. They need extensive physical and cognitive therapy to be able to recover, and maybe get back to an independent lifestyle. Patients usually spend 30 to 60 minutes a day in formal therapy at a clinic. For most of them, physical therapy can be monotonous, exercises done mindlessly, and sometimes they do not make much progress. They are not utilizing their full brain potential to form, reorganize, and rebuild neurological pathways.

tagline: Design and Engineering Firm
description: Capital Factory Portfolio CompanyVeteran Owned and OperatedAll products are designed, developed, assembled, and packaged in the USA.-Computer vision and AI have long been constricted to singular purposes. "Our device identifies weapons", "Our device identifies people", etc. Why? Why can't your camera stream identify whatever you want? Why can't you use the software on any camera stream you want? Prometheus can, and it can do so much more.Prometheus is an AI integrated IoT Network Security and Surveillance System. It is identification agnostic, sensor and IoT device agnostic, can identify and track locations of identifications, subscription-based, and designed, developed, assembled, and packaged in the USA.About Mammen & Peery Corp:Mammen and Peery Corp is a design and engineering firm originally established in 2019 that specializes in innovative ground-up solutions in the hardware, software, robotics, energy, and defense sectors. At the end of 2022, we decided to move fully from the service sector to the product sector after our portfolio of work became increasingly centered around defense projects and we were being commissioned to develop more and more solutions that others could not.We are currently raising capital for the launch of our first product, Prometheus, an AI integrated IoT network security and surveillance system, which is intended to aid in the curbing of criminal activity along the Texas border and for military and defense purposes. In later phases of development, versions of Prometheus are also planned to be implemented in schools to prevent acts of violence and in commercial retail establishments for use in marketing and analytics data gathering.We are currently working on version 1 of Prometheus for border use and an MVP of Prometheus is available for demonstrations.A beta version of the software component can be ready in as little as two months of funding. Software can be implemented on any camera stream, is app based, and exists in both cloud and localized versions.We are currently in our Seed 1 round of raising capital and are looking to raise a total of $500k with only $200k being needed to get the beta version of our software component to market.This round of funding allows for 12 months of runway and is to be used to finish the development of the software component of our system to bring to market (2 months), establish contracts with police forces and border entities, move forward on establishing contracts with military entities, and begin to bring the hardware component into contracts.The next round of funding will focus on multiple versions of Prometheus and acquisition of federal border and further defense contracts for Prometheus. The next version will also include a server only version that replaces any surveillance server with Prometheus.-Our Team:Mike McDonald - CEOFormer President - Gnostic Systems, Former Director of Manufacturing Solutions Central Region - Northrop Grumman, Former Staff Engineer - IBM. Had one of the first projects in knowledge-based systems, now known as IoT.Jake Mammen - CTO, Co-FounderCertified Full Stack Roboticist. Veteran. Extensive experience in ground-up industrial design, engineering, and fabrication, as well as the development of custom hardware and software. Advanced development skills in Linux, Python, C++, and ROS.Jake Peery - CFO, Co-FounderMBA. Extensive experience in business financial management, cost-analysis, risk-analysis, projections, and client relations.Joey Gomez - Head of SalesUS Navy AOCS Graduate. Former Technical Sales Regional Manager, Former Energy Specialist - HILTI North America. Former Design Engineer - Hughes Aircraft Electron Dynamics Division. Active Texas State Guard Team Leader NASAR Certified Search and Rescue Teams.
problem_statement: The general problem:Computer vision and AI have long been constricted to singular purposes. "Our device identifies weapons", "Our device identifies people", etc. Why? Why can't your camera stream identify whatever you want? Why can't you use the software on any camera stream you want? Prometheus can, and it can do so much more.Prometheus is an AI integrated IoT Network Security and Surveillance System. It is identification agnostic, sensor and IoT device agnostic, can identify and track locations of identifications, subscription-based, and designed, developed, assembled, and packaged in the USA.Our first problem that we are addressing:There are currently 5400 trail cameras surveilling the Texas border with a handful of people watching them live on monitors. Then terabytes of data is sorted through to establish connections between noted events and people.

tagline: Deliciously Convenient Low Sugar Snacks
description: NuSkool is the deliciously convenient low sugar, high fiber way to snack. Our mission is to combat preventable diseases, such as diabetes and heart failure, by removing sugar from the American diet in creative ways and having a bit of good, clean, fun along the way.
problem_statement: • Very difficult to find on-the-go-low-sugar options• Preventable disease and diabetes on the rise• Nutrition Bar category is STALE + loaded with sugar

tagline: We cure rare diseases
description: The current drug discovery process is failing. Millions of people die of curable diseases every year. At Everlume we have developed a new model of drug discovery and are pioneering a direct to patient approach that not only gives patients access to genetic based cures, but in record time.
problem_statement: The market for rare disease treatments is severely underserved, with over 300 million people worldwide affected by these conditions and only 5% having an approved treatment. Traditional pharmaceutical companies often overlook rare diseases due to the high costs and long timelines associated with drug development, leaving patients and their families with few options and little hope. Everlume is addressing this critical gap by revolutionizing the drug discovery process, making it faster, more affordable, and directly responsive to the unique needs of rare disease patients. Our innovative approach not only accelerates the development of life-saving treatments but also empowers families by putting them at the center of the cure process. By focusing on rare diseases, we are tapping into a market that is not just large and growing, but also in desperate need of innovative solutions.

tagline: Cloud 9 is on a mission to deliver mental, physical and social health access to underserved populations
description: More than video conferencing and beyond the EHR, Cloud 9 delivers award-winning strategies and software connecting communities’ healthcare, public safety and social services with  vital communications and information, improving care and cutting costs for high need behavioral health populations.
problem_statement: U.S. cities, counties & community healthcare services are not equipped to fully serve citizens’ needs:>80% of patients with mental or substance use disorders have a chronic co-occurring physical illness.The comorbidity cost of chronic physical illnesses that are linked to mental illnesses exceed $420Billion in the U.S. each year. 35% can be saved in populations by integrating mental health treatment.ERs, jails and courts have become the dumping grounds for mental illness; however, proper mentalhealthcare is not provided, making this a failed cycle of non-treatment that wastes $32 Billion annually.Coronavirus has exacerbated the public health and public safety issues that our communitiespreviously faced. Telehealth is essential Post-COVID-19. Civil unrest drives police reform changes thatrequire mental healthcare now be added to law enforcement response for 911 crisis calls. Cloud 9keeps high need individuals in treatment and out of harmful settings and costly systems.

tagline: Full stack patient support platform for surgery & cancer clinics
description: Providing the most powerful multi-chain toolkit to access blockchain infrastructure, earn yields, and integrate DeFi solutions.
problem_statement: The next phase of the internet is based on distributed networks which make the new generation of platforms, applications and services more private, secure, reliable and censorship resistant.By cutting out intermediaries and gatekeepers, builders and users gain back control over their applications and data.

tagline: Compression Works develops, manufactures and markets hemorrhage control devices for the $2B Global EMS and Military markets.  Our flagship product is the AAJT-S which is used to treat non-compressible hemorrhages.
description: Our solution is the AAJT-S (abdominal, aortic, and junctional tourniquet- stabilized) It is the only multi-purpose life-saving medical device that is FDA cleared to treat five indications.  It is easy to apply by first responders and battlefield medics and should be the ‘gold standard' for the definitive treatment of non-compressible hemorrhages.
problem_statement: Non-compressible hemorrhages in the difficult to access regions of the body account for tens of thousands of deaths per year around the world.  The Department of Defense estimates that up to 25% of battlefield deaths can be prevented and in the Pre-hospital EMS Market alone, over 40% of pelvic fracture victims associated with automobile accidents die before reaching the hospital due to internal bleeding. The total addressable market for these injuries exceeds $2B!

tagline: We build developer tools for generative AI Image workflows
description: Flush is an all-in-one tool for developers to build image generation apps on the cloud:- We simplify the process of building, fine-tuning, managing, and hosting AI image models, all on the cloud with our web UI.- Developers can easily create and deploy powerful AI image workflows in their apps with Flush using our open-source SDK.
problem_statement: There is no easy-to-use SDK for the most popular Stable Diffusion tool: Automatic 1111; we're building the first open-source SDK for it.

tagline: Self-Healing Wiring Insulation
description: HealieTech is a sustainable defense material company with patented healing technology sourced from NASA to be used for highly valuable military, aerospace and multi use assets. Their main product is a self healing wire insulation that protects it from overheating, cuts and chafes. This is a huge problem from telecommunication devices, vehicle operators and internet cables that span across the world. Healie aims to decrease cost and loss of millions in equipment and assets. NASA owns the patents: (3% goes to NASA, unless the clients are DoD and NASA related) 3 different patents and have licensed it already.
problem_statement: HealieTech's self-healing wiring insulation solves problems with the durability of high-value and multi-use assets.

tagline: Illuminating the Path to Next-Gen Healthcare
description: FireflyVR has built an immersive mental health platform that is clinically designed to enable the sustained mindset and cognitive behavioral changes that are necessary to effectively engage and activate patients across the care continuum of pre-treatment, active treatment, and post-treatment for better health outcomes.
problem_statement: The current care models being used in mental health therapy are highly variable and not scalable due to the cost and lack of qualified therapists.Problems → Solution:Mental health clinician shortage ← FireflyVR offers a tool for clinicians to teach and patients to practice therapeutic concepts to ease the burden on the clinician and streamline care.Lack of timely and consistent patient support across the care continuum ← increase accessibility by providing immersive experiences for use at home or in clinic at various points of treatment.Low provider adoption & engagement with first generation digital therapeutics ← Self-Directed, Configurable Therapeutic Adjunct that configures to a providers’ pre-existing programs.

tagline: The leader in social sports betting.
description: BroThrow simplifies betting on sports with friends. Our web-based app makes it easy to create and accept bets, track payments, compete in contests, and more, all while saving our users a fortune over time by not having to pay the "juice" or "vig". Unlike traditional fixed-odds or exchange-based betting, social betting means knowing who your opponent is and what everyone else is betting on. BroThrow is changing the game in sports betting!

tagline: Building Safe Spaces through food!
description: We created Safe Spaces from our belief that consumer product, specially food and beverage, are the new external signifiers, and as such, brands have the power to become  symbols of allyship and markers of safe spaces for the next generation of consumers.
problem_statement: Consumer brand choices have become a part of how we express our values and consumers are mindful of what brands they associate themselves with.Millennials and GenZ are hyper-aware that in a world so full of options, the choices they make are constantly judged the second they are made public. And they are all public. They are also very unlikely to be loyal to a brand, unless they buy into the brand's mission and values.Trends from the past 10 years have focused mission-driven brands into health-adjacent categories, leaving an opening in the snacks category where wunderkeks® fits seamlessly.The cultural moment claims for more conversations that enable the creation of Safe Spaces: about mental health, about sexual identity, about race...

tagline: Optical Engineer and Analysis in the Cloud
description: We have made the worlds first optical engineering and analysis software for the cloud. The unlimited resources of the cloud makes for never-before possible speed and accuracy of design and analysis of optical technology.
problem_statement: From smartphone cameras and screen, semi conductor fabrication, to space telescopes, optical technology is everywhere. Optical engineering software however is stuck in the past. Outdated assumptions and the limitations of single-workstation software limit the speed and scale of optical technology and leads to 100's of mission lost in waste every year.

tagline: Our predictive maintenance condition monitoring tool can be used by subject matter experts to produce rich operational insights in a matter of days.
description: Boon Logic invented a breakthrough technology in unsupervised machine learning that accelerated AI development and deployment. The next-gen Boon Nano algorithm performs model training and clustering 1,000X faster than traditional modeling methods that are complex and involve lengthy model training that can take several weeks to several months. What’s more, Boon Nano reduces the need for highly-skilled, hard-to-find AI talent and allows organizations to leverage the value of AI with their existing subject matter experts. It’s AI, simplified. Boon Nano is flexible as well, autonomously tuning, training, and running in real-time at the edge or in the cloud.
problem_statement: Until now, AI-based solutions have been built with traditional modeling methods that are complex and involve lengthy model training that can take months to years. In addition, these methods require expensive, highly specialized, and hard to find AI talent.

tagline: The Power of a Creative Agency at Your Fingertips
description: Blended Sense is a media technology marketplace platform, that makes content production accessible and reliable for small, medium, and enterprise businesses. We match creative pros with local businesses anywhere in the US and leverage our production management software to streamline logistics and communications.
problem_statement: The demand for SMBs to produce content accelerated beyond current market solutions.Current Options in the market place* Retain an Agency: Way too expensive; almost every SMB is priced out of this option.* Hire Full Time: High overhead cost; bandwidth constraints; ramp time; flight risk.* Source Free Lancer: High effort; unreliable; no quality/pricing standard; analysis paralysis; high risk.* DIY: Time consuming; lack of hardware and software; knowledge/skill gap.

tagline: Progenerative Medical is a pre-commercialization stage medical device company focused on expanding clinically-proven reduced pressure therapy into spinal and orthopedic indications.
description: Progenerative Medical's Regenn™ Therapy System, based on clinically-proven reduced pressure therapy, activates natural bone healing processes that lead to rapid boney integration of spinal fusion devices, resulting in consistent, predictable spinal fusion rates. Regenn™ Therapy is adjunctive and surgical procedure agnostic, integrates seamlessly with surgical practice, and is administered by the surgeon in the hospital.
problem_statement: Spinal fusion surgery has a significant failure rate that often requires one or more surgical interventions. Implants used in spinal fusion frequently fail because of poor integration with the patient’s bone, and surgical outcomes can be compromised by patient age and/or underlying co-morbidities such as obesity, smoking, and diabetes → 20 – 30% of patients undergoing spinal fusion procedures report dissatisfaction with the outcomes of surgery.

tagline: Turn the chaos of information into cognitive power.
description: Hams provides AI and digital transformation solutions and tools integration platform. We provide to our clients various AI solutions, models and tools which is built by state-of-the-art AI technology that can be acquired through our cutting edge cloud services or on-premises solution.
problem_statement: Hams is addressing the widespread problem of inefficient knowledge management and the frustration caused by disorganized files, which leads to lost productivity and difficulty in accessing critical information. Many businesses struggle with effectively managing vast amounts of data, leading to delays, miscommunication, and errors.

tagline: Transforming the delivery and explainability of outpatient musculoskeletal care.
description: linedanceAI introduces Movality, a software solution to transform providers’ expert observations into objective and explainable movement quality metrics. Movality increases course-of-care retention by enhancing patient understanding.Patented machine-learning technology automatically decodes movement quality using any tablet or mobile phone camera to reveal patient range of motion, dysfunction and compensation as objective movement quality metrics.Providers connect these metrics to drive patient understanding about:A) their conditionB) where the patient needs to be for a full recoveryC) their progress along the course of care.Outpatient providers use Movality to establish clear recovery expectations, and visually communicate patient’s recovery journey.
problem_statement: Musculoskeletal (MSK) care is mostly observational and lacks objective metrics to quantify patient conditions. Primary Care physicians, for example, use cholesterol healthy ranges to objectively score and communicate your wellness status. Objective metrics like this set expectations about the course of care and the importance of completing it.  In outpatient Physical Therapy (PT) practices, up to 70% of patients fail to complete the entire course of care. In addition to the health implications at risk, this kind of attrition comes at a staggering cost of $6.5 bn annually or 20% of the current PT market.

tagline: Document Management and Workflow Automation solution for Microsoft 365 with $700k in ARR is raising $2mn for expansion in US
description: Titan Workspace improves usability of Microsoft 365 by Simplifying Document Management and Workflow Automation.Our solution is purchased by customers to optimize records management, internal compliance, and task approvals. We primarily serve the mid-market, with a customer base mainly in manufacturing, pharma, and property management. We are highly capital efficient with solid SaaS matrix. we are Delaware Corp headquartered in Richardson Texas.
problem_statement: 90% of enterprises subscribers of Microsoft 365 use less than 30% of the platform capabilities due to three primary reasons:1.	Challenging Learning Curve: The learning process for navigating the Microsoft 365 platform can be daunting. Users often find it challenging to explore and fully grasp the extensive range of features available.2.	Intuitive Interface Concerns: The user interface, while powerful, may not always be intuitive. As a result, users spend excessive time figuring out how to perform tasks efficiently, impacting overall productivity.3.	Productivity Loss: When users struggle with platform complexities, their productivity suffers. Time spent managing work-related tasks could be better utilized if the process were streamlined.Titan Workspace, however, addresses these challenges by simplifying document management and automation, allowing users to focus on their core responsibilities.

milestones.description: Small prototype with few early adopters.

tagline: Loudcrowd help brands measure and grow UGC (user-generated content). Captures social content on social media (primarily Instagram), measures it's value, and incentivizes customers to create more.
description: They help brands measure and grow user-generated content. Loudcrowd captures social content (primarily via Instagram), measures it's value, and incentivizes customers to create more (all earned media). For example, if i post a photo of my Nike shoes, Nike can identify that i posted that photo and send me a 15% off coupon for my next purchase. Additionally, they help companies build rewards programs, automate ambassador programs, and run contests.
problem_statement: 92% of customers trust WOMM more than any other marketing40% of all traffic and lead generation comes from earned mediaUGC is the most effective type of social marketing, and brands earn billions of dollarsevery year in free UGC. But none have any idea what it’s worth or how to grow it (e.g.Brands can’t answer simple questions like: How much is my UGC worth?, How can I get more people tagging me?, Which of my customers generate the most value?)

tagline: Harnessing the power of lateral movement
description: New Modality Sports is a health and wellness technology company focused on improving recovery and rehabilitation, healthspan, and fitness through lateral motion.We help: hip and knee patients rehabilitate faster and better; allow the active aging and elderly to reduce their fall risk, improve their quality of life, healthspan and ability to remain independent; and we help athletes - whether fitness enthusiasts, amateur or pro - protect and maximize their hip and knee joint health while reaching peak performance.
problem_statement: 1 in 2 people require physical therapy for a knee or hip and 1 in 4 people will have a THA (total hip arthroplasty - aka total hip replacement) or TKA (total knee arthroplasty - aka total knee replacement), and yet prior to Phantom Edge there were no devices designed specifically for hip and knee health which is achieved by targeting muscle group activation of the gluteus medius and maximus, hip adductors and abductors. This movement and muscle engagement is vital to help prevent injuries, to help hip and knee patients rehabilitate faster and better from surgeries, injuries & osteoarthritis, and to help the active aging population improve their stability and mobility, decrease their fall risk, avoid sarcopenia, maintain their independence for longer and improve their healthspan. Effective activation and strengthening of these muscle groups is also crucial in improving athletic performance in most sports.

milestones.title: Hardware and software tech integration plan complete
milestones.description:
Validation of sensors and all hardware components now complete and ready to proceed to full tech dev plan, integrating hardware into the Phantom Edge Design and software development to allow accurate and reproducible data delivery via our native app or api integration into patient EMR or client CRM systems. 
Tech integration plan ready to execute pending capital raise.

milestones.title: Advisory Board
milestones.description:
Advisory Board Members confirmed:
Ben Levitan
With a background as an operator and investor, Ben works with venture and private-equity-backed businesses through his advisory business Cedalion Partners.Starting in his mid-30s, Ben has been CEO of four software, services, and technology companies, and served as Board Director of another six companies. He is a regular speaker on technology and entrepreneurial topics and has been featured in a variety of publications, including in a Harvard Business School case study.
Dr. Craig Della Valle
Dr. Della Valle is a professor of Orthopaedic Surgery at Rush University Medical Center.He is not only a busy surgeon (having performed more than 11,000 hip and knee replacements) but a respected leader in the field of hip and knee research. At present, he has co-authored more than 290 peer-reviewed scientific papers, more than 60 book chapters and has edited 12 text books. He travels extensively sharing his research and these experiences allow him exposure to the most up to date information to maximize patient quality of care.
Ted Ligety
Ted Ligety is a retired American alpine ski racer, a two-time Olympic gold medalist, and an entrepreneur, having co-founded Shred Optics.
Ligety won the Olympic Alpine combined event at the 2006 Olympics in Turin and went on to become the world’s leading giant slalom (GS) skier, a status he confirmed by winning gold in the GS race at the 2014 Olympics in Sochi. He is also a five-time World Cup champion in GS (2008, 2010, 2011, 2013 and 2014).
Ligety finished his career with 25 victories and 52 podiums in World Cup competition, his Olympic GS gold medal, 24 GS World Cup wins, 3 GS world championship gold medals and 5 World Cup titles put him among the three greatest GS skiers of all time.

milestones.title: Product design features completed
milestones.description:
The outcomes of our customer in-market testing and discovery have driven how we have refined the product features that we will launch with, as well as the data analytics that are most important to professionals in treating their patients, which we will provide via our tech array through our app. 
Critical improvements included: alteration to movement angle to make the movement pattern more posterio-lateral, to better engage the gluteus maximus, medius and hip adductor, abductor muscles. Greater range of resistance available via the friction resistance system. Finalization of the support handle.

milestones.title: GTM strategy
milestones.description:
GTM strategy defined:
Initial vertical -  B2B launch into Physical Therapy (PT), rehab, orthopedics, sports medicine, gerontology and athletic/sports training to allow for professional uptake of Phantom Edge and patient/consumer usage and adoption. 
B2B launch will be used as a sales vertical/partnership to reach home-use customers (B2B2C) allowing the professionals to obtain Phantom Edge at little to no cost to their clinics, with only cost for use being the software licensing fee, and allowing the professionals to earn commission as affiliate partners allowing their patients/clients to purchase Phantom Edge for home use through each clinic’s exclusive access code. Customer orders will be placed via the brand site, and fulfilled directly. Patients/clients can then use Phantom Edge at home in-between visits/training sessions and chose share their performance data with their provider for better overall outcomes. 
Second vertical - sports specific, e.g skiing (through our Advisor Ted Ligety), hockey, tennis, pickleball etc - utilizing the same model as in the initial vertical. 
Third Vertical - once we have traction through B2B verticals, we will enter a full DTC launch. Plan to enter a strategic partnership/merger with an established consumer wellness/fitness company for the DTC launch.

milestones.description:
In-market testing completed with: 
Physical therapists
Rehabilitation specialists
Orthopedic surgeons
Sports medicine doctors
Detroit Lions NFL team
Proactive Sports Performance
Precision Human Performance
Gabe Lyons, US National Skater
Ted Ligety, US Ski Team Olympic Gold Medalist 
Dr Craig DeValle and team - Rush University Medical Center, Chicago
Drs Bonato, Zafonte and Crandell - Spaulding Rehabiliation Hospital, Boston.
The outcomes of our testing and discovery have driven how we are refining the product features that we will launch with, as well as the data analytics that are most important to professionals in treating their patients, which we will provide via our tech array through our app. Discovery has also shown that our proposed price point for our professional machine that we will be launching is appropriate for our target market, and that our plan to have a lower priced consumer version in the future is in line with what people would be willing to pay to have a device in their home.

milestones.title: Patent filing
milestones.description: US and international Patents filed for Phantom Edge - including the friction resistance system, foot pedal design, folding mechanism and others.

tagline: Fueling eCommerce Growth with AI
description: X-Ray is an innovative AI-driven platform empowering Etsy sellers to elevate their online presence and sales. Our technology simplifies the optimization of product listings, leveraging advanced algorithms to enhance SEO, images, and overall store performance. Designed with user-friendliness, X-Ray offers real-time insights, actionable recommendations, and intuitive tools tailored for small business owners.Our commitment to cost-effective solutions, coupled with a deep understanding of the Etsy marketplace, positions us as a vital ally for sellers navigating the complexities of e-commerce, helping them stand out in a crowded digital landscape and achieve sustainable growth.
problem_statement: X-Ray addresses a critical challenge Etsy sellers face: the overwhelming task of optimizing their online store for maximum visibility and sales. In the crowded digital marketplace, sellers struggle to effectively stand out and connect with their target audience. Existing solutions are often costly, complex, and inadequate for small business owners with limited resources and technical expertise.X-Ray revolutionizes this space with AI-driven tools that simplify and automate optimization. Our platform offers real-time recommendations, cost-effectiveness, and alignment with platform guidelines, making it the ultimate solution for empowering sellers in the e-commerce ecosystem.

This extension forms a crucial component of our three-pronged product strategy aimed at enhancing user engagement and retention. By providing actionable insights and seamlessly guiding users back to the platform, the extension not only serves as a valuable tool but also serves as a gateway for understanding user behavior. This knowledge is instrumental in shaping our upcoming sales co-pilot, constituting the third and integral leg of our strategic product approach.

tagline: Reshaping the way we invest in physical objects
description: Traditional transactions of valuable physical objects for investment or resale costly steps: authentication, shipping, insurance, and customs. This makes it hard for users to quickly realize changes in market prices. Retail investors are often unable to invest in physical objects because the specific storage requirements (security, space, and environmental constraints), so an entire asset class was inaccessible.
problem_statement: Traditional transactions of valuable physical objects for investment or resale costly steps: authentication, shipping, insurance, and customs. This makes it hard for users to quickly realize changes in market prices. Retail investors are often unable to invest in physical objects because the specific storage requirements (security, space, and environmental constraints), so an entire asset class was inaccessible.

tagline: Intelligent summarization of security videos.
description: We summarize security video footage into text and allow enterprises to make sense of their surveillance videos. We are doing patient monitoring in senior care [that brought us over $120k in revenues last year] and machinery monitoring for companies such as P&G. In total we did $210k in revenues last year and expected to make $750k this year.
problem_statement: Companies generate massive amount of security video footage that is too expensive to be manually observed. Conventional AI approaches identify a handful of patterns on the stream. In both cases, much of the information content is wasted. We built a general purpose search engine that can quickly index large video streams, summarize, chart & provide highlights to security officers.

tagline: Move past seeing to knowing
description: Deep Perception provides a personalized video analytics platform for the video surveillance ecosystem. The Deep Perception platform is optimized for edge deployments and runs on AI enabled cameras, network video recorders and dedicated AI appliances. Our partner focused approach allows Deep Perception to tap into our partners' extensive channel networks to efficiently scale both users and revenue.
problem_statement: Generic computer vision applications underperform and traditional custom development of video analytics solutions is cost prohibitive. Personalized video analytics unlocks new recurring revenue opportunities for our VMS and camera partners in the rapidly growing video surveillance ecosystem.

tagline: AI-Driven People Enablement for Employee-Centric Enterprises.
description: AmplifAI transforms employee data into actions modeled after an enterprise’s best-performing people - helping hybrid teams maximize business outcomes, boost productivity and improve engagement. As more companies explore the new generation of hybrid work, innovative leaders and organizations are relying on AmplifAI to enable people, improve performance and make work more fun - wherever work is happening!
problem_statement: The modern employee spends too much time with data and systems. And this results in a massive waste of valuable resources that could be spent improving KPI effectiveness, team skills, or personal targets.As remote and hybrid work continues to evolve, the lack of engagement and people development created by data-intensive workloads creates an even bigger vulnerability within large workforces - and increases the risk of attrition, underperformance, and customer dissatisfaction.

tagline: Use Trash Gurus Marketplace to find a hauler, recycler, scrapper, reseller, or landfill.
description: Trash Gurus is a waste management platform connecting waste buyers and sellers through hosting waste transactions and optimizing fleets. Companies that sell with Trash Gurus reach new customers. Companies that Scrap with Trash Gurus keep customers.
problem_statement: Waste and hauling services are fractionalized and  stuck in the past. Consumers have no way to easily  connect with haulers, and haulers have no way to  attract new business.Trash Gurus is the world’s first waste marketplace.

tagline: Anti Big Data... Anywhere
description: We help customers use IoT information to better predict the future and alert when problems arise.
problem_statement: We are veterans and farmers; we have worked outdoors with our hands just as much as in front of a computer. These personal experiences provide understanding for the sector of society with jobs like these.Our goal is to fundamentally redefine the future of data by making insight extraction, easy, accessible, and operational in no and low bandwidth environments.

tagline: Hylio, Inc.
description: Hylio develops and offers innovative drone systems that completely automate precision agriculture processes. Using Hylio’s technology, farmers/producers can now apply crop treatments directly to problem areas, allowing farmers to increase yields by addressing pests and deficiencies with more accuracy and efficacy.
problem_statement: Current crop care methods are dangerous, imprecise, and inefficient. These antiquated techniques and technologies must be replaced with smarter tools in order for us to sustainably produce enough food on fewer and fewer acres.

tagline: Monetise infinite Ai versions of yourself
description: Twise allows for creators to serve their followers in an individual way while unlocking new revenue from content they already have. Books, videos, podcasts, blogposts now become on-demand speaking knowledge sources - this is the future of knowledge acquisition.We built a complex Ai stack to replicate the human mind, memory and personality. It takes minutes to set up and create a real-time speaking Ai clone. Try an early test by speaking to Gary Vee, Mr Beast or Greta Thunberg at www.twise.ai
problem_statement: Creators, thought-leaders and influencers are under a lot of pressure to create new, unique content which is then delivered in a one to many fashion. It is incredible time consuming and frankly not the best way to impact the end user.By taking existing content and knowledge and making it available through an Ai person, that sounds and acts like the creator, end users can access the knowledge on demand and get exactly what they need. Since the Ai is similar to the creator, uses their voice, it allows for the creator to form a virtual bond by becoming much more personal.Twise also allows for the creator to learn from their audience by getting insights into what topics they want to chat about and enables them to create more of the content that their audience is really interested in.

tagline: The Future of Last Mile: Adaptive Transportation
description: We have built a transformative last mile technology that enables carriers and delivery service providers to change modes of transportation on the fly, much like using a transformer truck to deliver parcels! This enables them to achieve a new level of efficiency by collaborating with other operators to pool resources and form hybrid fleets like truck-bike, truck-drone, or van-walker.
problem_statement: Last mile delivery operators are constrained to using a single courier type from pickup to delivery. This limits their ability to adapt to varying operating conditions along the route, resulting in poor asset utilization, high operating costs and significant environmental impacts (for instance when using a large truck to deliver to a congested urban area).

tagline: It's ON when It's ON
description: We created a fabric that, combined with the loops method, guarantees that your hair will stay where you want it without sacrificing health and comfort.  We identified ALL  issues that the regular hair ties present to all the humans that put their hair up, whether is for professional sports, occupation or hobby.
problem_statement: Every single long haired person that puts their hair up is different. From their DNA, their volume, texture, length and preferred hair style. A little bit like our bodies, they are all different. Why should we settle for a product that doesn't fit perfectly?  TIY gets tailored by you to you.  Choosing the loops and size of loops that the person likes, they guarantee the perfect fit without damage, headaches or breakage.  As a former professional athlete and a model, I used to wear 5 in competition and my hair dressers where trying to convince me to change hair style because I was damaging my hair to the point of no return.  I didn't want to sacrifice the way I looked or the health of my hair.

tagline: Training that Sticks
description: About SalesBoostSalesBoost is a patented, software as a service (SaaS) company providing a skill–based, simulation training platform that features unlimited business scenario replication and immediate feedback to improve effectiveness. SalesBoost leverages technology to fill the gap in learning retention and the adoption of new skills. It provides an engaging solution for professionals to tap into relevant, role-based content that is on-demand, self-paced, and available on any device, in short, easily digestible, micro-learning segments. Business professionals can access content that is meaningful to them, learn quickly, and practice real-world selling scenarios to be prepared for any situation. Additional information on SalesBoost can be found at www.SalesBoost.com.
problem_statement: Conversation skills are nearly impossible to train even though they are 100% necessary.SalesBoost accelerates time to proficiency in sales, leadership or customer service from 160 hours per person to just minutes.That means businesses can arm their team with the soft skills they need in minutes.Organizations can scale with the assurance their team is prepared  to meet the new demands of their enterprise to perform at top of their game.

tagline: Uber for Mold Inspection - Powered by AI and IoT
description: Mold is emerging as this generations' asbestos.Marvin Labs is revolutionizing the rapidly growing $5B mold inspection industry with their suite of AI and IoT technologies. Traditional mold inspection relies on expensive off-site laboratory analysis of site samples which can take up to a week. With Marvin Labs, inspectors provide rapid on-site mold testing results enabled by AI.Our Key Technologies:Marvin Lens, our AI powered robotic microscope for automated mold/asbestos analysis. (Launched! Patented, and Patent Pending) - With Lens, inspectors and remediators can perform mold and asbestos sample analysis themselves, eliminating the third-party lab, and enabling same day result turnaround. See more at: marvinlabservices.comMarvin Air: our world first all-in-one Indoor Air Quality monitor with toxic mold detection (Pre-order, Patent pending) - Air is designed for businesses and consumers to detect problem mold before it begins to impact health and property. If mold is detection a follow-up mold inspection is required. See more at: mvlabs.ai/air
problem_statement: Every year hundreds of millions of people are exposed to asbestos and mold in the built environment causing cancer, severe illness, death, and many billions in economic losses. To mitigate exposure risks, a multi-billion dollar inspection and consulting industry exists.For properties suspected of mold or asbestos contamination, an inspector attends the property, collects samples, and sends them to a third-party laboratory for specialized analysis. This process is labor intensive, extremely expensive, and can take up to 7 days to receive results increasing risk and liability.

milestones.title: Sales > Engineering
milestones.description: For the first time in the history of Marvin Labs, the size of our sales team has grown beyond the size of our technical team! Great to be making money whilst we sleep.

milestones.title: Completed Pilot with Large Multinational
milestones.description: Completed a pilot of our Marvin Lens platform with one of the world’s largest environmental testing service providers. Pilot results are being presented to executives at the organization in late October and move into a formal proposal stage. This multinational is itself worth in the tens of billions of dollars, and has over 500 laboratory locations across the world.

milestones.title: 30,000 Commercial Mold & Asbestos Tests Completed!
milestones.description: We hit 30,000 commercial tests performed by our customers on the Marvin Lens platform!

milestones.description: Launched our pre-order program online. Initial experiments showed a strong market need for the technology. With less than $500 spent on marketing efforts, over $11,000 in pre-orders have been secured as of Sept 2024.

milestones.title: Launched Marvin Lens for AI Mold Testing!
milestones.description: Launched the first commercial iteration of Marvin Lens, generating revenues, and working with customers to help them scale their mold testing services!

tagline: Delivering minimal-effort preventative health screenings to the mass market
description: BodySpec aims to be the go-to provider for preventative health by making it fast, easy, pleasant, and affordable. BodySpec does this by breaking high tech medical equipment and services out of the hospital and deploying it via a fleet of mobile van clinics directly to people at their gyms, offices, parks, and grocery stores.BodySpec streamlines the entire experience enabling fast bookings in under a minute and a seamless no-wait experience at the mobile van clinic. The initial offering is an affordable 15-min DEXA body composition test that can quantify risks for heart disease, diabetes, osteoporosis, hypertension, and more.By significantly reducing the frictions around accessing and receiving preventative health services, BodySpec aims to make it easy and pleasant to incorporate these screenings into regular health routines. The goal is to make accessing health services as fast and easy as a trip to Starbucks.
problem_statement: Everyone understands that preventative health screenings are important and effective - but less than 7% of Americans age 35+ received all the recommended appropriate clinical preventative services.The problem is exacerbated for Millennials.  It's not that Millennials don't care about their health; in fact, Millennials are the most avid consumers of wellness services and products. But, these are delivered as retail services and products, on retail terms consistent with their consumption habits - not with the frictions of traditional healthcare delivery like long wait times, surprise bills, and inconvenient scheduling. As such, Millennials are the most likely generation to put off health services, and may even be unhealthier than older generations when they were the same age.In launching our first service, an elective DEXA body scan, BodySpec has found repeatedly that if you put it in front of their faces, Millennials will engage in the right preventative health behaviors - including screenings.  There is a large market ($2B+) of untapped demand from Millennials for preventative health services - if delivered at the right time and place, and on their terms.

tagline: Your sustainable household assistant
description: Good Green is a sustainable marketplace empowering small business owners with proprietary technology and ensuring quality for consumers searching for home services.
problem_statement: Good Green makes it easier for customers to interact with moving companies and receive quotes by uploading videos - as opposed to waiting for someone to arrive at their house for an estimate. The team is looking to further build out capabilities in other home categories such as: cleaning, painting, furniture, contracting, etc.

tagline: FloatMe helps employees bridge cash gaps and build savings.
description: FloatMe helps employees bridge cash gaps and build savings.For a monthly subscription users today get: account monitoring, low balance alerts & payday notifications, overdraft prevention, emergency wage advances up to $50How it works: monthly subscription $1.99 per mo1) Sign Up - User links bank & debit card to verify consistent employment2) Monitor - Low balance and overdraft alerts + payday notifications.3) Float - Instantly advance up to $50. Auto drafted on next pay date. They charge $4 float fees4) Stash - Easily establish your own savings.
problem_statement: • Short term cash gaps are costly and available options from banks and lenders are predatory and unfair - over $46B per year is paid annually in fees.

tagline: Parabeac makes it easy for both designers & developers to make accurate & responsive designs in their end product. We enable designers to turn their design files into code & finally into the developer workflow via pull requests.
description: Our solution is to completely eliminate the handoff between design & development teams by enabling designers to function like front-end developers. We do this by taking design files from the most popular design programs, converting them into code, and integrating that code into the development workflow via pull requests. Existing tools today only aid the handoff & don't actually solve the whole problem.
problem_statement: The UI/UX design team & developers have two entirely different priorities, yet they have to work together to create a successful application. In app development, the UI/UX design to development process is one of the most expensive, frustrating, & time-consuming problems there are. The industry coined the problem "Handoff Hell". 60% of app development costs are being spent on front-end development according to Gartner.

tagline: Should you use off grid power in your next design?
description: What is PowerStack? An intelligent new way of delivering power and IoT off the grid, with smart power pole systems built to last.100% off-the-grid power, saving you time and money. Renewable and sustainable, PowerStack ensures you have power round the clock.Deployed Intelligence
problem_statement: We have re-imagined what the future of remote power generation and smart tech deploymentwill look like and delivered it to you.

tagline: Creating magical conversations at scale: Play, Win, Make Friends.
description: Joblessness and mass unrest from AGI are inevitable. The only way to cross this chasm and usher in the bountiful era AGI will provide is to create an AGI that people can trust. Trust is built through verbal conversation. Every person is attracted to different types of personalities and conversations. To create an AGI and personalitoes people trust and appreciate, we need the conversation data. We're creating a live voice and video social network to capture this data.This social network uses AI and gamification to help people build meaningful relationships. We take in people's social media data and use it to match people and then facilitate those conversations. People get entries into exciting Mr. Beast style giveaways for having longer conversations and talking about suggested mutually interesting topics. We are the most fun place on the planet to build and strengthen relationships.  Lastly, we have an AI that gives users feedback, ans lets them practice these conversations to become the best version of themselves.Character.ai has proven there's a 20M MAU market for chatting with AI, they just lack the data to make a truly compelling one.
problem_statement: The loneliness epidemic affects 80% of gen z and gen alpha, 85% of which are gamers. Gaming is a low stakes way to meet people; however it is still tough to start a conversation beyond the game.Were initially targeting the 60% of the first world, lonely genz gamers who use gaming as a  way to make social connections (175M people).

milestones.description: We’ve had 3.5M users cross through our ecosystem. Mostly a vanity metric, but we know we can capture and retain way more of these people with personalized AI.
