tagline: Organise the world's opinions
description: Get recommendations you trust from communities you loveThink Reddit meets Airtable! But much much sexier

tagline: Asteam Techno Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
description: Asteam Techno Solutions Pvt. Ltd. was established in 2017 with a perspective to become a single-source supplier & solution provider for all the industrial electrical automation hardware and software solution needs. Armed with team of as keen as mustard skilled engineers with many years of experience working in the field of industrial automation and special purpose machines.

tagline: Micro. Green. Living.
description: Casata is redefining the idea of living small: 400-750 square feet, comfortable, modern micro homes situated in a warm, vibrant community with mature trees, local art, and cutting edge amenities. With sustainability at our core, we offer low carbon footprint, low water waste units, as well as electric vehicle charging stations, electric scooters & bikes for local exploration, and open greenspace for community events and fresh air.
problem_statement: Casata serves as the best of both worlds: independent homes people can call their own, nestled within fun, vibrant communities centered around human connections, nature, and a modern lifestyle.

tagline: Teleport Live across the world like you are actually there
description: Anyone with a smartphone and Wormhole can spin around and create a 10 Dimensional Slice of Life™ around them. Technically speaking, these capture everything around them in real-time and create a LIVE 10D mesh that includes showing people as Avatars in the real world, Social Media activity in that area, games to play, things to buy and more…

tagline: Blockchain Infrastructure - The foundation of trust in a connected world.
description: GetChkd's state-of-the-art blockchain infrastructure platform revolutionizes system connectivity, enforces user-specific mappings, and ensures immutable audit trails for every action. This guarantees unparalleled security, accountability, and reliability for a connected system of systems across various domains and classifications. GetChkd: The Foundation of Trust in a Connected World.
problem_statement: We live in an increasingly connected digital world: the average public SaaS platform has over 350 third-party API integrations. With all of that connectivity and sharing of data comes more vulnerability and more opportunities for sensitive user information to be compromised.Blockchain has emerged as a unifying solution for these exact issues, which is why the DoD, NATO, 95% of decision makers in financial services and 60% of CIOs (in any industry) see blockchain investment as a top priority.

tagline: A FinTech-enabled market network for the commercial construction industry.
description: - ConstructionBevy is building the first Fin-Tech enabled market network for the commercial construction industry- First open platform for commercial construction connecting Owners/Developers, Architects/Engineering Firms, GCs, Subs, Manufacturers, and all the Equipment, Services and Financial companies supporting the industry.- 1st problem we solve: Helping GCs more rapidly find and qualify the best Subs for their projects in an SEO-friendly approach.- Unique (and freemium model) Pre-Qualification module with industry leading Risk Assessment Configurator ("RAC") to assess risk using data science- We're also the first to combine Pre-Qualification data in a contractor search tool, saving GCs 1000s of hours in admin time.
problem_statement: IT’S MESSY AND INEFFICIENT TO FIND AND QUALIFY TRADE PARTNERS- There's no common database of all companies, their offerings, and areas served in the commercial contracting sector where, using AI/ML, users can find and qualify subs of interest in an asset class that represents 6% to 10% of the GDP of every country in the world.- People outside the industry think GCs know what subs they want to use. GCs are always looking for subs - for multiple reasons- Trade partner qualification is expensive and time consuming for general contractors, subs, and material suppliers-  Responding to multiple pre-qual requests, sometimes with each new bid, is inefficient and can require a dedicated staff for trade partners/subs- There always seems to be more regulatory, reporting, and customer demands regarding environmental and societal impacts.- Existing tools focus on data gathering, rather than verifying past projects and/or ESG performance. Plus, companies have almost no workflow tools and thus doing manual credit approvals

tagline: Prosrent is the go-to marketplace for construction equipment rentals.
description: ProsRent helps construction companies nationwide by streamlining the construction equipment rental process a digital rental marketplace. This is guided by Prosrent's vast network of supplier vendors that the company leverages to enable construction companies to have the ability to rent equipment anywhere in the United States, while giving them the tools to manage their orders (from mobilization to demobilization) all through one source. Prosrent generates revenue via a surcharge on rental fees originated via the marketplace (around 17%).
problem_statement: Today,  construction industry equipment renters and suppliers must often engage via manual, inefficient processes when interacting. This leads to slow procurement processes, inconsistent pricing, and a fragmented market.

tagline: EyeVi helps engineers make road inspection 14x faster and 10x more cost-effective with road network intelligence
description: EyeVi is building a road network intelligence platform to solve the massive problem of road deterioration and maintenance backlog costing $435B in the US alone. Most defect detection is currently done manually and with EyeVi’s platform these detections and repairs can be done at a much lower cost and can capture insights much faster.

tagline: AI tools to create animations in minutes
description: We're building tools that help people start creating beautiful animations with ease, no artistic experience required. Users can create character, generate animations and images, draw backgrounds, add lipsyncing, and more with our feature set. The vision is to allow any single person or group to create long-form shows and movies in the same time it would currently take a studio to do the same.

We have producers/engineers anywhere from New York to Midland, Texas that maintain Emmy nominations, Grammys, gold records, etc. We hope to bring the community and industry together with good vibes and chances to connect.

tagline: The fastest, most affordable laundry delivery service that's ever existed built by ex-Instacart team
description: NoScrubs laundry delivery is the fastest, most affordable laundry delivery service that's ever existed. Simply schedule online, we pick up and return perfectly folded laundry within 2-3 hours.
problem_statement: Americans spend 50Bn+ hours a year doing laundry (75k lifetimes!). NoScrubs laundry is making this a bygone chore, by providing a service with the speed and price point that is appealing to anyone and everyone.Every other category winner (Doordash, Instacart, Uber, etc) has been as fast as the consumers other option. In this case, that's slogging through laundry on their own. The equivalent of 75,000 lifetimes are spent each year by americans slogging through their laundry chores. We can fix that.

milestones.title: 50% MoM growth
milestones.description: Crossed 100 customers and $65k annualized revenue

milestones.title: ARR
milestones.description: 88 customers (52 on subscriptions and 36 one time) at $47,820 ARR, grown 12% WoW since launching 3 months ago. Unlocked first “dark laundromat” location

tagline: Go-to platform for specialized clinicians
description: Branchly is growing health by bringing clinicians, families, and healthcare organizations together on one platform. We make it easy for healthcare organizations to efficiently build health-specific, multilingual directory branches that promote their mission and clinicians. This encourages clinicians to showcase their evolving expertise and build clinical networks while empowering families to find the specialized care they need.
problem_statement: The heart of our business is to make it easier for families to find specialized care. A 2020 Harris Poll found that the second biggest barrier that patients have when seeking healthcare is finding a provider that meets their unique needs and that they feel comfortable with. In order to serve families, we are meeting the needs of healthcare organizations who value a multi-lingual, health-specific directory branch to promote their mission, clinicians, and continuing education courses. These organizations include health educators, professional associations, and non-profits such as Special Olympics Texas. All of the targeted organizations have the same need of aggregating and expanding their clinical network as well as efficiently connecting their clinical community with families that need their expertise.

tagline: We leverage technology and data to provide self esteem education to children while collecting actionable insights and delivering it to key decision makers.
description: We are using our platform to improve self-esteem in kids and provide them with the tools they need to reach their full potential.  Parents and decision-makers will be equipped with vital information and insight into the child's climate to take action immediately before things escalate within their child. Our platform is unique because of the ability to engage our target audience with character and celebrity led instruction. Our actionable data is also a unique factor because we are providing real time insights to prevent things like suicide and other forms of youth violence.
problem_statement: We are solving the issue of unhealthy self esteem in children. What if we could prevent teen pregnancy before it happened? What if we could predict youth the suicide before the devastation? Teen pregnancy low academic achievement violent behavior self neglect and suicide have one thing in common amongst you and that is unhealthy self-esteem. There are over 60 million kids in the United States alone who suffer from low self-esteem. Enrichly is the first ever self-esteem based e-learning platform designed to strategically leverage technology and data for children. Our platform is designed to deliver self-esteem based learning skills while collecting actionable data and connecting key decision-makers to trusted mental health resources. Unhealthy self-esteem is the leading cause of issues like teen pregnancy, low academic achievement, violent behavior, and other risky youth behavior which can all lead to poverty and unsuccessful sequences of events.  Children shouldn’t be subject to unreached potential due to unhealthy self-esteem.

tagline: Renting Made Easy
description: Renting inventory (i.e. tools, equipment, tents, chairs, AV) is HARD, for both renters and rental companies.  It’s a giant, $1T industry still using old tech.TapGoods is the leading modern platform making renting easy.We’re following a 4-part playbook used by companies such as OpenTable, MINDBODY, and Storable to reach $2.5B+ valuations in smaller markets.  Our platform includes:- TapGoods PRO automates rental operations- TapGoods Storefront enhances online business with current customers- Marketplace provides rentals online for new customers for rental businesses- Payments captures margin with integrated payments
problem_statement: Renters, used to things in their life being easy and online, want to rent online but can't.Rental businesses either manage their business by relying on pen and paper or use outdated, legacy software.  Either way, they rely on labor-intensive, manual processes and fail to offer a modern shopping experience.

tagline: Helping organizations manage cyber risk

tagline: Improving access to targeted, non-opioid relief from headche pain.
description: OcciGuide guides occipital nerve blocks (ONB), enabling any practitioner - physician, nurse practitioner, physician assistant, first responder or medic - to provide targeted, quick acting, long lasting relief from headache pain without side effects, sedation, or impact on cognitive function. With OcciGuide, ONB can be used as a first line therapy for acute headache pain in any care setting or environment. OcciGuide can have a significant impact on reducing care disparities in environments where opioid use is highly prevalent for treating headache and specialist care is often not available.OcciGuide can be used to treat most headache types, including migraine, post traumatic headache and medication overuse headache.
problem_statement: Headache is the 3rd highest cause of disability worldwide and migraine is the 1st leading cause of disability in people under 50. Many treatments for acute headache are short acting, provide partial relief, and cause multiple side effects. Despite significant documentation that opioids have poor efficacy, negative side effect and a high abuse potential they are also used to manage acute headache pain, especially after other medications have failed.Occipital nerve blocks (ONB) offer a better treatment option, providing rapid onset pain relief that can last for an average of 2 weeks. Unfortunately, access to this procedure is very limited. ONB are overwhelmingly performed by specialists, who generally are not first line providers for headache patients. ONB are rarely used in the acute care settings despite numerous advantages and opioids are used in almost half of the headache visits in urban and rural ERs.

tagline: Smart Energy Solutions
description: Sanalife is at the forefront of transforming the built environment with our AI-driven IoT platform, accelerating the shift towards a smart and distributed energy grid. Operating within the $50B Energy Management market, we are uniquely positioned to capitalize on the industry's rapid evolution driven by energy inflation, sustainability mandates, compliance requirements, and heightened health and safety concerns.Our state-of-the-art SaaS platform, E360, tackles the most pressing challenges in energy efficiency, demand response, greenhouse gas (GHG) reporting, and indoor health and safety. By harnessing high-fidelity contextual data from advanced sensors, controllers, and third-party systems, our innovative approach dynamically optimizes both energy usage and air quality.With a robust customer base of over 500 clients and over 10 million square feet of commercial and industrial space under management, Sanalife is already making a significant impact. As we enter our Series A funding round, our goal is to accelerate customer acquisition and further enhance our technology to realize the vision of AI-driven autonomous buildings.
problem_statement: Building owners and operators face significant challenges in managing their escalating energy costs and the changing landscape of the energy market. In the past three years, energy costs in the US have surged by 29%, with no signs of slowing down as demand continues to rise. Alarmingly, only 10% of the 5.9 million commercial buildings in the country utilize Energy Management Systems (EMS), leading to a staggering 30% energy waste and over $75 billion in unnecessary costs annually.Moreover, indoor air quality (IAQ) is a critical yet often neglected issue. According to the EPA, indoor pollutant levels are five times higher than outdoor levels, contributing to 44 million missed workdays and $8 billion in yearly losses due to preventable airborne diseases. These challenges highlight the urgent need for comprehensive solutions that address both energy efficiency and IAQ, paving the way for healthier and more cost-effective building management.

tagline: Oatmeal that's ready to party!
description: Oats in Coats uses storytelling and inventive food products to make healthy eating fun for kids. We've started with a line of oatmeals made with real fruits and veggies, no added sugars or GMOs, and, importantly, free from the top allergens so that more families can safely enjoy. Oats in Coats is the first chapter in a series of "Grocery Stories", a family of brands inspired by a single prompt: "What happens at night at the grocery store when the lights are off and the customers have all gone home?"
problem_statement: Getting kids to eat healthy is a struggle! Co-founders and moms Daphne and Dyanna realized that today's better-for-you food options may be nutritious but kids aren't convinced by health claims alone. In fact, there is not a single better-for-you brand on BrandLove's list of the most beloved brands by American youth. Even Annie's didn't make the cut! So, while many brands offer healthy products, they aren't connecting with kids in a manner that excites them. That's why we meet kids where they are, with imaginative storytelling about a world set in the grocery store. Characters introduce kids to the foods in the aisles and engage them in their food choices. Upcoming stories will introduce families to additional brands as part of the "Grocery Stories" arc. Planned brands that will build on the success of Oats in Coats include "Fruits in Suits" and "Veggies with Wedgies". The market is huge, and the journey of capturing it will be laugh out loud fun. We hope you'll join us.

tagline: Next Generation Anti-infectives Biotech Platform
description: Maxwell has a "one drug for many bugs" deep learning-guided drug discovery platform technology which produces small molecules that can accurately mimic endogenous human peptides. The first human peptide being mimicked is LL-37 or "human cathelicidin antimicrobial peptide." LL-37 is used by the human innate immune system and all white blood cells to attack all known pathogens. Accurately and safely mimicking LL-37 could result in a super drug able to address many unmet medical needs, as well as current and future pandemics. The first biomimetic small molecule - MXB-22,510 - is on it's way to the FDA for human trials for a polymicrobial infection of sinus, called Chronic Rhinosinusitis, in Q1 2024. Dr Edward Rudnic, PhD, is a registered pharmacist - is the former US Head of R&D for Shire Pharmaceuticals, recently acquired by Takeda for $65 billion - and has successfully taken over 80 molecules through the FDA and into commercialization. Examples are Adderall XR, Carbatrol, Claritin, and other multi-billion dollar blockbusters.
problem_statement: Many viruses, bacteria and fungi are currently impossible to treat, especially when many of the bugs infect a patient all at once (called a polymicrobial infection). These pathogens drive some of the largest unmet medical needs like asthma, cystic fibrosis, post viral syndromes like Epstein Barr, Long COVID, fungal brain infections, dementias, deadly hospital acquired fungal and bacterial illness, and chronic sinus infections which are suffered by 12% of the population. Maxwell has selected a nasal spray application of MXB-22,510 to target chronic sinus infections are the first application of the biomimetic technology and has received highly encouraging written feedback from the FDA.

tagline: Someday we'll use teleportation, until then we'll use Pipedream.
description: PipeDream is a technology company that aims to create the world’s first commercial hyperlogistics network. At present, this is planned to be accomplished through the use of an underground tunnel network which facilitates autonomous self-propelled delivery robots at high speeds. PipeDream Labs will utilize a network of underground tunnels paired with high speed delivery robots to achieve rapid delivery for a variety of products. This will provide a fast, efficient, safe, and reliable system capable of enhancing, augmenting, and/or replacing existing logistics networks and delivery pools. In certain cases (where routes are predictable and repeatable) our system may also replace specialized delivery services.
problem_statement: Autonomous logistics will have the biggest impact on our daily lives of any technology other than AI. To be able to move things around quickly, freely, and for near 0 cost, will fundamentally change commerce. Pipedream is building the base layer infrastructure to do this at scale. Moving long distances, between cities, in and out of buildings are all problems that will need to be solved to make autonomous logistics work at scale, and Pipedream is focused on solving these problems the same way cities have been solving them for other necessities (sewage, water) for decades. By mirroring the water system in cities, Pipedream is able to take advantage of decades of understandings of how to put in this type of infrastructure, Pipedream is able to deliver these system's cheaply and with relatively low regulatory ease.

tagline: OneID Lab makes it easy to deploy and manage properly provisioned, decentralized digital credentials (tokens) as a part of an organization’s “zero trust” posture. When properly deployed, OneID Cloud can virtually eliminate account takeovers.
description: OneID Access enables efficient and secure digital transformation with a practical and secure solution that opens up greater possibilities for interactive remote access. The OneID Access solution has the capability to revolutionize how remote access is performed and secured for remote workers (IT), and remote management (IT/OT). OneID Access moves authentication policies to an automated, hardware-based solution which eliminates vulnerabilities and is less costly to administer than complicated and insecure software-based strategies for secure remote access.  The solution also includes the option for hardware-based access control within a building or plant, providing seamless logical and physical controls. Our tools help companies improve the nutrition, sustainability, and cost of their product and beverage portfolio while accessing supply chain insights to take action. We created the most actionable packaged food and beverage food science and supply chain database.Our patented AI provides product development, portfolio, and supply chain insights. Enterprise technology that improves and provides product management, ingredient intelligence, and insights for CPG companies, grocery stores, suppliers, and manufacturers to solve major inefficiencies. Our tools improve innovation and decision-making, save companies money and time, and help management teams confidently launch products in the $3 trillion packaged food market. The extensive and standardized Journey Foods database extracts data from millions of ingredients for algorithms to dynamically analyze and methodically recommend optimized portfolio recommendations based on pricing, supply chain, and nutrition parameters. All new and enterprise food and beverage companies rely on key insights to keep their products in the market. These same companies are aiming to meet the demands of their consumers by reducing their carbon footprint, developing sustainable business practices, improving nutrition, and saving costs across the board. To reach these goals, they'll have to reformulate their supply chains and recipes at rapid rates.

tagline: Space Cowboy rounds up space debris!
description: Space Cowboy Active Debris Remediation (ADR), founded by 26 year US Army Veteran Joe Guzman, leads the way in shaping a future sustainable space environment which can support the growth of an "off-world economy" that benefits all of us here on Earth. Space Cowboy ADR's core capability, a fleet of micro-satellite spacecraft about the size of a dishwasher, collects fragments between the sizes of 1 and 10cm in Lower Earth Orbit. Each of these fragments, while small, could completely destroy an operational satellite and create thousands of additional pieces of debris. The projected growth in both operational satellites and orbital debris demands an environmental clean-up solution.Proudly launched at Founder's Institute, Spring 2024 Cohort. A Capital Factory portfolio company.
problem_statement: Government and Commercial space domain awareness (SDA) organizations spend hundreds of millions of dollars per year to track trash in space and have not even scratched to surface of what is needed to protect high value space assets from damaging or destructive losses due to collisions with debris. Without Active Debris Remediation (ADR), these costs will only grow over time and eventually make satellite operations impossible. There exist no capabilities to reduce/manage the growth of small debris or mitigate the risk of their collisions with active satellites, the likes of which would halt the growth of the projected $1 Trillion space economy.

tagline: Self-care you can wear
description: Our wellness tools fit seamlessly into your busy day and work to give you healthy skin from within.Our patent-pending MicroPerle™ beads are mapped to the body’s lymphatic vessels. Combined with compression, each one applies very gentle pressure to encourage proper lymphatic return.They sit strategically where lymph stagnation can cause orange peel skin, or cellulite. Think of it as a mini lymph massage while you move. Voilà!
problem_statement: We all have a lymphatic system that runs throughout us, carrying infection-fighting cells and constantly working to filter out the things that don't serve our bodies.It requires movement to do its job properly. Unlike our blood circulatory system which has the heart to act as a pump, it must be manually stimulated.A properly flowing lymph system means better immunity, radiant skin and overall health. Who doesn't want that?!

tagline: Airborne Infection Prevention Software
description: Our solution is the development of a new, proprietary software. Our software integrates of the building design, equipment, management system and room use or its application. Our system integrates the critical information in several integrated data sets, including:•	HVAC Equipment•	Building Specifications•	Current Conditions•	Industry standards (e.g., ASHRAE), state mechanical standards, federal infection controls, design intentions, etc.All of these data sets are critical to meet the established standards, which are needed to provide maximum safety for the building occupants.We market our software to hospitals, air balance contractors and building architects. We are engaged to support the annual compliance testing, as well as new capital projects or renovations, which is mandatory to complete the project.
problem_statement: Life Balance Technologies helps hospitals and other buildings eliminate the threat of airborne infections by delivering accurate, reliable, and verifiable data needed to identify any airborne infection risks.None of the 6,100 accredited U.S. hospitals are 100% compliant with the established building and ventilation standards. These standards exist to keep the occupants safe from airborne infections. Before the Covid-19 pandemic, hospitals used the "ostrich" defense. Hospitals only have to test the airflow only once a year, and they only test about 15% of the building. Even more astounding, the hospitals are subject to field audits from the accreditation services only every three years to maintain their licenses to operate.There is another big problem too. The hospitals and owners of other public buildings, like schools, offices, entertainment venues, etc., have spent billions of dollars to build and modernize their ventilation systems. They incorporated the Energy Efficiency recommendations, which are built to optimize the occupant’s comfort (i.e. temperature) vs. energy consumption”.  Energy Efficient systems have some features that are good, like advanced filtration and increased insulation. But since the HVAC system is the biggest energy consumer, modern building systems are designed to slow down the fan speed, which reduces the airflow. Maintaining adequate airflow is "Airborne Infection Prevention 101." Without it, airborne infections can collect in high risk areas.  Building owners can save money on their utility bills, but they have put their occupants at risk.

tagline: SOFWERX

problem_statement: Our goal is to lower the barriers of entry for non-traditional solutions providers (industry, academia and laboratories), in order to further improve technology discovery efforts in support of the United States Special Operations Command (USSOCOM), facilitate effective engagement with industry, and accelerate technology development to support informed decision making as well as support relationship building between industry and investors.

There is both a shortage of trained computer science teachers and teaching tools that engage "middle learners": students that have completed basic introductions to coding but are not yet confident in their abilities to tackle text-based coding.

tagline: Talisman empowers businesses to master their finances, from spending to earning, becoming their core financial tool.
description: Understanding your company’s relationship with money should be easy.To grow better, you need to run better.Talisman is the first finance platform built for modern teams. From marketing to engineering, every employee has skin in the game on Talisman.Companies can fully control operational expenses, automate approvals, and collaborate faster on budgets, forecasts, and actuals.
problem_statement: 💼 Finance tools aren’t built for SMB operators-Current tools focus on taxes and are built for data-literate finance professionals, not SMB operators.-Existing tools like QuickBooks and Excel don’t explain data for operational understanding, focusing instead on auditing, tax preparation, and tax filing.📊 Data doesn’t make sense-It’s hard for non-accountants to understand what vendors they spend money on and why.With only 24% of decision-makers confident in their data skills, most can’t understand financial spreadsheets or dense PDFs.💰 Team budgets are siloed-Teams manage their budgets separately, making it hard to collaborate on projects, keep track of budgets, and get a clear view of overall company spending.⏳ Slow and manual process-It takes weeks of manual data entry to track, update, and analyze company spend to close the month, distracting from strategic work.🚫 Hard to stop cost creep-As companies grow, so do their costs, making it hard to catch spend fluctuations, unauthorized transactions, overcharges, free trials, and renewals before it’s too late.🔍 Lack of specific context-QuickBooks and other tools show all financial data to everyone, regardless of their role, team, or responsibilities.-Leaders, departments, and ICs can’t get finance insights filtered by category, role, team, or shared initiative.

tagline: Connecting companies to their deskless workforce
description: Apply modern technology such as mobile and chat bots to combat the top reasons for turnover, which are lack of connection, communication, and fringe benefits. Then make it an order of magnitude less expensive than today's options.
problem_statement: Turnover in some industries where deskless workers make up the majority of the workforce can easily be 50% - 80% or more. This is the top source of profit leakage due to the costs to interview, select, hire, and train.

tagline: A marketing ecosystem for public school districts
description: We Go Public promotes the benefits of a PreK-12 public education and its member districts. We amplify school districts' successes and drive engagement from the community through digital tools.We Go Public exists as a comprehensive marketing ecosystem with future development powered by AI.  It includes a website that serves 1200 school districts at a directory level, membership-based benefits, SEO that drives traffic, GeoMapping, on-demand marketing training, and marketing activities to promote public education.Our customers are school district administrators including communications professionals and superintendents. Our customers are not teachers and principals of individual schools.We Go Public is the only website and promotion vehicle for public school districts. Other companies provide services or products. We provide promotion and training through digital tools.
problem_statement: Education is competitive as student enrollment in public schools is equal to about $7K /child. When students go elsewhere, the funds are drained from the neighborhood school.Public schools face competition for enrollment from other education choices. Factors like COVID, charter schools, private schools, homeschooling, and teachers leaving, all affect enrollment choice.Public schools now must market and promote their offerings. However, their constraints include a lack of marketing expertise, time, and resources.

tagline: A talent marketplace for luxury retail brands and creative freelance  professionals.
description: An AI-powered, on-demand talent marketplace & social networking app for brands, businesses, and creative freelance professionals.
problem_statement: 62% of companies say their biggest priorities is investing in tools that help speed up finding and hiring talent.

tagline: Deliver higher cash flows and more predictable returns with Zeno's Energy OS
description: A product of 8VC's Build Program, Zeno is a visibility and accounting suit for midsized (i.e., non-major) upstream oil and gas companies. The software integrates with the existing fragmented tech stack and (or legacy) tools across the organization to give CFOs “command center” visibility into the performance of all their assets and allow them to run sophisticated forecasts and analyses. Zeno allows E&P operators the ability to integrate across the existing tech-stack (ERP, production data, drilling and reserves economics, land data, accounting, and market data), giving CFOs real-time insight into their asset’s performance.Zeno has invested heavily in building a data integration platform for the fragmented O&G software stack over the last three years. We previously had a CEO from Salesforce but struggled to productize it successfully or achieve traction in the market, culminating in 5 months with no sales from November 2022. Following the hire of our newest CEO (Sean), the team was able to close 5 contracts within 4 months.Product Features:- Command Centers for CFOs- CAPEX resource planning and financial forecasting- Asset management- Portfolio view
problem_statement: By targeting supply chain visibility issues that plague O&G markets (wells, land rights, mineral data, purification, etc.), Zeno aims to build a high-fidelity data set that can be translated into investor advantages like increased transparency and reduced inefficiencies. The business model is such that we charge smaller contract values for the O&G operators (<$500k) while taking up from 1-10% (depending on size) of each position hedged. Zeno's hedging model doubles their addressable market and allows them to scale much more quickly.

milestones.title: Zeno Technologies Unveils Updates with Releases v29.0 and v30.1
milestones.description: Zeno Technologies has announced powerful updates to its platform, enhancing the user experience and the efficiency of financial and operational planning for the energy industry. Two recent releases, v29.0 and v30.1, have introduced significant features and optimizations.

tagline: Empower construction workers to maximize safety, minimize risk and increase productivity everyday.
description: JobSiteCheck is a SaaS Solution that facilitates real time, bi-directional communication between decision makers and workers in the field.HEALTH AND SAFETY: Screen for health-related concerns upon entry, verify credentials, and streamline safety risk reporting by workers without fear of recourse. Notify workers in real-time regarding plan changes; PRODUCTIVITY: Collect data digitally and directly from workers on site to instantly identify delays, risks, and obstacles to inform action; DASHBOARDS AND REPORTING: Glean valuable trends and report on check-in data, health statuses, density and on-time delivery in seconds saving countless reporting and reconciliation hours; HARDWARE-FREE DEPLOYMENT: Deploy on site in a couple days with no new hardware, software downloads, or need to register users across multiple locations.
problem_statement: Failure to connect workers directly into the project management flow results in unidentified safety risks, wasted time, wasted materials, and loss of valuable jobsite data.→ $1.63T could be saved annually from infrastructure productivity changes→ 60% of GC and trades feel using software to manage safety and/or inspections during construction is of high value to improving this process→ 14 hrs/wk is spent on non-productive activities including looking for project information, conflict resolution and dealing with mistakes and rework

tagline: The SAT for Young Athletes
description: Youth Combine has established an algorithm that allows young athletes to track the performance ranking of their own athletic achievements and compare their data against other similarly aged athletes from across the United States.The same process is commonly used by professional sports leagues (NFL, NHL, MLB, NBA and others) to evaluate athletes across a wide range of data points in an effort to forecast their future successes.This is the first of its kind for young athletes and consists of the THREE Ps.  PERFORMANCE/PROJECTABILITY/PROGRESSION
problem_statement: “Develop and Promote Positive Athletic Experiences.”Provide an opportunity for the 45M youth athletes in the US to compete against other same-age youth in their community and across the country to appropriately score and rank their athletic skills relative to their ”competition” and in turn provide a data-first ranking of youth athletes in relative categories across America.Our team of science and research partners will analyze the data gathered at each Youth Combine and identify trends that provide a level of projectability to future athletic achievement opportunity. Year over year data will assist parents and the young athletes in identifying the potential best sport(s)  and specific activities that they may excel at in future years.

tagline: Real-time feedback on form while strength training
description: 12 million sports injuries occur per year due to incorrect technique while training, leaving a $40b opportunity for a technology that corrects form. We track motion and give athletes real-time feedback on their lifting technique, all from a wearable device and smartphone. We are focused on lifting, but later will expand to golf, tennis, baseball and yoga, Pilates to become the dominant player for form correction across all sports.
problem_statement: We all know someone that takes their training seriously, you could say he’s a regular at the gym. It’s their last lift of the day, and they are going for that personal record, but leave either injured or frustrated. Well, we are here to solve that for athletes at all levels across the world.No matter the stage of an athlete, they all share a common goal, that’s to decrease injury while maximizing performance. This holds true for kids building their athletic foundations, serious athletes at the peak of their performance, and everyday gym goers that live an active lifestyle but need to be able to pick up their kids every day. Poor technique while training is the primary factor keeping them from achieving these goals, and attributes to almost 12 million sports injuries per year.This leaves a big need for a solution that can provide the feedback necessary to prevent poor technique. This solution should be a portable technology that provides real time feedback to users during their sessions, allowing them to drive results. Lastly, this solution must be advanced enough to evolve with the training methods of tomorrow.

milestones.title: The University of South Carolina Joins FitLift as First Major Client
milestones.description: The University of South Carolina Football program chooses to purchase FitLift for their entire weight room. This is our first major client totaling over 20 devices and over 100 athlete accounts and proves our product is of high enough quality for elite competitive programs.

milestones.title: FitLift Wins 2nd in the Syracuse University Orange Tank Business Competition
milestones.description: We take home a cash prize of $2,500 as a result of winning 2nd in our category. This competition has both student and alumni ventures apply, where only 3 are chosen as finalists to compete live on campus for the prizes.

milestones.title: Our Athletes Get First Major Wins
milestones.description:
After only 1 year using our product, two our our athletes have achieved their first wins in major competition. What did they attribute to the success? Better strength training that helped them build the explosive power needed to beat the best, powered by FitLift!
https://www.rouleur.cc/blogs/the-rouleur-journal/how-do-riders-train-to-peak-for-the-tour-de-france-femmes

milestones.title: We Are Admitted Into The Softeq Venture Studio
milestones.description: We receive our first outside investment of $100k to pair with admittance into the Softeq Venture Studio. This Venture Studio is focused around accelerating startups with a hardware/ software component through business development, supply chain optimization, and applicable investor exposure.

milestones.title: We Launch On The App Store
milestones.description: The big day has come, and our product finally got approved for the App Store. After over a year in development and responding to BETA customer feedback, we are ready for our first version to launch!

milestones.title: FitLift Partners With Team DSM
milestones.description:
We completed our first major partnership with Team DSM (previously Team Sunweb). Starting in Q1 of 2021, our product will be used by just under 60 of their cyclists for purposes of weight training. A quote from the Team is included below.
https://www.fitlift.com/blog/welcome-team-dsm

tagline: Hallway Facilitates Richer Employee Connections within the Enterprise
description: Using AI to contextualize and summarize those audio conversations (as well as conversations on existing enterprise platforms) to make actionable. Creating a platform to engage with your colleagues informally (hallway conversations) on either professional and personal topics. Auto-generating profiles to allow employees to build, grow and propagate their personal brand
problem_statement: Hallway is the digital space for employees to build authentic connections, grow their brand and find experts within their company. We do this by leveraging AI to contextualize & summarize audio conversations and generate employee profiles with data gathered from existing enterprise tools (e.g., MS Teams) and water-cooler conversations on our platform.

tagline: The ONLY pharmacy in America not making a margin on medications.
description: • Radically transparent prescription costs.• ScriptCo Pharmacy buys and sells medication at cost.• No “surprise” copay or deductible when the PBM updates their formulary• No restrictions on medication “day supply” - We can fill up to a 90 day supply in most instances.Technology: Open API pharmacy software, medication dispensing robots, CRM software integrated w/pharmacy software, Scriptco.com platform
problem_statement: • Prescription cost transparency – Americans and self funded employer plans have no idea what the real cost of their medication should be.• High Copays/Deductibles – The insured population out of pocket expense has risen year over year. Consumers realize using their insurance for prescriptions can cost more.• Self-funded employer plans can now remove all of the extra cost from their pharmacy benefit portion of health care saving on average $250 per belly button per year by utilizing ScriptCo instead of the traditional insurance ecosystem.• Insurance companies (PBM’s) are continually changing formularies, creating surprise cost for a drug that was once a low costs for that patient.• The uninsured population is having problems affording their medications.• ScriptCo launched its business-to-business platform in July of 2023 and on average is saving self-funded employer plans $250 per belly button per year after paying for all expenses.• The business-to-business platform allows plan sponsors to onboard 1 or 100,000 lives into the ScriptCo ecosystem with the click of a button.

tagline: Pioneering 3D Visualization
description: Founded in 2015, Austin-based small business FoVI3D is dedicated to developing revolutionary 3D visualization technologies to support natural collaboration and enable rapid decision making in high-stress environments. FoVI3D’s PRISM 3-person collaborative workstation is ergonomically designed to allow direct eye access enabling effective communication; provides a configurable 2D touch panel for ease in access to information; and contains a software framework that enables operators to move from an immersive common operational picture mode for all 3 users to an independent view for task specific operations.As pioneers in light-field display visualization, FoVI3D continues to push the envelope  in the research and development of a frameless, tileable, spatial light modulator, the ActiveHogel, designed to accommodate large format light-field displays (LfD) for natural, collaborative 3D visualization without the use of goggles, glasses, or eye-tracking.  FoVI3D has an exceptionable patent portfolio in in collaborative light-field enabling technologies.
problem_statement: The ability to quickly decompose, understand, and interact with complex 3D data provides a significant opportunity to reduce decision time, improve situational understanding, and communicate effectively and efficiently.  With an influx of data and shortened decision windows, the ergonomically designed PRISM 3-person workstation enables collaboration over a shared common 3D visual to facilitate a deeper, richer understanding between users.

tagline: Nudging the next generation of entrepreneurs to launch their first company.
description: I got a gentle nudge to start a company in my 20s and it changed my life. I pay it forward with The Gentle Nudge - a weekly newsletter for anyone who ever wanted to become an entrepreneur.
problem_statement: How many great entrepreneurs have never started a company?**Foundational beliefs:**- healthy entrepreneurship helps us all organize the world a little bit better- becoming an entrepreneur is one of the most transformative and satisfying adventures one can take in their career- there are incredible people out there, humble experts in their respective fields, with unique insights, who would make great entrepreneurs. They’ve just never met anyone to give them a gentle nudge- anyone can learn to be entrepreneur (growth mindset > fixed mindset), they just need a little bit of inspiration, support, love, and attention- VC is a half a trillion dollars asset class chasing “activated entrepreneurs” - people who already self-identified as founders; it seems that not too much money, work, or attention goes into activating “latent entrepreneurs”

tagline: Smart data for hard workers
description: Smart Collar is a B2B SaaS and enterprise data solution for claims and remediation service professionals. Using a combination of GIS data, overlays, and other backend meta the platform is able to generate a targeted list of leads for adjusters, roofers, and restoration contractors to use to find, qualify, and contact potential customers.Their business model is a monthly fee of $99 plus added service purchases.
problem_statement: Public Adjusters who work for the insured (not the insurance companies) can help victims of natural disasters and other claims get the full value of their property loss by providing an independent assessment of the damage. Yet, most people are unaware of their existence, and there aren’t really any services out there to help PAs connect with their customer.

tagline: Feel better, sleep better, and get back to being you.
description: The only wearable that doesn't just track your sleep, it actively improves it 💤 through silent, soothing vibrations. Developed by neuroscientists and physicians. Better health through better sleep.

tagline: Creating the Future of Diagnostic Accessibility  for the Price of a Latte!
description: Developed at Johnson & Johnson's MedTech Center of Device Innovation, Steradian Technologies has invented the first noninvasive, fully-portable infectious disease diagnostic that costs the price of a latte. The RUMI uses novel photon-based detection to collect and diagnose infectious diseases in breath within 30-seconds. The device will be the first human bio-aerosol specimen collector to convert breath into a fully sterile liquid sample, allowing for many applications in direct disease detection.Steradian has won and received grants from the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, Johnson & Johnson, and XPRIZE. The company was named Top 10 Texas Startups and BIPOC Company of the Year in Houston.
problem_statement: Hospitals and insurance companies lose $10M each week on diagnostic inefficiencies that are created by time, labor, and a backlog in testing. Additionally, patients crave diagnostic ease and accessibility to quick testing. The COVID-19 pandemic demonstrated that now is the time to innovate and disrupt how point-of-care diagnostics can fundamentally shift healthcare and create opportunities for fast, inexpensive, and high-tech solutions. The RUMI diagnostic, created by Steradian Technologies diagnosis respiratory disease (COVID-19, Influenza, lung cancer) at the speed of light, all for the cost of a latte -- pre-inflation latte, might we add!

tagline: Insider Threat Defense
description: NUTS Technologies is a dual-use tech company that tackles the challenges of data security in traditional and cloud environments. Their innovative solutions protect sensitive information regardless of location, cloud dependence, or infrastructure limitations. Unlike conventional approaches, NUTS empowers users with secure, independent data storage, sharing, and access control, even in contested or disconnected scenarios. Think of it as "data armor" that keeps your information safe, no matter where the world takes you.
problem_statement: Conventional cybersecurity models offer many products to provide strong network and server perimeters around data. Over time, the complexity of these environments becomes unmanageable and costly due to never ending cycles of iterative upgrades, increasing compatibility challenges, and higher knowledge requirements. Adversaries choose to drill into select weak security perimeters of high-value targets for the best risk-rewards. Conventional security models have failed to prevent many high-profile incidents such as SolarWinds, OPM, Colonial Pipeline, WannaCry, NotPetya and Maersk. Administrators' access to sensitive data has become a growing insider threat risk. Traditional vetting has failed to predict or prevent leaks, such as Snowden, Manning, or the most recent Massachusetts Air National Guard incident.NUTS safeguards critical data and mitigates external and insider threats. NUTS treats data as a first-class citizen, and NUTS eases the burdens of cybersecurity on the operator by automating tasks like advanced encryption, key management and secure data sharing. NUTS security travels with the data so the security profile is cryptographically enforced in any computing node, from data center to the edge, whether network connected or not, thus allowing maximum flexibility for the operator and full assurance to administrators.

milestones.title: Department of Commerce, National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) awards NUTS Tech a SBIR Phase I
milestones.description: The Department of Commerce, National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) develops and promotes measurement, standards, and technology which the DoD and Commercial sectors rely upon for establishing industry standards. A successful performance of this award helps to validate our approach and uniqueness of our technology. The SDFT technology essentially eases the burdens of upgrading ciphers as they change and helps to address President Biden’s NSM-10 goals of easing the burden of transitioning to post-quantum cryptography and beyond. The project goal is to research and develop the capability to integrate NIST post-quantum primitives into SDFT.

milestones.title: Department Air Force awards NUTS Tech a SBIR Phase I for SDFT.
milestones.description: The Department Air Force awarded NUTS Technologies a Open Topic SBIR Phase I on their Structured Data Folding with Transmutation (SDFT) protocol. The goal of this project is to research and develop the ability to integrate the SDFT protocol into existing DAF systems. SDFT is a protocol designed and used by NUTS Technologies in their existing product the NutManager. It’s capabilities eases the transitions between ciphers.

milestones.title: Granted 22nd patent on FHOG
milestones.description: NUTS Technologies was granted their 22nd patent on their NUTS: FLEXIBLE HIERARCHY OBJECT GRAPHS (FHOG)

milestones.title: Department of Defense CDAO Tradewinds Solutions Marketplace: Awardable status
milestones.description: NUTS Technologies deemed “awardable” by the Department of Defense Chief Digital Artificial intelligence Office (CDAO) for their Insider Threat Defense Solution and are listed on the Tradewinds government marketplace.

milestones.title: Department Air Force awards NUTS Technologies an AFWERX SBIR Phase I for Insider Threat Defense
milestones.description: NUTS Technologies announces it has been selected by AFWERX for a Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) Award for phase I in the amount of $74,277 focused on Insider Threat Defense (ITD) to address the most pressing challenges in the Department of the Air Force (DAF). The Air Force Research Laboratory and AFWERX have partnered to streamline the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer (STTR) process by accelerating the small business experience through faster proposal to award timelines, changing the pool of potential applicants by expanding opportunities to small business and eliminating bureaucratic overhead by continually implementing process improvement changes in contract execution. The DAF began offering the Open Topic SBIR/STTR program in 2018 which expanded the range of innovations the DAF funded and now on December 11th, 2023, NUTS Tech will start its journey to create and provide innovative capabilities that will strengthen the national defense of the United States of America.

milestones.title: Department of Defense CDAO Tradewinds Solutions Marketplace: Awardable status
milestones.description:
GAINE solution was evaluated and deemed awardable by DoD SMEs.
The Tradewinds Solutions Marketplace is the flagship offering of Tradewinds, the Department of
Defense’s (DoD’s) suite of tools and services designed to accelerate the procurement and
adoption of Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning, data, and analytics capabilities.

milestones.title: Generative AI security at the endpoint prototype
milestones.description: Built a prototype on top of the NUTS ecosystem to allow AI sessions to be included as chat participants within a secure chat session providing security at the edge for private Generative AI systems.

milestones.title: Flash Memory Summit 2023 Best of Show award winner
milestones.description: At Flash Memory Summit 2023 (FMS23) in Santa Clara, the world’s largest conference in semiconductor technology, NUTS won the most innovative best of show award for the Data Encryption category.

milestones.title: Patent Grant #16
milestones.description:
Received 6th US Patent grant US 11720716.
16th patent/acceptance overall globally.

milestones.title: NutRouter network mesh prototype
milestones.description: Prototype of network mesh of NutRouters allowing immense dynamic scalability.

milestones.title: 2nd small business client
milestones.description: second small business added to our client base with licensing of up to 5 users

milestones.title: USSOCOM Technical Event Exhibitor
milestones.description: NUTS was selected for participation at TE 23-3 under Data security, transport, and processing category at the USSOCOM Technical Experimentation Event TE 23-3 at the Emerging Technology Institute (ETI) in Red Springs, NC

milestones.title: Commercial product launch
milestones.description: initial commercial offering of the NutManager via website

milestones.title: Beta version launched
milestones.description: released beta version including insider threat protection capabilities

milestones.title: Patent Grant #1
milestones.description: 1st US Patent granted. US 10503933

tagline: A software company powering product and ingredient intelligence. We help companies save time and money while improving food.
description: Journey Foods builds enterprise technology that improves product management, ingredient intelligence and distribution growth for CPG companies, ingredient suppliers, and manufacturers. With a focus on saving companies money and time, Journey Foods' tools accelerate innovation and improve decision-making with JourneyAI nutrition and supply chain insights.
problem_statement: • $3 Trillion food production problem, 8 Billion people to Feed• The packaged food dilemma - Not enough technology to make good food for 8 billion people• Barriers to better products - 38,042 People / 1 Food Scientist, lack of focus on nutrition, supply chain stress, poor data and insights, not sustainable

tagline: Workout tracker & social community
description: - Successfully built a prototype- 90% the way to a finished MVP ready for market- App is 100% bootstrapped

tagline: Make the city your billboard
description: We're making it easy for anyone to purchase ad-inventory for digital outdoor campaigns within Rideshare and other high-traffic formats. More than just ads, we're building intelligence around how that campaign reaches audiences across an array of connected displays, and allowing advertisers to trace their spend in real-time in meaningful ways like live locations of viewers.When we broke down the composition of the outdoor advertising industry we found that around 60% of the media spend is from local businesses. We found out that less than 4% of the outdoor transit format displays are digital. So what does that process look like for 60% of the industry? Largely a manual process that has some serious GAPS in terms of cost, accessibility, sophistication, and measurability.
problem_statement: Outdoor advertising is an extremely effective tool for increasing store visitation / brand awareness in real-time, but no platform has been meaningfully  invented to help local and regional businesses tap into this inventory on-demand via Rideshare and other formats where audiences are in transit.

company_name: Revolutionizing Digital Asset Security and Inheritance Planning
tagline: Revolutionizing estate planning through AI, Cryptography & Smart contracts
description: We have created a revolutionary zero-trust digital vault that utilizes state-of-the-art cryptographic algorithms, multi-party compute (MPC), and AI-powered biometric identity validations to effectively safeguard confidential information.CryptoLegacy.ai is leveraging this technology to transform the legacy and estate planning industry by providing robust security for crypto keys and NFTs, while also facilitating inheritance planning through seamless integration with blockchain and smart contracts. Our aim is to revolutionize the way individuals manage and protect and pass on their digital assets for future generations.
problem_statement: Digital Assets emerged as a new asset class ($1T in wealth) and the legal inheritance of digital assets is almost non-existent.  Trustees need a way to access the keys/wallets of their trustors after their demise. Estate lawyers and wealth managers need a key disbursement solution for their (self-custody) clients. Crypto exchanges don't have a legacy solution in place. It will cost them a lot of time, money and effort to establish legacy planning, without any direct benefit to top-line revenue. Crypto custody solutions in the market require the handover of the keys. Most retail investors don’t like to lose flexibility and control. Self-custody owners resort to a multitude of insecure options such as writing down the secrets or sharing with friends.Our comprehensive solution stack is designed to address the unique challenges faced by individuals, trustees, and crypto exchanges when it comes to safeguarding and protecting digital assets, including cryptocurrencies and NFTs. We provide a range of robust solutions that ensure the secure management and preservation of these valuable digital assets, offering peace of mind and enhanced security for all stakeholders involved.

milestones.title: 10 Customer Interviews, product review and feedback
milestones.description: Conduct 10 customer interviews. Showcase the product and gather feedback and testimonials.

tagline: The missing piece to unleash the robotics revolution
description: We are building a robotic arm to do what only humans can do today, but at a lower cost. Our unique advantage is replacing electric motors with our patented artificial muscles, allowing for unprecedented dexterity with low weight and low power. Combining high-dexterity with the current advances in AI will unleash the robotics revolution.
problem_statement: Mega industries depend on manual labor to deliver their products or services. They are experiencing unprecedented labor shortages and fierce competition. They know they must automate to survive global competitiveness, but there is a huge gap between the capabilities of current robotic systems and human labor.Elysium solves THE fundamental problem holding back the robotics revolution: Actuation.Through our innovative muscle-like actuators, we can build robots with human-level dexterity that are lightweight and, therefore, safe for human collaboration.  By giving robots dexterous fingers, we extend their capabilities in automation environments, increasing their value. And because of the low cost of our systems, we reduce their total cost of ownership.  Together, this greatly increases the ROI of robotic systems and enables massive-scale deployment.In the short term, we will provide our 'Robots as a Service' to address low-skilled occupations that demand fine motor skills, such as fruit packing and machine tending. In the long term, we will integrate our robotic hands with generative AI to automate higher-skilled tasks like assembly, manufacturing and beyond.Other opportunities include prosthetics, were our muscle-like actuators enable fully dexterous bionic hands that are lightweight, silent, low-cost, and uniquely personalized to each individual.

tagline: The revolution of OOH advertising media
description: Espaciales is a tool that connects brands and agencies with the best OOH spaces reinventing the buying process, making it a more attractive an effective media.
problem_statement: Out of home (OOH) Media has great impact but is a very tradicional industry. A fragmented market with no data witch makes campaign planning and media buying a slow and tedious process.We help companies understand where is their audience, and from there our algorithm selects best spaces to impact in the most efficient way. And from here we provide a one-stop-shop for every vendor.

tagline: Advancing Manufacturing to Advance Humanity
description: Solideon layers off-the-shelf robotics with proprietary software that creates multi-robotic, autonomous micro-factories that are capable of 3D printing, post processing, assembling, and inspecting entire structures and vehicles without human intervention. We work with companies to improve lead times, reduce weight, improve performance, and reduce costs for what they need.
problem_statement: Historically, manufacturing was time, cost, and labor intensive. For technologically driven industries like aerospace, energy, and automotive this comes at the cost of innovation. A plurality of the OEMs, primes, and high-growth startups in the modern era are building the technology of the future on 50-100 year old supply chains. This culminates to 5-10+ year long manufacturing timelines when factoring design engineering, procurement, fulfillment, assembly, and testing that we have normalized.When the pandemic exposed domestic manufacturing capabilities and international supply chain predicaments, it was clear that western countries faced more issues. The unit economics of defense, space, and other heavy industries is at an all time low, and many vendors have gone out of business or changed focus. The ability to maintain vehicles, let alone develop additional vehicles is incredibly costly and timely, especially in harsher environments like on a battleship, in space, or by an oil rig.

milestones.title: Leap 71 Partnership Agreement
milestones.description: Solideon and LEAP 71 have signed an agreement to design and produce multi-meter-scale hardware for space applications. The two companies will work together to build large metal structures with the eventual goal of enabling off-planet production. LEAP 71 and Solideon have been collaborating for the past year to interface between LEAP 71’s proprietary Computational Engineering Models (CEM), which are generative frameworks for building sophisticated physical objects, and Solideon’s large-size collaborative robotic metal manufacturing technology, Aperture.

milestones.title: Delivered on first commercial contract
milestones.description: Printed a propulsion tank for Fenix Space

milestones.title: Awarded contract from AFRL
milestones.description: Awarded a Phase I STTR from AFRL.

tagline: Better for you snacking & comfort foods
description: Credo makes better for you nostalgic snacking & comfort foods sold nationwide at Whole Foods, Wegman's, HEB, and hundreds of restaurants across the country, using only ingredients sourced from plants. Credo is delivering healthier options for a world in need of smarter foods that take into account sustainable, clean options for adults and children alike.
problem_statement: The world is struggling with record numbers of obesity, heart disease, diabetes, and other diet-related diseases.  Credo believes that change happens one plate at a time.  Credo has created better for you snacking & comfort foods that don't sacrifice the standard American diet taste, yet delivers foods made entirely of plant-based ingredients.

tagline: G2DT.AI Corporation
description: PALGenie is a Closed-AI, Employee Learning, and Proficiency Platform & Productivity Suite. PALGenie is comprised of 4 primary, road-tested solutions:PALTutor - designed to speed up employee training and proficiency;PALAssist - designed to provide corpus-specific, quick answers for domain-specific questions;PALCX - an AI-driven customer support helper; andPALExpert - AI-driven co-pilots designed to automate micro-tasks.PALGenie was designed to streamline the inefficiencies from slow employee onboarding and proficiency training and a lack of real-time, personalized, on-the-job training tools. PAL tools learn from the internal corpus of organizations and further tuning itself with user inputs to become a better trainer of those users.
problem_statement: Fortune 1,000 organizations are challenged to build employee proficiency - especially in regulated domains where there are often complicated process dependencies and complicated enterprise systems. The time to proficiency and time lost due to lack of ongoing proficiency costs organizations billions annually. The lack of employee knowledge not only causes poorer metrics around customer issue resolution, which reflects in lower CSAT and NPS, as well as increasing employee attrition; it can also affect the overall corporate reputation and hurt the brand as a whole.

milestones.title: GTM Model Validated
milestones.description:
‘23: Sell-Through Model Proven to Work: 
OVERVIEW: PAL sells to Business Process Outsourcing (BPO) companies. BPO companies place trained employees within enterprise organizations to augment and scale their operations. BPO companies use PAL to help their (BPO) employees reach proficiency faster.
Three Brands working with two different PAL BPO Clients asked to deploy PAL solutions on their internal employees after seeing the performance of the outsourced BPO employees. A top-10 Non-Bank Financial Brand, a top-10 Communication Brand, and a top-10 Healthcare Brand now use PAL to improve their internal employee performance. Adding Brands using PAL validates the PAL GTM model where our services will Sell Through our BPO Clients to the BPO Brands.

tagline: Revterra is developing a scalable, long-duration energy storage solution to enable large scale penetration of renewable power sources.
description: We are developing an ultra-efficient kinetic energy storage system for utility scale applications. Our enabling technology is a passive magnetic bearing system which allows for efficiencies matching lithium ion batteries with much longer lifespan and lower environmental impact.
problem_statement: Available battery technology cannot meet the demand for utilityscale energy storage. Renewable energy sources require significant storage tomoderate output. Lithium ion batteries are utilized in some cases but their cost, short lifespan, and supply chain issues will prevent adoption on a massive scale

tagline: the quickest, easiest on-demand satellite photo and video app

problem_statement: SkyFi is the first company to democratize satellite image ordering and delivery by establishing unique partnerships with satellite operators, lowering cost throughhigher utilization, and being transparent with pricing.

tagline: IndustLabs has been building and integrating Industrial Automation solutions for industries such as Food & Beverage, Oil & Gas, Automotive Manufacturers, and more. Beyond services and automation IndustLabs is a full-scale manufacturer of Electrical Control Panels.
description: IndustLabs is a full-service provider of custom or off the shelf electrical control panels. Their control panels host a large variety of data that can be crucial to a company’s future IoT plans. Using a hardware IoT Gateway in each Control Panel, they can convert legacy data types, such as ModBus, to modern Ethernet / MQTT data-grams. This IoT Gateway can integrate with an existing IoT platforms or with their IoT platform built for scale in Amazon’s AWS Cloud.

tagline: Affordable flight simulation for all
description: Fly-a-Sim will make these experiences available to everyone, regardless of skill level or age.It will be a new and exciting entertainment venue  for the entire family.With the release of MSFS 2020 and the new Top Gun movie, Fly-a-Sim will be in a very good position to attract scores of clients.We will have a 737 sim as well as 4 F18 jet fighter sims, ideal for a dog fight scenario,  team buildings or just a solo landing on an aircraft carrier.
problem_statement: Affordable flight sim experiences in South Africa is extremely difficult to come by and usually only available at training simulators owned by airline companies.

tagline: World's first booking and financing marketplace for the wedding industry
description: Wedy is the world's first two-sided marketplace that helps couples to plan and book incredible wedding packages. We offer wedding business owners the tools to sell packages, create invoices and manage bookings in a centralized platform.
problem_statement: The wedding industry is too niche: In today's Uber and Airbnb world, modern couples expect more then yellow-page style directory with photos and reviews; they want the ability to take an actionable step — to book the person they like on the platform.On the other side, Vendors have invoicing software for payments. But they lack the front-end marketplace for consumers to discover their services, which further fragments the industry.Traditional wedding companies target couples or vendors, but not both. None of our competitors (The Knot Worldwide, Zola, Honeybook) are in the transaction of services in this industry as they have gone deep and wide into being consumer (or) vendor focused.As an Architect and design mastermind, Rumaiza designed the UI/UX of the Wedy App and Anas built the platform. With less than $185K raised with a friends and family round, Wedy has achieved a 596% YoY Growth in 2022, bringing in $1.8M in sales since its launch.In 2023, Wedy closed the year strong by bringing in $1.2M in revenue.

tagline: Keep Your Data Safe and AI Operations Secure
description: Preamble provides enterprises a user friendly AI Security Operations platform to use, secure, and monitor AI systems.

tagline: Digital marketplace for the next-generation of creative side-hustles
description: Students can easily list their side-hustle, set their own schedule & prices, and gain instant exposureto their peers and small businesses looking for affordable talent in their launched app.
problem_statement: We are ending the "broke college student narrative," by providing a way for students to make money on their own terms.Currently, Fiverr, UpWork, and other gig-economy platforms do not cater to the audience of these Gen-Z college students. This creates an environment where they do not feel seen, nor adequately supported in starting a new side-hustle.At the same time, we are seeing historically tight labor shortages. Many small businesses are looking to grow their marketing efforts in a cost-efficient, yet impactful way. Gen-Z's (18-24 years old) are the perfect candidates for digital marketing as they are native to these platforms.Through Clutch we connect the two.

tagline: Digital Triplet for IoT/OT
description: ByteTrail is using the latest technology, standards and protocols to create a comprehensive digital triplet of a company's IoT/OT networks. Complete visibility of all devices is a requirement and oncoming regulatory will require audits of software supply chains. Digital twins are representations of physical world systems, but the addition of machine learning and GenAI creates a constantly updating environment.
problem_statement: Industrial Internet of Things (IoT) devices have proliferated in the last decade. However, the infrastructure to support them is immature at best.  Research has shown that 75% of these devices installed all over the world, and running our critical infrastructure have NEVER been updated (firmware, passwords, O/S, applications and more). Worse, we know that 70% of cyberattacks are using IoT networks to traverse laterally in targeted companies.ByteTrail is building the software ecosystem to provide automatic and continuous device update capability at the edge. Firmware, O/S, applications and configurations are changed remotely and autonomously. AI cannot be performed accurately at the edge without this capability.This is one of the last IT functions that needs full automation, and it is enabled by current technology.

tagline: Tow Trucks in Space

Our systems also serve as additional redundancy for existing systems that mitigate the risks of critical system failures and provide an immediate alternative to deploying replacement satellites.

They cost $100M++ to develop and deploy but are abandoned in orbit at their end of life, either after running out of fuel or experiencing a system failure. The ability to salvage these assets would revolutionize satellite operations.

tagline: We help tech companies to always meet product development deadlines on time and budget, by connecting them with thousands of available vetted software engineers already working at DevHouses in LATAM.
description: Web platform where tech companies upload the technical profile they are looking for and in less than 24 hours receive candidates for one-on-one interviews. Once they choose to hire one they will pay via Simbiosis, no matter the location of the software engineer, following a monthly scheme for the time they needed. This way they can increase or decrease their tech team on demand. On the other hand our partners, DevHouses in LATAM, would be able to apply to our platform and once accepted start uploading the technical profiles of their software engineers that are available to be assigned full-time to remote projects. We add a 10% fee to the monthly cost per engineer assigned. We provide free online courses to our partners in order to improve their technical capacities and provide a better service.
problem_statement: Tech companies need top developers on short notice. Due to various demands of a project, SMBs don’t always need a full staff. Most contracts to date with developers are on a long-term, fully employed status. This is rather costly and inefficient use of both a developers time and a business’s budget.

tagline: SECURITY WITHOUT COMPROMISE
description: The company protects privileged data and enterprise communications through industry-leading communication technologies, having developed a unique encryption protocol that uses Messaging Layer Security (MLS) and Post-Quantum Cryptography (PQC) to offer unmatched security while less data than any other platform. SENTRIQS makes its protocol available for integration into third-party applications through Software Development Kits (SDKs) and as part of its ultra-secure collaboration platform, Glyph.
problem_statement: + Quantum computers capable of cracking all legacy encryption schemes are expected to arrive by 2030.Quantum computers capable of cracking all legacy encryption schemes are expected to arrive by 2030.+ Quantum computers capable of cracking all legacy encryption schemes are expected to arrive by 2030.+ Data is being harvested and stored today to be cracked in the future, and information can be valuable or dangerous for a long time.+ Existing communications platforms employ weak security measures, rely on dated security algorithms and only upgrade under regulatory pressure or after a breach.+ Quantum-proof encryption greatly increases data overhead, making scaling into large groups difficult.

tagline: Organically Grow by Repurposing Content at Scale

Businesses, media agencies, and media influencers must be able to capitalize on their content effectively. The problem is for long-form videos, the process of repurposing content is clunky and slow. Editors and marketing teams jump from platform to platform, unsuccessfully trying to integrate editing, captioning, resizing, templates, hashtags, posting, and associated written content into the workflow. The result is that firms bleed time and money trying to accomplish a task that is crucial to content strategy but also insanely difficult. Instead of spending time creating better content, they spend time repurposing. This leads to poor customer engagement, conversions, organic reach, and brand identity.

problem_statement: Physical security teams are often understaffed and struggle to provide enough awareness of large sites, such as logistics hubs, manufacturing plants, and corporate campuses.  Robotics lend a novel solution against typical security methods at a lower price point.
