milestones.title: GXO Case Study: A Data-Driven Security Robotics Program
milestones.description:
Risk Issues And Mitigation Opportunities:
GXO is responsible for billions of dollars in assets and revenues. Ensuring that customers can resiliently distribute their products in an effective, efficient, and timely manner enables world-class service level agreements. The GXO security team was looking for an innovative solution for their perimeter security operations that addressed oversight of key risk mitigation opportunities including:
Enhanced visual security risk, threat, and vulnerability coverage in and around large distribution centers and warehouses with many potential access points.
Optimized autonomous support of security officers to mitigate a country-wide labor shortage.
Improved reliability for observing and reporting alarms, anomalies, and mitigation responses.
Improved brand value protection through more effective security response, asset protection, and risk management procedures.
Created a safer environment for employees and contractors by using robotic solutions rather than personnel to investigate security alarms.
Delivered value to shareholders by optimizing corporate security costs and prioritizing solutions that are scalable while providing an ROI.
Built a layered security solution to effectively protect people, assets, and stakeholder interests.
Created a flexible and repeatable process for detecting, investigating, reporting, and responding to alarms while lowering the liability risk of people (contractors, employees, first responders, visitors) in the process.
DroneDog and DroneSentry conducting an alarm security response mission.
Solution Requirements:
Automated drone system to include a battery swap capability for back-to-back security missions with less than 5 minutes of downtime. Note: All other drone-in-a-box systems have a ~40-minute downtime to fully charge by using an inductive charging system rather than battery swap.
24/7/365 customer support.
Remote monitoring capability with real-time video feeds and tele-operable drones/robotics at near-real-time speeds (less than .5 second latency).
A dedicated Robotic Security Operations Center (RSOC) for remote monitoring and operations.
Automated remote software updates.
Consistently scheduled maintenance plan to enable system reliability throughout the length of the multi-year contracts.
OPEX costing structure.
A clear regulatory path to receive Beyond Visual Line-of-Sight (BVLOS) waivers from the Federal Aviation Administration.

milestones.title: GXO enhances security and safety with high-tech DroneDog and Aerial Drone System from Asylon
milestones.description:
GXO Logistics, Inc. (NYSE: GXO), the world’s largest pure-play contract logistics provider, announced today that it has deployed advanced air and ground security robotics at one of its major distribution centers in Clayton, Ind., and plans to significantly increase deployment of automated security systems across other sites within the next year. This would be the largest air and ground security robotics fleet in the world. The DroneDog and DroneSentry duo, integrated with the DroneCore security platform from Asylon, Inc., are security technologies of the future, providing high-quality data and onsite activity updates that can detect potential issues in real time and simultaneously report them to the security team. Click here to see the DroneDog in action.
“We launched the DroneDog and DroneSentry advanced security system at a customer’s facility that is more than 1 million square feet and requires a 24/7 security presence to safeguard our people and the products,” said Thomas Nelson, Senior Director of Security at GXO. “The combination of air and ground robotics gives us superb live video feed, including infrared vision for nighttime patrols, that we can operate, evaluate and respond to in real time.”
GXO has already used these robotic assets to conduct more than 12,000 patrols or first-responder missions. The company also has used these robotic assets to investigate and clear alarms, as well as complete video-verified security audits, saving miles of walk time for team members. This technology is detecting potential issues in real time while making the environment safer for team members and securing the customer’s products.

milestones.title: Asylon Scores BVLOS Waiver for Automated Security Drone System
milestones.description:
This  week, leading air and ground robotic security company Asylon, Inc. revealed that it has been granted three beyond visual line of sight (BVLOS) waivers from the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA).Pertaining to the company’s automated security drone-in-a-box system and service, these waivers will authorize Asylon to conduct BVLOS operations within four initial sites around the U.S. Though similar waivers have been granted to groups such as Google’s Wing, Zipline, Xcel Energy, and Matternet, this is the first time a waiver of this class has been granted for an automated security drone system.
Asylon first worked alongside the FAA in February 2020 as part of the BEYOND Program, then known as the UAS Integration Pilot Program, when the company deployed its automated DroneSentry system at Memphis International Airport for FedEx Express.

tagline: Augmenting Human Potential
description: We create autonomous drone inspection solutions for aerospace, defense, and space verticals using industry-leading AI models for anomaly detection. We don't like the status quo, in fact, we are reimagining the workforce and alleviating the pressure placed on some of our most critical infrastructures.Rizse has developed a vertically integrated, fully autonomous drone inspection platform for the aerospace & defense market. By automating the visual inspection process, we can reduce aircraft inspection time by 90% while augmenting the already strained inspector market. Our system is the next step to automating digital workflows and tooling for aircraft & spacecraft maintenance providers and eliminating costly repetitive work between technicians and administration.

tagline: How every Realtor® starts the day!
description: Introducing Agnt, the 'Do This' app for every real estate professional. Our AI-powered co-pilot delivers personalized guidance for every agent's next action.With over 4,000 agents currently benefiting from our data analysis, and a projected reach of 17,000 by June 2024, we're at the forefront of generating, aggregating, and analyzing valuable insights.Agnt offers a free app for simple tasks like writing listing descriptions and posting ads. Leveraging hundreds of data streams, we assist agents in understanding their precise next best action. Our platform automates the creation and hosting of luxury branded websites, PPC ads, dynamic retargeting, auto-generated SEO content, and blog posts. With a flywheel-type upsell strategy fully automated, powered by the same AI, Agnt helps agents respond to inquiries, inform clients of market shifts, all at extreme scale.
problem_statement: Realtors excel in relationships, not tech or data. Yet, their online presence, CRM usage, ads, and client searches generate abundant, underutilized data, causing missed revenue chances. Despite having access to crucial fragmented data, most lack a guiding co-pilot to steer them toward optimal business actions.

description: For the underserved Latino business and fastest-growing segment of the US Market; Trez is an all-in-one solution providing Payroll, Benefits, and Finance.
problem_statement: The problem Trez is trying to solve is how complicated and costly payroll operations can be. Not only that, but payroll services lack human relationships and support for Latino and Hispanic culture and language.Relevance of the problem and why it needs a solution now:The fastest-growing workforce is Latino, and Latino businesses are launching and growing at an accelerated rate.Although California’s Retirement Mandate requires businesses with 5 or more employees to offer 401k or payroll-administered IRA, 50% of the US workforce does not have retirement via employer-sponsored plans. This number increases to 69% for the US Latino workforce. 13 other states have similar mandates, and this is an expanding trend across the country.

tagline: Elite Sweets makes low-carb, high-protein donuts for consumers who want to enjoy a guilt-free, sweet treat.
description: Elite Sweets makes low-carb, high-protein donuts for consumers who want to enjoy a guilt-free, sweet treat. Elite Sweets creates a healthy alternative to the sugary treats on the market. Currently, they sell the donut in 3 flavors: Chocolate, Cinamon, and Birthday Cake. The donuts each have up to 13g of protein, between 1g - 6g of net carbs, and are all gluten-free and keto friendly.
problem_statement: Americans consume the most sugar on this planet per capita, resulting in over 71% of Americans being obese, 34.2M Americans have diabetes, 28M Americans have heart disease.

tagline: Surface Engineering Research and Development Company located in Fayetteville, Arkansas
description: SurfTec is a privately held company formed in 2015 to commercialize the patented low-friction technology pioneered by the company founders, Dr. Samuel Beckford, CEO, and Dr. Min Zou, CTO. The vision of SurfTec is to pioneer the development of innovative material surfaces based on nanotechnology. The team’s background in Surface Engineering, Materials Science, Tribology, and Nanomechanics and involvement in academic research is a significant advantage for continuous innovation.  SurfTec has been awarded a National Science Foundation Small Business Innovation Research Phase I and II grant and the Department of Energy’s Next Generation of Electric Machines: Enabling Technologies grant to commercialize its patented low-friction technology.At SurfTec, we develop polymer nanoparticle composite low-friction coatings that can be used at extreme temperatures and in caustic environments. The vision of SurfTec is to reduce/eliminate oil consumption in mechanical systems by employing its low-friction coating as a protective layer to prevent metal-on-metal contact in mechanical systems. The successful transition from traditional lubricants to SurfTec's coating in manufacturing has tremendous implications for the US economy and the environment.

tagline: Build a network worth bragging about
description: Humblebrag is a relationship engagement tool that turns a founder’s private network into the the ultimate resource for their company. We do this by giving founders a private workspace that enables them to ask the right people, at the right time for the right kind of help when they need it. All in one place.
problem_statement: It is tedious and time consuming for entrepreneurs to know who in their network to reach out to for help when they face a challenge.

tagline: Powers Apple, Microsoft device trade-in and upgrade programs. Also leases MacBooks to startups.
High-speed, low-cost drones
description: AeroParagon LLC is developing a Group 1 UAS capable of 140+ mph speeds, with the ability to carry 1 kg of modular lethal/nonlethal payload. Product is a small-business developed drone 10” by 10” in size with a weight of 1.5 lbs. Cost estimated at $3,000 per unit, range estimated at 3-5 nautical miles with flight times around 3-5 minutes based on payload size and flight speed. Goal to be ATAK integrated and also optionally support RF/GPS denied operating theaters. Swarm deployable (dependent on funding) or solo unit capable. Plan to implement a buy-back program for crashed/broken drones to increase sustainability, minimize troop training/testing cost, and decrease reliance on foreign raw materials.
problem_statement: Instead of building an expensive UAS for specialized cameras and long flight times, AeroParagon LLC focuses on extreme speed, versatile payloads, and minimal cost.

tagline: Cybrik’s project intelligence platform helps engineering and construction project team make better and faster decisions, reducing risk and resulting in significant improvements in cost and schedule performance.
description: The team at Cybrik has spent a combined 35+ years in delivering on engineering & construction projects with companies such as NOV, SOFEC, and Oceaneering and know the challenges inherent to the existing project management processes.They built a cloud-based SaaS project management platform for large construction projects which helps teams monitor the project data pipeline and alerts them to any changes or variations made, quickly find the data needed to do the job correctly, and quickly identify any changes made to project documents. They estimate this will provide ~$3M of value for a $100M project.
problem_statement: Large, complex construction projects are primarily managed via a hodgepodge of software including email (yes, email), pdfs, spreadsheets, and more. It’s a headache to sort through, and worse, information can slip through the cracks leading to costly mistakes.

tagline: Re-imagining and disrupting the practice of immigration law | Advanced AI for drafting and research.
description: Visalaw.ai is a cutting-edge AI software platform for immigration professionals.  Our key mission is to disrupt and re-imagine the practice of immigration law.  Our platform currently offers tools focusing on research, complex drafting, and automation.Visalaw.ai is a spinoff company of an established immigration law firm, Siskind Susser P.C. The company was founded in 2020 and made our AI platform available to legal professionals in January 2024.
problem_statement: U.S. immigration services demand extensive, time-consuming writing, which strains law firms' resources and reduces margins. Firms either absorb the costs or pass them on to clients, making services less accessible.Our solution is to offer an advanced AI platform to lawyers (which handles legal research, complex drafting, and automation) that can help complete immigration petitions that usually take at least 15 hours, in 15 minutes.

tagline: Orchestra connects the pieces to ensure patients receive high quality, coordinated care
description: We're improving care coordination for outpatient surgeries, which leads to lower cancellation rates and higher revenue for facilities.Orchestra Health is a telehealth service that offloads managing prepping a patient for surgery from the surgeon. We standardize patient intake & triage, manage documentation prior to surgery, and facilitate transitions post-surgery.
problem_statement: Preparing for surgery is complex and requires stakeholders to coordinate quickly. Multiple steps need to be completed before surgery; when the process breaks surgery is delayed, which costs the providers millions of dollars a year and harms patients. This system is expensive to maintain and breaks often.

tagline: The enterprise platform for real-world AI
description: Worlds is building the enterprise platform for real-world AI. Our software brings AI-based Automation directly into the physical operations of the world's largest industrial companies. Companies like Chevron, Werner Industries, and Timken Steel are all using Worlds today to measure, analyze, and build AI-based automation into their physical operations at scale. Worlds is creating AI as infrastructure and bringing AI and automation to the base layer of new organizational structure. Our new software, WorldsNQ is flipping the entire AI training industry from a top-down, human-in-the-loop process to a bottom-up, fully automated AI system. For the first time ever, organizations can convert the data from their existing cameras and sensors into a live data stream that they can use to measure and build AI-based automation directly into their physical operations. WorldsNQ is a completely unsupervised AI that is more accurate, more comprehensive, and 100X faster than any current market solution. AI training projects that take 3-6 months to complete today are done in hours with NQ.
problem_statement: To date, there has not been a way for large organizations to measure and improve their real-world environment.Our focus is on large industrial companies in the center of the supply chain, primarily manufacturing, distribution, and logistics, helping them solve their most difficult operational problems. As these large industrials are growing larger and faster than they ever have before, their ability to observe, analyze, affect, and de-risk operations at scale has become untenable.Compounding the problem are narrow-point solutions, and they are everywhere-  mostly computer vision companies, Digital twin providers, or sensor companies all making claims that, even if they were true, address only a tiny sliver of a much larger problem. What’s really needed is one place where they can all come together (cameras, sensors, AI, people processes) and that’s exactly what we have built with the Worlds platform. We have spoken with Digital Transformation teams all over the world and what we’ e been told consistently is that what they want is consolidation.

tagline: On a mission to stop recurring cancer
description: SingleCell Biotechnology, has developed a breakthrough platform to stop the recurrence of cancer.Our platform helps clinicians and drug companies assess underlying cells responsible for recurrence so that new drugs and treatments can be realized.
problem_statement: Cancer recurrence is responsible for far too many cancer deaths due to the resistant and aggressive behavior of recurring cancer.  Current drug development models utilize cancer information based on the primary tumor but contain very little, if any,  information with regard to cancer stem cells responsible for recurrence.  We need a way to test and treat cancer stem cells responsible for recurrence in order to provide better information about patient tumors AND to develop new drugs to combat recurrence.

milestones.title: Hired Key employees
milestones.description:
Senior Scientist
Data Engineer

milestones.title: CPRIT SEED Grant Award ($2.5M) to optimize assays and demonstrate usefulness for drug development.
milestones.description: Awarded CPRIT Grant for $2.5M to further the optimization of the plaform assays and demonstrate drug development in finding new biomarkers to combat difficult cancers.

milestones.title: Platform tested on primary tumor cells
milestones.description: Platform successfully tested with primary tumor cells direct from operating room to show that it has the ability to be used as a diagnostic device.

milestones.title: 4 well device version of platform ready for production
milestones.description: 4 well device version of platform devices made ready for production, past the prototype stage.

milestones.title: Demonstrated platform use case with re-purposed drug
milestones.description: Demonstrated that the platform can be used to identify re-purposed drugs that can be used to enhance or provide improved treatment outcomes.

milestones.title: Tested effectiveness of current drugs and radiation against non-dividing cells
milestones.description: Used platform to demonstrate how current drugs and radiation have little to no effect on migrating and dormant cancer cells.  Further showing that current treatments targeting rapidly dividing cells leave this lethal population of non-dividing cells behind.

milestones.title: Successful platform test with Breast and Glioblastoma PDX cell lines
milestones.description: Platform successfully demonstrated on prototype devices to demonstrate single cell dormancy, migration, and clonogenic assays with both Glioblastoma (brain) cancer and breast cancer patient derived cell lines.

tagline: A Step Into the Universe
description: Celestis, Inc. is the iconic global pioneer and leader in memorial spaceflights.  We offer a uniquely compelling service  - launching a symbolic portion of an individual’s cremated remains or DNA sample to space as a commemorative celebration of life. The company utilizes prominent space launch and spacecraft providers including SpaceX and United Launch Alliance (ULA) to provide four primary services:•	Earthrise (sub-orbital flights),•	Earth Orbit (orbital flights),•	Luna (flights to the Moon),•	Voyager (deep-space missions).
problem_statement: Celestis operates at the intersection of two rapidly growing industries: commercial space and funeral/memorial services, particularly in cremation. The rising global cremation rate, especially in the U.S. where it has grown from 4% in 1960 to 63% today, opens new avenues for memorialization. Many families are seeking innovative ways to commemorate their loved ones, with Celestis offering a highly symbolic and adventurous alternative to traditional funerals. As the space industry has expanded with more frequent and cost-effective launches, Celestis is poised to grow its market share by providing a unique, emotionally resonant service.

milestones.title: First Round of Funding
milestones.description: Our first-round fundraising goal was $650,000. We oversubscribed and raised $700,000.

tagline: We connect everything
Building largest real-world blockchain application in healthcare
description: EVER has built a new operating system for healthcare providers underpinned by a blockchain-secured health information exchange (HIE). Patients can download a digital health wallet which seamlessly interfaces with provider networks allowing patients to directly access telehealth offerings through their EVER app. Importantly, patients own all of their health information and EVER provides monetization opportunities (health data marketplace) from pharma and other stakeholders seeking to work with large-scale patient data.
problem_statement: Patients do not own their personal health data creating a fractured health data ownership landscape which results in severe bottlenecks due to a lack of interoperability and data portability across a sprawling health system. The market for provider systems (e.g. electronic health records) and tools (clinical decision support) is still largely dominated by poor quality legacy systems. There is little opportunity for AI/ML approaches to work with data from these systems preventing health breakthroughs.

tagline: We Power Fitness.
description: Fitness and wellness industry's lead AI-driven engagement platform.
problem_statement: With the explosion of new fitness and wellness solutions available to consumers, fitness and wellness operators have faced record challenges in retaining their members and clients. Our target audience is looking for new ways to seamlessly engage members, with the ultimate goal of increasing retention and in-club revenue streams.MotionVibe’s introductory product is an industry-leading group fitness management platform, connecting health club members to the products, services and staff most meaningful to them. We do this through dynamic mobile apps, advanced analytics for club operators, and integration with dozens of third-party applications. We’re expanding to offer an AI-powered full-service business enterprise solution to include payment processing, membership sales, and online sales of products & services.

tagline: HOHM provides on-demand sleep pods for Hospitals, Airports, and Universities, bookable via mobile phone/tablet.
description: HOHM provides on-demand sleep pods for Hospitals, Airports, and Universities, bookable via mobile phone/tablet. HOHM pod specs: 43.5 sq ft. (7.25 ft x 7.25 ft x 6 ft) sleep pod, twin size mattress (From Tempur Sealy), easily sanitized surfaces, privacy and sound blocking curtain, charging ports for cell phones and laptops.  Assembly time only takes 3-4 hours and plugs into standard outlet.
problem_statement: Sleep deprivation is a major problem with healthcare workers; doctors working 30 hour on call shifts, nurses working 7pm to 7am shifts and sleeping in their cars on their break, the floor, the stories go on and on. This creates large safety risks for both the staff and patients. This same problems also apply to other use cases such as universities and airport, where finding a safe and convenient place to sleep is hard.

tagline: Building AI First Responders
description: C8 Labs is a public safety technology company focused on automating skills a few individuals possess globally through the use of artificial intelligence (AI). These skills are crucial to law enforcement agencies, dedicated search and rescue organizations, FEMA groups supporting disaster relief efforts, and even applications for military operators and future space exploration. From [human] remains identification, to mantracking, and real-time analysis of drone video, these skills require many years of training and hands-on instruction from a small group of experts. As a result, our capabilities in the field are often limited and getting confirmation from experts results in delays, which can mean the difference between life and death.
problem_statement: In the US, more than 600k people go missing annually [NamUS]. Skills required to locate missing persons are highly specialized and require extensive training from a small group of experts [NASAR]. As a result, our capabilities in the field are often quite limited and getting confirmation from the experts results in delays.

tagline: Copy5 helps networked companies collaborate by bringing internal and external teams to a unified digital space and providing intelligent analytics to measure productivity of people working remotely.
description: Focusing on video, digital communication, document and data organization, project management, and external team process control, Copy5 provides unique support for cross-company collaboration.
problem_statement: Collaboration among a distributed hybrid workforce is mission critical to companies of all sizes.  Current solutions offer limited features; promote disorganization, a chaotic channel structure, waste, and data loss.Other collaboration platforms do not drive connectedness aligned with how an organization actually works, so collaboration fails.Copy5 enables:1)	The digital workplace to deliver performance2)	Tie collaboration + execution3)	Measurements drives behavior

tagline: AI for WordPress
description: WPAI is a startup that builds AI tools for WordPress.Our flagship product, CodeWP (https://codewp.ai), is used by over 50,000 people, and is a code generation and learning platform created specifically for WordPress. We leverage custom AI, and a unique user interface to offer the leading platform for our industry.
problem_statement: WordPress, the CMS the powers almost half the Internet, is confusing.We apply AI to make WordPress easier to use, simpler to extend, and more accessible to anybody from a non-techie to a seasoned developer.CodeWP helps people extend WordPress with code. Since it's inception, the CMS was intended to be extended using PHP snippets and plugins. Our platform allows anybody to generate these for Core, and many other plugins. It integrates directly into your live website to ensure accurate and up-to-date outputs.The Agent (launching in May 2024) exists directly in a WordPress website and will fulfill any task the user asks of it. Statistics, content generation, extending with code, security scans, etc.

tagline: Be Invested
description: Fennel will be the first brokerage in history to offer voting policies for retail investors to automate voting, provide deep ESG insights into companies that are customized to users preferences and give access to powerful investing tools typically only held by high-net-worth investors.
problem_statement: The financial markets are not truly democratized. The system is far removed from retail investors ability to simply purchase asset classes, there is no governance built in. There is a lack of representations at public companies as proxy voting is an extremely convoluted & difficult process, and investors’ voting rights are lost through securities lending. There is a lack of accessibility, as everyday investors have limited access to anything close to the wealth management tools used by high-net-worth investors. Finally there is a lack of transparency in the companies people invest in as well as how their orders are executed. There exist no easy-to-use tools for investors to align their investments with companies who share their vision and values.

tagline: Last-mile delivery for apartment buildings
description: Fetch accepts all packages at local facilities and coordinates scheduled, door-to-door delivery directly with residents. Through the Fetch app, residents can quickly manage and monitor their packages - a reliable, convenient, and secure process.Fetch has grown to over 500 employees and now operates in DFW, Austin, Houston, San Antonio, Seattle, Denver, Chicago, Orlando, Tampa, Jacksonville, Miami, Ft Lauderdale, Minneapolis-St Paul, Raleigh-Durham, Atlanta, Phoenix, DC, Portland, and Charlotte with more markets slated for 2022. We work with 8 of the top 10 management companies in the US, all top 7 developers, and a number of the largest owners in the country.
problem_statement: Fetch solves the "package problem" for apartment buildings.  The explosion of e-commerce has created a huge problem for property managers and owners who are left responsible for handling thousands of resident packages every month.

tagline: The First B2B Sourcing Platform Exclusively for Premium Fashion
description: All in 1 Sourcing Management that would handle everything from bidding to shipping. The  platform would provide access to vetted Italian apparel manufacturers, have full transparency with their process of making the product from the factory. They would also allow for small batches of clothing to be made, as low as 30, and with every account, there would be a dedicated account manager that would support the user.
problem_statement: Omnichannel Rise: The rise of DTC shopping trends has increased the need for competitive fashion brands to champion their own exclusivity and differentiate themselves.Sourcing in a New Era: pandemic has disrupted traditional apparel and footwear sourcing.Supply Chain Sustainability: Brands are seeking way to engage customers in their product creation process. As customers become more aware of issues in fashion, brands need to respond by making their processes and sources more transparent.

tagline: Link to Learn is a cadaveric skills-lab based out of Denver, Colorado providing access to quality advanced critical care skills training, in both clinical and field casualty care settings (commercial and defense customers).
description: Predominantly teach Tactical Combat Casualty Care (TCCC) for Medical Personnel through hands-on cadaveric skills practice combined with Augmented Reality (AR). This will be a mobile interactive learning environment enabling instructors to enhance their pre-op instruction with anatomical holograms and senior personnel will be able to triage realistic battlefield injuries overlaid on a cadaver.
problem_statement: Our warriors need to be trained how to provide critical care on the battlefield. Right now a few problems exist:• Logistical and financial restraints prevent frequent travel to accredited labs• Staffing limitations reduce the availability of training sessions.• Inadequate learning materials inhibit tactile assessment skills

tagline: De Kabeza is gamifying learning and engagement for corporations
description: De Kabeza has a mobile solution (their app or white-labeled) live-streamed video, chat and an interactive layer (starting with trivia) to launch games. This is done with a custom and proprietary content management system and an app, which can run either public or private sessions.
problem_statement: Corporate training is mundane and ineffective. Training videos and policy updates are one-way communication that are not engaging the end user. Corporate companies spend roughly $1,200 per employee each year on training and education.

tagline: Helping everyone invest in premium NFTs as an alternative asset class
description: Masterpieces gives everyone the ability to auto-invest in high value premium NFT assets to build a diversified portfolio and start their Web3 journey.Using collective ownership and a familiar UX, we are making it easy for mainstream consumers to buy and collect a piece of the most valuable and culturally significant NFTs with the strongest communities, where the most future appreciation will accrue.
problem_statement: NFTs are a new $40B per year digital alternative asset class and rapidly growing. But the premium assets, where the power law will apply and the most value will accrue over the coming years, these assets cost $10k's or $100k's each. This makes this new asset class out of reach of the mainstream consumer, let alone being able to build a diversified portfolio to get exposure based on their risk profile.

tagline: Turn accounts receivables on insurance claims into upfront capital with a couple of clicks.
description: SquareDash pays contractors 30-90 days faster by providing instant funding on approved property insurance claims. It uses proprietary technology to digitize legacy documents with a simple PDF or image upload, validating the claim and reducing underwriting risk. It is the first solution of its kind in the $70B US property loss market.
problem_statement: Working insurance claims is hard: It’s complex and requires workflows not found in retail jobs, it’s high volume after storms create large amounts of work in an instant, and it’s expensive to operate through long sales cycles and slow claim settlements. Collecting payment often involves physically driving to customers' homes to pick up paper insurance checks after waiting months for them to arrive in the mail.

milestones.title: Closed $1.5M Seed Round
milestones.description: Successfully closed an oversubscribed seed round, led by Hivers and Strivers, with a co-investment by The PenFed Foundation. Angel investors include Elizabeth Yin (The Hustle Fund), Amber Illig (The Council), Darwinian Ventures, Allison Barr-Allen (Uber payments alum), Reed McBride (VP @ Carta), Jarrod Yound, and Spencer Bryson

milestones.title: Launched Private Pilot
milestones.description:
Launched our accounting and receivables factoring product to Luck Roofing.
Luck produces ~$300K in monthly revenue, and we charge a 5% fee to facilitate all customer payments and factor Luck’s receivables.
Stripe raised our weekly ACH processing limit from $10k/week to $500k/week.
We secured a lending partner with a $75M debt facility.

tagline: A B2B, SaaS virtual community platform for Nonprofits, Membership Orgs. and Corporate Culture Leaders.
description: On The Dot is a B2B, SaaS Virtual Community Platform. We help organizations create virtual communities rich with resources, collaboration and connection and give them a seamless, all-in-one communication tool to drive community engagement and scale.
problem_statement: Virtual communities are essential for every organization... Social media groups are not the answer due to privacy issues, limited features, and lack of data ownership.

milestones.title: Closed $200K of $1M Covertible Note
milestones.description: Secured lead for $1M convertible note raise, plus one additional investor.

tagline: Bringing Augmented Reality to the travel and eventTech industries!
description: CityGuyd brings recent advancements in Augmented Reality technology to both the travel and eventtech markets by augmenting real life tour guides or famous figures on the ground of travel destinations and events across the globe! We are "digitizing" the tour guide experience by allowing tour guides to connect directly with travelers digitally through their phones. Our app uses AR technology and GPS signals to let travelers know our digital tour guides are available whenever they approach a known landmark or attraction. Our AR tour guides then pop up on the ground in front of users to tell them anything they need to know, in their chosen language of course, in a socially distant, face-to-face engaging experience that has never before been possible!
problem_statement: Covid-19's dramatically negative impact on the travel industry has proven the industry has a major problem - we failed to embrace the digital future. The need to embrace new technologies and digitize the tour guide experience has never been more apparent than in the post-Covid world. Private tour guides come at a premium cost, group tours aren't viable in the age of social distance, audio tours are one dimensional, and travel books feel antiquated. This industry needs to embrace new technologies to reach new audiences, rebound post-Covid, and prevent future damage in case of pandemics. Younger travelers gravitate towards technology and digital interactions, and the incoming Augmented Reality tech revolution all leads to one path - a digitized AR tour guide experience. That is the problem CityGuyd solves!

tagline: Powering the Future of Learning Today
description: EMPACT is our immersive training platform that is built upon best-in-class commercial technology from Epic Games (Unreal Engine) and Microsoft (Azure cloud and services). EMPACT allows our engineering team, partners and customers to create, manage, deliver and sustain an immersive training program. EMPACT is unique in it's ability through our Studio offering to enable instructors and subject matter experts to create their own immersive training lessons without writing code - simply records your lesson in a full 3D virtual world, publish to our cloud-based content management system, and deliver the training to students or employees.
problem_statement: We're addressing the lack of effective training in the corporate and government industries through the use of virtual and augmented reality training to elevate the level of proficiency and preparedness in the workforce.

tagline: Smart maintenance software for manufactures to eliminate unplanned downtime.
description: Sensyrtech is building Sentinyl™, a smart maintenance software that brings Industry 4.0, the new age of manufacturing technologies, together in a single platform. We want to increase collaboration amongst teams, simplify reporting and logging, and centralize machine monitoring.
problem_statement: The industrial digital maintenance ecosystem is heavily fragmented. The current technologies used by facilities such as the CMMS (work order management), IIoT (cloud data capture, condition-monitoring sensors), VMS (video management), PdMs (predictive maintenance sensors), etc. have come out over the past 15 years and grown in silo. Each of these technologies and companies only reveals one slice of the larger problem. With limited to no flow of data from one application to another, the current system ultimately forces the user to continuously jump between softwares, maintain and train inefficient manual flows, and keep up with multiple vendors and providers. Maintenance is also an inherently human function - people with hands-on-tools run the show. Softwares today don't understand their needs and this leads to digital transformation abandonment.

tagline: a marketplace for home healthcare
description: CareSnap is a  marketplace for home healthcare that connects patients, agencies, and caregivers through mobile-apps.Patients are matched with agencies by insurance and location.Caregivers find available jobs nearby.Agencies get a referral pipeline of patients and caregivers.Hospitals & clinics effectively plan and discharge patients.
problem_statement: ~60% of patients that are discharged from the hospital don't get the care needed after a hospital stay.Patients lack resources to connect with home health agencies in their area that accept their insurance.Home healthcare is a fragmented, paper-based industry.Over 700,000 patients looking for home health services.Over 7,400 home health agencies in Texas alone, looking for caregivers and patients.Over 575,000 caregivers looking for home healthcare jobs.

tagline: People + Robots make the best teams
description: At Diligent we build AI-powered robotics.  Our product, Moxi, is a semi-humanoid robot (mobile base + manipulating arm) that transports items for clinical teams in hospitals (lab samples, medications, supplies, equipment), returning time to an overburdened workforce in an industry experiencing crisis-level workforce shortages. This is the most advanced robotic solution in operation today in such a dynamic human environment. Diligent’s technical teams are pushing the boundaries of machine vision and AI in order to enable robots to operate 24/7 opening doors, operating elevators, and navigating busy hallways alongside clinical teams. We have a proven solution and strong customer demand, with 100 robots deployed to 30+ hospitals across the US., and plans for 2-3x growth in 2024 and 2025.
problem_statement: The healthcare labor shortage is projected to worsen, with millions of nurses set to retire over the next decade. Healthcare occupations are expected to account for 40% of new jobs from 2022-2032, yet the workforce is facing a severe shortfall. Diligent Robotics is uniquely positioned to address this crisis, making it an ideal time to invest.

tagline: Your Fare is an online ordering management platform for restaurants.
description: Your Fare is an online ordering and management software for restaurants. What we do is integrate 3rd party delivery services like UberEats and DoorDash directly into the restaurants point of sale system. We acquired an online ordering solution and a loyalty platform to provide restaurants with a complete technology stack for restaurants managing their business beyond their 4 walls.
problem_statement: Consumer behavior has changed in a post covid world. Online ordering and takeout is now 62% of a restaurants revenue. Restaurants using 3rd party delivery services like UberEats and DoorDash, receive orders from a tablet. Restaurants spend $1500 per month, on average 75 labor hours, entering 3rd party delivery orders manually into the POS system. Restaurants are piecing together multiple technologies in order to run their business beyond their 4 walls.

tagline: Chipper is a consumer-facing mobile app that allows borrowers to pay, manage, and refinance their loans all in one place.
description: Payments and rewards mobile platform that allows student loan borrowers to chip away their debt through everyday transactions.
problem_statement: Student loans can be confusing and overwhelming. Whatever your situation, Chipper has your back! Whether you need help lowering payments, qualifying for forgiveness programs, or chipping away at your debt faster, we have a solution for you. Members save an average of $6,400 and 2.5 years in repayment!

tagline: Quilt is a low-code, Fintech enablement-as-a-service platform designed to facilitate embeddable Fintech services and abstract away integration complexity.
description: Quiltt makes it faster, easier and cheaper for companies to deliver consumer-facing fintech experiences. The core of the platform is a unified user data graph that normalizes and enriches data from multiple sources. This data is wrapped by application logic and partner integrations, delivering seamless experiences via APIs (GraphQL and REST) or embeddable UI modules (drop-in widgets and SDKs).  Quiltt’s revenue model is SaaS, with pricing tied to a client’s user base; additionally, Quitt engages in revenue share with vendor partners.
problem_statement: As many consumer facing companies race to rebundle financial services and/or embed modern Fintech experiences, barriers such as talent shortages, cost intensity, and complex integrations & data management issues continue to exist.

tagline: It isn't good to keep things bottled up
description: Vinat is a D2C wine business seeking to simplify the wine-buying experience for women.

tagline: Investing for the rest of us
description: Fundr combines the power of AI and portfolio diversification to help investors maximize their ROI. It uses AI to vet startups and remove bias from the investing process so the best companies get funded. Using a proprietary algorithm, it evaluates companies on 90 pieces of data, streamlines the deal close, and helps investors track and build a strong relationship with their portfolio companies. Fundr recently completed its pilot, has had triple-digit growth in the last few months, doubled its revenue this month, and has a number of exciting partnerships and scaling opportunities in the pipeline. Fundr has been featured in TechCrunch, Yahoo Finance, on the Forbes Next 1000 list, and more.
problem_statement: Seed investing hasn’t had real innovation in decades. Investors and startups are navigating long investing timelines and bad outcomes. On average it takes 3-6 months to close a deal and 3 years to build a diversified portfolio. Still, investors have a 90% portfolio failure rate. Many investors cobble together a mix of forms, emails, and cloud storage to assist in a largely manual process. Bias, lack of access, and a shift to later-stage funding has kept world-changing ideas from getting funded.

tagline: Own your home, not its problems.
description: PreFix is a tech-enabled service that eliminates the hassles of home ownership, saves homeowners up to 50% off home maintenance costs, and creates a data-driven “operating system” for the home.  A fully trained, dedicated Home Manager fixes most things for a low copayment.  Seasonal preventive maintenance on all appliances and systems is included, which pays for the cost of the service on its own.  For only the most complex repairs we use our vetted contractors at low, negotiated rates with no mark up.  Other home-related products and services are now being distributed on the basis of this trusted homeowner relationship and proprietary home-related data.
problem_statement: Homeowners are are confronted with a broken process when any issues arise in their home:  a short supply of contractors that frequently won't call back, service windows and waiting, no way to know if their getting the best price, and no knowledge of what ongoing preventive maintenance needs to be done (vs. what is just an "upsell" opportunity by commission-based contractors).

tagline: Preventing nerve damage from chemotherapy
description: Eisana Health is a development stage medical device company, based in The Woodlands, Texas. We are focused on preventing devastating side effects from cancer treatment. Our first product is a cooling system for hands and feet, specifically tailored to the unique needs of cancer patients, to prevent painful and incurable nerve damage caused from many common chemo drugs.
problem_statement: Many common chemotherapy drugs make their way in the blood to fingers and toes and destroy sensitive nerve endings. This chemotherapy-induced peripheral neuropathy (CIPN) is horrible on several levels:•	Common, painful, and debilitating;•	Not curable;•	Dramatically decreases quality of life for survivors;•	Payors are spending an average of $17k, per year, per patient, just trying to deal with symptoms;•	Oncologists struggle with two bad choices when it occurs in the middle of several rounds of chemo:keep going and cause a permanent disability or stop treatment and the patient dies.A poster was presented at last year's American Society of Clinical Oncologists (ASCO) conference showing a 55% reduction in nerve damage with cooling, concluding that all patients receiving neurotoxic chemo drugs should be encouraged to cool their hands and feet on the day of chemo.Problem is, there's no easy and safe way to do it. Patients are struggling with ice cold solutions, designed for injury or rehabilitation: 20 minutes on, 20 minutes off. Cancer patients need less cold, uninterrupted, for several hours while the drug is at a high concentration in the blood. Eisana Health is the first company to design cooling gloves that allow a patient to use their hands (phone, eat, read, etc) and cooling booties that allow a patient to use their feet (walk).

tagline: Harnessing Waste Heat
description: SeebeckCell Technologies (SCT) develop and manufacture power solutions for industrial facilities by utilizing waste heat at their facilities while providing carbon emission offsets.SCT's beachhead product is for data centers (SCT-DC). It uses the platform technology in Coolant Distribution Units to recover low-temperature waste heat from IT equipment and offset carbon emissions.
problem_statement: Most machines lose up to 60% of the intake energy to surround through heat. The global waste heat recovery system(WHRS) market was valued at $54.3 billion, and the petroleum refinery segment accounted for the largest market share.The cost and maintenance issues associated with wireless sensor battery replacement are intractable and immense. In addition, the negative environmental effect of wasted battery metals is something to be reckoned with soon. Current battery-operated wireless sensors have a lifespan of only 1 to 2 years, making replacement and maintenance expenses. In industrial applications with hundreds or thousands of potential sensor locations, a battery replacement cost can be as high as $500, bringing it to over $2,000 per IoT sensor over a 10-year lifespan.As a solution, Abundant industrial waste heat can be utilized as an energy source to power the IoT.

tagline: AI Marketing Agents
description: Contentify is a platform that provides AI-powered tools to help marketers, founders, and content creators automate their content creation and marketing strategies. It offers AI marketing agents that can generate and publish content such as blog posts, social media updates, and more. The platform allows users to create visuals, captions, and hashtags and optimize content for SEO, all tailored to specific audience needs. This automation helps improve efficiency and maintain a consistent online presence without requiring manual effort for every piece of content.The AI tools in Contentify are designed to be customizable. You can fine-tune the agents based on your brand's needs and review, edit, or approve content before it goes live. These AI-driven features help manage repetitive tasks, allowing human creators to focus on more strategic and creative aspects of content development. Contentify aims to empower users to maintain an impactful, consistent, and dynamic online presence more quickly and affordably than traditional methods.
problem_statement: Contentify is addressing several pain points related to content creation and digital marketing:1. Efficiency in Content Production: Traditional content creation is often time-consuming and labor-intensive. Contentify leverages AI to automate the creation of blogs, social media posts, graphics, and more, significantly speeding up the production process. This is particularly beneficial for small teams or solo marketers who need to maintain a steady flow of content without dedicating extensive resources.2. Consistency and Scalability: Maintaining a consistent online presence is crucial for brand visibility and engagement. Contentify helps solve the scalability challenge by enabling businesses to generate large volumes of high-quality, personalized content consistent with their brand voice. This consistency is difficult to achieve manually, especially at scale.3. Cost Reduction: Hiring a team of writers, designers, and marketers can be costly. Contentify provides an alternative that can produce content efficiently at a fraction of the cost, making it accessible for businesses with smaller budgets who want to maintain a strong digital marketing presence.4. Customization and Personalization: The platform enables targeted content creation by analyzing audience data and generating personalized content that resonates with specific audience segments. This tailored approach helps increase engagement and relevance, which can be challenging to achieve manually.5. Freeing Up Creative Time: By automating repetitive and administrative tasks, Contentify allows creators and marketers to focus more on strategy and creative innovation rather than spending time on routine content production tasks.In essence, Contentify provides a solution to the challenges of efficient, scalable, and cost-effective content marketing, enabling businesses to maintain a competitive digital presence with fewer resources.

tagline: Privacy, Security, and Ownership are Human Rights
description: The Whisper Company has created a new level of privacy, security and ownership of your information.------Our first of two (patented) technologies are:- Persistent User Authorization (PUA).True to Zero Trust: it puts the Always Verify, in the zero-trust moniker of “Always Verify, Never Trust”.  It guarantees that only the authenticated user can operate the application/device by using continuous biometric authentication. The instant the user is not in front of their device or someone else (shoulder-surfer), the contents of their screen obfuscate.  The identity assurance is throughout the session, not just for access like current solutions. It is password-less and frictionless for the end-user, improving operational efficiency while increasing security.- Chaotic Hybrid Encryption (CHE).A Quantum Resistant Encryption that is low code and low latency.  It eliminates the Harvest Now/Decrypt Later (HNDL) of the upcoming "quantum winter".  CHE can be implemented in-line and it is 20-100 times faster that AES-256 (current military-grade encryption).  CHE leverages layers of proprietary technologies. It’s a one-time pad encryption, with an infinite-Key, generated from a chaotic oscillator, realized in a hybrid (mixed-signal) processor.  We don't share encryption keys, they are generated locally.We have SDKs ready to be licensed, so our clients (FinTech, HealthTech, Military, Government, etc.) can make their apps more secure with less friction to their users, reducing fraud (chargebacks), MITM attacks, Phishing, stolen credentials, etc.Additional information (including pitches, patents, infographics, white papers, repositories, and more) are available at https://LinkTr.ee/TheWhisperCompany. Feel free to reach out to us:[email protected]
problem_statement: Endpoints are keys to information vulnerabilities, whether it be personal, proprietary, financial, medical, highly valuable, or sensitive.  Today we have more people accessing more information from more endpoints than ever.  We don't have adequate solutions to protect these endpoints and the information therein. Multi-factor Authentication ensures the right device is nearby a login session, but doesn't ensure who is behind the device and who enters that six digit code or if the authorized user continues to operate the app or device. Passwords and Pin's can easily be hacked, guessed, or visually eavesdropped, not to mention the vulnerability of users that have their passwords automatically saved. These current "solutions" leave users with friction and companies dealing with fraud, identity theft and data leaks. Authentication and access to information needs to be biometric based and needs to be continuous.-----For those that are not aware, Quantum computing is not far from being a commercially viable technology.  Preparing for this day is more important than ever.  Adversaries, foreign and domestic are saving today’s data in troves. They call this "act" Harvest Now, Decrypt Later (HNDL). They already have our data, and are saving more and more day by day. The Financial industry amongst other proprietary information industries are all targets. They are holding this information and waiting for quantum computing capabilities to decrypt it.  Current encryption will be rendered obsolete.  We need quantum resistant encryption today.

milestones.title: PUA Patent
milestones.description:
As we pivot from Industrial IoT (IIoT) to peer-to-peer communication, we had the dilemma of how to guarantee only authorized users had access to the sensitive information.  Our CEO, Alejandro Fernandez had the aha-moment of why not using biometrics continuously.  After reviewing the USPTO, we realized that there was no patent issued, so we decided to file one.
We contacted Bill Hulsey, a well-known patent attorney in Austin, that had worked with our CTO in previous patents.
Benito and Alejandro wrote the patent application and filed it on 03/04/2020
We worked with Hulsey and Patent Reviewer until the patent issued 09/27/2022

The last funding was 10/25/2021.

tagline: Stop Harm - Save Lives - Better Outcomes
description: Pegwin Patient Safety Innovation helps healthcare institutions solve post-operative patient complications by leveraging Machine Learning and AI technology to alert clinicians on early identification of patient abnormalities.On top of the EMR we create a risk profile for each patient that shows their co-morbidities ranked by severity and pushes the best practice and standard of care to the attending clinician in real-time, augmenting their knowledge to take timely preventive action.Pegwin is the winner of two (2) ONC for IT Patient Safety Challenges and is an evidence-based solution addressing volatility in the patient state, the uncertainty in decision making, and complexity and ambiguity of data related to patient safety. Pegwin Insights uses live data in real-time from pre-op to homecare, allowing for early detection of patient deterioration to eliminate potential preventable harm.
problem_statement: The third leading category of death globally, following cancer and heart disease, is mortality within 30-days of surgery. Nearly 1 in 4 hospitalized patients admitted to hospitals in the U.S. will experience harm. Despite decades of effort, U.S. hospitals still have a long way to go to improve patient safety.Current systems, for monitoring post-operative patients, on surgical wards, are inadequate.This results in higher costs, added liability, unreimbursed revenue, preventable patient harm and unnecessary loss of life. A recent study shows that 7% of total admissions experience preventable harm and 1% experienced serious preventable adverse events that resulted in serious harm or death.Our data-driven tools will reduce the financial burden from adverse events.

milestones.title: MOU Between Pegwin and Prism Care, Inc.

The objective is to create an alliance that can support improvement in patient health outcomes and generate incremental revenue. 
Prism Care is a provider of remote patient monitoring (RPM), and chronic care management (CCM) that encompasses a full scope of services. This includes an advanced RPM digital momitoring platform, the Prism Care Patient Engagement Center (PEC), and allied services designed to improve patient outcomes. 
Pegwin is a visionary Digital Health IT company revolutionizing patient care with its groundbreaking product, Pegwin Insights. It provides predictive analytics using AI and Machine Learning to give providers (MD/DO, NP/PA) actionable information obtained from Prism Care (through chronic care management and RPM).

milestones.title: Proof of Principle
milestones.description:
The preliminary study performed on >15M randomized observations (SMART DST2; SMART STU3; MIT, Harvard, Boston Children’s Hospital) showed completeness, computability, and accuracy of the raw data sources (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources - FHIR).
RESULTS: Cross-validated (70/30) AI-Driven model demonstrated good discrimination for unplanned ICU Admission - AUC 0.90; 95% CI, 0.76-0.94) and performed as well, or better than the current models (C statistic ranges: 0.56– 0.74).
The model calibration across different risk categories showed a close association of predicted and observed outcomes (PSI11; PSI04).

milestones.title: Agreement to conduct feasibility and usability study of our Machine Learning and medical AI algorithm
milestones.description:
Harnessing the power of machine learning models to accurately predict risks, provide early alerts and reduce the incidence of critical postoperative pulmonary complications in a tertiary cancer center.


Pegwin has developed and tested the Pegwin Insights Platform prototype that agnostically sits on top of any Electronic Health Record (EHR) to display each patient’s Risk Profile to support nurses to do the right thing, to the right patient at the right time. This will help to continue timely, quality care even with the nursing shortages.


Pegwin has a signed agreement with the #1 Cancer Center in the U.S. to conduct a feasibility and usability study of our Machine Learning and medical AI algorithm. They have asked for the rights to be the first to publish the results.

Kaidu's real-time spatial intelligence technology is a powerful tool that helps businesses optimize their operations and build customer loyalty through accurate, actionable insights. Our technology can be used to make forecasting decisions that help businesses stay ahead of the curve. Kaidu AI solves this problem by providing low-cost, plug-and-play smart sensors that use AI and real-time analytics to gather valuable data on customer behavior and space utilization. tagline: Making Sustainable Plastics Affordable
description: Applied Bioplastics enables large plastic compounders to reduce their carbon and microplastic footprint while saving money. We also offer biocomposite building material in-use for the last three years in the world's largest refugee camp, where it has proven to improve human health and wellbeing. We are currently in active trials for the United Nations and just received our second major order to build a new village. All materials created by Applied Bioplastics are dual-use. Founded June 2019.
problem_statement: We are solving the overconsumption of oil, the microplastics and carbon that are all associated with durable polymers, while avoiding and winning on the price problem presented by the cheapest, most useful material on the market: plastic.

tagline: We ensure medications remain safe
description: HelioWave Technologies is an early-stage biotechnology start-up company that is leveraging innovations in microfluidics from Texas A&M University to revolutionize microbial contaminant testing in the pharmaceutical and biomanufacturing industries. To address these limitations from the conventional sterility testing pipeline, HelioWave has developed a line of sterility and bioburden testing device, named HelioCHIPS(TM), that incorporates the latest innovations in our electronic-based cell manipulation and detection using label-free sensing techniques to dramatically lower the cost, increase the speed, improve the scalability, enhance the accuracy, and introduce automation to the sterility testing market. Primary target markets include vaccine and therapeutic manufacturing, targeted and emerging therapy manufacturing, and QC/QA of reagents products, with direct adjacencies in the food/beverage, hygiene, and cosmetic industries.
problem_statement: Primary vaccine and therapeutic manufacturing is typically conducted in a batch-process manner where final products are tested prior to release. Due to bottlenecks in sterility testing for product clearance, often times manufacturers do not know if their products being produced are contaminated in real-time, leading to the potential for the disposal of millions of dollars worth of contaminated products. Furthermore, decentralized manufacturing facilities for emerging therapeutic modalities (i.e., autologous cell therapies and oligonucleotide-based therapies) are becoming increasing prevalent as new ways to provide quality, targeted, and economical health care for the public. These new and emerging technology approaches have more constrained product release deadlines, more complex contamination cases, and entail complex product matrices, making standard testing difficult, time consuming, or error prone. Therefore an automated, robust, universal, rapid, and high resolution solution offers the most ideal case to ensure the quality assurance of emerging therapies in a scalable fashion.

tagline: The Digital Front Door to Employee Productivity
description: CONTACT:  Beth White, Founder and CEO -[email protected]Imagine having your own personal assistant at work, that provides you with 24/7 support, answering your questions, so you can be more productive…that’s MeBeBot! MeBeBot answers questions like, "How do I get a new insurance card?" and "I am locked out of (example) system, what do I do to reset my password?" for employees instantly.Currently used by over 24,000 mid-market enterprise employees across the globe, MeBeBot an AI Chatbot/Intelligent Assistant in Slack/Teams that gives employee the support they need, when they need it. With an affordable, turn-key solution that launches to mid-market enterprise employees in weeks, our customers gain a 200% + ROI value, by saving operational costs and improving productivity.-Native AI solution, with 24,000 paid subscribers, crowdsourced trained/domain-specific data model for 93% accuracy of answers upon initial deployment.-Intelligent Assistant for employee FAQs, expanded AI Platform and product features, including push messaging and pulse surveys, rich dashboard of people analytics data, and manager specific support.-Incorporating Generative AI to automate FAQs for product, customer and sales support.Key Differentiators:*MeBeBot is an AI Platform "Bot in a Box," as the solution launches in weeks (no implementation), with immediate time to value in under two months* AI Intelligent Assistant app installs in under 30 minutes to Teams, Slack or SharePoint/Intranet web chat* AI Data Model, designed, developed, and trained (with a crowdsourced user approach) to be domain specific for enterprise businesses with 85-90% accuracy of answers at launch* Hundreds of FAQs within a curated knowledge base, easily edited in a customer facing portal, by business users (no code)* Dashboard with real-time data and analytics, with benchmark data and insights to employee usage, displaying immediate ROI results* Push messaging and Pulse surveys ensure adoption, consistent communications, and employee engagement, driving retention and improving employer brand.*Manager ToolBot™ helps managers be better managers, by providing specific coaching answers to their needs.*SOC 2, Type II certified.*Women's Business Enterprise National Council (WBENC) Certified Vendor
problem_statement: CONTACT:  Beth White, Founder and CEO -[email protected]Inefficiencies within companies waste time and money. Over 48% of CEOs cite AI and automating work is the answer to improving productivity and operational efficiencies, yet few know how to get started leveraging these technologies. And, many of the AI productivity solutions today (from Microsoft, Google, IBM, and OpenAI) are too expensive for most enterprise companies.With the rapid changes in workplaces, real-time employee support and communications are essential, and employee feedback is key to engagement/retention. Yet, HR, IT and Ops team members are overwhelmed and spend 2-3 hours a day manually responding to employees' FAQs and struggle to keep communications accurate and consistent. With both hybrid work and employee turnover challenges, companies lose 20%+ of their team members annually, that directly impacts the bottom line.MeBeBot provides employees with 24/7 support, real-time communications, and captures instant feedback, as an AI App in Microsoft Teams/Slack or webchat. With an AI Digital Employee Experience Platform, that leverages both generative AI and prescriptive AI, companies can launch a solution to their employees in weeks. As a first step in a path to accessible and affordable AI/automation, MeBeBot reduces manual support for employees by 60-70% and keeps them more productive and engaged, improving overall retention.

tagline: We make rotating systems more efficient
description: Our product is based on a simple mechanical device that can be readily retrofitted into existing systems.  The system has a significantly higher power density with a small form factor, is lower cost, and is designed for use in harsh environments.   Similar to continuously variable transmissions (CVTs) used for automotive and transportation solutions, Orbital’s drive has a variable input to output speed ratio over its operating range.  Our technology has been validated in several independent performance tests for the US Department of Defense, which has confirmed performance benefits and cost reductions.
problem_statement: Orbital Traction’s products optimize the performance of engine and electric motor driven systems in commercial and industrial products. We solve a critical problem in industrial automation; the inability of installed industrial systems to fully control the rotating speed. Our products provide a cost-effective solution to improve control, facilitate meaningful automation and provide the optimization benefits promised by IIoT; reducing energy consumption and the associated carbon footprint by up-to 50%. Many industrial systems have synchronous electric motors for prime movers and use simple on/off control or employ energy wasting control techniques such as braking, choking or recirculation.  These control schemes waste energy and do not provide optimum performance from the system.  An alternative solution uses electrical control systems such as variable frequency, AC or DC drives.  These systems are often expensive to retrofit, take significant space due to low power density, require advanced power electronics to provide energy efficiency improvements and are not suitable for harsh environments without additional expensive protection systems.

tagline: Charter is building the unified operating system for spacecraft program management.
description: The bottleneck in spacecraft manufacturing now is now friction in logistics and operations processes. Even as the hardware side of space activity gets cheaper and easier, capitalizing on these advancements has remained difficult because of the tools to support the 'human factor' has not kept up, and that's resulted in the relative difficulty (and corresponding cost) of managing a space mission's operational and logistical elements now eclipsing the difficulty of actually constructing spacecraft. So much of the space industry runs on analog processes and excel that engineering teams are left with long timelines and endless back-and-forths with suppliers, with a lot of avoidable mistakes and wasted time incurred because of inefficiency.60% of engineering hours in the industry are wasted because of this inefficiency, resulting in thousands of hours and millions of dollars wasted per mission. This loss of productivity, the cost incurred by delays, and the big-ticket losses of missions failing have led to an annual $44.5B drain across the entire space industry.That drain is what Charter is here to solve.
problem_statement: The bottleneck in spacecraft manufacturing now is now friction in logistics and operations processes. Even as the hardware side of space activity gets cheaper and easier, capitalizing on these advancements has remained difficult because of the tools to support the 'human factor' has not kept up, and that's resulted in the relative difficulty (and corresponding cost) of managing a space mission's operational and logistical elements now eclipsing the difficulty of actually constructing spacecraft. So much of the space industry runs on analog processes and excel that engineering teams are left with long timelines and endless back-and-forths with suppliers, with a lot of avoidable mistakes and wasted time incurred because of inefficiency.60% of engineering hours in the industry are wasted because of this inefficiency, resulting in thousands of hours and millions of dollars wasted per mission. This loss of productivity, the cost incurred by delays, and the big-ticket losses of missions failing have led to an annual $44.5B drain across the entire space industry.That drain is what Charter is here to solve.

tagline: Empowering everyday actions for extraordinary social impact
description: Knobl stands as a pioneering for-profit enterprise, currently available for free on the Apple App Store, reshaping the paradigm of social impact. Diverging from conventional donation platforms, Knobl harnesses the potential of activity-based campaigns, seamlessly interfacing with four prominent APIs: Apple Health, Fortnite, Tesla, and Spotify. This distinctive methodology empowers users to seamlessly convert their routine activities into charitable contributions, cultivating a heightened sense of purpose and engagement.In addition to revolutionizing charitable giving, Knobl emerges as a valuable asset within the burgeoning creator economy. By offering users an innovative avenue to monetize their philanthropic endeavors, Knobl not only facilitates meaningful contributions but also aligns with the dynamic trends in the digital landscape. This duality positions Knobl at the intersection of technological innovation, social impact, and the creator economy, providing a novel and impactful platform for both users and stakeholders alike.
problem_statement: Knobl strategically addresses the challenges prevalent in the philanthropic landscape by recognizing and resolving common issues faced by its key stakeholders: Individuals, Non-Profits, and Brands/Companies. The frustrations and problems encountered by these entities may vary, but Knobl offers comprehensive solutions for each.1.) Frustration Resolution:Individuals: Knobl empowers individuals who aspire to support causes but face financial constraints by providing alternative means of contribution beyond monetary donations.Nonprofits: Through Knobl, nonprofits gain the ability to articulate a compelling narrative, ensuring effective communication of their mission and impact.Brands/Companies: Knobl assists brands and companies in achieving a measurable return on investment (ROI) for their Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Initiatives.2.) Transparency Enhancement:Individuals: Knobl ensures transparency by providing detailed information on where donated funds are allocated, fostering trust and accountability.Nonprofits: The platform establishes clear metrics, enabling transparent reporting and accountability to donors.Brands/Companies: Knobl facilitates the communication of supported causes to consumers, enhancing transparency and fostering trust in corporate philanthropy.3.) Community Engagement:Individuals: Knobl offers features that enable individuals to seamlessly invite friends and family to participate in and support shared causes, creating a sense of community.Nonprofits: The platform assists nonprofits in devising strategies to encourage active participation within their communities.Brands/Companies: Knobl provides tools and methods for brands to involve consumers in their CSR efforts, fostering community engagement and promoting a shared sense of purpose.Knobl distinguishes itself as the premier platform that amalgamates innovative digital consumer experiences to provide robust solutions to the multifaceted challenges faced in the social impact space.

tagline: Custom engineering exploring next level UAS capabilities.
description: Based in Boulder, CO and founded in 2011, Black Swift Technologies is recognized for delivering reliable, robust, and highly accurate unmanned aircraft systems (UAS) capable of flying scientific payloads in demanding atmospheric environments (high-altitude, arctic, desert, corrosive particulates, and strong turbulence). Its purpose-built scientific aerial platforms are used around the globe for a variety of specialized atmospheric research missions in extreme conditions, including monitoring and assessing wildland fires, volcanoes, tornadoes, and hurricanes.  We've developed advanced systems enabling machine learning and machine vision for applications like preventative maintenance and automated remote landing with collision avoidance.  Our team of industry leading experts continue to develop cutting edge capabilities that push the possibilities of unmanned aircraft systems.
problem_statement: Methane, a greenhouse gas 25x more potent than carbon dioxide, strongly contributes to global warming and degrades air quality. Methane leaks occur in both oil and gas production and distribution infrastructure. Colorado is a major oil and gas producer and the industry is an important source of jobs and economic growth in our state. Colorado is also considered the national leader in policy to control methane emissions. Methane emissions is a high profile issue in Colorado and a major priority for both industry and regulators alike.Over the past 6 years, Black Swift Technologies (BST) has developed unmanned aircraft systems (UAS) and sensor technologies that put the company in the position to meet a critical unmet need in the Oil and Gas production and regulatory industries; the capability to monitor 100 well sites for methane leaks in a single day, inexpensively, with  extraordinarily high sensitivity and precise geolocation. The cost per wellsite for a survey with this technology is less than $35, compared with a $500+ price for the current gold-standard approaches to methane leak detection.

tagline: Transforming Satellite Data into Subscription Products
description: Leveraging advanced machine learning against satellite data and space-based imagery provides broad-perspective intelligence for unmatched breadth and operational capability.
problem_statement: We aim to solve your biggest intelligence challenges by delivering the insight needed for public and private organizations to make data-backed decisions for their operations. We source satellite data and imagery from a vast network of aerospace resources and pair it with our proprietary AI to identify, track, and assess an array of data characteristics - ultimately leading to a deeper understanding of vessel movement at sea and energy infrastructure on land.

tagline: Protecting Organizations from People Risk
description: ClearForce is a people risk analytics company that combines software, data services, compliance, and workflow automation to build safe and secure organizations.  Our patent-pending Resolve™ platform and continuous evaluation solutions help public and private sector organizations mitigate people risk associated with mission critical initiatives for insider threat, workplace safety, cyber security, SAFETY Act, trusted workforce, and suicide prevention
problem_statement: 94% of businesses perform pre-employment criminal background checks according to the Professional Background Screening Association (PBSA).  Yet there continues to be an explosion of front-page news regarding fraud, theft, violence, and other people risk threats costing lives and reputations.   One-time pre-employment background checks are simply not enough.  Annual or recurring background checks only compound the cost exponentially and do not solve the problem.  There are many known gaps in background checks.  They are expensive, take days/weeks, contain limited point-in-time data, and do not provide the real-time multi-source tip/lead data that security and risk management leaders require for investigation.  ClearForce is leading a new path forward.

problem_statement: As an increasing number of citizens become more invested in the political process, federal, state, and local legislation often remains hidden within a maze of government sites and records or conveyed under partisan messages & platforms.
