description: Nomadik is bringing a unifying real-time situational awareness platform that provides every stakeholder with the same picture, augmented with crowd sourced data. We automate the entire intelligence process from data parsing to analysis and correlation so that anyone can get the insights they need from the mayor or governor to boots on the ground.
problem_statement: Current civil data analysis platforms focus solely on law enforcement with no way to coordinate city services and the data spread across them. Cities struggle to coordinate data and resources to mount an effective response to homelessness, public safety, immigration, and policy.

With this, we save you time and money and enable you to work ON your business, not IN it.
problem_statement: Companies are spreading themselves thin as they are forced to use many different software solutions for accounting, HR, IT, sales, etc.

tagline: Farmland Investing. Simplified
description: AcreTrader was created with a simple mission: provide investors direct access to the highly attractive asset class of farmland investments.Farmland investments provide an opportunity for high-return potential and low volatility compared to other asset classes. Directly investing in farmland was historically difficult and unattainable for most investors. Until now.Through a proprietary online investment platform, AcreTrader offers transparency to people wanting to invest in farmland. Additionally, AcreTrader removes the headaches traditionally associated with land ownership by handling all aspects of administration and property management, from insurance and accounting to working with local farmers and improving soil sustainability.Securities are offered through AcreTrader Financial, LLC, a broker dealer registered with FINRA and a member of SIPC Information on all FINRA registered broker dealers can be found on FINRA’s BrokerCheck.Alternative investments are speculative, involve a high degree of risk and are not suitable for all investors. Complete loss of principal is possible.  Private placements are unregistered securities, considered illiquid and long-term investments. Distributions are not guaranteed.

tagline: MIRA - An Ai Co-pilot, Mortgage Intelligent Resource Assistant
description: Revolutionizing Mortgages with Mira—Your AI Co-Pilot for Smarter Lending. At Mira, we’re reshaping the mortgage landscape with cutting-edge AI solutions that simplify and enhance every phase of the lending journey. Mira functions as an AI-powered co-pilot, seamlessly integrating with your LOS, POS, and CRM systems to amplify productivity and create an elevated borrower experience from start to finish. Our platform enables lenders to streamline origination, verification, and fraud detection, reducing processing times and operational costs while boosting profitability.For lenders, Mira improves efficiency through intelligent automation, real-time pricing, and seamless system integration. For loan officers, Mira optimizes lead management by centralizing workflows, assessing eligibility, expediting pre-approvals, and offering diverse mortgage quotes, thus enhancing productivity and client satisfaction. And for consumers, Mira delivers a simplified mortgage journey with tailored loan comparisons and clear financial planning tools.With instant loan eligibility assessments, pre-approvals, restructuring options, and real-time application assistance, Mira empowers mortgage professionals to focus on client relationships and accelerate loan closures. Our AI-driven, 24/7 solutions are designed to deliver an experience borrowers remember, helping mortgage teams reduce unnecessary touches and handle more loans.
problem_statement: The mortgage industry today is burdened by complex, time-intensive processes that drive up costs, slow down approvals, and often compromise borrower satisfaction. Traditional workflows, especially for origination and pre-approvals, rely heavily on manual steps that create inefficiencies and hinder timely communication with borrowers. In an era where digital experiences are expected, lenders need solutions that can deliver speed, transparency, and consistency across each stage of the mortgage process.Mira addresses these pressing needs by providing an AI-powered platform that automates and enhances critical workflows, such as eligibility assessments, verification, and document processing. By integrating with existing LOS, POS, and CRM systems, Mira enables lenders and loan officers to improve submission quality, increase loan approval rates, and reduce processing times. Mira’s comprehensive, real-time solutions make it possible to deliver an elevated borrower experience, meet growing demands for digital transformation, and allow lenders to operate with greater efficiency and profitability.

tagline: Building the tools to unlock nature-based climate action
description: We're building the embedded data layer for the carbon supply chain. Companies, traders, auditors, and others across the supply chain use our software to ingest, analyze, and report complex environmental data for carbon markets, compliance schemes, and Article 6 trading. We plug these into a plug-and-play sandbox environment where our friends (carbon accounting startups & data providers ) integrate over API creating a single source of truth.
problem_statement: Climate-tech is building on an underlying layer of legacy remote-sensing software that hasn't changed much in 30 years (ERDAS, SNAP, ENVI, ArcGIS). These tools were designed for making maps, not spectral analysis and AI classification. Nature will play a key role in decarbonization at-large which is why we're excited about building the critical data-layer for natural assets.Nature-based solutions (NBS) can deliver up to 30% of needed mitigations to reach 2030 goals. NBS projects (afforestation, reforestation, regenerative agriculture, conservation, etc) are failing to meet audit requirements (for carbon registries) losing credit issuance and causing repetitional harm to buyers (O&G, blue chip comps, etc) due to a lack of transparency. Opaqueness in carbon markets, which globally represent a $978B industry across 30 jurisdictions, is caused by complex methodologies, audit requirements, and supply-side shortcomings. Gazelle is building a next-generation platform streamlining end-to-end MRV for NBS across the carbon supply chain enabling companies, traders, auditors, etc to confidently invest in and monitor natural assets.

tagline: THINK:  Mission Control for Parents
description: We are NOT a recruiter, we are an EdTech company.Athlete Foundry is a veteran-owned, veteran-led, Educational Technology company based in Austin, Texas that helps ALL families maximize student athlete success, regardless of zip code. We are unapologetically committed to level the playing field with our first-in-the-nation platform.We give parents of middle & high school student athletes a comprehensive 6th thru 12th grade roadmap that lets them build their most comprehensive ATHUMADEMIC resume (athletic + human + academic),...to improve their odds of becoming a collegiate athlete, increase their college financial assistance potential, and help prepare them to be successful in life after sports ---- regardless of current ability or zip code.
problem_statement: Athlete Foundry, a veteran-owned and veteran-led EdTech company, is overhauling and reimagining the misinformed, broken, and defective road to collegiate athletics that continues to feed the deep inequities in youth athletics.  In fact, at least 80% of parents don't know the basic steps from 6th through 12th grade to develop and maximize their child's options for college, athletics, and life after college.Athlete Foundry solves this problem and gives parents of middle & high school student athletes a fully on-line 6th thru 12th grade roadmap that lets them build their most comprehensive ATHUMADEMIC resume (athletic + human + academic),...to improve their odds of becoming a collegiate athlete, increase their college financial assistance potential, and ultimately help prepare them to be successful in life after sports ---- regardless of current ability or zip code.  Think: mission control for the parent.

tagline: Technology for Humanity's Future
description: ICON is a construction technology company developing robotic and AI systems to lower the cost and increase the speed and quality of construction to tackle the global housing crisis and prepare to build on other worlds. As a pioneer of large-scale 3D printing, ICON continually sets new standards for delivering resilient, dignified housing and recently unveiled a radical new robotic printer that enables multi-story construction, a new low-carbon building material, a digital catalog for residential architecture, and an AI architect for home design and construction.
problem_statement: The housing of the future must be different from the housing we have known.We exist as a response to the global housing crisis. Construction-scale 3D printing is designed to not only deliver high-quality homes faster and more affordably, but fleets of printers can change the way that entire communities are built for the better. The U.S. faces a deficit of 5 million new homes and worldwide there are 1.2 billion humans that lack adequate shelter. There is a profound need to swiftly increase supply without compromising quality, beauty, or sustainability and that is exactly the strength of ICON's technology.ICON, the pioneer of advanced construction technologies and large-scale 3D printing, announced a new suite of products and technologies designed to further automate construction including a radical new robotic printer that enables multi-story construction, a new low-carbon building material, a digital catalog for residential architecture with more than 60 ready-to-build home designs, and an AI Architect™ for home design and construction. ICON believes that together these technologies make its construction technology platform a faster, more sustainable way to build high-quality housing affordably around the world.

tagline: Fintech platform unlocking the $30T home equity market
description: View our overview deck here -> https://nada.docsend.com/v/kvfq9/nada_pitchdeckNada is an award-winning fintech and investment platform on a mission to unlock the wealth trapped within the $30 trillion home equity market for homeowners and investors. As the first company qualified by the SEC to issue city-specific shares of home equity, Nada’s Cityfunds product provides investors with direct access to the home equity market. By investing in the equity of homes, Nada is providing homeowners with immediate liquidity without the burden of added debt or monthly payments.Nada's innovative platform aligns individual investors with homeowners to build and preserve their wealth through the power of home equity.
problem_statement: The challenge lies in the illiquidity of home equity, which confines homeowners to limited options like taking on more debt or selling their homes to access their trapped equity. Simultaneously, individual investors seek more capital-efficient and less volatile alternatives to traditional investments like stocks or alternatives like crypto or single-family rentals.Nada is a Home Equity Investment ("HEI") platformHEI OriginatorNada originates home equity investments, which provide homeowners an alternative option to access their home equity without the burden of added debt or monthly payments.HEI Asset ManagerNada is the first company qualified by the SEC to offer HEI investment products to individuals. Individual investors can invest in a top city’s home equity market through its Cityfunds product.What is an HEI?HEIs are lien-secured agreements where homeowners receive cash upfront in exchange for a share of their homes future value

With a core focus on hospitality, we work with students, schools and hotels to provide foundational education, upskilling and reskilling that supports the life cycle of career placement and advancement. Our transformational technology enables us to bring training to remote and historically underserved communities, creating new opportunities for students wherever they live and learn.
problem_statement: The hospitality industry is the second largest employer in the world (employs 300,000,000) but suffers from a 300% turnover rate. Coupled with a 75% decline in hospitality training programs in the US hotels are in crisis and can't find enough talent.

tagline: Everlasting Power
description: Direct Kinetic Solutions develops persistent power sources. Our devices are about the size of a stamp and can generate power reliably, safely and predictably for years. To date we have self funded our product development efforts through federal contracts, and we are looking for partners to help us expand aggressively into commercial markets. We have different proof of concept engagements in the making, and we want to make sure we can reach scale quickly to satisfy them.
problem_statement: Portable devices run out of power. When that happens you either need to maintain the device, or replace it. In some cases this limits your market opportunities, or it could lead to hard about situations when these devices are in hostile, remote and austere environments. By adding our power sources, sensors can last for decades minimizing the need for maintenance, enabling safe operations, and reducing the amount of waste generated.

tagline: A smarter, more connected world for animals.
description: Animal Cloud is building advanced animal health software that gives access to automated real-time monitoring. Our technology lets animals have their own "medical insurance card" which will contain all the information about their medical history. Our platform also includes an API that allows bi-directional data exchange between our cloud servers and devices. This allows animal caretakers to measure and monitor animals' health as well as provide veterinarians with real-time or remote access to the animals they treat.
problem_statement: Animal health management problems include failed/mislabeled records, medical diagnoses, missing history, insufficient heredity, and inefficient/expensive medication management. Electronic health records provide the perfect solution to manage, monitor, and expand the treatment of 300 million animals. This technology will save millions in treatment costs by increasing the accuracy of data, reduce costs associated with unnecessary treatments and surgeries, and provide an innovative solution to animal health management problems.

tagline: The fantasy sports stock market
description: A platform where sports fans can buy and sell shares of professional athletes using virtual currency. A much faster and more competitive way to engage with your favorite sports.Unlike traditional fantasy sports or sports betting, Populus is completely free to play and is legal in all 50 US states to anyone 13+.
problem_statement: We've interviewed hundreds of students and sports fans and our research showed 2 key things:1. Fantasy sports is slow, boring, and lacks the competitive aspect, and fewer than 30% of players finish a season. It requires a high time commitment and players have to wait an entire season to swap teams or players.2. Sports betting, while growing in popularity, has a lot of barriers to entry including being 21+ and living in one of the 25 US states where it is legal. Furthermore, young adults, who form the majority of sports fans, usually don't have much money to bet.

We specialize in connecting people of all abilities to uniquely tailored health, informative, and support resources. Customized support resources delivered directly to the user have a profound impact on social determinants of heath across the special care community. We accomplish this through two parts of our platform:(1) our enterprise software for healthcare organizations, which scales and automates care management, and(2) our free mobile app for families, focused on helping the entire family unit get support by connecting them with their community.Our technology platform empowers small teams of care managers to reach 100% of their patient population, delivering more community resources directly to families.

tagline: Advancing Readiness. Optimizing Air Mobility.
description: We offer Enterprise SaaS platform to airlines and USAF to manage the operations. We are automating the disruption management for airlines and USAF, with the goal of scaling the technology for wider Aerospace and Defense application. Our algorithms are able to recover the schedules in a few minutes, in comparison to days the schedulers spent performing the same tasks manually.OpsLab (formerly SkySchedule) was started in 2018 by co-founders with backgrounds in airline operations and financial technologies. From simplifying logistics, to optimizing air mobility, to advancing combat readiness, our mission is to create innovative software products to make life easier for pilots. OpsLab products are currently deployed across multiple components of the U.S. Air Force and with multiple commercial airline fleets.
problem_statement: Disruptions to schedules in Aerospace and Defense industries result in billions of dollars in losses each year, primarily because schedule recoveries are performed manually, and often result in wastage of resources.  The operation relies on orchestrating complex resource allocations, while following Federal regulations, and schedule disruptions occur frequently because of weather, maintenance, personnel issues.

tagline: Developing Supersonic UAVs to Advance Air Combat Training
description: Exosonic is an early-stage aerospace start-up based in Los Angeles, CA developing supersonic adversary air UAVs to support the fighter pilot training mission for both commercial and government customers. The goal is to mature these supersonic UAVs to become loyal wingmen (or collaborative combat aircraft) and eventually develop quiet supersonic airliners from the lessons learned and profits generated by the supersonic UAV product line. Founded in 2019, Exosonic has raised $4.5M+ in private capital and $3M+ in AFWERX funding. The team has 12 FTEs and is developing a subscale flight test vehicle to demonstrate autonomy and potentially crewed-uncrewed teaming with a first flight timeframe of Q2 2023.
problem_statement: We're addressing the lack of representative, affordable aircraft used for air combat training that are necessary to ensure US fighter pilots are well-trained to protect the US against a near-peer threat, like China. Today's fighter pilots either train against very expensive operational aircraft like F-35s, F-22s, or F-16s. To save on cost, the USAF and US Navy hire air combat training companies who fly 60 - 70 year old aircraft platforms acting as 21st century enemy fighter aircraft. Needless to say, these give US fighter pilots a false sense of air superiority in training which may not translate well in actual combat. Exosonic wants to be at least 2x cheaper than existing commercial solutions (or 3 - 5x cheaper than existing government solutions) by developing supersonic UAVs that actually represent today's adversaries. These supersonic UAVs will allow fighter pilots to train like they fight so they can be adequately prepared to defend against enemy threats.

tagline: Host Our Heroes
description: atease helps government employees (civilian and military) book vacation rentals using government travel allowances.
problem_statement: Government regulations prohibit Airbnb, VRBO, and Booking during moves and work travel because it is undetermined which vacation rentals meet government specifications.

tagline: TurboTax for government-backed startup grants
description: OmniSync is an Air Force and Department of Energy-funded startup using state-of-the-art artificial intelligence to nurture innovation. OmniSync is well-known for its two main platforms: TurboSBIR, which helps startups find and apply for government funding, and TurboInnovate, which rapidly scans millions of innovation data points across industry, academia, and government for market research purposes.

tagline: Use Downstream Marketplace to find a hauler, recycler, scrapper, reseller, or landfill.
description: Downstream is a vetted marketplace connecting Customers with the best local haulers for frictionless, affordable waste management and site services.
problem_statement: Customers who user Downstream are REIT Management and Construction Companies, who book multiple service lines, across multiple locations, in numerous cities and states.For Construction, a Project Manager needs to procure a roll off dumpster, temporary fence, and portable restroom in order to be OSHA compliant.  With just these services over multiple job sites, a Project Manager will manage 10-15 difference suppliers, with vastly different pricing and unexpected fees, which makes it cumbersome to vet the service quality of each supplier.Downstream solves this problem with a Waste Marketplace.

tagline: Automated Digital Identity and Compliance Workflows.
description: We build custom identity verification solutions for enterprises.  Perhaps it's automating international contractor identity checks.  Or maybe it's automating age verification for your growing e-commerce store.BlueCheck build highly automated compliance and identity verification workflows.
problem_statement: Companies struggle to automate compliance checks such as identity verification when onboarding employees.  Usually, customer service or HR reviews identity documents before making a decision.This does not hit compliance requirements.  It does not allow a company to scale or provide a good experience for their employees or users.  Additionally, it's probably customer service or HR's least favorite part of their job.

tagline: Preserve Life on Earth, Expand it in Space
description: Interstellar Lab is a biotech which develops, manufactures and operates advanced biofarming platform to help customers produce the cleanest plant-based ingredients.Our biofarming technology combines automated farms (Biopods), AI and bioscience with a unique data-driven approach to considerably accelerate plant growth while optimizing plant molecular composition.We offer sustainable end-to-end solution for high-quality botanical ingredients from research to production to large health, beauty and F&B companies, including L’OREAL, Robertet and dsm-firmenich.Our solution also convinced NASA, which contracted with us twice to adapt the system for deployment in space station and lunar environment.We count 56 engineers, scientists and researchers located between our flagship BioFactory in Ivry-sur-Seine (France), our SpaceLab at NASA KSC Florida (USA) and a Business Hub in San Francisco (USA).

tagline: eve drones arrive within 3 minutes of a 911 call to help emergency responders save resources and save lives.
description: eve Vehicles Corporation designs American-made drone systems for public safety. We use drone systems to help improve efficiency of human capital by arriving quickly on scene and providing accurate information. Our advanced drone systems can be accessed from anywhere in the world through our secure web portal.
problem_statement: Over the last two years, crime in Austin has risen by 200% and our police force shrunk by approximately 40%. If you were to call 911 right now, you would be looking at an average wait time of 9 minutes to speak with an operator and it would take another 45 minutes for police officers to show up. Lives are lost in these moments.Our drones show up first at the scene of 911 calls within three minutes of speaking with an operator. Our drones autonomously fly to the scene from charging nests deployed around the city, and are then controlled by a drone pilot through our web portal once at the emergency scene.  Responders love our "hands-off" subscription model, because we do all the maintenance, updating, and training for the system. We help bridge the gap of human resources in emergency services using robotic automation.By showing up within 3 minutes, we can tell the city which resources to send, if they need to show up at all, and how to approach the situation safely. This system will save the city incredible amounts of money, and pay for itself.

description: Transmute empowers enterprises across industries with authentic data and traceable insights. Transmute Verifiable Data Platform (VDP) transforms digitized and paper documents into secure, interoperable, context rich data that streamlines regulatory compliance and maximizes business agility. Leveraging Decentralized Identifiers (DIDs), Verifiable Credentials (VCs), and Linked Data, Transmute VDP addresses the key global trade issues of identity, trust, and meaning by providing enhanced security and unprecedented visibility into supply chain transactions.
problem_statement: Even with the rise of technology and e-commerce, supply chains today remain impeded by massive amounts of manual administration. Less than 1% of trade documents are fully digitized, and the disparate solutions [like pdfs and EDI data] have resulted in recreating or exacerbating data silos amongst supply chain participants. Transmute Verifiable Data Platform (VDP) transforms digitized and paper documents into secure, interoperable, context rich data that streamlines regulatory compliance and maximizes business agility. Built atop open standards, Transmute VDP leverages Decentralized Identifiers (DIDs), Verifiable Credentials (VCs), and Linked Data to address the key global trade issues of identity, trust, and meaning by providing enhanced security and unprecedented visibility into supply chain transactions.

tagline: AI Teacher Copilot
description: A platform where teachers can assign personalized problem sets to students based on their previous performance. problem_statement: Teachers often follow a 'one size fits all' model when assigning homework, as its near impossible to design questions for each student when you have 100 students and a multitude of other commitments. This works against students on both ends of the learning curve: smart kids aren't challenged and have to complete more problems than necessary to demonstrate content mastery, and kids that are behind have to move onto new material while leaving gaps in their learning.

These, often unseen leaks, hindering businesses from reaching their full revenue potential, manifest as stagnations, delays, misaligned prioritizations, data discrepancies, and process non-compliance, among others. They permeate the revenue engine, from marketing and sales to customer success, despite the proliferation of dashboards and BI tools.While this is a systemic problem, finding all the leaks isn't humanly possible! This is because of siloed systems and functions, volumes of data in each. Revenue operations teams are painstaking tasked with manually combing through charts, spreadsheets. Repeating this inefficient process every day.

tagline: Frictionless Document Automation
description: UnicornForms streamlines data, document and e-signing workflows in highly regulated government and enterprise applications. Today, admin, paperwork and bureaucracy costs companies and the US economy trillions of dollars due to lack of automation. Whether it's enrollment, benefit applications, inspections, audits or renewing a certification, admins and their clients are stuck with PDFs, email, bad process or expensive custom solutions. We remove bureaucracy as a barrier.We have built a generic solutions architecture that is sector agnostic. Essentially, we are Google Docs, Forms, eSign and a database combined. Additionally, we provide exceptional multi-lingual mobile optimized experiences, even for hard to complete government forms. By focusing on the data engineering level, we can autofill routine data between formats in an easy point and click interface.
problem_statement: There are two layers to the problem we address. The first layer is very high level. We tackle the multi-trillion dollar problem of corporate inefficiency in managing, creating and sharing documents, whether it's simple contracts and agreements or more complex regulatory filings. The second layer is expressed in segment specific terms. For example, today special ed or government benefit programs are not automated in enrollment solutions in education. PII, PHI and other sensitive data are transmitted as PDFs via insecure channels, such as email. Union forms or filing permits for film projects are cumbersome and costly to complete. Inspections and audits of a building are done on paper or in PDFs.While end users frame their problem within specific terms, what unites all these problems is the need to have webhooks within documents that can be streamlined via workflows, autofilling or programmatically.

tagline: Reward your fans with NFT ticketing
description: Relic Tickets uses blockchain technology to issue smart tickets packed with amazing benefits for fans and the management tools you need. Say goodbye to counterfeit tickets while continuing to serve primary and resale markets with Relic Tickets.
problem_statement: SAY GOODBYE TO COUNTERFEIT TICKETSOur tickets are registered on the blockchain and connected to each visitor’s smartphones, making fraud impossible.You are now able to:- Lock tickets (once sold) and unlock them at a date and time of your choosing- Increase consumer trust by offering a truly counterfeit proof solution to purchase their tickets.- Our smart ticket is equipped with non-static, revolving QR codes that change as a function of time and when it’s transferred to a different user.

tagline: We power multifamily hospitality: Lodgeur helps apartment buildings boost and diversify cash flow by converting and managing vacant units to attract renters looking for convenient and flexible furnished accommodation.
description: We're a B2B2C prop-tech company that helps apartment building owners boost their cash flow and property value. We do this by converting empty apartments and managing them to attract a new type of renter looking for the convenience of furnished accommodation on flexible terms. Our furnished living on-demand product gives traveling professionals and digital nomads the service and consistency of a hotel with the spaciousness and function of a stylish home. It's also perfect for people who hate moving and assembling furniture! Our long-term vision is to build the operating system that powers apartment buildings anywhere globally to increase and diversify their NOI (net operating income) by incorporating hospitality into their revenue management mix..Why now? The pandemic has accelerated changes in how we live, work, and travel. We're switching from booking hotels to alternative accommodation. We're spending less time in the office or never going back. And that means we're no longer tied to a single location every day.Our competitors are rental arbitrage companies such as short-term rental brand Sonder and corporate housing operators. What differentiates us is that as the building's partner instead of tenant, we don't have a long-term commitment to pay a fixed monthly rent. Instead, we make money by charging a commission on the revenues generated, earning high-profit margins (75%). Our model better balances risk and rewards for owners: it generates more revenue in good times and eliminates the risk of a lease default in bad times. This last point is essential because three of the four largest competitors defaulted on their leases and went out of business during the pandemic.
problem_statement: If you need a place to live in the US, just about every property is rented unfurnished on a long-term contract. But people's lives don't always fit into neat 12-month sprints. Why does moving need to be so hard? Why do you need to own your furniture? And if you need temporary housing, you're stuck between flawed options: booking monotonous hotels or playing 'Airbnb roulette'. Hotels are expensive, and the rooms are small and not well suited to families or sharers. With no kitchen, you're forced to eat out or order expensive room service – a pain if you're staying more than a couple of nights.It's no surprise then that many apartment budlings are struggling with vacancy losses. They only market a single product: bare apartments on a long-term lease. In Houston, the average downtown building has forty empty units, costing them nearly a million dollars in vacancy loss each year! And worse, since buildings are valued on their cash flows, it's knocking millions of dollars off the potential value! Things are different overseas. Back in London (where I'm from), four out of every five properties are rented fully furnished on shorter terms. And that makes sense. The trend is for innovative companies to disrupt the status quo by providing more convenience and flexibility to consumers. Amazon changed how we shop. Netflix changed how we watch TV. And now Lodgeur is changing how we travel and sleep by offering on-demand accommodation.

tagline: Do Anything, With Anyone, Anywhere.
description: Froop is an innovative platform transforming the way people plan and experience social events. Designed to streamline the event lifecycle, Froop offers unique, user-friendly tools for organizing gatherings that are both meaningful and memorable. With a focus on privacy, community, and connectivity, Froop caters to individuals and organizations seeking genuine interactions away from the noise of mainstream social media. Our mission is to empower users with the capability to effortlessly create, manage, and enjoy events, fostering real-world connections and enriching social experiences.
problem_statement: Social event planning and coordination are inefficient and fragmented, leading to significant time waste and reduced engagement. The average person spends over 8 hours weekly managing social activities, using multiple disconnected tools that lack context-awareness for different event types. This fragmentation results in:Wasted time and effort in coordinationDecreased participation due to planning frictionReduced quality of social experiencesInefficient use of resources for event organizersCurrent solutions are either too generic or address only specific aspects of event planning, failing to provide end-to-end management for the diverse range of social activities people engage in, from casual gatherings to organized amateur sports. This gap in the market represents a significant opportunity to streamline social coordination, enhance engagement, and improve the overall quality of social interactions.

tagline: myNILpay is a first-of-its-kind fintech platform to enable fans an NCAA-compliant method to direct-pay college student athletes for their Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL). #NILforALL
description: myNILpay is a first-of-its-kind fintech platform using blockchain technology to offer fans an NCAA-compliant method to direct-pay college student athletes for their Name, Image, and Likeness (NIL). myNILpay revolutionizes the way fans support their favorite college athletes by providing an opportunity for all student athletes, men and women, revenue and non-revenue sports to monetize their NIL.
problem_statement: On July 1, 2021, the NCAA implemented a new groundbreaking policy allowing students to profit from their NIL (Name, Image, Likeness). To date there has been little or no opportunity for vast majority of the 500,000 student athletes to monetize their NIL.

tagline: The Automatic Headshot Studio
description: Studio Pod is a groundbreaking photography studio that leverages automation to eliminate the need for a photographer.  With features like online scheduling and management, self-operating Pods for photo capture, and instant access to high-quality images, Studio Pod offers a unique combination of convenience, affordability, and accessibility to help users present themselves in their best light.
problem_statement: Headshots are costly, inconvenient, and inconsistent. Customers face varying results and experiences with each photographer, making it difficult to know what to expect. Coordinating headshots for a team only compounds these issues, leading to wasted time and money.Studio Pod solves these problems. Customers can purchase and schedule photo sessions on their own time through our website. Our autonomous Pods deliver professional-level results with just the touch of a button and provide a preview of the photos throughout the process, eliminating surprises. High-resolution photos are delivered quickly and can be downloaded and used right away. Corporate clients can manage all team photos in one convenient online portal.We serve customers through permanent locations and on-site delivery, providing a convenient and streamlined headshot experience.

tagline: Modernizing Makeup
Life-changing phone service for families with cognitive challenges
description: teleCalm stops problem calls for seniors living with Alzheimer’s & other cognitive challenges. teleCalm's landline and cell phone service empowers families to stop late-night calls, repeated calls, 911 abuse, elder fraud, and 100% of telemarketer and scam calls. Our service works with family caregivers to help their loved ones age in place, maintain their independence, reduce senior isolation, and reduce caregiver stress.Family caregivers subscribe to our $55 monthly phone service for their loved-one and manage that service remotely through the Caregiver app. Most subscribe to our service to stop OUTGOING call problems, but they also love that we block 100% of the incoming telemarketer / scam calls as well. Caregivers set custom quiet hours to manage late-night calling and curb repeated dialing issues automatically. Caregivers can also limit incoming and outgoing calls to only pre-approved contacts. For seniors calling 911 unnecessarily, we can reroute these calls to nurses stations in a senior living community or to our EMT call center for seniors living independently.teleCalm’s patent-protected service is the ONLY service that stops outgoing call problems and restricts calls to only trusted contacts. teleCalm is a veteran and woman-owned social impact company.
problem_statement: There are over 10 million seniors in the USA living with dementia and other cognitive issues, that’s 18% of the senior population. These seniors are also being cared for by 20 million family caregivers, most over 55 years old themselves. Most of these seniors have challenges using the phone; repeatedly calling friends & family, and calling all throughout the night. Many are easily swayed, buying everything they see on TV. They are also defrauded of $36 billion a year, 18% of which is by toxic family members and friends. Many also make unnecessary 911 calls resulting in fines to the families.There are an additional 24 million individuals with other cognitive challenges; including Autism, TBI, and the Intellectually Disabled -- many being cared for by the 50-plus age group as well. These challenges cause substantial loneliness, isolation, and stress, both to the individual and the family caregivers. Isolation has been proven to have negative mental as well as physical effects. This can increase the progression of the senior’s dementia, as well as the strain placed on the caregiver.This represents a TAM of $12.4 billion (34 million people) in the US alone.

tagline: Coliving made simple.
description: Messy roommates? BoBo is a mobile application that helps roommates communicate and manage chores to simply the coliving experience.
problem_statement: Imagine coming home after a long day of work to a pile of dirty dishes, an overflowing trash can, and dirty toilet stains left by your roommates. For our digital generation, the awkwardness of confronting your roommates often outweighs the inconvenience of the mess itself. Our survey revealed that an overwhelming 81% (308 out of 382) of UT students reported experiencing roommate-related issues, primarily due to roommates failing to complete their assigned chores (255 respondents).

tagline: AI-Powered Innovation, Made Easy
description: App Orchid was born as an AI firm in 2014.  App Orchid built the App Orchid Platform as an enterprise grade AI platform that combines all the technology required to build AI powered enterprise apps.App Orchid is democratizing AI. No longer do business users have to endure long and expensive IT engagements. The App Orchid platform allows enterprises to deploy AI apps without any coding, replacement of systems or training. The App Orchid platform automatically gets your enterprise data “AI Ready” by performing the entire Knowledge Harvesting Lifecycle so you don’t have to deploy and integrate multiple tools. Most importantly we incorporate your employees “tribal knowledge” so that you get the best insights and recommendations for your business.
problem_statement: Companies are trying to develop and deploy AI and IoT applications at scale but usually never progress beyond experiments and prototypes because of the complexity in bringing together the myriad of technologies and making them work together to deliver on the use case(s).This requires years of building an enterprise platform which supports data aggregation and integration, multi-cloud computing, collaborative platform development, enterprise microservices, and a host of other technical components to work together in one common framework.The common framework must then be implemented by highly skilled (and expensive) technical personnel. It must also be designed to be easily usable by end users and provide significant business value.The cost and time needed to develop and deliver this common framework, or "model-driven architecture" as more recently advertised, is prohibitive for most organizations and very risky and expensive if not done properly. Most organizations have failed.

tagline: SaaS application which allows attorneys and private investigators to use limited data to find information on people relevant to their cases.
description: SOLUTION / PRODUCTSaaS application which allows attorneys and private investigators to use limited data to find information on people relevant to their cases. Data algorithms access 31 (currently) unique data sources to aggregate and normalize data into simplified reports. FMW uses data iteration (using bits of data to find more data, then using the newly located data to uncover even more data) to mimic manual searches at lighting speed. Recent notable additions to FMW data are a homegrown, multi-billion record dark web breach database, and a network with thousands of ALPR (automatic license plate recognition) camera’s that track vehicle sighting around the nation.
problem_statement: It is hard to locate further information when you only have limited information to go on. For example, finding stolen vehicles, depositions and testimonies, stolen assets, jury selection, finding facts, and more.

tagline: Watch. Play. Be. Together.
description: WiVu (pronounced "We View") is a marketplace reinventing out of home social entertainment with an Airbnb-style booking app for private viewing parties.  Users host their own watch parties in private rooms - located within hotels, restaurants/bars and movie theaters - with professional grade AV, comfortable seating, food and drinks and (best of all) no need to clean up.
problem_statement: The options for viewing content outside of the home have not kept pace with consumer demand and expectations.  Movie theaters don't provide a compelling experience in terms of choice (limited options and times) or social viewing (sitting side-by-side in the dark with behavior restrictions) and bars can be crowded and difficult to find/hear what you're looking for.  Additionally, there are thousands of locations across the country (bars, hotels, restaurants, movie theaters, FECs) that have massively underutilized capacity in addition to food & beverage service.  WiVu makes the process for bringing these two groups together as simple as Uber or Airbnb.

tagline: Energy is here.
description: - Here connects you with a trusted network of businesses ready to help with time-consuming or energy-depleting tasks from house-cleaning to meal delivery to transportation.- Our simple, easy-to-use tools enable you and your friends and family members to build community and extend support for the things that will make an immediate difference.- We introduce you to services designed to manage stress and build resilience as you navigate your diagnosis, from mental health services to financial advice to nutritional counseling.- Connect with the Here community to hear real stories, ask questions, and lean on a nationwide collective eager to give back—because everyone deserves an equitable chance in this fight.

tagline: Measuring, Monitoring and Reducing GHG Emissions
description: We help our customers save money by automating the tracking and reporting emission process. We eliminate operational and administrative manhours needed to measure and calculate emissions, and our accurate measurements actually reduce the reported emissions, which lowers the carbon cost and future carbon taxes. We provide data to make the Scope 1 and Scope 3 information “auditable”.
problem_statement: Many companies are committed to reaching Net-Zero emissions in 2050. Although it is an admirable goal, most of the companies don’t have a realistic plan on how to reach it. Stakeholders are tired of empty promises and have begun calling out companies who make false statements on their progress. Very few companies have systems that can measure and monitor emissions accurately, and the risk of erroneous emission data increases operating costs and leads to bad capital decisions.

tagline: The Next Generation of Women's+ Healthcare
Re-Energizing Building Facades
description: INOVUES re-energizes building facades through its non-invasive window retrofit innovations, making buildings smarter, greener, and healthier for a better and sustainable future. Our patented retrofit systems slash facade and window upgrade costs by up to 90%, resulting in up to 10x faster payback and higher ROI. Our mission is to help building owners and operators save up to 40% on energy consumption and comply with the new building emissions laws so cities can achieve their energy-efficiency and emissions-reduction targets.
problem_statement: Windows are responsible for up to 40% of the energy loss in buildings, the largest energy-consuming and carbon-emitting sector globally. Historically, upgrading building facades and windows has been a massive undertaking, requiring full or partial replacement and months of business disruptions. This results in unrealistic payback periods and negative ROIs.INOVUES offers the only technology that enables building facades to be retrofitted with the latest energy-saving and smart glass innovations without removal, replacement, or disruption. The primary use case for our non-invasive retrofit systems is transforming single- and low-performing double-pane windows (found in over 50% of existing buildings) into high-performing multi-pane systems — thereby saving owners up to 40% on energy consumption and carbon emissions while also improving occupants' thermal and acoustic comfort and increasing the value and sustainability of older buildings.

description: PerSim is an augmented reality medical patient simulator that provides highly realistic depictions of actual clinical conditions in nearly any environment at a price 1/10th that of traditional, mannequin-based, "high-fidelity" simulators.
problem_statement: Medical error, most often caused by cognitive error, is responsible for up to 400,000 deaths per year and is the third leading cause of death in the United States. We firmly believe that with better training tools, healthcare professionals can provide better care.

tagline: Short-term space for YOUR business. Where Main Street offers space for entrepreneurs and unlocks a new revenue source.
description: GotSpot is short-term space for YOUR business. We're a digital marketplace where Main Street space is a resource for entrepreneurs, and entrepreneurs are a revenue source for local businesses.Think Airbnb, but for all kinds of commercial spaces. GotSpot is the place where entrepreneurs who typically don't keep commercial space (kitchens, galleries, studios, warehouses, workshops, bars, restaurants, etc.) can find space to rent from local businesses for hours or days at a time. The entrepreneur gets to capitalize on a new opportunity, while creating a new revenue stream for local businesses. We're growing the local economy while building community resiliency.
problem_statement: GotSpot is helping small businesses grow everyday, and helping communities tackle their toughest days.

tagline: The ubiquitous digital receipt
description: I Hate Receipts  is revolutionizing digital receipts. Using a sleek checkout experience for card present and online purchases, IHR powers the digtial receipt experience for our partners. Those partners include payment termianls, e.g. Ingenico, Merchant Acquirers, e.g. Payroc, and Card Brands, e.g. Mastecard.I Hate Receipts' technology turns each receipt into an opportunity for merchants, brands, and partners to interact with the customer after the transaction. By unlocking the data that is currently trapped on paper and emailed receipts, we make every receipt function and feel like an app.I Hate Receipts' Whitelabled Backend Portal allows Merchants to see valuable data insights on their consumers. The Consumer Data Platform (CDP) that I Hate Receipts provides is sourced from Level 3 Receipt Data. These insights allow SMB Merchants to compete and keep up with big box stores and larger platforms.I Hate Receipts was hired recently by GS1 to write the digital receipt standards for the FDA and CDC. This Federal Government Contract is revenue producing and allows for future opportunity with the Federal Government.
problem_statement: Receipts are a wasted opportunity for merchants. Often times the last word a merchant says to a consumer is "Receipt." Would you like your receipt or do you want your receipt? Then, the consumer is out of the door and the merchant is spending a lot of money to try to get them back in the door.We believe the receipt is not the end of the conversation but just the beginning of the relationship.I Hate Receipts' Digitial Receipt Experience powers the Backoffice Portal available to merchants and whitelbaled to our partners.

milestones.title: Federal Government Contract
milestones.description: We have been contracted by the FDA and CDC through GS1 to write digital receipt standards involving foodborne illness.

tagline: SimWerx
description: SimWerx is dedicated to optimizing medical training and prehospital care, particularly in high-stress, time-sensitive environments. With cutting-edge technologies such as REAL-X and Medic Copilot, it has established itself as a solution provider for prolonged casualty care. REAL-X ensures a uniform, realistic training environment, while Medic Copilot augments decision-making capabilities with context-aware advice.
problem_statement: In austere and prolonged casualty care environments, the ability to make swift clinical decisions is not just critical - it's a matter of life and death. Medical professionals in these situations often work under intense stress, constrained resources, and in conditions where traditional telehealth support is impractical due to limited or no connectivity. In these circumstances, the challenge of managing multiple casualties concurrently can lead to cognitive overload, which can significantly impede the effective delivery of care.

tagline: Wearable devices for accelerated muscle strengthening
description: AL’s first device, KneeStim, is a light, low-profile device that uses neuromuscular electrical stimulation (NMES) to dynamically stimulate quadriceps muscles in sync with regular activity, accelerating rehabilitation by strengthening and training muscle with each step. KneeStim’s unique mix of AI, motion-tracking hardware, and patented joint modeling OS enables rapid gait and treatment personalization.  Collected physiologic data is used to optimize rehab, track compliance, and enable recurring reimbursement. Competitors’ devices do not adapt to movement and can only be used while stationary, leading to reduced efficacy and poor compliance.
problem_statement: 15M in the US seeking solutions for knee pain and dysfunction + 1M recovering from knee surgery  ~$10B knee treatment TAM.  Poor quadriceps muscle strength correlates with pain, poor mobility, and lower quality of life, creating $3B in avoidable healthcare spend. Physical therapy is effective, but <30% of patients attend all prescribed sessions or remain compliant with their home-based regimens. COVID-19 has driven physical therapy cancellations and no-shows up by 20% and delayed ~10k knee procedures per lockdown week, creating more need for cost- and time-efficient, remote, trackable rehab.

tagline: Financial planning and analysis platform for tech SMEs working with multiple data sources.
description: Cofi has built a powerful next generation financial planning and analysis tool that enables lean finance teams to eliminate archaic and time-consuming manual reporting and modeling efforts by seamlessly connecting data-sources and offering a state-of-the art analytics, modeling, and reporting engine. CoFi offers one of the most flexible and easy-to-use options in the market, at competitive prices.CoFi has also gained impressive GTM traction after just 3 quarters in the US market by signing up 10 clients and $70K in ARR, and have an exciting product roadmap looking to develop game-changing AI/ML functionality like an AI copilot, automatic error-correction, and automatic forecasting.
problem_statement: Today, B2B SaaS finance teams are required to work with more data sources than ever before, tighter timelines, and in smaller teams - and Excel cannot keep up! Cofi offers the most flexible and cost-effective option to unlock productivity and creativity in Finance teams.

milestones.title: 30 company consolidation with 20+ different currencies for a payment unicorn company
milestones.description:
A global payment company manages 30 subsidiaries, each dealing in different currencies.
Challenge:
Consolidating and standardizing financial data from 20+ currencies and various subsidiaries is complex.
Solution with Cofi:
Multi-Currency Handling: Cofi consolidates financials from different currencies into a unified format.
Data Standardization: Ensures consistent financial reporting across all subsidiaries.
Real-Time Insights: An immediate, consolidated financial overview of the entire operation is offered.
Scalability: Adapts to the growth and changes in each subsidiary’s financial processes.
Strategic Decisions: Facilitates informed decision-making with clear financial insights.
Outcome:
Cofi streamlines the company’s financial management, providing a comprehensive view for better strategic planning and a strong global financial stance.

tagline: We design | We build
description: Von Perry's is a tech-habitat company. Tech-Habitat is a new industry Von Perry is introducing to the industry 4.0.  Our solutions are engineered and constructed for the twenty first century consumers. Texas based Von Perry is committed to bring beautiful v-Homes to the mass population.  Visit our website to know more about our on going projects.
problem_statement: The construction industry has not changed much over the years. Today, the industry is facing a severe labor shortage, which resulted in skyrocketing home prices.

tagline: Illuminating the Heart and Lungs for Chronic Diseases
description: BioLum's innovative chemiluminescent technology provides a cutting-edge point-of-care biomarker detection platform for chronic diseases, allowing for the rapid evaluation of drug efficacy, quantitative understanding of disease progression, and early prediction of exacerbations.BioLum’s flagship product, the BioSense AMD H2O2 (Airway Monitoring Device, Hydrogen Peroxide), is a point-of-care, low-cost device that analyzes respiratory inflammation in real time. This will allows clinicians and patients to monitor airway inflammation, Predict exacerbation, and Personalize treatments.BioLum’s second test in the development pipeline is the BioSense VeNO (Vascular Endogenous Nitric Oxide) for cardiovascular disease, a unique finger-prick blood test that provides an instant readout of endothelial dysfunction and will transform cardiovascular healthcare. This will help predict risk of heart disease, select best treatment based on nitric oxide bioavailability, and Monitor disease progression.Along with these products, our novel chemiluminescent techniques have garnered interest from a number of biopharmaceutical development companies. BioLum collaborates with pharmaceutical leaders to help analyze novel drug compounds and identify the mechanisms of action to personalize treatment.• Shift to value based care• Shit to remote monitoring• Patient identification and stratification
problem_statement: Reactive oxygen and nitrogen species (RONS) have been linked to development of several inflammatory diseases; yet, measuring RONS in the lab setting requires expensive instruments, time, and expertise.Respiratory Disease (Asthma and COPD) is the 3rd leading cause of death. Asthma is the most common childhood disease. Exacerbations are the largest cost burden and most dangerous to lung health. Urgent need to monitor progression and prevent exacerbation.Cardiovascular disease (heart failure, PAH) is the leading cause of death worldwide. 655,000 Americans die annually. Nitric Oxide regulates cardiovascular health. Urgent need to monitor nitric oxide and personalize treatments.

tagline: Boogaloo creates healthy technology for children. Their first product, Sound Companion, is a kid-friendly and parent-approved audio console that will allow kids up to age 14 to stream their favorite music, podcasts, and audiobooks without the privacy concerns inherent in other digital devices.
description: Using an app, parents can choose the music and stories that are right for their family, which are synched to our dedicated audio console. Kids can listen whenever and wherever they like: our portable, battery-powered audio console doesn’t have a microphone, camera, and lives mostly offline.
problem_statement: • Today’s digital media landscape is not built for kids’ wellbeing or parents’ convenience• Audio is the only digital medium kids can use safely on their own, but it’s disembodied• 9 in 10 parents identify significant barriers to their kids listening independently

tagline: Let us find you hidden scripting IP
description: Arganteal’s solution allows you to integrate all the DevOps tools you already use into one framework. The consolidation and automation offered by Arganteal's patented solution allows for lighting fast deployment designed to meet the speed of Agile development sprints. Utilizing the Arganteal software suite can reduce deployment labor by 90% by streamlining deployments, easing transfers, and freeing you from script errors.  Our auto-deployment orchestration technology can synthesize the deployment code for any target platform using one universal set of perfected, platform-specific Libraries. These Libraries capture process details and prevent tribal knowledge loss. They also allow specific new workflows to be composed by less experienced engineers. Our software solution is platform and language agnostic and provides a framework to glue all other existing tools together. This means you can start making your scripts reusable from where your team is right now without having to learn a new language or start over. Our technology works on any layer of the stack from bare metal to infrastructure, to containers, to applications, and to application configuration. The result is a faster and more reliable DevOps process.
problem_statement: The traditional DevOps approach is often inefficient as things frequently get caught up moving over the wall from development to operations. In fact, its estimated hundreds of thousands of man-years are spent on this kind of scripting every year. Gartner notes, the agile development process is relatively organized but the Ops team process is still fairly disorganized. The USAF says that integrating and fielding software on the Ops side of DevOps is very complex and accounts for two-thirds of software spending. Add to that deployment scripts are having to be continually written and rewritten from scratch as they are often not valued or catalogued. Since target server information must be manually entered into each script they are at best only partially reusable. Engineers usually run a hand edited script for every API and a typical cloud deployment might cross 10 API. The result of all of this is long, billable hours sitting at a PC. Arganteal has a unique approach to automating these very manual cloud process steps.

tagline: An Artificial Workforce Platform
description: We make Artificial Employees for your Small BusinessArtificial Compute gives you a simple way to create, train, and deploy an Artificial Workforce.
problem_statement: 61% of small to midsize business owners aren’t ready to adopt because AI is too complicated for what they need.

tagline: Local Eats without the wait
description: Streetstop is a 2 sided SaaS enabled Marketplace that connects new food businesses to consumers. The goal of Streetstop is to be the platform to find all of the different pop ups. Due to our background in the food space, we are focusing on food specifically chefs to grow a foundation and ultimately go into fashion, beauty etc. Lastly, we want to build a strong foundation in LA before we expand to the rest of the world and the rest of the verticals.
problem_statement: More and more Gen Z are looking for Experiences. The rise of pop ups is leading to a $95 Billion Market by 2025 (https://capitaloneshopping.com/research/pop-up-retail-statistics/). The goal of Streetstop is to help consumers discover, order and receive communications from the pop ups. For vendors, the goal of streetstop is to find their early customers, manage orders and send communications to their customers.

tagline: Sleep Better = Heal Faster!
description: We are a startup medical device company that is focused on recovery after shoulder surgery. Shoulder surgery is the second largest orthopedic surgery in the country with over 1 million procedures per year.  There is a $250 million+ untapped market to address Sleep in recovery.  We have a patented product with a 96% success rate of our patients averaging 6-8 hours of uninterrupted Sleep and are only serious competitor is a "recliner" which has proven to be effective as it pertains to Sleep, for the last 60 years. It is reasonable to expect to gain 50-75% market share in this untapped market we are basically creating.
problem_statement: The second largest orthopedic surgery in the country (Rotator Cuff) recovery process is universally known as a miserable 3–6-month recovery, with sleep deprivation being the biggest issue. Current post-surgical recovery methods, unchanged for over 60 years, result in patients getting only 2 hours of uninterrupted sleep while using a recliner.  Since most patients must return to work within 1-2 weeks after surgery, this fog from sleep deprivation and how that exacerbates every other difficulty with the recovery, is what makes this such a miserable experience.Our patients sleep in their own beds their first night home from surgery and average 6-8 hours of uninterrupted sleep, awakening fully rested with little or no pain.   These patient outcomes are just unheard of with this recovery and why we believe we will become the new standard of care for this and many other recoveries.

tagline: More. Cargo. Volume. Period.
description: C Cubed Aerospace is an innovative asset-lite aerospace company. We produce cargo aircraft by converting passenger aircraft to freighters. C Cubed focuses on the Airbus A320 & Airbus A321, which are the most successful narrow-body (single aisle) transport aircraft ever produced. We give those aircraft a “second economic life,” after they have concluded their service as passenger aircraft. Our innovative and green design results in the most efficient freighters carrying more containerized cargo than any other narrowbody aircraft in the industry.
problem_statement: The air cargo market is expected to grow at a 3.5% CAGR over the next 20 years. That compounding effect suggests a requirement for 1,300 additional passenger to freighter (P2F) conversions. The Airbus A320 and A321 are an excellent choice for those conversions as they are newer, enjoy a more modern design and are more widely available to convert to the cargo configuration compared to the Boeing 737 and its 1960's design. C Cubed Aerospace designed a unique configuration allowing for one additional pallet position in the A320 and up to two additional pallet positions in the A321 compared to the competition. This allows us to claim we are the greenest narrowbody conversion available as our design can transport more cubic volume than the competition plus we use less fossil fuel than the Boeing narrowbody conversions, up to 25% less fuel compared to the older Boeing 757. History has shown that when new cargo designs are introduced with more cargo volume capacity, that product has become the dominant offering.

tagline: The first membership-based healthcare marketplace  disrupting the $1 trillion  health insurance industry
description: The first membership-based healthcare marketplace  disrupting the $1 trillion traditional health insurance industry.indipop provides a curated marketplace of top-rated, membership-based healthcare plans with a savings of over 20%-70% compared to traditional insurance. indipop plan rates are NOT based on employment status or earnings providing flexibility for the self employed and small business owner.   They offer an open network of providers/hospitals serving all 50 states with the same benefits state to state and set pricing for major medical needs, this is health care as it is meant to be.
problem_statement: 57mil (40% of the US workforce) are self-employed (gig workers, freelancers, contractors) and an additional 12 million are small business owners who struggle to access and afford quality healthcare. They often purchase high-deductible expensive plans with limited networks and benefits.

tagline: Pick your pics, quick
description: PicTag helps uses search, sort, and share their pictures more effectively. We allow users to add tags to photos which can be filtered and queried, and share pictures with those tags attached. Additionally, we use novel machine learning algorithms in association with cloud computing so that photos can be automatically tagged correctly and efficiently, making it both easier on the user to tag and more robust as more pictures get added to the neural network.
problem_statement: In a world dominated by pictures, it's still really hard to organize them on your phone. You can't add individual tags to images, you can't organize images you share with others or they share with you, and the machine learning built into phones is quite limited. We want to hand control to the user by letting them have full control over their photo gallery. Surveys we have conducted show on average, college students have over 8000 photos sitting locally on their phone, which they constantly scroll through when they need to find that right one - we want to create a world without aimless scrolling.

tagline: Automated Redactions - Let us Rectify Your Documents
description: Rectify’s technology automatically identifies and removes private data with minimal human interaction. YOU have control but we automate. We remove the human error and are 131x faster than manual processes.Rectify’s team worked together in AT&T’s corporate legal department where we were responsible for protecting sensitive content when documents were leaving the organization. We focused mostly on regulatory and litigation matters. AT&T trusted us in this capacity for 15 years. Over our tenure – we have protected 10s of millions of records.Fines are beginning to be assessed against violations of sharing data that contain personal identifiers and it is impacting businesses beyond litigation. With the ever expanding data privacy regulations that are being created by states the subject is becoming a highlighted problem and they are looking for solutions.
problem_statement: Every minute of every day, companies generate millions of digital documents filled with sensitive information. And they are sharing more data than ever before. However, removing that sensitive content is still very much a manual process.

tagline: At Home Vet Care
description: We make it possible for mobile vets to open an efficient online clinic, allowing them to make x5 time more money per hour. For pet parents, we are making it easier and simple to care for their pet, saving them time and money.
problem_statement: Pet parents need to take their pets to the clinic for every small issue costing them hundreds, and spending additional time.40% of Veterinarians are leaving the profession because of lack of wok-life balance.

tagline: revolutionizing women's healthcare
description: FemTec Health is the leading Health and Beauty Sciences Company focused on using technology and data to transform the total healthcare experience for women in every stage of their life cycle. FemTec Health’s mission is to revolutionize women’s healthcare by using state-of-the-art genomics, predictive intelligence, and digital technologies to create an experience that is unified, coordinated, and provides personalized services and products based on every woman's unique needs.
problem_statement: FemTec Health is the leading Health and Beauty Sciences Company focused on using technology and data to transform the total healthcare experience for women in every stage of their life cycle. FemTec Health’s mission is to revolutionize women’s healthcare by using state-of-the-art genomics, predictive intelligence, and digital technologies to create an experience that is unified, coordinated, and provides personalized services and products based on every woman's unique needs.

tagline: plug and play embedded finance
description: Deposits.inc is an embedded Fintech platform that provides regional and community banks with no-code, low code, and open banking solutions. Our focus is to bring innovative and customizable turnkey solutions on a micro services architecture without having to replace legacy infrastructure.
problem_statement: Deposits sits at the convergence of software, banking, and payments. Our low-code platform levels the playing field and enables you to deliver the best experiences in money and financial services for your community.

tagline: On-demand labor marketplace connecting schools, and substitute teachers
description: HelloSubs is a powerful teacher staffing platform leveraging AI to efficiently match schools in need of substitute teachers with qualified educators. By aggregating supply and demand, we solve one of the education system's most pressing challenges—staffing shortages—ensuring that classrooms remain productive and students’ learning isn't disrupted. Our intelligent platform streamlines the hiring process, making it faster, more reliable, and cost-effective for schools nationwide.
problem_statement: The education sector is facing a critical staffing shortage, with 70% of school districts across the U.S. struggling to find qualified substitute teachers. Each year, there are 69 million unfilled teaching assignments across three key segments: K-12 schools, early childhood education centers, and summer camps. This shortage disrupts classrooms, negatively impacts student learning outcomes, and leaves families without childcare.HelloSubs addresses this massive need by streamlining the process of finding and hiring substitute teachers. With a Total Addressable Market (TAM) of $64 billion, our platform is poised to capture significant value by connecting schools and educators more efficiently, and profitably than traditional processes.
